GP12garup1_u:4: oṃ nārāyaṇaṃ namaskṛtya naraṃ caiva narottamam /
GP12garup1_u:5: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayamudīrayet // GarP_Mang.1 //
GP12garup1_u:6: oṃ ajamajaramanantaṃ jñānarūpaṃ mahāntaṃ śivamamalamanādiṃ bhūtadehādihīnam /
GP12garup1_u:7: sakalakaraṇahīnaṃ sarvabhūtasthitaṃ taṃ harimamalamamāyaṃ sarvagaṃ vanda ekam // GarP_1,1.1 //
GP12garup1_u:8: namasyāmi hariṃ rudraṃ brahmāṇaṃ ca gaṇādhipam /
GP12garup1_u:9: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva manovākkarmabhiḥ sadā // GarP_1,1.2 //
GP12garup1_u:15: munayo ravisaṅkāśāḥ śāntā yajña parāyaṇāḥ // GarP_1,1.5 //
GP12garup1_u:17: sūta ! jānāsi sarvaṃ tvaṃ pṛcchāmastvāmato vayam /
GP12garup1_u:18: devatānāṃ hi ko deva īśvaraḥ pūjya eva kaḥ // GarP_1,1.6 //
GP12garup1_u:19: ko dhyeyaḥ ko jagatsraṣṭā jagatpātti ca hanti kaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:20: kasmātpravartate dharmo duṣṭahantā ca kaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,1.7 //
GP12garup1_u:21: tasya devasya kiṃ rūpaṃ jagatsargaḥ kathaṃ mataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:22: kairvrataiḥ sa tu tuṣṭaḥ syātkena yogena vāpyate // GarP_1,1.8 //
GP12garup1_u:24: varṇāśramādidharmāṇāṃ kaḥ pātā kaḥ pravartakaḥ // GarP_1,1.9 //
GP12garup1_u:28: purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ vakṣye sāraṃ viṣṇukathā śrayam /
GP12garup1_u:29: garuḍoktaṃ kaśyapāya purā vyāsācchrutaṃ mayā // GarP_1,1.11 //
GP12garup1_u:31: paramātmā paraṃ brahma janmādyasya yato bhavet // GarP_1,1.12 //
GP12garup1_u:34: hariḥ sa prathamaṃ devaḥ kaumāraṃ sargamāsthitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:39: tantraṃ sātvatamācaṣṭe naiṣkarmyaṃ karmaṇāṃ yataḥ // GarP_1,1.16 //
GP12garup1_u:40: naranārāyaṇo bhūtvā turye tepe tapo hariḥ /
GP12garup1_u:41: dharmasaṃ rakṣaṇārthāya pūjitaḥ sa surāsuraiḥ // GarP_1,1.17 //
GP12garup1_u:43: provāca sūraye sāṅkhyaṃ tattvagrāmavi nirṇayam // GarP_1,1.18 //
GP12garup1_u:55: dadhre kamaṭharūpeṇa pṛṣṭha ekādaśe vibhuḥ // GarP_1,1.24 //
GP12garup1_u:63: triḥ saptakṛtvaḥ kupito niḥ kṣattrāmakaronmahīm // GarP_1,1.28 //
GP12garup1_u:65: cakre vedataroḥ śākhāṃ dṛṣṭvā puṃso 'lpamedhasaḥ // GarP_1,1.29 //
GP12garup1_u:71: buddho nāmrā jinasutaḥ kīkaṭeṣu bhaviṣyati // GarP_1,1.32 //
GP12garup1_u:73: bhavitā viṣṇuyaśaso nāmnā kalkī jagatpatiḥ // GarP_1,1.33 //
GP12garup1_u:75: manuvedavido hyādyāḥ sarve viṣṇukalāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,1.34 //
GP12garup1_u:77: purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ vyāsaḥ purāsau me 'bravīdidam // GarP_1,1.35 //
GP12garup1_u:78: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye karmakāṇḍe etatpurāṇapravṛttihetunirūpaṇaṃ nāma prathamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:82: kathaṃ vyāsena kathitaṃ purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ tava /
GP12garup1_u:85: ahaṃ hi munibhiḥ sārdhaṃ gato badarikāśramam /
GP12garup1_u:86: tatra dṛṣṭo mayā vyāso dhyāyamānaḥ pareśvaram // GarP_1,2.2 //
GP12garup1_u:89: vyāsa brūhi hare rūpaṃ jagatsargādikaṃ tataḥ // GarP_1,2.3 //
GP12garup1_u:90: manye dhyāyasi taṃ yasmāttasmājjānāsi taṃ vibhum /
GP12garup1_u:91: evaṃ pṛṣṭo yathā prāha tathā viprā?nibodhata // GarP_1,2.4 //
GP12garup1_u:93: śṛṇu sūta ! pravakṣyāmi purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ tava /
GP12garup1_u:97: brahmā śrīgāruḍaṃ puṇyaṃ purāṇaṃ sāravācakam // GarP_1,2.6 //
GP12garup1_u:99: ahaṃ hi nārado dakṣo bhṛgvādyāḥ praṇipatya tam /
GP12garup1_u:102: purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ sāraṃ rudraṃ ca māṃ yathā /
GP12garup1_u:105: kathaṃ rudraṃ suraiḥ sārdhamabravīdvai hariḥ purā /
GP12garup1_u:106: purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ sāraṃ brūhi brahmanmahārthakam // GarP_1,2.9 //
GP12garup1_u:109: tatra dṛṣṭo mayā rudro dhyāyamānaḥ paraṃ padam // GarP_1,2.10 //
GP12garup1_u:110: pṛṣṭo namaskṛtaḥ kiṃ tvaṃ devaṃ dhyāyasi śaṅkara? /
GP12garup1_u:111: tvatto nānyaṃ paraṃ devaṃ jānāmi brūhi māṃ tataḥ // GarP_1,2.11 //
GP12garup1_u:114: ahaṃ dhyāyāmi taṃ viṣṇuṃ paramātmānamīśvaram // GarP_1,2.12 //
GP12garup1_u:118: tameva gatvā pṛcchāmaḥ sāraṃ yaṃ cintayāmyaham // GarP_1,2.14 //
GP12garup1_u:120: śuciṃ śuciṣadaṃ haṃsaṃ tatpadaṃ parameśvaram // GarP_1,2.15 //
GP12garup1_u:122: yasminviśvāni bhūtāni tiṣṭhanti ca viśanti ca // GarP_1,2.16 //
GP12garup1_u:126: garīyasāṃ gariṣṭhaṃ ca śreṣṭhaṃ ca śreyasāmapi // GarP_1,2.18 //
GP12garup1_u:128: gṛṇanti satyakarmāṇaṃ satyaṃ satyeṣu sāmasu // GarP_1,2.19 //
GP12garup1_u:129: purāṇa puruṣaḥ prokto brahmā prokto dvijātiṣu /
GP12garup1_u:134: yasyāgnirāsyaṃ dyaurmūrdhā khaṃ nābhiścaraṇau kṣitiḥ // GarP_1,2.22 //
GP12garup1_u:135: candrādityau ca nayane taṃ devaṃ cintayāmyaham /
GP12garup1_u:136: yasya trilokī jaṭhare masya kāṣṭhāśca bāhavaḥ // GarP_1,2.23 //
GP12garup1_u:138: yasya keśeṣu jīmūtā nadyaḥ sarvāṅgasandhiṣu // GarP_1,2.24 //
GP12garup1_u:144: padybhāṃ yasya kṣitirjātā śrotrābhyāṃ ca tathā diśaḥ // GarP_1,2.27 //
GP12garup1_u:146: sargaśca pratisargaśca vaṃśo manvantarāṇi ca // GarP_1,2.28 //
GP12garup1_u:151: stutvā praṇamya taṃ viṣṇuṃ śrotukāma sthitaḥ suraiḥ // GarP_1,2.30 //
GP12garup1_u:153: sārāntsārataraṃ viṣṇuṃ pṛṣṭavāṃstaṃ praṇamya vai // GarP_1,2.31 //
GP12garup1_u:155: yathā papraccha māṃ vyāsa stathāsau bhagavān bhavaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:156: papraccha viṣṇuṃ devādyaiḥ śṛṇvatāmamaraiḥ saha // GarP_1,2.32 //
GP12garup1_u:158: hare kathaya deveśa ! devadevaḥ ka īśvaraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:159: ko dhyeyaḥ kaśca vai pūjyaḥ kairvratai stuṣyate paraḥ // GarP_1,2.33 //
GP12garup1_u:160: kairdharmaiḥ kaiśca niyamaiḥ kayā vā dharmapūjayā /
GP12garup1_u:161: kenācāreṇa tuṣṭaḥ syātkiṃ tadrūpaṃ ca tasya vai // GarP_1,2.34 //
GP12garup1_u:170: śṛṇu rudra ! pravakṣyāmi brahmaṇā ca suraiḥ saha // GarP_1,2.38 //
GP12garup1_u:172: ahaṃ dhyeyaśca pūjyaśca stutyohaṃ statibhiḥ suraiḥ // GarP_1,2.39 //
GP12garup1_u:173: ahaṃ hi pūjito rudra ! dadāmi paramāṃ gatim /
GP12garup1_u:174: niyamaiśca vrataistuṣṭa ācāreṇa ca mānavaiḥ // GarP_1,2.40 //
GP12garup1_u:176: duṣṭanigrahakartā hi dharmagoptā tvahaṃ hara ! // GarP_1,2.41 //
GP12garup1_u:178: ahaṃ mantrāśca mantrārthaḥ pūjādhyānaparo hyaham // GarP_1,2.42 //
GP12garup1_u:181: jñātā śrotā tathā mantā vaktā vaktavyameva ca /
GP12garup1_u:182: sarvaḥ sarvātmako devo bhuktimuktikaraḥ paraḥ // GarP_1,2.44 //
GP12garup1_u:184: itihāsānyahaṃ rudra ! sarvavedā hyahaṃ śiva ! // GarP_1,2.45 //
GP12garup1_u:186: ahaṃ brahmā sarvalokaḥ sarvadevātmako hyaham // GarP_1,2.46 //
GP12garup1_u:189: yamo 'haṃ niyamo rudra ! vratāni vividhāni ca /
GP12garup1_u:190: ahaṃ sūryastathā candro maṅgalādīnyahaṃ tathā // GarP_1,2.48 //
GP12garup1_u:192: tuṣṭa ūce varaṃ brūhi matto vavre varaṃ sa tu // GarP_1,2.49 //
GP12garup1_u:194: mama mātā ca vinatā nāgairdāsīkṛtā hare /
GP12garup1_u:195: yathāhaṃ deva tāñjitvā cāmṛtaṃ hyānayāmi tat // GarP_1,2.50 //
GP12garup1_u:200: yathā tvayoktaṃ garuḍa tathā sarvaṃ bhaviṣyati // GarP_1,2.52 //
GP12garup1_u:206: gāruḍaṃ tava nāmnā talloke khyātiṃ gamiṣyati // GarP_1,2.55 //
GP12garup1_u:208: tathā khyātiṃ purāṇeṣu gāruḍaṃ gāruḍaiṣyati // GarP_1,2.56 //
GP12garup1_u:210: māṃ dhyātvā pakṣimukhyedaṃ purāṇaṃ gada gāruḍam // GarP_1,2.57 //
GP12garup1_u:212: kaśyapo gāruḍaṃ śrutvā vṛkṣaṃ dagdhamajīvayat // GarP_1,2.58 //
GP12garup1_u:215: garuḍoktaṃ gāruḍaṃ hi śṛṇu rudra ! madātmakam // GarP_1,2.59 //
GP12garup1_u:216: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śrīgaruḍamahāpurāṇotpattinirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvitīyo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:220: iti rudrābjajo viṣṇoḥ śuśrāva brahmaṇo muniḥ /
GP12garup1_u:221: vyāso vyāsādahaṃ vakṣyehaṃ te śaunaka naimiṣe // GarP_1,3.1 //
GP12garup1_u:225: vyavahāro vrataṃ vaṃśā vaidyakaṃ sanidānakam // GarP_1,3.3 //
GP12garup1_u:230: bhutvā harervāhanaṃ ca sargādīnāṃ ca kāraṇam /
GP12garup1_u:232: cakre kṣudhā hṛtaṃ yasya brahmāṇḍamudare hareḥ /
GP12garup1_u:233: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā smṛtamātreṇa nāgāndīnāṃ ca saṃkṣayaḥ // GarP_1,3.7 //
GP12garup1_u:235: garuḍaḥ sa haristena proktaṃ śrīkaśyapāya ca // GarP_1,3.8 //
GP12garup1_u:237: vakṣye vyāsaṃ namaskṛtya śṛṇu śaunaka tadyathā // GarP_1,3.9 //
GP12garup1_u:238: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣayanirūpaṇaṃ nāma tṛtīyo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:243: vaṃśānucaritaṃ caiva etad brūhi janārdana // GarP_1,4.1 //
GP12garup1_u:246: sargasthitilayāntāṃ tāṃ viṣṇoḥ krīḍāṃ purātanīm // GarP_1,4.2 //
GP12garup1_u:250: tathā puruṣarūpeṇa kālarūpeṇa ca sthitam // GarP_1,4.4 //
GP12garup1_u:251: vyaktaṃ viṣṇustathāvyaktaṃ puruṣaḥ kāla eva ca /
GP12garup1_u:257: aṇḍo hiraṇmayo rudra tasyāntaḥ svayameva hi /
GP12garup1_u:258: śarīragrahaṇaṃ pūrvaṃ sṛṣṭyarthaṃ kurute prabhuḥ // GarP_1,4.8 //
GP12garup1_u:262: sraṣṭā sṛjati cātmānaṃ viṣṇuḥ pālyaṃ ca pāti ca // GarP_1,4.10 //
GP12garup1_u:263: apasaṃhriyate cānte saṃhartā ca svayaṃ hara /
GP12garup1_u:270: (2) nanmātrāṇāṃ dvitīyastu bhūtasargo hi sa smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,4.14 //
GP12garup1_u:272: ityeṣa prākṛtaḥ sargaḥ sambhūto buddhipūrvakaḥ // GarP_1,4.15 //
GP12garup1_u:276: (7) tator'vāksrotasāṃ sargaḥ saptamaḥ sa tu mā nuṣaḥ // GarP_1,4.17 //
GP12garup1_u:278: pañcaite vaikṛtāḥ sargāḥ prākṛtāstu trayaḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,4.18 //
GP12garup1_u:280: sthāvarāntāḥ surādyāstu prajā rudra ! caturvidhāḥ // GarP_1,4.19 //
GP12garup1_u:281: brahmaṇaḥ kurvataḥ sṛṣṭiṃ jajñire mānasāḥ sutāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:286: utsasarja tatastāṃ tu tamomātrātmikāṃ tanūm // GarP_1,4.22 //
GP12garup1_u:291: tato hi balino rātrāvasurā devatā divā /
GP12garup1_u:292: sattvamātrāṃ tanuṃ gṛhya pitaraśca tato 'bhavan // GarP_1,4.25 //
GP12garup1_u:296: jyotsnā rātryahanī sandhyā śarīrāṇi tu tasya vai // GarP_1,4.27 //
GP12garup1_u:297: rajomātrāṃ tanu gṛhya kṣudabhūtkopa eva ca /
GP12garup1_u:298: kṣuttṛṭkṣāmā amṛgbhakṣā rākṣasā rakṣaṇācca ye // GarP_1,4.28 //
GP12garup1_u:300: jātāḥ kopena bhūtāste gandharvā jajñire tataḥ // GarP_1,4.29 //
GP12garup1_u:302: svargaṃ dyaurvakṣasaścakre sukhato 'jāḥ sa muṣṭavān // GarP_1,4.30 //
GP12garup1_u:311: āsyādvai brāhmaṇā jātā bāhubhyāṃ kṣattriyāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:312: ūrubhyāṃ tu viśaḥ sṛṣṭāḥ śūdraḥ padybhāma jāyata // GarP_1,4.35 //
GP12garup1_u:314: mārutaṃ ca viśāṃ sthānaṃ gāndharvaṃ śūdrajanmanām // GarP_1,4.36 //
GP12garup1_u:319: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sṛṣṭivarṇanaṃ nāma caturtho 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:325: dharmaṃ rudraṃ manuṃ caiva sanakaṃ ca sanātanam /
GP12garup1_u:326: bhṛguṃ sanatkumāraṃ ca ruciṃ śraddhāṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_1,5.2 //
GP12garup1_u:333: tasyāṃ tu janayāmāsa dakṣo duhitaraḥ śubhāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:334: dadau tā brahmaputrebhyaḥ satīṃ rudrāya dattavān // GarP_1,5.6 //
GP12garup1_u:336: bhṛgave ca dadau khyātiṃ rūpeṇāpratimāṃ śubhām // GarP_1,5.7 //
GP12garup1_u:338: śriyaṃ ca janayāmāsa patnī nārāyaṇasya yā // GarP_1,5.8 //
GP12garup1_u:339: tasyāṃ vai janayāmāsa balonmādau hariḥ svayam /
GP12garup1_u:344: virajāḥ sarvagaścaiva tasya putrau mahātmanaḥ // GarP_1,5.11 //
GP12garup1_u:348: somaṃ durvāsasaṃ caiva dattātreyaṃ ca yoginam // GarP_1,5.13 //
GP12garup1_u:351: kṣamā tu suṣuve bhāryā pulahasya prijāpateḥ /
GP12garup1_u:355: ūrjāyāṃ tu vasiṣṭasya saptājāyanta vai sutāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:358: svāhāṃ prādātsa dakṣo 'pi śaśarīrāya vahnaye // GarP_1,5.18 //
GP12garup1_u:360: phāvakaṃ pavamānaṃ ca śuciṃ cāpi jalāśinaḥ // GarP_1,5.19 //
GP12garup1_u:361: pitṛbhyaśca svadhā jajñe menāṃ vaitaraṇīṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:362: te ubhe brahmavādinyau menāyāṃ tu himācalaḥ // GarP_1,5.20 //
GP12garup1_u:363: mainākaṃ janayāmāsa gaurīṃ pūrvaṃ tu yā satī /
GP12garup1_u:364: tato brahmātmasambhūtaṃ pūrvaṃ svāyaṃbhuvaṃ prabhuḥ // GarP_1,5.21 //
GP12garup1_u:366: śatarūpāṃ ca tāṃ nārīṃ taponihatakalmaṣām // GarP_1,5.22 //
GP12garup1_u:370: devahūtiṃ manustāsu ākūtiṃ rucaye dadau // GarP_1,5.24 //
GP12garup1_u:371: prasūtiṃ caiva dakṣāya davahūtiṃ ca kardame /
GP12garup1_u:375: śraddhā calā dhṛtistuṣṭiḥ puṣṭirmedhā kriyā tathā /
GP12garup1_u:378: khyatiḥ satyatha sambhūtiḥ smṛtiḥ prītiḥ kṣamā tathā // GarP_1,5.28 //
GP12garup1_u:379: sannatiścānasūyā ca ūrjā svāhā svadhā tathā /
GP12garup1_u:380: bhṛghurbhavo marīciśca tathā caivāṅgirā muniḥ // GarP_1,5.29 //
GP12garup1_u:384: śraddhā kāmaṃ calā darpaṃ niyamaṃ dhṛtirātmajam // GarP_1,5.31 //
GP12garup1_u:386: medhā śrutaṃ kriyā daṇḍaṃ layaṃ vinayameva ca // GarP_1,5.32 //
GP12garup1_u:388: vyavasāyaṃ prajajñe vai kṣemaṃ śāntirasūyata // GarP_1,5.33 //
GP12garup1_u:390: kāmasya ca ratirbhāryā tatputro harṣa ucyate // GarP_1,5.34 //
GP12garup1_u:392: tasya jāmātaraḥ sarve yajñaṃ jagmurnimantritāḥ // GarP_1,5.35 //
GP12garup1_u:393: bhāryabhiḥ sahitāḥ sarve rudraṃ devīṃ satīṃ vinā /
GP12garup1_u:395: tyaktā dehaṃ punarjātā menāyāṃ tu himālayāt /
GP12garup1_u:398: vidhvaṃsya yajñaṃ dakṣaṃ tu taṃ śaśāpa pinākadhṛk /
GP12garup1_u:400: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe prajākartrādisṛṣṭirnāma pañcamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:405: sunītyāṃ tu dhruvaḥ putraḥ sa lebhe sthānamuttamam // GarP_1,6.1 //
GP12garup1_u:409: divañjayastasya sutastasya putro ripuḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,6.3 //
GP12garup1_u:413: adharṃmakārī veṇa(na) śca munibhiśca kuśairhataḥ // GarP_1,6.5 //
GP12garup1_u:417: tato 'sya dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ mamanthuḥ sahasā dvijāḥ // GarP_1,6.7 //
GP12garup1_u:419: puthurityevanāmā sa veṇaputro divaṃ yayau // GarP_1,6.8 //
GP12garup1_u:420: dudoha pṛthivīṃ rājā prajānāṃ jīvanāya hi /
GP12garup1_u:423: upayeme samudrasya lavaṇasya sa vai sutām // GarP_1,6.10 //
GP12garup1_u:425: sarve prācetasā nāma dhanurvedasya pāragāḥ // GarP_1,6.11 //
GP12garup1_u:428: prajāpatitvaṃ saṃprāpya bhāryā teṣāṃ ca māriṣa /
GP12garup1_u:431: nāvardhanta ca tāstasya apadhyātā hareṇa tu // GarP_1,6.14 //
GP12garup1_u:435: nāradoktā bhuvaścāntaṃ gatā jñātuṃ ca nāgatāḥ // GarP_1,6.16 //
GP12garup1_u:437: śavalāśvāste 'pi gatā bhrātṝṇāṃ padavīṃ hara ! // GarP_1,6.17 //
GP12garup1_u:438: dakṣaḥ kruddhaḥ śaśāpātha nāradaṃ janma cāpsyasi /
GP12garup1_u:439: nārado hyabhavatputraḥ kaśyapasya muneḥ punaḥ // GarP_1,6.18 //
GP12garup1_u:444: asiknyāṃ (mahiṣyāṃ) janayāmāsa dakṣo duhitaro hyatha // GarP_1,6.20 //
GP12garup1_u:445: ṣaṣṭiṃ kanyā rūpayutā dve caivāṅgirase dadau /
GP12garup1_u:446: dve prādātsa kṛśāśvāya daśa dharṃmāya cāpyatha // GarP_1,6.21 //
GP12garup1_u:448: pradadau bahuputrāya suprabhāṃ bhāminīṃ tathā // GarP_1,6.22 //
GP12garup1_u:451: sa kṛśāśvāya ca prādātsuprajāṃ ca tathā jayām /
GP12garup1_u:452: arundhatī vasuryār(jā) mī lambā bhānurmarudvatī // GarP_1,6.24 //
GP12garup1_u:453: saṅkalpā ca muhūrtā ca sādhyā viśvā ca tā daśa /
GP12garup1_u:456: kadrūḥ sādhyā harā krodhā vinatā surabhiḥ khagā // GarP_1,6.26 //
GP12garup1_u:460: lambāyāścaiva ghoṣo 'tha nāgavīthistu yā (jā) mitaḥ // GarP_1,6.28 //
GP12garup1_u:462: saṅkalpāyāstu sarvātmā jajñe saṃkalpa eva hi // GarP_1,6.29 //
GP12garup1_u:464: pratyūṣaśca prabhāsaśca vasavo nāmabhiḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,6.30 //
GP12garup1_u:465: āpasya putro vetuṇḍiḥ (ṇḍaḥ) śramaḥ śrānto dhvanistathā /
GP12garup1_u:470: anilasya śivā bhāryā tasyāḥ putraḥ pulomajaḥ // GarP_1,6.33 //
GP12garup1_u:474: apatyaṃ kṛttikānāṃ tu kārtikeya iti smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,6.35 //
GP12garup1_u:475: pratyuṣasya viduḥ putramṛṣiṃ nāmnā tu devalam /
GP12garup1_u:484: viṣṇuḥ śakror'yyamā dhātā tvaṣṭā pūṣā tathaiva ca // GarP_1,6.40 //
GP12garup1_u:485: vivasvānsavitā caiva mitro varuṇa eva ca /
GP12garup1_u:486: aśumāṃśca bhagaścaiva ādityā dvādaśa smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,6.41 //
GP12garup1_u:502: svarbhānurvṛṣaparvā ca pulomā ca mahāsuraḥ // GarP_1,6.49 //
GP12garup1_u:503: ete danoḥ sutāḥ khyātā vipracittiśca vīryavān /
GP12garup1_u:504: svarbhānoḥ suprabhā kanyā śarmiṣṭhā vārṣaparvaṇī // GarP_1,6.50 //
GP12garup1_u:506: vaiśvānarasute cobhe pulomā kālakā tathā // GarP_1,6.51 //
GP12garup1_u:507: ubhe te tu mahābhāge mārīcestu parigrahaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:513: añja (nta) ko narakaścaiva kāla nābhastathaiva ca /
GP12garup1_u:516: śukī śyenī ca bhāsī ca sugrīvī śucigṛdhrike // GarP_1,6.56 //
GP12garup1_u:518: śyenī śyenāṃstathā bhāsī bhāsān gṛdhrāṃśca gṛdhryapi // GarP_1,6.57 //
GP12garup1_u:527: gaṇaṃ krodhavaśaṃ viddhi te ca sarve ca daṃṣṭriṇaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:528: krodhā tu janayāmāsa piśācāṃśca mahābalān // GarP_1,6.62 //
GP12garup1_u:536: īdṛk sadṛk tathānyādṛk tataḥ pratisadṛk tathā // GarP_1,6.66 //
GP12garup1_u:540: ṛtaśca ṛtadharṃmā ca vihartā varuṇo (camaso) dhruvaḥ // GarP_1,6.68 //
GP12garup1_u:546: dyutirvasuranādhṛṣyo lābha kāmo jayī virāṭ // GarP_1,6.71 //
GP12garup1_u:547: udveṣaṇo gaṇo nāma vāyuskandhe tu saptame /
GP12garup1_u:548: etatsarvaṃ hare rūpaṃ rājāno dānavāḥ surāḥ // GarP_1,6.72 //
GP12garup1_u:549: sūryādi parivāreṇa manvādyā ījire harim // GarP_1,6.73 //
GP12garup1_u:550: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe uttānapādavaṃśādivarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭho 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:555: bhuktimuktipradaṃ sāraṃ vyāsa ! saṃkṣepataḥ param // GarP_1,7.1 //
GP12garup1_u:560: oṃ hrāṃ hrīṃ saḥ sūryāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:571: snānaṃ vastropavītañca gandhapuṣpaṃ ca dhūpakam // GarP_1,7.4 //
GP12garup1_u:594: oṃ aṃ oṃ namo bhagavate vāsudevāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:595: oṃ āṃ oṃ namo bhagavate saṅkarṣaṇāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:596: oṃ aṃ oṃ namo bhagavate pradyumnāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:597: oṃ aḥ oṃ namo bhagavate aniruddhāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:601: oṃ kṣauṃ namo bhagavate narasiṃhāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:602: oṃ bhūḥ oṃ namo bhagavate varāhāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:603: oṃ kaṃ ṭaṃ paṃ śaṃ vainateyāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:604: oṃ jaṃ khaṃ raṃ sudarśa nāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:605: oṃ khaṃ ṭhaṃ phaṃ ṣaṃ gadaiyau namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:606: oṃ vaṃ laṃ maṃ kṣaṃ pāñcajanyāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:607: oṃ ghaṃ ḍhaṃ bhaṃ haṃ śriyai namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:608: oṃ gaṃ ḍaṃ vaṃ saṃ puṣṭyai namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:609: oṃ dhaṃ ṣaṃ vaṃ saṃ vanamālāyai namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:610: oṃ saṃ daṃ laṃ śrīvatsāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:611: oṃ ṭhaṃ caṃ bhaṃ yaṃ kaustubhāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:616: viṣṇuśaktyāḥ sarasvatyāḥ pūjāṃ śṛṇu śubhapradām // GarP_1,7.7 //
GP12garup1_u:624: śraddhā ṛddhiḥ kalā medhā tuṣṭiḥ puṣṭiḥ prabhā matiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:625: oṃ hrīṅkārādyā namo 'ntāśca sarasvatyāśca śaktayaḥ // GarP_1,7.9 //
GP12garup1_u:631: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sūryādīnāṃ sarasvatyāśca pūjanaṃ nāma saptamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:640: teṣu caiva prakurvīta sūtrapātaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ // GarP_1,8.3 //
GP12garup1_u:643: antareṣu ca sarveṣu aṣṭau caiva tunābhayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:644: pūrvamadhyamanābhi bhyāmathaṃ sūtraṃ tu bhrāmayet // GarP_1,8.5 //
GP12garup1_u:650: padmāni tāni kurvīta deśikaḥ para mārthavit // GarP_1,8.8 //
GP12garup1_u:652: dvāraśobhāṃ tathā tatra tadardhena tu kalpayet // GarP_1,8.9 //
GP12garup1_u:654: antaraṃ nīlavarṇena dalāni asitena ca // GarP_1,8.10 //
GP12garup1_u:656: dvārāṇi śuklavarṇena rekhāḥ pañca ca maṇḍale // GarP_1,8.11 //
GP12garup1_u:657: sitā raktā tathā pītā kṛṣṇā caiva yathākramam /
GP12garup1_u:659: hṛnmadhye tu nyasedviṣṇuṃ kaṇṭhe saṅkarṣaṇaṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:662: ahaṃ viṣṇuriti dhyātvā karṇikāyāṃ nyaseddharim // GarP_1,8.14 //
GP12garup1_u:664: aniruddhaṃ paścime ca brihmāṇaṃ cottare nyaset // GarP_1,8.15 //
GP12garup1_u:666: tato 'bhyarcya ca gandhādyaiḥ prāpnuyātparamaṃ padam // GarP_1,8.16 //
GP12garup1_u:667: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇupūjopayogivajranābhamaṇḍalanirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:673: dviguṇaṃ putrake homaṃ triguṇaṃ sādhake matam /
GP12garup1_u:682: ekaikaṃ yo jayettatra kṣetrajñaṃ dehakāraṇāt // GarP_1,9.6 //
GP12garup1_u:686: hastaṃ padmaṃ samākhyātaṃ patrāṇyaṅgulayaḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,9.8 //
GP12garup1_u:689: taṃ hastaṃ pātayenmūrdhni śiṣyasya tu samāhitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:692: guruḥ śiṣyaṃ samabhyarcya netre baddhe tu vāsasā /
GP12garup1_u:694: puṣpaṃ nipatitaṃ yatra mūrdhno devasya śārṅgiṇaḥ // GarP_1,9.11 //
GP12garup1_u:697: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇudīkṣānidṛ nāma navamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:703: śrāṃ śrīṃ śrūṃ śraiṃ śrauṃ śraḥ kramāddhṛdayaṃ ca śiraḥ śikhām /
GP12garup1_u:704: kavacaṃ netramastraṃ ca āsanaṃ mūrtimarcayet // GarP_1,10.1 //
GP12garup1_u:706: catuḥ ṣaṣṭyantamaṣṭādi khākṣe khākṣyādi maṇḍalam // GarP_1,10.2 //
GP12garup1_u:708: lakṣmīmaṅgāni caikasminkoṇe durgāṃ gaṇaṃ gurum // GarP_1,10.3 //
GP12garup1_u:710: oṃ ghaṃ ṭaṃ ḍaṃ haṃ śrīmahālakṣmyai namaḥ // GarP_1,10.4 //
GP12garup1_u:713: oṃ hrīṃ saiṃ sarasvatyai namaḥ // GarP_1,10.5 //
GP12garup1_u:714: oṃ hrīṃ vadavadavāgvādinisvāhā oṃ hrīṃ sarasvatyai namaḥ // GarP_1,10.6 //
GP12garup1_u:715: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe lakṣmyarcananirūpaṇaṃ nāma daśamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:722: yamityanena bījena tacca sarva vināśayet // GarP_1,11.2 //
GP12garup1_u:731: madhye bījadvayaṃ nyasya nyasedaṅge tataḥ punaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:734: padmākārau karau kṛtvā madhye 'ṅguṣṭhaṃ niveśayet // GarP_1,11.8 //
GP12garup1_u:736: kramāccaitāni bījāni tarjanyādiṣu vinya set // GarP_1,11.9 //
GP12garup1_u:737: tato mūrdhākṣivakkreṣu kaṇṭhe ca hṛdaye tathā /
GP12garup1_u:738: nābhau guhye tathā jānvoḥ pādayorvinyasetkramāt // GarP_1,11.10 //
GP12garup1_u:739: pāṇyoḥ ṣaḍaṅgabījāni nyasya kāye tato nyaset /
GP12garup1_u:742: hṛdaye hṛdayaṃ nyasya śiraḥ śirasi vinyaset // GarP_1,11.12 //
GP12garup1_u:743: śikhāyāṃ tu śikhāṃ nyasya kavacaṃ sarvatastanau /
GP12garup1_u:745: tenaiva ca diśo baddhā pūjā vidhimathācaret /
GP12garup1_u:747: dharma jñanaṃ ca vairāgyamaiśvaryaṃ ca yathākramam /
GP12garup1_u:758: manasāvāhya tatreśaṃ hariṃ śārṅgaṃ nyasetpunaḥ // GarP_1,11.20 //
GP12garup1_u:760: madhye netraṃ tu koṇeṣu astramantraṃ nyasettataḥ // GarP_1,11.21 //
GP12garup1_u:762: dvāri pūrve pare caiva vainateyaṃ tu vinyaset // GarP_1,11.22 //
GP12garup1_u:765: dvāryattare gadāṃ nyasya śaṅkhaṃ koṇeṣu vinyaset /
GP12garup1_u:766: devadakṣiṇataḥ śārṅgaṃ vāme caiva sudhīrnyaset // GarP_1,11.24 //
GP12garup1_u:772: añjaliḥ prathamā mudrā kṣipraṃ devaprasādhanī // GarP_1,11.27 //
GP12garup1_u:775: savyasya tasya cāṅguṣṭho yaḥ sa uddhaḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:776: tisraḥ sādhāraṇā hyetā mūrtibhedena kalpitāḥ // GarP_1,11.29 //
GP12garup1_u:780: mudreyaṃ narasiṃhasya nyubjaṃ kṛtvā karadvayam // GarP_1,11.31 //
GP12garup1_u:782: navamīyaṃ smṛtā mudrā varāhābhimatā sadā // GarP_1,11.32 //
GP12garup1_u:788: vāsudevo balaḥ kāmo hyaniruddho yathākramam // GarP_1,11.35 //
GP12garup1_u:790: nārāyaṇastathā brahmā viṣṇuḥ siṃho varāharāṭ // GarP_1,11.36 //
GP12garup1_u:793: kaṃ ṭaṃ paṃ śaṃ garutmānsyājjaṃ khaṃ vaṃ ca sudarśanam /
GP12garup1_u:794: ṣaṃ caṃ phaṃ ṣaṃ gadādevī vaṃ laṃ maṃ kṣaṃ ca śaṅkhakam // GarP_1,11.38 //
GP12garup1_u:795: ghaṃ ḍhaṃ bhaṃ haṃ bhavecchrīśca gaṃ jaṃ vaṃ śaṃ ca puṣṭikā /
GP12garup1_u:796: ghaṃ vaṃ ca vanamālā syācchrī vatsaṃ daṃ saṃ bhavet // GarP_1,11.39 //
GP12garup1_u:797: chaṃ ḍaṃ paṃ yaṃ kaustubhaḥ proktaścānanto hyahameva ca /
GP12garup1_u:804: vidyudrūpāṇi cāstrāṇi yāni noktāni varṇataḥ // GarP_1,11.43 //
GP12garup1_u:806: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe navavyūhārcanaṃ nāmaikādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:811: oṃ nama ityādau saṃsmṛtiḥ paramātmanaḥ // GarP_1,12.1 //
GP12garup1_u:852_0: kṣaiṃ narasiṃhāya bhūrvarāhya kaṃ vainateyāya jaṃ khaṃ vaṃ sudarśanāya khaṃ caṃ phaṃ
GP12garup1_u:852_1: ṣaṃ gadāyai vaṃ laṃ maṃ kṣaṃ pāñcajanyāya ghaṃ ḍhaṃ bhaṃ haṃ śriyai gaṃ ḍaṃ vaṃ śaṃ
GP12garup1_u:852_2: puṣṭyai dhaṃ vaṃ vanamālāyai daṃ śaṃ śrīvatsāya chaṃ ḍaṃ yaṃ kaustubhāya śaṃ śārṅgāya
GP12garup1_u:852_3: iṃ iṣudhibhyāṃ caṃ carmaṇe khaṃ khaḍgāya indrāya surāya partaye agnaye tejodhipatayeyamāyadharmādhipatayekṣaṃnairṛtāyarakṣodhipataye
GP12garup1_u:852_4: varuṇāya jalādhipataye yoṃ vāyave prāṇādhipataye dhāṃ dhanadāya dhanādhipataye hāṃ
GP12garup1_u:852_5: īśānāya vidyādhipataye oṃ vajrāya śaktyai oṃ daṇḍāya khaṅgāya oṃ pāśāya dhvajāya
GP12garup1_u:852_6: gadāyai triśūlāya laṃ anantāya pātālādhipataye khaṃ brahmaṇe sarvalokādhipataye oṃ
GP12garup1_u:872: oṃ naṃnoṃ bhagavateṃ vāṃsuṃdevāyaṃ oṃ namo nārāyaṇāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:877: evaṃ japtvā vidhānena śatamaṣṭottaraṃ tathā // GarP_1,12.5 //
GP12garup1_u:878: arghaṃ dattvā jitaṃ tena praṇāmaṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:879: tato 'gnāvapi sampūjyaṃ taṃ yajeta yathāvidhi // GarP_1,12.6 //
GP12garup1_u:881: pūrvamullikhya cābhyukṣya praṇavena tu mantravit // GarP_1,12.7 //
GP12garup1_u:883: pūrvaṃ tatsakalaṃ dhyātvā maṇḍale manasā nyaset // GarP_1,12.8 //
GP12garup1_u:888: vāgatīte pare tattve ātmānaṃ ca layaṃ nayet /
GP12garup1_u:891: gacchagaccha paraṃ sthānaṃ yatra devo nirañjanaḥ // GarP_1,12.12 //
GP12garup1_u:893: sudarśanaḥ śrīhariśca acyutaḥ sa trivikramaḥ // GarP_1,12.13 //
GP12garup1_u:894: caturbhujo vāsudevaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ pradyumna eva ca /
GP12garup1_u:903: oṃ mahācakrāya asurāntakṛt huṃ phaṭ oṃ huṃ sahasrāra huṃ phaṭ // GarP_1,12.16 //
GP12garup1_u:905: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe pūjānukramanirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:910: namonamaste movidaṃ cakraṃ gṛhya sudarśanam // GarP_1,13.1 //
GP12garup1_u:911: prācyāṃ rakṣasva māṃ viṣṇo ! tvāmahaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:912: gadāṃ kaumodakīṃ gṛhṇa padmanābha namo 'sta te // GarP_1,13.2 //
GP12garup1_u:913: yāmyāṃ rakṣasva māṃ viṣṇo ! tvāmahaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:915: pratīcyāṃ rakṣa māṃ viṣṇo ! tvāmaha śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:916: musalaṃ śātanaṃ gṛhya puṇḍarīkākṣa rakṣa mām // GarP_1,13.4 //
GP12garup1_u:919: namaste rakṣa rakṣoghna ! aiśānyāṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:921: pragṛhya rakṣa māṃ viṣṇo āgnyeyyāṃ rakṣa sūkara /
GP12garup1_u:922: candrasūryaṃ samāgṛhya khaḍgaṃ cāndramasaṃ tathā // GarP_1,13.7 //
GP12garup1_u:923: nairṛtyāṃ māṃ ca rakṣasva divyamūrte nṛkesarin /
GP12garup1_u:925: vāyavyāṃ rakṣa māṃ deva hayagrīva namo 'stu te /
GP12garup1_u:928: viśālākṣaṃ samāruhya rakṣa māṃ tvaṃ rasātale // GarP_1,13.10 //
GP12garup1_u:931: kṛtvā rakṣasva māṃ viṣṇo namaste puruṣottama /
GP12garup1_u:932: etaduktaṃ śaṅkarāya vaiṣṇavaṃ pañjaraṃ mahat // GarP_1,13.12 //
GP12garup1_u:937: iti śrīgāruḍe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇupañjarastotraṃ nāma trayodaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:942: dhyāyibhiḥ procyate dhyeyo dhyānena harirīśvaraḥ // GarP_1,14.1 //
GP12garup1_u:948: ṣaḍvidheṣu sthito draṣṭā śrotā ghrātā hyatīndriyaḥ // GarP_1,14.4 //
GP12garup1_u:950: mantā manaḥ sthito devo manasā parivarjitaḥ // GarP_1,14.5 //

GP12garup1_u:2900: evaṃ prārthya dvijān bhojya dattvā tebhyaśca dakṣiṇām /
GP12garup1_u:2904: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇupavitrāropaṇaṃ nāma tricatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:2918: ātmānaṃ rathinaṃ viddhi śarīraṃ rathameva tu /
GP12garup1_u:2919: buddhiṃ ca sārathiṃ viddhi manaḥ pragrahameva ca /
GP12garup1_u:2922: yastu vijñāna bāhmena yuktena manasā sadā // GarP_1,44.7 //
GP12garup1_u:2923: sa tu tatpadamāpnoti sa hi bhūyo na jāyate /
GP12garup1_u:2928: pratyāhā ro jayaḥ prokto dhyānamīśvaracintanam // GarP_1,44.10 //
GP12garup1_u:2930: pūrvaṃ cetaḥ sthiraṃ na syāttatomūrtiṃ vicintayet // GarP_1,44.11 //
GP12garup1_u:2934: ātmāhaṃ paramaṃ brahma paramaṃ jyotireva tu // GarP_1,44.13 //
GP12garup1_u:2936: dvārakādiśilāsaṃstho dhyeyaḥ pūjyo 'pyahaṃ ca saḥ // GarP_1,44.14 //
GP12garup1_u:2939: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe brahmamūrtidhyānanirūpaṇaṃ nāma catuścatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:2980: (kṛṣṇaḥ) sa vartulāvartaḥ pātu vo natapṛṣṭhakaḥ // GarP_1,45.19 //
GP12garup1_u:2982: (vāmano) vartulo hrasvo vā (rā) macakraḥ sureśvaraḥ // GarP_1,45.20 //
GP12garup1_u:2992: śālagrāme dvārakāyāṃ sthitāya gadina namaḥ // GarP_1,45.25 //
GP12garup1_u:3003: viṣṇormūrtimayaṃ stotraṃ yaḥ paṭhetsa divaṃ vrajet /
GP12garup1_u:3006: yathāyudhastathā gaurī caṇḍikā ca sarasvatī // GarP_1,45.32 //
GP12garup1_u:3008: gajāsyaśca gaṇaḥ skandaḥ ṣaṇmukhonekadhā guṇāḥ // GarP_1,45.33 //
GP12garup1_u:3011: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śālagrāmamūrtilakṣaṇaṃ nāma pañcacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:3017: īśāne ca śiraḥ pādau nairṛte 'gnyanile karau /
GP12garup1_u:3022: sūryaḥ satyo bhṛguścaiva ākāśo vāyureva ca // GarP_1,46.4 //
GP12garup1_u:3026: asuraḥ śeṣapāpau (dau) ca rogo/ḍahimukha (khya) eva ca // GarP_1,46.6 //
GP12garup1_u:3030: āpaścaivātha sāvitrī jayo rudrastathaiva ca // GarP_1,46.8 //
GP12garup1_u:3031: madhye navapade brahmā tasyāṣṭhau ca samīpagān /
GP12garup1_u:3034: mitro 'tha rājayakṣmā ca tathā pṛthvīdharaḥ kramāt // GarP_1,46.10 //
GP12garup1_u:3036: īśānakoṇādārabhya durge car (jñeyo) vaṃśa ucyate // GarP_1,46.11 //
GP12garup1_u:3038: aditiṃ himavantaṃ ca jayantaṃ ca idaṃ trayam // GarP_1,46.12 //
GP12garup1_u:3044: bhāṇḍāgāraṃ ca kauberyāṃ goṣṭhāgāraṃ ca vāyave // GarP_1,46.15 //
GP12garup1_u:3054: madhye catuṣpado brahmā dvipa dāstvaryamādayaḥ // GarP_1,46.20 //
GP12garup1_u:3056: tebhyo hyubhayataḥ sārdhādanye 'pi dvipadāḥ surāḥ // GarP_1,46.21 //
GP12garup1_u:3058: carakī ca vidārī ca pūtanā pāparākṣasī // GarP_1,46.22 //
GP12garup1_u:3064: vistārābhihataṃ dairghyaṃ rāśiṃ vāstostu kārayet // GarP_1,46.25 //
GP12garup1_u:3065: kṛtvā ca vasubhirbhāgaṃ śeṣaṃ baddhā yamādiśet /
GP12garup1_u:3072: vāstukroḍe gṛhaṃ kuryānna pṛṣṭhe mānavaḥ sadā // GarP_1,46.29 //
GP12garup1_u:3076: dvāraṃ dīrghārdhavistāraṃ dvārāṇyaṣṭau smṛtāni ca // GarP_1,46.31 //
GP12garup1_u:3078: sutahīnaṃ tu raudreṇa vīryaghnaṃ dakṣiṇe tathā // GarP_1,46.32 //
GP12garup1_u:3082: arthadaṃ cārthahānyai ca doṣadaṃ putramṛtyudam // GarP_1,46.34 //
GP12garup1_u:3088: aṣṭabhāge kṛte bhāge dvārāṇāṃ ca phalāphalam // GarP_1,46.37 //
GP12garup1_u:3090: gṛhasya śobhanaḥ prokta īśāne caiva sālmaliḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3091: pūjito vignahārī syātprāsādasya gṛhasya ca // GarP_1,46.38 //
GP12garup1_u:3092: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vāstumānalakṣaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṭcatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:3096: prāsādānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ ca vakṣye śaunaka tacchṛṇu /
GP12garup1_u:3106: atha vāpi samaṃ vāstuṃ kṛtvā ṣoḍaśabhāgikam /
GP12garup1_u:3107: tasya madhye caturbhāgamādau garbhaṃ tu kārayet // GarP_1,47.6 //
GP12garup1_u:3111: caturdikṣu tathā jñeyo nirgamastuḥ tathā budhaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3116: liṅgamānamatho vakṣye pīṭho liṅgasamo bhavet // GarP_1,47.11 //
GP12garup1_u:3121: nir gamastu samākhyātaḥ śeṣaṃ pūrvavadeva tu /
GP12garup1_u:3130: traivedaṃ kārayetkṣetraṃ yatra tiṣṭhanti devatāḥ // GarP_1,47.18 //
GP12garup1_u:3132: nemiḥ pādena vistīrṇā prāsādasya samantataḥ // GarP_1,47.19 //
GP12garup1_u:3133: garbhaṃ tu dviguṇaṃ kuryānnemyā mānaṃ bhavediha /
GP12garup1_u:3134: sa eva bhitterutsedho śikharo dviguṇo mataḥ // GarP_1,47.20 //
GP12garup1_u:3135: prāsādānāṃ ca vakṣyāmi mānaṃ yoniṃ ca mānataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3140: etebhya eva sambhūtāḥ prāsādāḥ sumanoharāḥ // GarP_1,47.23 //
GP12garup1_u:3146: valabhī gṛharājaśca śā lāgṛhaṃ ca mandiram // GarP_1,47.26 //
GP12garup1_u:3147: vimānaṃ ca tathā brahmamandiraṃ bhavanaṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:3148: uttambhaṃ śibikā veśma navaite puṣpakodbhavāḥ // GarP_1,47.27 //
GP12garup1_u:3150: mukulī cāsya uṣṇīṣī śaṅkhaśca kalaśastathā // GarP_1,47.28 //
GP12garup1_u:3152: gajo 'tha vṛṣabho haṃso garuḍaḥ siṃhanāmakaḥ // GarP_1,47.29 //
GP12garup1_u:3156: vakraḥ svastikakhaḍgau ca gadā śrīvṛkṣa eva ca // GarP_1,47.31 //
GP12garup1_u:3159: yatra tatra vidhātavyaṃ saṃsthānaṃ maṇḍapasya tu /
GP12garup1_u:3160: rājyaṃ ca vibhavaścaivaḥ hyāyurvardvanameva ca // GarP_1,47.33 //
GP12garup1_u:3168: prāsāde mañcarī kāryā citrā viṣamabhūmikā // GarP_1,47.37 //
GP12garup1_u:3174: kiyanto yeṣu cādhārā nirādhārāśca kecana // GarP_1,47.40 //
GP12garup1_u:3178: prāsāde niyamo nāsti devatānāṃ svayambhuvām // GarP_1,47.42 //
GP12garup1_u:3182: purato vāhanānāṃ ca kartavyā lagna(ghu) maṇḍapāḥ // GarP_1,47.44 //
GP12garup1_u:3184: prasāde devatānāṃ ca kāryā dikṣu vidikṣvapi // GarP_1,47.45 //
GP12garup1_u:3190: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśe ācārakāṇḍe prāsādaliṅgamaṇḍapādilakṣaṇanirūpaṇaṃnāma saptacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:3195: sutithyādau suramyāṃ ca pratiṣṭhāṃ kārayedguruḥ // GarP_1,48.1 //
GP12garup1_u:3197: svaśākhoktavidhānena atha vā praṇavena tu // GarP_1,48.2 //
GP12garup1_u:3200: mantranyāsaṃ guruḥ kṛtvā tataḥ karma samārabhet /
GP12garup1_u:3203: dhvajāṣṭakaiścaturhastāṃ madhye vediṃ ca kārayet // GarP_1,48.5 //
GP12garup1_u:3209: śiraḥ sthāne tu devasya ācāryo homamācaret // GarP_1,48.8 //
GP12garup1_u:3211: dvārāṇi caiva catvāri kṛtvā vai toraṇāntike // GarP_1,48.9 //
GP12garup1_u:3215: pūrvadvāre mṛgendraṃ tu hayarājaṃ tu dakṣiṇe // GarP_1,48.11 //
GP12garup1_u:3217: agnimīleti hi mantreṇa prathamaṃ pūrvato nyaset // GarP_1,48.12 //
GP12garup1_u:3222: yāmyāṃ vai kṛṣṇarūpā tu nairṛtyā śyāmalā (dhūsarā) bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:3223: vāruṇyāṃ pāṇḍurā jñeyā vāyavyāṃ pītavarṇikā // GarP_1,48.15 //
GP12garup1_u:3224: uttare raktavarṇā tu śukleśī ca patākikā /
GP12garup1_u:3225: bahurūpā tathā madhye indravidyeti pūrvake // GarP_1,48.16 //
GP12garup1_u:3227: pūjyā rakṣohanoveti paścime uttare 'pi ca // GarP_1,48.17 //
GP12garup1_u:3230: kalaśau tu tato dvaudvau niveśyau toraṇāntike /
GP12garup1_u:3233: dikpālāśca tataḥ pūjyāḥ śāstradṛṣṭena karmaṇā // GarP_1,48.20 //
GP12garup1_u:3235: asminvṛkṣa itaṃ caiva pracārīti parā smṛtā // GarP_1,48.21 //
GP12garup1_u:3240: ālokanena dravyāṇi śuddhiṃ yānti na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3250: pratiṣṭhā yasya devasya tadākhyaṃ kalaśaṃ nyaset /
GP12garup1_u:3251: aiśānyāṃ pūjayedyāmye astreṇaiva ca bardhanīm // GarP_1,48.29 //
GP12garup1_u:3257: vardhanyā tu samāyuktaṃ kalaśaṃ bhrāmayedanu // GarP_1,48.32 //
GP12garup1_u:3260: ghaṭaṃ cāvāhya vāyavyāṃ gaṇānāṃ tveti sadgaṇam /
GP12garup1_u:3263: kumbhasya pūrvato bhūtaṃ gaṇadevaṃ baliṃ haret // GarP_1,48.35 //
GP12garup1_u:3268: kṛtvā brahmarathe devaṃ pratiṣṭhanti tato dvijāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3275: lakṣaṇe kriyamāṇe tu nāmaikaṃ sthāpako va(da) det // GarP_1,48.41 //
GP12garup1_u:3281: sahadevī balā caiva śatamūlī śatāvarī // GarP_1,48.44 //
GP12garup1_u:3282: kumārī ca guḍūcī ca siṃhī vyāghrī tathaiva ca /
GP12garup1_u:3287: ratnāni caiva dhānyāni oṣadhīṃ śatapuṣpikām // GarP_1,48.47 //
GP12garup1_u:3289: kṣīraṃ dadhi kṣīrodasya ghṛtodasyeti vā punaḥ // GarP_1,48.48 //
GP12garup1_u:3291: tejo 'sīti ca mantraiśca kumbhaṃ caivābhimantrayet // GarP_1,48.49 //
GP12garup1_u:3293: snātaścaiva suveṣaśca dhūpo deyaśca gugguluḥ // GarP_1,48.50 //
GP12garup1_u:3295: pṛthivyāṃ yāni tīrthāni saritaḥ sāgarāstathā // GarP_1,48.51 //
GP12garup1_u:3297: tena toyena yaḥ snāyātsa mucyetsarvapātakaiḥ // GarP_1,48.52 //
GP12garup1_u:3299: gandhadvāreti gandhaṃ ca nyāsaṃ vai vedamantrakaiḥ // GarP_1,48.53 //
GP12garup1_u:3304: sthitvā caiva pare tattve mantranyāsaṃ tu kārayet /
GP12garup1_u:3307: yathāśāstraṃ nivedyāni pādamūle tu dāpayet // GarP_1,48.57 //
GP12garup1_u:3309: kalaśaṃ sahiraṇyaṃ ca śiraḥ sthāne nivedayet // GarP_1,48.58 //
GP12garup1_u:3313: vṛṣākapiṃ ca mitraṃ bahvacaḥ pūrvato japet // GarP_1,48.60 //
GP12garup1_u:3314: rudraṃ puruṣasūktaṃ ca ślokādhyāyaṃ ca śukriyam /
GP12garup1_u:3315: brahmāṇaṃ pitṛmaitraṃ ca adhvaryurdakṣiṇe japet // GarP_1,48.61 //
GP12garup1_u:3317: bheruṇḍāni ca sāmāni chandogaḥ paścime japet // GarP_1,48.62 //
GP12garup1_u:3319: nīlarudrāṃśca maitraṃ ca atharvaścottare japet // GarP_1,48.63 //
GP12garup1_u:3321: tāmrapātre śarāve vā yathāvibhavato 'pi vā // GarP_1,48.64 //
GP12garup1_u:3323: astreṇa jvālayedvahniṃ kavacena tu veṣṭayet // GarP_1,48.65 //
GP12garup1_u:3325: pātraṃ gṛhya karābhyāṃ ca kuṇḍaṃ bhrāmya tataḥ punaḥ // GarP_1,48.66 //
GP12garup1_u:3326: vaiṣṇavena tu yogena paraṃ tejastu niḥ kṣipet /
GP12garup1_u:3329: dikṣudikṣu tato dadyātparidhiṃ viṣṭaraiḥ saha // GarP_1,48.68 //
GP12garup1_u:3335: agnestu rakṣaṇārthāya yaduktaṃ karma ntravit // GarP_1,48.71 //
GP12garup1_u:3337: pavitraṃ tu tataḥ kṛtvā kuryādājyasya saṃskṛtim // GarP_1,48.72 //
GP12garup1_u:3345: pūjayitvā tato vahniṃ kuṇḍeṣu viharettathā // GarP_1,48.76 //
GP12garup1_u:3347: purṇāhutiṃ śatasyānte sarveṣāṃ caiva homayet // GarP_1,48.77 //
GP12garup1_u:3351: niṣkṛṣya bahirācāryo dikpālānāṃ baliṃ haret // GarP_1,48.79 //
GP12garup1_u:3352: bhūtānāṃ caiva devānāṃ nāgānāṃ ca prayogataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3353: tilāśca samidhaścaiva homadravyaṃ dvayaṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,48.80 //
GP12garup1_u:3355: paruṣasuktaṃ pūrveṇaiva rudracaiva tu dakṣiṇe // GarP_1,48.81 //
GP12garup1_u:3359: evaṃ madhye tathā pāde pūrṇāhutyā tathā punaḥ // GarP_1,48.83 //
GP12garup1_u:3365: caraṇāvagnimīḷe tu iṣetvo gulphayoḥ sthitāḥ // GarP_1,48.86 //
GP12garup1_u:3366: agna āyāhi jaṅghe dve śannodevīti jānunī /
GP12garup1_u:3375: lauhabījāni siddhāni paścāddevaṃ tu vinyaset // GarP_1,48.91 //
GP12garup1_u:3376: na garbhe sthāpayeddevaṃ na garbhaṃ tu parityajet /
GP12garup1_u:3377: īṣanmadhyaṃ parityajya tato doṣāpahaṃ tu tat // GarP_1,48.92 //
GP12garup1_u:3379: oṃ sthiro bhava śivo bhava prajābhyaśca namonamaḥ // GarP_1,48.93 //
GP12garup1_u:3380: devasya tvā saviturvaḥ ṣaḍbhyo vai vinyasedguruḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3385: arghyaṃ dattvā namaskṛtya tato devaṃ kṣamāpayet // GarP_1,48.96 //
GP12garup1_u:3387: ṛttvigbhyaśca pradātavyā dakṣiṇā caiva śaktitaḥ // GarP_1,48.97 //
GP12garup1_u:3389: āhutīnāṃ śataṃ hutvā tataḥ pūrṇāṃ pradāpayet // GarP_1,48.98 //
GP12garup1_u:3393: mukuṭaṃ kuṇḍalaṃ chatraṃ keyūraṃ kaṭisūtrakam // GarP_1,48.100 //
GP12garup1_u:3397: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe devapratiṣṭhādinirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:3403: viprādyaiḥ svena dharmeṇa taddharmaṃ vyāsa ! vai śṛṇu // GarP_1,49.1 //
GP12garup1_u:3410: bhikṣācaryātha śuśrūṣā guroḥ svādhyāya eva ca /
GP12garup1_u:3419: kuṭumbabharaṇe yuktaḥ sādhako 'sau gṛhī bhavet // GarP_1,49.9 //
GP12garup1_u:3421: ekākī yastu vicaredudāsīnaḥ sa maukṣikaḥ // GarP_1,49.10 //
GP12garup1_u:3427: sanyāsī sa hi vijñeyo vānaprasthāśrame sthitaḥ // GarP_1,49.13 //
GP12garup1_u:3429: jñānāya vartate bhukṣuḥ procyate pārameṣṭhikaḥ // GarP_1,49.14 //
GP12garup1_u:3431: samyak ca damasampannaḥ sa yogī bhikṣurucyate // GarP_1,49.15 //
GP12garup1_u:3432: bhaikṣyaṃ śrutaṃ ca maunitvaṃ tapo dhyānaṃ viśeṣataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3433: samyak ca jñānavairāgyaṃ dharmo 'yaṃ bhikṣuke mataḥ // GarP_1,49.16 //
GP12garup1_u:3436: yogī ca trividho jñeyo bhautikaḥ kṣattra evaca /
GP12garup1_u:3438: prathamā bhāvanā pūrve mokṣe tvakṣa(duṣka) rabhāvanā /
GP12garup1_u:3439: tṛtīye cāntimā proktā bhāvanā pārameśvarī // GarP_1,49.19 //
GP12garup1_u:3441: pravṛttiśca nivṛttiśca dvividhaṃ karma vaidikam // GarP_1,49.20 //
GP12garup1_u:3443: kṣamā damo dayā dānamalobhā (bho) bhyāsa eva ca // GarP_1,49.21 //
GP12garup1_u:3445: satyaṃ saṃtoṣa āstikyaṃ tathā cendriyanigrahaḥ // GarP_1,49.22 //
GP12garup1_u:3449: prājāpatyaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ smṛtaṃ sthānaṃ kriyāvatām // GarP_1,49.24 //
GP12garup1_u:3454: smṛtaṃ teṣāṃ tu yatsthānaṃ tadeva vana (guru) vāsinām /
GP12garup1_u:3455: saptarṣīṇāṃ tu yatsthānaṃ sthānaṃ tadvai vanaukasām // GarP_1,49.27 //
GP12garup1_u:3457: ānandaṃ brahma tatsthānaṃ yasmānnāvartate muniḥ // GarP_1,49.28 //
GP12garup1_u:3461: yamāḥ pañca tvahiṃsādyā ahiṃsā prāṇyahiṃsanam // GarP_1,49.30 //
GP12garup1_u:3469: evaṃ dvidhā tridhāpyuktaṃ puraṇātpūrakaḥ sa ca // GarP_1,49.34 //
GP12garup1_u:3473: brahmātmacintā dhyānaṃ syāddhāraṇā manaso dhṛtiḥ // GarP_1,49.36 //
GP12garup1_u:3475: ahamātmā paraṃ brahma satyaṃ jñānamanantakam // GarP_1,49.37 //
GP12garup1_u:3483: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe varṇāśramadharmanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonapañcāśattamodhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:3488: brāhme muhūrte cotthāya dharmamarthaṃ ca cintayet // GarP_1,50.1 //
GP12garup1_u:3490: uṣaḥ kāle tu saṃprāpte kṛtvā cāvaśyakaṃ budhaḥ // GarP_1,50.2 //
GP12garup1_u:3492: prataḥ snānena pūyante ye 'pi pāpakṛto janāḥ // GarP_1,50.3 //
GP12garup1_u:3494: prātaḥ snānaṃ praśaṃsanti dṛṣṭādṛṣṭaṣṭakaraṃ hi tat // GarP_1,50.4 //
GP12garup1_u:3497: alakṣmīḥ kālakarṇo ca duḥ svapnaṃ durvicintitam /
GP12garup1_u:3498: prataḥ snānena pāpāni dhūyante nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,50.6 //
GP12garup1_u:3499: na ca snānaṃ vinā puṃsāṃ prāśastyaṃ karma saṃsmṛtam /
GP12garup1_u:3500: home japye viśeṣeṇa tasmātsnānaṃ samācaret // GarP_1,50.7 //
GP12garup1_u:3502: ārdreṇa vāsasā vāpi mārjanaṃ kāyikaṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,50.8 //
GP12garup1_u:3505: brāhmaṃ tu mārjanaṃ mantraiḥ kuśaiḥ sodakabindubhiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3507: gavāṃ hi rajasā proktaṃ vāyavyaṃ snānamuttamam /
GP12garup1_u:3513: apāmārgaṃ ca vilvaṃ ca karavīraṃ ca dhāvane /
GP12garup1_u:3518: saṃmārjya mantrai rātmānaṃ kuśaiḥ sodakabindubhaiḥ // GarP_1,50.16 //
GP12garup1_u:3522: prākkūleṣu tataḥ sthitvā darbheṣu susamāhitaḥ // GarP_1,50.18 //
GP12garup1_u:3524: yā sandhyā sā jagatsūtirmāyātītā hi niṣkalā // GarP_1,50.19 //
GP12garup1_u:3526: dhyātvā raktāṃ sitāṃ kṛṣṇāṃ gāyattrīṃ vai japedvudhaḥ // GarP_1,50.20 //
GP12garup1_u:3532: yo 'nyatra kurute yatnaṃ dharma kārye dvijottamaḥ // GarP_1,50.23 //
GP12garup1_u:3544: tvameva brahma paramamāpo jyotī raso 'mṛtam // GarP_1,50.29 //
GP12garup1_u:3548: athāgamya gṛhaṃ vipraḥ (paścāt) samācamya yathāvidhi // GarP_1,50.31 //
GP12garup1_u:3550: ṛtvik putro 'tha patnī vā śiṣyo vāpi sahodaraḥ // GarP_1,50.32 //
GP12garup1_u:3552: vinā ma (ta) ntreṇa yatkarma nāmutreha phalapradam // GarP_1,50.33 //
GP12garup1_u:3554: guruṃ caivāpyupāsīta hitaṃ cāsya samācaret // GarP_1,50.34 //
GP12garup1_u:3563: nadīṣu devakhāteṣu taḍāgeṣu saraḥ su ca /
GP12garup1_u:3566: mṛdaikayā śiraḥ kṣālyaṃ dvābhyāṃ nābhestathopari // GarP_1,50.40 //
GP12garup1_u:3567: adhaśca tisṛbhiḥ kṣālyaṃ pādau ṣaṭbhistathaiva ca /
GP12garup1_u:3577: tvaṃ yajñastvaṃ vaṣaṭkāra āpo jyotī raso 'mṛtam /
GP12garup1_u:3584: drupadāṃ vātha sāvitrariṃ tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // GarP_1,50.49 //
GP12garup1_u:3586: apaḥ pāṇau samādāya japtvā vai mārjane kṛte // GarP_1,50.50 //
GP12garup1_u:3592: haṃsaḥ śuciṣadetena sāvitryā ca viśeṣataḥ // GarP_1,50.53 //
GP12garup1_u:3593: anyaiḥ saurairvaidikaiśca gāyattrīṃ ca tato japet /
GP12garup1_u:3597: kartavyā tvakṣālā syādantarā tatra sā smṛtā /
GP12garup1_u:3599: anyathā ca śucau bhūmyāṃ darbheṣu ca samāhitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3600: pradakṣiṇaṃ samāvṛtya namaskṛtya tataḥ kṣitau // GarP_1,50.57 //
GP12garup1_u:3608: prācīnāvītī pitrye tu tena tīrthena bhārata /
GP12garup1_u:3609: niṣpīḍya snānavastraṃ vai samācamya ca vāgyataḥ // GarP_1,50.62 //
GP12garup1_u:3611: brahmāṇaṃ śaṅkaraṃ sūryaṃ tathaiva madhusūdanam // GarP_1,50.63 //
GP12garup1_u:3613: pradadyādvātha puṣpādi sūktena puruṣeṇa tu // GarP_1,50.64 //
GP12garup1_u:3614: āpo vā devatāḥ sarvāstena samyak samarcitāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3615: dhyātvā praṇavapūrvaṃ vai devaṃ vārisamāhitaḥ // GarP_1,50.65 //
GP12garup1_u:3617: narte hyārādhanātpuṇyaṃ vidyate karma vaidikam // GarP_1,50.66 //
GP12garup1_u:3619: tadviṣṇoriti mantreṇa sūktena puruṣeṇa tu // GarP_1,50.67 //
GP12garup1_u:3624: mānuṣaṃ brahmayajñaṃ ca pañca yajñānsamācaret // GarP_1,50.69 //
GP12garup1_u:3626: kṛtvā manuṣyayajñaṃ vai tataḥ svādhyāyamācaret // GarP_1,50.70 //
GP12garup1_u:3627: vaiśvadevastu kartavyo devayajñaḥ sa tu smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3628: bhūtayajñaḥṛ sa vai jñeyo bhūtebhyo yastvayaṃ baliḥ // GarP_1,50.71 //
GP12garup1_u:3636: manovākkarmabhiḥ śāntaṃ svāgataiḥ svagṛhaṃ tataḥ // GarP_1,50.75 //
GP12garup1_u:3644: akṛtvā tu dvijaḥ pañca mahāyajñān dvijottamaḥ // GarP_1,50.79 //
GP12garup1_u:3645: bhuñjate cetsa mūḍhātmā tiryagyoniṃ ca gacchati /
GP12garup1_u:3650: aśaucaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi aśuciḥ pātakī sadā // GarP_1,50.82 //
GP12garup1_u:3657: śudhyenmāsena vai śūdro yatīnāṃ nāsti pātakam /
GP12garup1_u:3659: iti gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe nityakarmāśaucayornirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:3670: nityaṃ naimittikaṃ kāmyaṃ vimalaṃ dānamīritam // GarP_1,51.4 //
GP12garup1_u:3672: anuddiśya phalaṃ tasmādbrāhmaṇāya tu nityaśaḥ // GarP_1,51.5 //
GP12garup1_u:3673: yattu pāpopaśāntyai ca dīyate vidupāṃ kare /
GP12garup1_u:3678: cetasā sattvayuktena dānaṃ tadvimalaṃ śivam // GarP_1,51.8 //
GP12garup1_u:3680: dadāti vedaviduṣe sa na bhūyo 'bhijāyate // GarP_1,51.9 //
GP12garup1_u:3681: bhūmidānātparaṃ dānaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
GP12garup1_u:3682: vidyāṃ dattvā brāhmaṇāya brahmaloke mahīyate // GarP_1,51.10 //
GP12garup1_u:3685: vaiśākhyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ tu brāhmaṇānsapta pañca ca /
GP12garup1_u:3688: prīyatāṃ dharmarājeti yathā manasi vartate // GarP_1,51.13 //
GP12garup1_u:3691: dadāti yastu viprāya sarvaṃ tarati duṣkṛtam /
GP12garup1_u:3692: ghṛtānnamudakaṃ caiva vaiśākhyāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ // GarP_1,51.15 //
GP12garup1_u:3696: yo hi yāṃ devatāmicchetsamārādhayituṃ naraḥ // GarP_1,51.17 //
GP12garup1_u:3702: bhogakāmo hi śaśinaṃ balakāmaḥ samīraṇam // GarP_1,51.20 //
GP12garup1_u:3704: akāmaḥ sarvakāmo vā pūjayettu gadādharam // GarP_1,51.21 //
GP12garup1_u:3710: anaḍuddaḥ śriyaṃ puṣṭāṃ godo bradhnasya viṣṭapam // GarP_1,51.24 //
GP12garup1_u:3712: dhānyadaḥ śāvataṃ saukhyaṃ brahmado brahma śāśvatam // GarP_1,51.25 //
GP12garup1_u:3720: yadyadiṣṭatamaṃ loke yaccāsya dayitaṃ gṛhe // GarP_1,51.29 //
GP12garup1_u:3722: ayena viṣuve caiva grahaṇe candrasūryayoḥ // GarP_1,51.30 //
GP12garup1_u:3724: prayāgādiṣu tīrtheṣu gayāyāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ // GarP_1,51.31 //
GP12garup1_u:3730: mriyamāṇeṣu vipreṣu brahmahā sa tu garhitaḥ // GarP_1,51.34 //
GP12garup1_u:3731: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe dānadharmanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikapañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:3736: brahmahā ca surāpaśca steyī ca gurutalpagaḥ // GarP_1,52.1 //
GP12garup1_u:3739: brahmahā dvādaśābdāni kuṭīṃ kṛtvā vane vaset /
GP12garup1_u:3740: kuryādanaśanaṃ vātha bhṛgoḥ patanameva ca // GarP_1,52.3 //
GP12garup1_u:3741: jvalantaṃ vā viśedagniṃ jalaṃ vā praviśetsvayam /
GP12garup1_u:3742: brāhmaṇārthe gavārthe vā samyak prāṇānparityajet // GarP_1,52.4 //
GP12garup1_u:3743: dattvā cānnaṃ ca viduṣe brahmahatyāṃ vyapohati /
GP12garup1_u:3744: aśvamedhāvabhṛthake snātvā vā mucyate dvijaḥ // GarP_1,52.5 //
GP12garup1_u:3748: setubandhe naraḥ snātvā mucyate brahmahatyayā // GarP_1,52.7 //
GP12garup1_u:3750: surāpastu surāṃ pītvā agnivarṇāṃ dvijottamaḥ // GarP_1,52.8 //
GP12garup1_u:3752: suvarṇasteyī muktaḥ syānmusalena hato nṛpaiḥ // GarP_1,52.9 //
GP12garup1_u:3757: cāndrāyaṇāni vā kuryātpañca catvāri vā punaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3758: patitena ca saṃsargaṃ kurute yastu vai dvijaḥ // GarP_1,52.12 //
GP12garup1_u:3762: cāndrāyaṇaṃ ca vidhinā kṛtaṃ caivātikṛcchrakam // GarP_1,52.14 //
GP12garup1_u:3764: amāvasyāṃ tithiṃ prāpya yaḥ samārādhayedbhavam // GarP_1,52.15 //
GP12garup1_u:3770: snātvā nadyāṃ tu pūrvāhne mucyate sarvapātakaiḥ // GarP_1,52.18 //
GP12garup1_u:3783: pativratā tu yā nārī bhartuḥ śuśrūṣaṇotsukā /
GP12garup1_u:3784: na tasyā vidyate pāpamiha loke paratra ca // GarP_1,52.25 //
GP12garup1_u:3788: ityāha bhagavānviṣṇuḥ purā mama yatavratāḥ // GarP_1,52.27 //
GP12garup1_u:3789: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe prāyaścittanirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvipañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:3803: dadyācchrutāya maitrīṃ ca yāti nityaṃ ca rājabhiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3804: dravyārthaṃ śatruṇā nāśaṃ saṃgrāme cāpi saṃvrajet // GarP_1,53.6 //
GP12garup1_u:3805: makaraḥ kacchapaścaiva tāmasau tu nidhī smṛtau /
GP12garup1_u:3806: kacchapī viśvasennaiva na bhuṅkena (nā) dadāti ca // GarP_1,53.7 //
GP12garup1_u:3810: rajastamomayo nandī ādhāraḥ syātkulasya ca // GarP_1,53.9 //
GP12garup1_u:3811: stutaḥ prīto bhavati vai bahubhāryā bhavanti ca /
GP12garup1_u:3812: pūrvamitreṣu śaithilyaṃ prītimanyaiḥ karoti ca // GarP_1,53.10 //
GP12garup1_u:3816: ekasya syānnidhiḥ śaṅkhaḥ svayaṃ bhuṅkte dhanādi(nta)kam // GarP_1,53.12 //
GP12garup1_u:3822: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe navanidhivarṇanaṃ nāma tripañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:3827: medhāmedhātithirbhavyaḥ śabalaḥ putra eva ca // GarP_1,54.1 //
GP12garup1_u:3831: vibhajya sapta dvīpāni saptānāṃ pradadau nṛpaḥ // GarP_1,54.3 //
GP12garup1_u:3833: jalopari mahī yātā maurivāste sarijjale // GarP_1,54.4 //
GP12garup1_u:3835: kuśaḥ krauñcastathā śākaḥ puṣkaraścaiva saptamaḥ // GarP_1,54.5 //
GP12garup1_u:3844: nīlaḥ śvetaśca śṛṅgī ca uttare varṣaparvatāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3845: plakṣādiṣu narā rudra ye vasanti sanātanāḥ // GarP_1,54.10 //
GP12garup1_u:3849: ramyo hiraṇmayākhyaśca kururbhadrāśva eva ca // GarP_1,54.12 //
GP12garup1_u:3851: nābhestu merudevyāṃ tu putro 'bhūdṛṣabho hara // GarP_1,54.13 //
GP12garup1_u:3852: tatputro bharato nāma śālagrāme sthito vratī /
GP12garup1_u:3857: pṛthuśca tatsuto nakto naktasyāpi gayaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,54.16 //
GP12garup1_u:3862: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhuvanakośavarṇanopayogipriyavratavaṃśanirūpaṇaṃ nāma catuḥ pañcaśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:3872: siddhiḥ svābhāvikī rudra ! varjayitvā tu bhāratam /
GP12garup1_u:3877: andhrā dakṣiṇato rudra ! turaṣkāstvapi cottare // GarP_1,55.6 //
GP12garup1_u:3881: vedasmṛtir narmadā ca varadā surasā śivā // GarP_1,55.8 //
GP12garup1_u:3882: tāpī payoṣṇī sarayūḥ kāverī gomatī tathā /
GP12garup1_u:3885: ṛṣikulyā ca kāverī mattagaṅgā payasvinī // GarP_1,55.10 //
GP12garup1_u:3886: vidarbhā ca śatadrūśca nadyaḥ pāpaharāḥ śubhāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3887: āsāṃ pibanti salilaṃ madhyadeśādayo janāḥ // GarP_1,55.11 //
GP12garup1_u:3891: kāśaya (ṣāyā) śca videhāśca pūrvasyāṃ kosalāstathā // GarP_1,55.13 //
GP12garup1_u:3898: strīrājyāḥ saindhavā mlecchā nāsti kā yavanāstathā /
GP12garup1_u:3899: paścimena ca vijñeyā māthurā naiṣadhaiḥ saha // GarP_1,55.17 //
GP12garup1_u:3906: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhuvanakośavarṇanaṃ nāma pañcapañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:3912: sukhodayastathā nandaḥ śivaḥ kṣemaka eva ca /
GP12garup1_u:3913: dhruvaśca saptamasteṣāṃ plakṣadvīpeśvarā hi te // GarP_1,56.2 //
GP12garup1_u:3915: somakaḥ sumanāḥ śailo baibhrājaścātra saptamaḥ // GarP_1,56.3 //
GP12garup1_u:3916: anutaptā śikhī caiva vipāśā tridivā kramuḥ /
GP12garup1_u:3917: amṛtā sukṛtā caiva saptaitāstatra nimnagāḥ // GarP_1,56.4 //
GP12garup1_u:3923: yonitoyā vitṛṣṇā ca candrā śukla vimocanī // GarP_1,56.7 //
GP12garup1_u:3925: jyotiṣmataḥ kuśadvīpe sapta putrāḥ śṛṇuṣvatān // GarP_1,56.8 //
GP12garup1_u:3937: gaurī kumudvatī caiva sandhyā rātrirmanojavā // GarP_1,56.14 //
GP12garup1_u:3942: sukumārī kumārī ca nalinī dhenukā ca yā /
GP12garup1_u:3943: ikṣuśca veṇukā caiva gabhastī saptamī tathā // GarP_1,56.17 //
GP12garup1_u:3947: tāvaccaiva ca vistīrṇaḥ sarvataḥ parimaṇḍalaḥ // GarP_1,56.19 //
GP12garup1_u:3953: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhuvanakośavarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaṭpañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:3959: atalaṃ vitalaṃ caiva nitalaṃ ca gabhastimat /
GP12garup1_u:3960: mahākhyaṃ sutalaṃ cāgryaṃ pātālaṃ cāpi saptamam // GarP_1,57.2 //
GP12garup1_u:3962: bhūyastatra daiteyā vasanti ca bhujaṅgamāḥ // GarP_1,57.3 //
GP12garup1_u:3963: raudre tu puṣkaradvīpe narakāḥ santi tāñchṛṇu /
GP12garup1_u:3966: rudhirākhyo vaitaraṇī kṛmiśaḥ kṛmibho janaḥ // GarP_1,57.5 //
GP12garup1_u:3968: tathā pūyavahaḥ pāpo vahnijvālastvadhaḥ śirāḥ // GarP_1,57.6 //
GP12garup1_u:3972: uparyupari vai lokā rudra ! bhūtādayaḥ sthitāḥ // GarP_1,57.8 //
GP12garup1_u:3974: tadaṇḍaṃ mahatā rudra ! pradhānena ca veṣṭitam // GarP_1,57.9 //
GP12garup1_u:3975: aṇḍaṃ daśaguṇaṃ vyāptaṃ nārāyaṇaḥ sthitaḥ // GarP_1,57.10 //
GP12garup1_u:3976: iti gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhuvanakośagatāpātalanarakādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptapañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:3981: yojānānāṃ sahasrāṇi bhāskarasya ratho nava // GarP_1,58.1 //
GP12garup1_u:3991: dvitīye 'kṣe tu taccakraṃ saṃsthitaṃ mānasācale // GarP_1,58.6 //
GP12garup1_u:3999: hāhā rathasvanaścaiva jyeṣṭhe bhāno rathe sthitāḥ // GarP_1,58.10 //
GP12garup1_u:4003: pramlocā ca nabhasyete sarpāścārke tu santi vai // GarP_1,58.12 //
GP12garup1_u:4007: suṣeṇo 'nyo dhṛtācī ca vasantyāśvayuje ravau // GarP_1,58.14 //
GP12garup1_u:4019: viśvāmitrastathā rakṣo yajñāpeto hi phālgune // GarP_1,58.19 //
GP12garup1_u:4021: stuvanti munayaḥ sūryaṃ gandharvairgoyate puraḥ // GarP_1,58.20 //
GP12garup1_u:4032: aṣṭāśvaḥ kāñcanaḥ śrīmān bhaumasyāpi ratho mahān // GarP_1,58.26 //
GP12garup1_u:4038: svarbhānosturagā hyaṣṭau bhṛṅgābhā dhūsaraṃ ratham // GarP_1,58.29 //
GP12garup1_u:4040: tathā keturathasyāśvā aṣṭau te vātaraṃhasaḥ // GarP_1,58.30 //
GP12garup1_u:4043: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhuvanakośanirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭapañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4049: caturlakṣaṃ jyotiṣasya sāraṃ rudrāya sarvadaḥ // GarP_1,59.1 //
GP12garup1_u:4056: sāvitraśca tathā hastā citrā tvaṣṭā prakīrtitaḥ // GarP_1,59.4 //
GP12garup1_u:4063: vāsavastu tathā ṛkṣaṃ dhaniṣṭhā procyate budhaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4064: tathā śatabhiṣā proktaṃ nakṣatraṃ vāruṇaṃ śiva // GarP_1,59.8 //
GP12garup1_u:4070: pañcamyāṃ ca trayodaśyāṃ vārāhī dakṣiṇe sthitā // GarP_1,59.11 //
GP12garup1_u:4072: saptamyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ ca cāmuṇḍā vāyugocare // GarP_1,59.12 //
GP12garup1_u:4075: dvādaśyāṃ ca caturthyāṃ tu kaumārī nairṛte tathā /
GP12garup1_u:4078: puṣyā hastā tathā jyeṣṭhā prasthāne śreṣṭhamucyate // GarP_1,59.15 //
GP12garup1_u:4080: aśvinī rohiṇī puṣyā dhaniṣṭhā ca punarvasū // GarP_1,59.16 //
GP12garup1_u:4088: revatī cāśvinī citrā svātī hastā punarvasū // GarP_1,59.20 //
GP12garup1_u:4089: anurādhā mṛgo jyeṣṭhā ete pārśvamukhāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4094: rohiṇyārdrāṃ tathā puṣyā dhaniṣṭhā cottarātrayam // GarP_1,59.23 //
GP12garup1_u:4095: vāruṇaṃ śravaṇaṃ caiva nava cordhvamukhāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4096: eṣu rājyābhiṣekaṃ ca paṭṭabandhaṃ ca kārayet // GarP_1,59.24 //
GP12garup1_u:4098: caturtho cāśubhā ṣaṣṭhī aṣṭamī navamī tathā // GarP_1,59.25 //
GP12garup1_u:4099: amāvāsyā pūrṇimā ca tadvādaśī ca caturdaśī /
GP12garup1_u:4100: aśuklā pratipacchreṣṭhā dvitīyā candra sūnunā // GarP_1,59.26 //
GP12garup1_u:4104: navamī candravā(sau) reṇa daśamī tu gurau śubhā // GarP_1,59.28 //
GP12garup1_u:4106: trayodaśī śukrabhaumau śanau śreṣṭhā caturdaśī // GarP_1,59.29 //
GP12garup1_u:4108: dvādaśīṃ dahate bhānuḥ śaśī caikādaśīṃ dahet // GarP_1,59.30 //
GP12garup1_u:4109: kujo dahecca daśāmīṃ navamīṃ ca budho dahet /
GP12garup1_u:4110: aṣṭamīṃ dahate jīvaḥ saptamīṃ bhārgavo dahet // GarP_1,59.31 //
GP12garup1_u:4114: meṣe karkaṭake ṣaṣṭhī kanyāyāṃ mithune 'ṣṭamī // GarP_1,59.33 //
GP12garup1_u:4115: vṛṣe kumbhe caturtho ca dvādaśī makare tule /
GP12garup1_u:4116: daśamī vṛścike siṃhe dhanurmone caturdaśī // GarP_1,59.34 //
GP12garup1_u:4117: etā dagdhā na gantavyaṃ pīḍādiḥ kila mānavaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4120: rohiṇyāditrayaṃ jīve śukre puṣyātrayaṃ śiva // GarP_1,59.36 //
GP12garup1_u:4124: kṛttikāsu budhaścaiva gurau rudra punarvasuḥ // GarP_1,59.38 //
GP12garup1_u:4130: bhāge dviśeṣe strīnāśaḥ pusaḥ syādekaśūnyayoḥ // GarP_1,59.41 //
GP12garup1_u:4131: viṣkambhe ghaṭikāḥ pañca śūle sapta prakīrtitāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4132: ṣaḍgaṇḍe cātigaṇḍe ca nava vyāghātavajrayoḥ // GarP_1,59.42 //
GP12garup1_u:4133: vyatīpāte ca parighe vaidhṛte ca dinedine /
GP12garup1_u:4134: etai mṛtyuyutā hyeṣu sarvakarmāṇi varjayet // GarP_1,59.43 //
GP12garup1_u:4135: haster'kaśca guruḥ puṣye anurādhā budhe śubhā /
GP12garup1_u:4136: rohiṇī ca śanau śreṣṭhā saumaṃ somena vai śubham // GarP_1,59.44 //
GP12garup1_u:4137: śukre ca revatī śreṣṭhā aśvinī maṅgale śubhā /
GP12garup1_u:4139: bhārgave bhaparaṇī caiva some citrā vṛṣadhvaja ! /
GP12garup1_u:4140: bhaume cai vottarāṣāḍhā dhaniṣṭhā ca budhe hara ! // GarP_1,59.46 //
GP12garup1_u:4141: garau śatabhiṣā rudra ! śukre vai rohiṇī tathā /
GP12garup1_u:4142: śanau ca revatī śambho ! viṣayogāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // GarP_1,59.47 //
GP12garup1_u:4144: śravaṇaṃ ca dhaniṣṭhā ca hastāśvanīmṛgāstathā // GarP_1,59.48 //
GP12garup1_u:4147: āśleṣā kṛttikā rudra ! prasthāne maraṇapradāḥ // GarP_1,59.49 //
GP12garup1_u:4148: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre nakṣatrataddevatādagdhayogādinirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4152: ṣaḍāditye daśā jñeyā some pañcadaśa smṛtāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4153: aṣṭāvaṅgārake cava budhai spatadaśa smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,60.1 //
GP12garup1_u:4165: mithunasya budho jñeyaḥ somaḥ karkaṭakasya ca // GarP_1,60.7 //
GP12garup1_u:4166: sūryakṣetraṃ bhavetsiṃhaḥ kanyā kṣetraṃ budhasya ca /
GP12garup1_u:4167: bhārgavasya tulā kṣetraṃ vṛścikoṅgārakasya ca // GarP_1,60.8 //
GP12garup1_u:4171: dvirāṣāḍhaḥ sa vijñeyo viṣṇuḥ svapiti karkaṭe // GarP_1,60.10 //
GP12garup1_u:4183: artha prāpnoti vāyavye uttare kalahobhavet // GarP_1,60.16 //
GP12garup1_u:4185: vilikhya ravicakraṃ tu bhāskaro narasannibhaḥ // GarP_1,60.17 //
GP12garup1_u:4189: hṛdaye pañca ṛkṣāṇi ekaṃ nābhau pradāpayet // GarP_1,60.19 //
GP12garup1_u:4191: nakṣatrāṇi ca śeṣāṇi ravipāde niyojayet // GarP_1,60.20 //
GP12garup1_u:4197: mastake padṛvastraṃ syānnakṣatraṃ yadi sthitam // GarP_1,60.23 //
GP12garup1_u:4198: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍaṃ prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre grahadaśādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4205: candrasya dvādaśāvasthā bhavanti śṛṇu tā api // GarP_1,61.2 //
GP12garup1_u:4211: pravāso hānimṛnyṛ ca jayo hāseratiḥ sukham // GarP_1,61.5 //
GP12garup1_u:4212: śoko bhogo jvaraḥ kampaḥ sukhaṃ ceti kramātphalam /
GP12garup1_u:4213: janmasthaḥ kurute tuṣṭiṃ dvitīye nāsti nirvṛtiḥ // GarP_1,61.6 //
GP12garup1_u:4215: pañcamena mṛgāṅkena strīlābho vai tathā bhavet // GarP_1,61.7 //
GP12garup1_u:4216: ghanadhānyāgamaḥ ṣaṣṭhe ratiḥ pūjā ca saptame /
GP12garup1_u:4219: dvādaśena śaśāṅkena mṛtyureva na saṃkhayaḥ // GarP_1,61.9 //
GP12garup1_u:4220: kṛttikādau ca pūrveṇa saptarkṣāṇi ca vai vrajet /
GP12garup1_u:4223: aśvinī revatī citrā dhaniṣṭhā samalaṅkṛtau // GarP_1,61.11 //
GP12garup1_u:4226: śukracandrau hi janmasthau śubhadau ca dvitīyake /
GP12garup1_u:4227: śaśijñaśukrajīvāśca rāśau rāśau cātha tṛtīyake // GarP_1,61.13 //
GP12garup1_u:4230: mandākārai ca kujaḥ ṣaṣṭhe gurucandrau ca saptame /
GP12garup1_u:4231: jñaśukrāvaṣṭame śreṣṭhau navamastho guruḥ śubhaḥ // GarP_1,61.15 //
GP12garup1_u:4233: budho 'tha dvādaśe caiva bhārgavaḥ sukhado bhavet // GarP_1,61.16 //
GP12garup1_u:4234: siṃhena makaraḥ śreṣṭhaḥ kanyayā meṣa uttamaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4235: tulayā saha mīnastu kumbhena sahakarkaṭaḥ // GarP_1,61.17 //
GP12garup1_u:4236: dhanuṣā vṛṣabhaḥ śreṣṭho mithunena ca vṛścikaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4238: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre grahāṇāṃ śubhāśubhasthānādinirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikapaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4240: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre lagnaghaṭikā pramāṇādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma dviṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4248: kūrmonnatau ca caraṇau syātāṃ nṛpavarasya hi // GarP_1,63.2 //
GP12garup1_u:4250: sūrpākārau ca caraṇau saṃkhuṣkau viralāṅgulī // GarP_1,63.3 //
GP12garup1_u:4251: duḥ khadāridyadau syātā nātra kāryāṃ vicāraṇā /
GP12garup1_u:4254: dvedve romṇī paṇḍitānāṃ śrotriyāṇāṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_1,63.5 //
GP12garup1_u:4258: viṣamestrīcañcalo vai nṛpaḥ syādvṛṣaṇe same // GarP_1,63.7 //
GP12garup1_u:4262: bhogāḍhyāḥ samajaṭharā niḥ svāḥ syurghaṭasannibhāḥ // GarP_1,63.9 //
GP12garup1_u:4264: lalāṭe yasya dṛśyante tisro rekhāḥ samāhitāḥ // GarP_1,63.10 //
GP12garup1_u:4265: sukhī putrasamāyuktaḥ sa ṣaṣṭiṃ jīvate naraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4272: triśūlaṃ paṭṭiśaṃ vāpi lalāṭe yasya dṛśyate /
GP12garup1_u:4273: dhanaputra samāyuktaḥ sa jīveccharadaḥ śatam // GarP_1,63.15 //
GP12garup1_u:4275: saṃprāptā yā bhavedrudra ! sa jīveccharadaḥ śatam // GarP_1,63.16 //
GP12garup1_u:4277: madhyamāmūlagā rekhā āyūrekhā ataḥ param // GarP_1,63.17 //
GP12garup1_u:4279: acchinnā vā vibhaktā vā sa jīveccharadaḥ śatam // GarP_1,63.18 //
GP12garup1_u:4281: śatavarṣāṇi jīvecca bhogī rudra ! na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,63.19 //
GP12garup1_u:4284: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre sāmudrike puṃllakṣaṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāma triṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4288: yasyāstu kuñcitāḥ keśā mukhaṃ ca parimaṇḍalam /
GP12garup1_u:4289: nābhiśca dakṣiṇāvartā sā kanyā kulavardhinī // GarP_1,64.1 //
GP12garup1_u:4291: sahasrāṇāṃ tu nārīṇāṃ bhavetsāpi pativratā // GarP_1,64.2 //
GP12garup1_u:4292: vakrakeśā ca yā kanyā maṇḍalākṣī ca yā bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:4293: bhartā ca mriyate tasyā niyataṃ duḥ khabhāginī // GarP_1,64.3 //
GP12garup1_u:4295: viśālanetrā bimboṣṭhī sā kanyā labhate sukham // GarP_1,64.4 //
GP12garup1_u:4298: kārye ca mantrī satstrī syātsatī (khī) syātkaraṇeṣu ca /
GP12garup1_u:4299: streheṣu bhāryā mātā syādveśyā ca śayane śubhā // GarP_1,64.6 //
GP12garup1_u:4300: aṅkuśaṃ kuṇḍalaṃ cakraṃ yasyāḥ pāṇitale bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:4301: putraṃ prasūyate nārī narendraṃ labhate patim // GarP_1,64.7 //
GP12garup1_u:4302: yasyāstu romaśau pārśvau romaśau ca payodharau /
GP12garup1_u:4303: annatau cādharoṣṭhau ca kṣipraṃ mārayate patim // GarP_1,64.8 //
GP12garup1_u:4309: patiṃ mārayate kṣipraṃ svecchācāreṇa vartate // GarP_1,64.11 //
GP12garup1_u:4311: patiṃ mārayate kṣipraṃ svecchācāreṇa vartate // GarP_1,64.12 //
GP12garup1_u:4313: tvacaḥ snehena śāyyāṃ ca pādasnehena vāhanam // GarP_1,64.13 //
GP12garup1_u:4317: śubhe jaṅghe virome ca ūrū hastikaropamau // GarP_1,64.15 //
GP12garup1_u:4320: aromā trivalī nāryā hṛtstanau romavarjitau // GarP_1,64.16 //
GP12garup1_u:4321: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre sāmudrike strīlakṣaṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāma catuḥ ṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4330: śū(sar) pākārau virūkṣau ca vakrau pādau śirālakau // GarP_1,65.3 //
GP12garup1_u:4333: vicchittidau ca vaṃśasya brahmanghau śaṅku (pakra) sannibhau /
GP12garup1_u:4338: nṛpāṇāṃ śrotriyāṇāṃ ca dvedve śriye ca dhīmatām // GarP_1,65.7 //
GP12garup1_u:4339: tryādyairniḥ svā mānavāḥ syurduḥ svabhājaśca ninditāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4340: keśāśca vai kuñcitāśca pravāse mriyate naraḥ // GarP_1,65.8 //
GP12garup1_u:4342: vikaṭaiśca daridrāḥ syuḥ samāṃsai rājyameva ca // GarP_1,65.9 //
GP12garup1_u:4350: balavānyuddhaśīlaśca laghuśektaḥ sa eva ca // GarP_1,65.13 //
GP12garup1_u:4352: samābhyāṃ kṣitipaḥ proktaḥ pralambena śatābdavān // GarP_1,65.14 //
GP12garup1_u:4360: samaiḥ strīratnadhanino madhye nimnaiśca kanyakāḥ // GarP_1,65.18 //
GP12garup1_u:4362: puṣpagandhe nṛpāḥ śukre madhugandhe dhanaṃ bahuḥ // GarP_1,65.19 //
GP12garup1_u:4363: putrāḥ śukre matsyagandhe tanuśukre ca kanyakāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4367: māṃsalasphik sukhī syācca siṃhasphik bhūpatiḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4368: bhavetsiṃhakaṭī rājā niḥ svaḥ kapikaṭirnaraḥ // GarP_1,65.22 //
GP12garup1_u:4369: sarpodarā daridrāḥ syuḥ piṭharaiśca ghaṭaiḥ samaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4370: dhanino vipulaiḥ pārśvairniḥ svā raktaiśca nimnagaiḥ // GarP_1,65.23 //
GP12garup1_u:4376: vāmāvartaśca sādhyaṃ vai medhāṃ dakṣiṇatastathā // GarP_1,65.26 //
GP12garup1_u:4378: adho gavāḍhyaṃ kuryācca nṛpatvaṃ padmakarṇikā // GarP_1,65.27 //
GP12garup1_u:4380: trivaliḥ kṣmāpa ācārya ṛjubhirvālibhiḥ sukhī // GarP_1,65.28 //
GP12garup1_u:4386: samonnataṃ ca hṛdayamakampaṃ māṃsalaṃ pṛthu // GarP_1,65.31 //
GP12garup1_u:4398: saṃmāsau caiva bhugnālpau śliṣṭau ca vipulau śubhau // GarP_1,65.37 //
GP12garup1_u:4400: niḥ svānāṃ romaśau hrasvau śreṣṭhau karikara prabhau // GarP_1,65.38 //
GP12garup1_u:4402: medhāvināṃ ca sūkṣmāḥ syurbhṛtyānāṃ cipiṭāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,65.39 //
GP12garup1_u:4429: śatāyuṣaṃ ca kurute chinnayā taruto bhayam /
GP12garup1_u:4430: niḥ svāśca bahurekhāḥ syunirdravyāścibukaiḥ kṛśaiḥ // GarP_1,65.53 //
GP12garup1_u:4434: tīkṣṇā dantāḥ samāḥ śreṣṭhā jihvā raktā samā śubhā // GarP_1,65.55 //
GP12garup1_u:4435: ślakṣṇā dīrghā ca vijñeyā tālū śvete dhanakṣaye /
GP12garup1_u:4436: kṛṣṇe ca paruṣo vakraṃ samaṃ saumyaṃ ca saṃvṛtam // GarP_1,65.56 //
GP12garup1_u:4437: bhūpānāmamalaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ viparītaṃ ca duḥ khinām /
GP12garup1_u:4438: mahā duḥ khaṃ durbhagāṇāṃ strīmukhaṃ putramāpnuyāt // GarP_1,65.57 //
GP12garup1_u:4439: āḍhyānāṃ vartulaṃ vakraṃ nirdravyāṇāṃ ca dīrghakam /
GP12garup1_u:4442: sampūrṇaṃ bhogināṃ kāntaṃ śmaśru snigdhaṃ śubhaṃ mṛdu // GarP_1,65.59 //
GP12garup1_u:4454: svalpacchidrau supuṭau ca avakrau ca nṛpeśvare // GarP_1,65.65 //
GP12garup1_u:4455: krūre dakṣiṇavakrā syādvalināṃ ca kṣutaṃ sakṛt /
GP12garup1_u:4456: syādviniṣpiṇḍitaṃ hrādi sānunādaṃ ca jīvakṛt // GarP_1,65.66 //
GP12garup1_u:4460: jihyaiśca locanaiḥ śūrāḥ senānyo gajalocanāḥ // GarP_1,65.68 //
GP12garup1_u:4462: nīlotpa lākṣā vidvāṃsaḥ saubhāgyaṃ śyāmacakṣuṣām // GarP_1,65.69 //
GP12garup1_u:4464: maṇḍalākṣāśca pāpāḥ syurniḥ svāḥ syurdenalocanāḥ // GarP_1,65.70 //
GP12garup1_u:4468: āḍhyo niḥ svaśca khaṇḍabhrṛrmadhye ca vinatabhruvaḥ // GarP_1,65.72 //
GP12garup1_u:4469: strīṣu gamyāsu saktāḥ syuḥ sutārthe parivarjitāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4477: pracurāśrudīnaṃ rūkṣaṃ ca ruditaṃ ca sukhāvaham /
GP12garup1_u:4496: vipulastriṣu gambhīro dīrghaḥ sūkṣmaśca pañcasu // GarP_1,65.86 //
GP12garup1_u:4498: nābhiḥ svaraśca sasattvaṃ ca trayaṃ gambhīramīritam // GarP_1,65.87 //
GP12garup1_u:4500: cakṣuḥ kakṣā nāsikā ca ṣaṭ syur nṛpakṛkāṭikāḥ // GarP_1,65.88 //
GP12garup1_u:4501: unnatāni ca hrasvani jaṅghā grīvā ca liṅgakam /
GP12garup1_u:4502: pṛṣṭhaṃ catvāri raktāni karatālvadharā nakhāḥ // GarP_1,65.89 //
GP12garup1_u:4506: narāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ proktaṃ vadāmi strīṣu lakṣaṇam // GarP_1,65.91 //
GP12garup1_u:4507: rājñyāḥ snigdhau samau pādau talau tāmrau nakhau tathā /
GP12garup1_u:4508: śliṣṭāṅgulī connatāgrau tāṃ pāpya nṛpatirbhavet // GarP_1,65.92 //
GP12garup1_u:4512: jaṅghe ca romarahite suvṛtte viśire śubhe // GarP_1,65.94 //
GP12garup1_u:4514: ūrū karikarākārāvaromau ca samau śubhau // GarP_1,65.95 //
GP12garup1_u:4517: gūḍho maṇiśca śubhado nitambaśca guruḥ śubhaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4520: aromaśau stanau pīnau ghanāvaviṣamau śubhau // GarP_1,65.98 //
GP12garup1_u:4521: kaṭhinau romaśā śastā mṛdugrīvā ca kambubhā /
GP12garup1_u:4522: āraktāvadharau śreṣṭhau māṃsalaṃ vartulaṃ mukham // GarP_1,65.99 //
GP12garup1_u:4525: nāsā samā samapuṭā strīṇāṃ tu rucirā śubhā /
GP12garup1_u:4527: na pṛthū bālendunibhe bhruvau cātha lalāṭakam /
GP12garup1_u:4530: snigdhā nīlāśca mṛdavo mūrdhajāḥ kuñcitāḥ kacāḥ // GarP_1,65.103 //
GP12garup1_u:4531: strīṇāṃ samaṃ śiraḥ śreṣṭhaṃ pāde pāṇitale 'tha vā /
GP12garup1_u:4537: na nimnaṃ nonnataṃ strīṇāṃ bhavetkaratalaṃ śubham /
GP12garup1_u:4539: rekhā yā maṇibandhotthā gatā madhyāṅguliṃ kare // GarP_1,65.107 //
GP12garup1_u:4540: gatā pāṇitale yā ca yordhvapādatale sthitā /
GP12garup1_u:4541: strīṇāṃ puṃsāṃ tathā sā syādrājyāya ca sukhāya ca // GarP_1,65.108 //
GP12garup1_u:4547: śubhaṃ tu lakṣaṇaṃ strīṇāṃ proktaṃ tvaśubhamanyathā // GarP_1,65.111 //
GP12garup1_u:4548: kaniṣṭhikānāmikā vā yasyā na spṛśate mahīm /
GP12garup1_u:4549: aṅguṣṭhaṃ vā gatātītya tarjanī kulaṭā ca sā // GarP_1,65.112 //
GP12garup1_u:4552: vāmāvartaṃ nimnamalpaṃ duḥ khitānāṃ ca guhyakam /
GP12garup1_u:4553: grīvayā hrasvayā niḥ svā dīrghayā ca kulakṣayaḥ // GarP_1,65.114 //
GP12garup1_u:4555: kekare piṅgale netre śyāme lolekṣaṇā satī // GarP_1,65.115 //
GP12garup1_u:4556: smite kūpe gaṇḍayośca sā dhruvaṃ vyabhicāriṇī /
GP12garup1_u:4557: pralambinī lalāṭe tu devaraṃ hanti cāṅganā // GarP_1,65.116 //
GP12garup1_u:4558: udare śvaśuraṃ hanti patiṃ hanti sphicordvayoḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4559: yā tu romottarauṣṭhī syānna śubhā bhartureva hi // GarP_1,65.117 //
GP12garup1_u:4560: stanau saromāvaśubhau karṇau ca viṣamau tathā /
GP12garup1_u:4561: karālā viṣamā dantāḥ kleśāya ca bhavanti te // GarP_1,65.118 //
GP12garup1_u:4568: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre sāmudrike strīnaralakṣaṇaṃ nāma pañcaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4581: ubhayoḥ saṃgamo yatra tatra muktirna saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,66.5 //
GP12garup1_u:4582: śālagrāmo dvārakā ca naimiṣaṃ puṣkaraṃ gayā /
GP12garup1_u:4583: vārāṇasī prayāgaśca kurukṣetraṃ ca sūkaram // GarP_1,66.6 //
GP12garup1_u:4584: gaṅgā ca narmadā caiva candrabhāgā sarasvatī /
GP12garup1_u:4587: prabhavo vibhavaḥ śuklaḥ pramodo 'tha prajāpatiḥ // GarP_1,66.8 //
GP12garup1_u:4588: aṅgirāḥ śrīmukho bhāvaḥ yuvā dhātā tathaiva ca /
GP12garup1_u:4589: īśvaro bahudhānyaśca pramāthī vikramo viṣuḥ // GarP_1,66.9 //
GP12garup1_u:4591: sarvajitsarvadhārī ca virodhī vikṛtiḥ kharaḥ // GarP_1,66.10 //
GP12garup1_u:4593: hemalambo vilaṃbaśca vikāraḥ śarvarī plavaḥ // GarP_1,66.11 //
GP12garup1_u:4596: paridhāvī pramādī ca ānando rākṣaso nalaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4599: aśobhanāḥ śobhanāśca nāmnaivaite hi vatsarāḥ // GarP_1,66.14 //
GP12garup1_u:4601: rājā sā(mā) jā udāsā ca pīḍā mṛtyustathaiva ca // GarP_1,66.15 //
GP12garup1_u:4602: ā ī ū ai au svarāṃśca likhetpañcāgnikoṣṭhake /
GP12garup1_u:4604: tithī ekā gnikoṣṭheṣu trayo rājātha sā (mā) jayāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4610: kalāliṅgā ca yā tiṣṭhetpañcamastasya vai mṛtiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4611: kalā tithistathā vāro nakṣatraṃ māsameva ca // GarP_1,66.20 //
GP12garup1_u:4612: nāmodayasya pūrvaṃ ca tathā bhavati nānyathā /
GP12garup1_u:4615: trailokyamohanaṃ bījaṃ nṛsiṃhasya tu padma(nna)gam // GarP_1,66.22 //
GP12garup1_u:4617: bhūrje tu dhāritāḥ kaṇṭhe bāhau ceti jayādidāḥ // GarP_1,66.23 //
GP12garup1_u:4618: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jyotiḥ śāstre śālagrāmaṣaṣṭyūbdasvarodayānāṃ nirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṭṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4623: hareḥ śrutvā haro gaurīṃ dehasthaṃ jñānamabravīt // GarP_1,67.1 //
GP12garup1_u:4624: kujo vahnī raviḥ pṛthvī saurirāpaḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4629: sthānasevāṃ tathā dhyānaṃ vāṇijyaṃ rājadarśanam // GarP_1,67.4 //
GP12garup1_u:4633: śubhāśubhaviveko hi jñāyate tu svarodayāt // GarP_1,67.6 //
GP12garup1_u:4637: cakravacca sthitāstāstu sarvāḥ prāṇaharāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,67.8 //
GP12garup1_u:4639: vāmā somātmikā proktā dakṣiṇā ravisannibhā // GarP_1,67.9 //
GP12garup1_u:4641: vāmā hyamṛtarūpā ca jagadāpyāyane sthitā // GarP_1,67.10 //
GP12garup1_u:4644: nirgame tu bhavedvāmā praveśe dakṣaiṇā smṛtā /
GP12garup1_u:4651: śobhaneṣu ca kāryeṣu yātrāyāṃ viṣakarmaṇi // GarP_1,67.15 //
GP12garup1_u:4653: dvābhyāṃ caiva pravāhe ca krūrasaumyavivarjane // GarP_1,67.16 //
GP12garup1_u:4657: yuddhādibhojane ghāte strīṇāṃ caiva tu saṃgame // GarP_1,67.18 //
GP12garup1_u:4661: vāmācāre 'thavā dakṣe pratyaye yatra nāyakaḥ // GarP_1,67.20 //
GP12garup1_u:4662: tanusthaḥ pṛcchate yastu tatra siddhirna saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4663: vaicchando vāmadevastu yadā vahati cātmani // GarP_1,67.21 //
GP12garup1_u:4665: vāme vā dakṣiṇe vāpi yatra saṃkramate śivā // GarP_1,67.22 //
GP12garup1_u:4666: ghore ghorāṇi kāryāṇi saumye vai madhyamāni ca /
GP12garup1_u:4667: prasthite bhāgato haṃse dvābhyāṃ vai sarvavāhinī // GarP_1,67.23 //
GP12garup1_u:4671: agrato vāmikā śreṣṭhā pṛṣṭhato dakṣiṇā śubhā // GarP_1,67.25 //
GP12garup1_u:4672: vāmena vāmikā proktā dakṣiṇe dakṣiṇā śubhā /
GP12garup1_u:4673: vāme vāmā śubhe caiva dakṣiṇe dakṣiṇā śubhā // GarP_1,67.26 //
GP12garup1_u:4674: jīvo jīvati jīvena yacchūnyaṃ tastvaro bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:4678: yāvatṣaṣṭhī tu pṛcchāyāṃ pūrṇāyāṃ prathamo jayet /
GP12garup1_u:4681: pravṛtte dakṣiṇe mārge viṣame viṣamākṣaram // GarP_1,67.30 //
GP12garup1_u:4682: anyatra vāmavāhe tu nāma vai viṣamākṣaram /
GP12garup1_u:4685: jā(ja) yate nātra sandeho nāḍīmaghye tu lakṣayet // GarP_1,67.32 //
GP12garup1_u:4688: na dātuṃ jāyate so 'pi nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GP12garup1_u:4689: atha saṃgrāmamadhye tu yatra nāḍī sadā vahet // GarP_1,67.34 //
GP12garup1_u:4690: sā diśā jayamāpnoti śūnye bhaṅgaṃ vinirdiśet /
GP12garup1_u:4692: jayaṃ parājayaṃ caiva yo jānāti sa paṇḍitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4693: vāme vā dakṣiṇe vāpi yatra sañcarate śivam // GarP_1,67.36 //
GP12garup1_u:4695: śaśisūryapravāhe tu sati yuddhaṃ samācaret // GarP_1,67.37 //
GP12garup1_u:4697: yāṃ diśaṃ vahate vāyustāṃ diśaṃ yāvadājayaḥ // GarP_1,67.38 //
GP12garup1_u:4698: jāyate nātra sandeha handro yadyagrataḥ sthitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4699: meṣyādyā daśa yā nāḍyo dakṣiṇā vāma saṃsthitāḥ // GarP_1,67.39 //
GP12garup1_u:4701: nirgame nirgamaṃ yāti saṃgrahe saṃgrahaṃ viduḥ // GarP_1,67.40 //
GP12garup1_u:4703: vāme vā dakṣiṇe vāpi pañcatattvasthitaḥ śive // GarP_1,67.41 //
GP12garup1_u:4705: madhye tu pṛthivī jñeyā nabhaḥ sarvatra sarvadā // GarP_1,67.42 //
GP12garup1_u:4707: madhye stambhaṃ vijānīyānmokṣaḥ sarvatra sarvage // GarP_1,67.43 //
GP12garup1_u:4708: iti śrīgāruḍemahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe svarodaye śubhāśubhanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4713: indrādyā nirjitāstena vijetuṃ tairna śakyate // GarP_1,68.1 //
GP12garup1_u:4715: balo dadau sa (sva) paśutāmatisattva surairhataḥ // GarP_1,68.2 //
GP12garup1_u:4723: yadyatpapāta ratnānāṃ bījaṃ kracana kiñcana // GarP_1,68.6 //
GP12garup1_u:4724: mahodadhau sariti vā pavarta kānane 'pi vā /
GP12garup1_u:4727: prādurbhavanti ratnāni tathaiva viguṇāni ca // GarP_1,68.8 //
GP12garup1_u:4732: ākāravarṇau prathamaṃ guṇadoṣau tatphalaṃ parīkṣā ca /
GP12garup1_u:4737: dhāraṇaṃ saṃgraho vāpi kāryaḥ śriyamabhīpsatā // GarP_1,68.13 //
GP12garup1_u:4739: ta eva mūlyamātrāyā vettāraḥ parikīrtitāḥ // GarP_1,68.14 //
GP12garup1_u:4742: tasyāsthileśo nipapāta yeṣu bhuvaḥ pradeśeṣu kathañcideva /
GP12garup1_u:4746: ātāmrā himaśailajāśca śaśibhā veṇvātaṭīyāḥ smṛtāḥ sauvīre tvasitābjameghasadṛśāstābhrāśca saurāṣṭrajāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4747: kāliṅgāḥ kana kāvadātarucirāḥ pītaprabhāḥ kosale śyāmāḥ puṇḍrabhavā mataṅgaviṣaye nātyantapītaprabhāḥ // GarP_1,68.18 //
GP12garup1_u:4749: loke 'sminparāmāṇumātramapi yadvajraṃ kraciddṛśyate tasmindevasamāśrayo hyavitathastīkṣṇāgradhāraṃ yadi // GarP_1,68.19 //
GP12garup1_u:4756: dvau vajravarṇau pṛthivīpatīnāṃ sadbhiḥ pradiṣṭau na tu sārvajanyau /
GP12garup1_u:4757: yaḥ syājjavāvidrumabhaṅgaśoṇo yo vā haridrārasannikāśaḥ // GarP_1,68.23 //
GP12garup1_u:4761: tataḥ kaṣṭataro vajravarṇānāṃ saṅkaro mataḥ // GarP_1,68.25 //
GP12garup1_u:4762: na ca mārgavibhāgamātravṛttyā viduṣā vajraparigraho vidheyaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4764: ekamapi yasya śṛṅgaṃ vidalitamavalokyate viśīrṇaṃ vā /
GP12garup1_u:4765: guṇavadapi tanna dhāryaṃ vajraṃ śreyo 'rthibhirbhavane // GarP_1,68.27 //
GP12garup1_u:4767: na hi vajrabhṛto 'pi vajramāśu śriyamapyāśrayalālasāṃ na kuryāt // GarP_1,68.28 //
GP12garup1_u:4769: na tanna kuryāddhriyamāṇamāśu svacchandamṛtyorapi jīvitāntam // GarP_1,68.29 //
GP12garup1_u:4770: koṭyaḥ pārśvani dhārāśca ṣaḍaṣṭau dvādaśeti ca /
GP12garup1_u:4772: ṣaṭkoṭi śudvamamalaṃ sphuṭatīkṣṇadhāraṃ varṇānvitaṃ laghu supārśvamapetadoṣam /
GP12garup1_u:4774: tīkṣṇāgraṃ vimalamapetasarvadoṣaṃ dhatte yaḥ prayatatanuḥ sadaiva vajram /
GP12garup1_u:4779: maṇiśāstravido vadanti tasya dviguṇaṃ rūpakalakṣamagramūlyam // GarP_1,68.34 //
GP12garup1_u:4782: yattaṇḍulairdvādaśabhiḥ kṛtasya vajrasya mūlyaṃ prathamaṃ pradiṣṭam /
GP12garup1_u:4789: sva (sa) mūlyāddaśamaṃ bhāgaṃ vajraṃ labhati mānavaḥ // GarP_1,68.39 //
GP12garup1_u:4791: sva (su) mūlyācchataśo bhāgo vajrasya na vidhīyate // GarP_1,68.40 //
GP12garup1_u:4793: ratnānāṃ parikarmārthaṃ mūlyaṃ tasya bhavellaghu // GarP_1,68.41 //
GP12garup1_u:4794: prathamaṃ guṇasampadābhyupetaṃ pratibaddhaṃ samupaiti yacca doṣam /
GP12garup1_u:4795: alamābharaṇena tasya rājño guṇahīno 'pi maṇirna bhūṣaṇāya // GarP_1,68.42 //
GP12garup1_u:4801: parīkṣā teṣu kartavyā vidvadbhiḥ suparīkṣakaiḥ // GarP_1,68.45 //
GP12garup1_u:4803: pṛthivyāṃ yāni ratnāni ye cānye lohadhātavaḥ // GarP_1,68.46 //
GP12garup1_u:4807: jātirajātiṃ vilikhati jātiṃ vilikhanti vajrakuruvindāḥ // GarP_1,68.48 //
GP12garup1_u:4809: vajrāṇi muktāmaṇayo ye ca kecana jātayaḥ // GarP_1,68.49 //
GP12garup1_u:4815: saudā minīvisphuritābhirāmaṃ rājā yathoktaṃ kaliśaṃ dadhānaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4817: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ratnatadviśeṣavajraparīkṣaṇādivarṇanaṃ nāmāṣṭaṣaṣṭitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4822: muktāphalāni prathitāni loke teṣāṃ ca śuktyudbhavameva bhūri // GarP_1,69.1 //
GP12garup1_u:4823: tatraiva caikasya hi mūlamātra niviśyate ratnapadasya jātu /
GP12garup1_u:4824: vedhyaṃ tu śuktayudbhavameva teṣāṃ śeṣāṇyavedhyāni vadanti tajjñāḥ // GarP_1,69.2 //
GP12garup1_u:4826: prāyo vimuktāni bhavanti bhāsā śastāni māṅgalyatayā tathāpi // GarP_1,69.3 //
GP12garup1_u:4828: kambūdbhavaṃ teṣvadhamaṃ pradiṣṭamutpadyate yacca gajendrakumbhāt // GarP_1,69.4 //
GP12garup1_u:4832: mataṅgajāścāpi viśuddhavaṃśyāste mauktikānāṃ prabhavāḥ pradiṣṭāḥ // GarP_1,69.6 //
GP12garup1_u:4834: pāṭhīnapṛṣṭhasya samānavarṇaṃ mīnātsuvṛttaṃ laghu cātisūkṣmam // GarP_1,69.7 //
GP12garup1_u:4835: utpadyate vāricarānaneṣu matsyāśce te madhyacarāḥ payodheḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4839: te veṇavo divyajanopabhogye sthāne prarohanti na sārvajanye /
GP12garup1_u:4842: prāpyātiratnāni mahāprabhāṇi rājyaṃ śriyaṃ vā mahatīṃ durāpām // GarP_1,69.11 //
GP12garup1_u:4844: jijñāsayā ratnadhanaṃ vidhijñaiḥ śubhemuhūrte prayataiḥ prayatnāt // GarP_1,69.12 //
GP12garup1_u:4845: rakṣāvidhānaṃ sumahadvidhāya harmyopariṣṭhaṃ kriyate yadā tat /
GP12garup1_u:4848: na taṃ bhujaṅgā na tu yātudhānā na vyādhayo nāpyupasargadoṣāḥ // GarP_1,69.14 //
GP12garup1_u:4849: hiṃsanti yasyāhiśiraḥ samutthaṃ muktāphalaṃ tiṣṭhati kośamadhye /
GP12garup1_u:4850: nābhyeti meghaprabhavaṃ dharitrīṃ vipradgataṃ tadvibudhā haranti // GarP_1,69.15 //
GP12garup1_u:4853: divā yathā dīrptiṅkaraṃ tathaiva tamo 'vagāḍhāsvapi tanniśāsu /
GP12garup1_u:4855: mūlyaṃ na vā syāditi niścayo me kṛtsnā mahī tasya muvarṇapūrṇā /
GP12garup1_u:4857: sāpatnyahīnāṃ sa mahīṃ samagrāṃ bhunakti tattiṣṭhati yāvadeva /
GP12garup1_u:4858: na kevalaṃ tacchubhakṛnnṛpasya bhāgyaiḥ prajānāmapi tasya janma // GarP_1,69.19 //
GP12garup1_u:4860: nakṣatramāleva divo viśīrṇā dantāvalistasya mahāmurasya // GarP_1,69.20 //
GP12garup1_u:4861: vicitravarṇeṣu viśuddhavarṇā payaḥ su patyuḥ payasāṃ papāta /
GP12garup1_u:4870: cintyā na tasyākarajā viśeṣā rūpe pramāṇe ca yateta vidvān /
GP12garup1_u:4871: na ca vyavasthāsti guṇāguṇeṣu sarvatra sarvākṛtayo bhavanti // GarP_1,69.25 //
GP12garup1_u:4873: mūlyaṃ sahasrāṇi tu rūpakāṇāṃ tribhiḥ śatairapyādhikāni pañca // GarP_1,69.26 //
GP12garup1_u:4875: yanmāṣakāṃstrīnbibhṛyātsahasre dve tasya mūlyaṃ paramaṃ pradiṣṭam // GarP_1,69.27 //
GP12garup1_u:4876: ardhādhikau dvau vahato 'sya mūlyaṃ tribhiḥ śatairapyadhikaṃ sahasram /
GP12garup1_u:4877: dvimāṣa konmānitagauravasya śatāni cāṣṭau kathitāni mūlyam // GarP_1,69.28 //
GP12garup1_u:4878: ardhādhikaṃ māṣakamunmitasya samaṃ ca viṃśatritayaṃ śatānām /
GP12garup1_u:4879: guñjāśca ṣaḍ dhārayataḥ śate dve mūlyaṃ paraṃ tasya vadanti tajjñāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4880: adhyardhamunmāna(pa) kṛtaṃ śataṃ syānmūlyaṃ guṇaistasya samanvitasya // GarP_1,69.29 //
GP12garup1_u:4882: adhikaṃ daśabhiḥ śataṃ ca mūlyaṃ samavāpnotyapi bāliśasya hastāt // GarP_1,69.30 //
GP12garup1_u:4884: navasaptatimāpnuyātsvamūlyaṃ yadi na syādguṇasampadā vihīnam // GarP_1,69.31 //
GP12garup1_u:4885: triṃśatā dharaṇaṃ pūrṇaṃ śikyaṃ tasyeti kīrtyate /
GP12garup1_u:4888: pañcāśattu bhavetsomastasya mūlyaṃ tu viṃśatiḥ // GarP_1,69.33 //
GP12garup1_u:4893: ghṛṣṭaṃ tato mṛdutanūkṛtapiṇḍamūlaiḥ kuryādyatheṣṭamanu mauktikamāśu viddham // GarP_1,69.35 //
GP12garup1_u:4894: mṛlliptamatsyapuṭamadhyagataṃ tu kṛtvā paścātpacettanu tataśca biḍālapuṭyā /
GP12garup1_u:4895: dugdhe tataḥ payasi taṃ vipacetsudhāyāṃ pakraṃ tato 'pi payasā śucicikraṇena // GarP_1,69.36 //
GP12garup1_u:4897: vyāḍirjagāda jagatāṃ hi mahāprabhāvaḥ siddho vidagdhahitatatparayā dayāluḥ // GarP_1,69.37 //
GP12garup1_u:4900: evaṃ hi siṃhale deśe kurvanti kuśalā janāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4905: sitaṃ pramāṇavatsnigdhaṃ guru svacchaṃ sunirmalam // GarP_1,69.41 //
GP12garup1_u:4906: tejo 'dhikaṃ suvṛttaṃ ca mauktikaṃ guṇavatsmṛtam // GarP_1,69.42 //
GP12garup1_u:4909: evaṃ samastena guṇodayena yanmauktikaṃ yogamupāgataṃ syāt /
GP12garup1_u:4910: na tasya bhartāramanarthajāta eko 'pi kaścit samupaiti doṣaḥ // GarP_1,69.44 //
GP12garup1_u:4911: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe muktāphalapramāṇādivarṇanaṃ nāma muktāphalaparīkṣā nāmaikonasaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4916: asṛggṛhītvā carituṃ pratasthe nistriṃśanīlena nabhaḥ sthalena // GarP_1,70.1 //
GP12garup1_u:4918: laṅkādhipenārdhapathe sametya svarbhānuneva prasabhaṃ niruddhaḥ // GarP_1,70.2 //
GP12garup1_u:4923: tataḥ prabhṛtyeva ca śarvarīṣu kūlāni ratnairnicitāni tasyāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4930: sāṃdre 'pi rāge prabhayā svayaiva bhānti svalakṣyāḥ sphuṭamadhyaśobhāḥ // GarP_1,70.8 //
GP12garup1_u:4936: anye punaḥ santi ca puṣpitānāṃ tulyatviṣā kokanadottamānām // GarP_1,70.11 //
GP12garup1_u:4939: kāmaṃ tu rāgaḥ kuruvindajeṣu sa naiva yādṛk sphaṭikodbhaveṣu /
GP12garup1_u:4940: nirarciṣo 'ntarbahulā bhavanti prabhāvavanto 'pi nataiḥ samastaiḥ // GarP_1,70.13 //
GP12garup1_u:4944: na jāyante hi ye kecinmūlyaleśamavāpnuyuḥ // GarP_1,70.15 //
GP12garup1_u:4946: sadharmāṇaḥ prajāyante svalpamūlyā hi te smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,70.16 //
GP12garup1_u:4948: arciṣmattā mahattā ca maṇīnāṃ guṇasaṃgrahaḥ // GarP_1,70.17 //
GP12garup1_u:4950: na te praśastā maṇayo bhavanti samānato jātiguṇaiḥ samastaiḥ // GarP_1,70.18 //
GP12garup1_u:4958: kārṣṇyāttathā siṃhaladeśajātaṃ muktābhidhānaṃ nabhasaḥ svabhāvāt // GarP_1,70.22 //
GP12garup1_u:4960: yastāmrikāṃ puṣyati padmarāgo yogāttuṣāṇāmiva pūrṇamadhyaḥ // GarP_1,70.23 //
GP12garup1_u:4961: strehapradigdhaḥ pratibhāti yaśca yo vā praghṛṣṭaḥ prajahāti dīptim /
GP12garup1_u:4962: ākrāntamūrdhā ca tathāṅgulibhyāṃ yaḥ kālikāṃ pārśvagatāṃ bibharti // GarP_1,70.24 //
