GP12garup1_u:4964: tulyapramāṇasya ca tulyajāteryo vā gurutvena bhavettu tulyaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4965: prāpyāpi ratnākarajā svajātiṃ lakṣedgurutvena guṇena vidvān // GarP_1,70.25 //
GP12garup1_u:4968: vajraṃ vā kuruvindaṃ vā vimucyānena kenacit /
GP12garup1_u:4970: jātyasya sarve 'pi maṇerna jātu vijātayaḥ santi samānavarṇāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:4971: tathāpi nānākaraṇārthameva bhedaprakāraḥ paramaḥ pradiṣṭaḥ // GarP_1,70.28 //
GP12garup1_u:4972: guṇopapannena sahāvabaddhomeṇirna dhāryo viguṇo hi jātyā /
GP12garup1_u:4973: na kaustubhenāpi sahāvabaddhaṃ vidvānvijātiṃ bibhṛyātkadācit // GarP_1,70.29 //
GP12garup1_u:4974: cāṇḍāla eko 'pi yathā dvijātīnsametya bhūrīnapi hantyayatnāt /
GP12garup1_u:4977: na padmarāgasya mahāguṇasya bhartāramāpatspṛśatīha kācit // GarP_1,70.31 //
GP12garup1_u:4979: guṇaiḥ samuttejitacārurāgaṃ yaḥ padmarāgaṃ prayato bibharti // GarP_1,70.32 //
GP12garup1_u:4984: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe padmarāgaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma saptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:4989: dvidhā kurvanniva vyoma satvaraṃ vāsukiryayau // GarP_1,71.1 //
GP12garup1_u:4998: tatraiva kiñcitpatatastu pittādupetya jagrāha tato garutmān /
GP12garup1_u:4999: mūrchāparītaḥ sahasaiva ghoṇārandhradvayena pramumoca sarvam // GarP_1,71.6 //
GP12garup1_u:5001: kalhāraśaṣpakabhujaṅgabhujāñca patraprāptatviṣo marakatāḥ śubhadā bhavanti // GarP_1,71.7 //
GP12garup1_u:5003: tasyākarasyātitarāṃ sa deśo duḥ khopalabhyaśca guṇaiśca yuktaḥ // GarP_1,71.8 //
GP12garup1_u:5012: yuktaṃ saṃsthānaguṇaiḥ samarāgaṃ gauraveṇa na vihīnam /
GP12garup1_u:5021: tadapi guṇavatsaṃjñāmāpnoti hi yādṛśī pūrvam // GarP_1,71.17 //
GP12garup1_u:5025: śreyaskāmairna taddhāryaṃ kretavyaṃ vā katañcana // GarP_1,71.19 //
GP12garup1_u:5028: kṣaumeṇa vāsasā mṛṣṭā dīptiṃ tyajati putrikā /
GP12garup1_u:5029: lāghavenaiva kācasya śakyā kartuṃ vibhāvanā // GarP_1,71.21 //
GP12garup1_u:5032: vajrāṇi muktāḥ santyanye ye ca keciddvijātayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5041: saṃgrāme vicaradbhiśca dhāryaṃ marakataṃ budhaiḥ // GarP_1,71.27 //
GP12garup1_u:5046: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe purvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍa marakataparīkṣaṇaṃ nāmaikasaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5051: deśe papāta ditijasya nitāntakāntaṃ protphullanīrajasamadyuti netrayugmam // GarP_1,72.1 //
GP12garup1_u:5062: tata eva hi jāyante maṇayastatra bhūrayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5069: ta eva pratyayā dṛṣṭā indranīlamaṇerapi // GarP_1,72.10 //
GP12garup1_u:5077: kathitā vijātaya ime sadṛśā maṇinendranīlena // GarP_1,72.14 //
GP12garup1_u:5085: nīlatāṃ tannayetsarvaṃ mahānīlaḥ sa ucyate // GarP_1,72.18 //
GP12garup1_u:5087: tadindranīlasya mahāguṇasya suvarṇa saṃkhyātu litasya mūlyam // GarP_1,72.19 //
GP12garup1_u:5088: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe indranīlaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma dvisaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5093: parīkṣāṃ brahmaṇā proktāṃ vyāsena kathitāṃ dvijā // GarP_1,73.1 //
GP12garup1_u:5105: cāṣāgrapakṣapratimaśriyo ye na te praśastā maṇiśāstravidbhiḥ // GarP_1,73.7 //
GP12garup1_u:5113: tadeva vaidūryamaṇeḥ pradiṣṭaṃ paladvayonmāpi tagauravasya // GarP_1,73.11 //
GP12garup1_u:5114: jātyasya sarve 'pi maṇestu yādṛgvijātayaḥ santi samānavarṇāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5116: sukhopalakṣyaśca sadā vicāryo hyayaṃ prabhedo viduṣā nareṇa /
GP12garup1_u:5117: snehaprabhedo laghutā mṛdutvaṃ vijātiliṅgaṃ khalu sārvajanyam // GarP_1,73.13 //
GP12garup1_u:5121: yadi nāma bhavanti doṣahīnā maṇayaḥ ṣaḍguṇamāpnuvanti mūlyam // GarP_1,73.15 //
GP12garup1_u:5123: mūlyametanmaṇīnāṃ tu na sarvatra mahītale // GarP_1,73.16 //
GP12garup1_u:5125: tasya saptatimo bhāgaḥ saṃjñārūpaṃ kariṣyati // GarP_1,73.17 //
GP12garup1_u:5127: palasya daśamo bhāgo dharaṇaḥ parikīrtitaḥ // GarP_1,73.18 //
GP12garup1_u:5128: itthaṃ maṇividhiḥ prokto ratnānāṃ mūlyaniścaye // GarP_1,73.19 //
GP12garup1_u:5129: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vaidūryaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma trisaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5134: prādurbhavanti tābhyastu puṣpa (ṣya) rāgā mahāguṇāḥ // GarP_1,74.1 //
GP12garup1_u:5136: kaukaṇṭakanāmā syātsa eva yadi lohitāpītaḥ // GarP_1,74.2 //
GP12garup1_u:5137: ālohitastu pītaḥ svacchaḥ kāṣāyakaḥ sa ekoktaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5138: ānīlaśuklavarṇaḥ snigdhaḥ somāla(na) kaḥ saguṇaḥ // GarP_1,74.3 //
GP12garup1_u:5139: atyantalohito yaḥ sa eva khalu padmarāgasaṃjñaḥ syāt /
GP12garup1_u:5140: api cendranīlasaṃjñaḥ sa eva kathitaḥ sunīlaḥ san // GarP_1,74.4 //
GP12garup1_u:5142: dhāraṇaphalaṃ ca tadvatkiṃ tu strīṇāṃ sutaprado bhavati // GarP_1,74.5 //
GP12garup1_u:5143: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe puṣparāgaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma catuḥ saptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5148: tataḥ prasūtaṃ pavanopapannaṃ karketanaṃ pūjayatamaṃ pṛthivyām // GarP_1,75.1 //
GP12garup1_u:5150: nīlaṃ punaḥ khalu sitaṃ paruṣaṃ vibhinnaṃ vyādhyādidoṣakaraṇena ca tadvibhāti // GarP_1,75.2 //
GP12garup1_u:5151: snigdhā viśuddhāḥ samarāgiṇaśca āpītavarṇā guravo vicitrāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5153: patreṇa kāñcanamayena tu veṣṭayitvā taptaṃ yadā hutavahe bhavati prakāśam /
GP12garup1_u:5154: rogapraṇāśanakaraṃ kalināśanaṃ tadāyuṣkaraṃ kulakaraṃ ca sukhapradaṃ ca // GarP_1,75.4 //
GP12garup1_u:5155: evaṃvidhaṃ bahuguṇaṃ maṇimāvahanti karketanaṃ śubhalaṅkṛtaye narā ye /
GP12garup1_u:5156: te pūjitā bahudhanā bahubāndhavāśca nityojjvalāḥ pramuditā apite bhavanti // GarP_1,75.5 //
GP12garup1_u:5158: tejo 'tidīpti kulapuṣṭivihīnavarṇāḥ karketanasya sadṛśaṃ vapurudvahanti // GarP_1,75.6 //
GP12garup1_u:5160: tasyottamasya maṇi śāstravidāṃ mahimnā tulyaṃ tu mūlyamuditaṃ tulitasya kāryam // GarP_1,75.7 //
GP12garup1_u:5161: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe karketanaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma pañcasaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5170: bhīṣmamaṇiṃ grīvādiṣu susampadaṃ sa sarvadā labhate // GarP_1,76.3 //
GP12garup1_u:5182: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vaidūryaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṭsaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5186: puṇyeṣu parvatavareṣu ca nimnagāsu sthānāntareṣu ca tathottaradeśagatvāt /
GP12garup1_u:5187: saṃsthāpitāḥ svanakhabāhugateḥ prakāśaṃ saṃpūjya dānavapatiṃ prathite pradeśe // GarP_1,77.1 //
GP12garup1_u:5189: gandharvavahnikadalīsadṛśāvabhāsā ete praśastāḥ pulakāḥ prasūtāḥ // GarP_1,77.2 //
GP12garup1_u:5191: maṅgalyayuktā bahubhakticitrā vṛddhipradāste pulakā bhavanti // GarP_1,77.3 //
GP12garup1_u:5193: mṛtyupradāśca viduṣā parivarjanīyā mūlyaṃ palasya kathitaṃ ca śatāni pañca // GarP_1,77.4 //
GP12garup1_u:5194: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe pulakaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāma saptasaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5201: nānāprakāravihitaṃ rudhirākṣa(khya) ratnamuddhṛtya tasya khalu sarvasamānameva // GarP_1,78.2 //
GP12garup1_u:5202: madhyendupāṇḍuramatīva viśuddhavarṇaṃ taccendranīlasadṛśaṃ paṭalaṃ tule syāt /
GP12garup1_u:5203: saiśvaryabhṛtyajananaṃ kathitaṃ tadaiva pakrañca tatkila bhavetsuravajravarṇam // GarP_1,78.3 //
GP12garup1_u:5204: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe rudhirākṣaratnaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭasaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5213: saṃskṛtaṃ śilpinā sadyo mūlyaṃ kiñcillabhettataḥ (dā) // GarP_1,79.3 //
GP12garup1_u:5214: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sphaṭikaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāmaikonāśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5219: cikṣepa tatra jāyante vidrumāḥ subhahāguṇāḥ // GarP_1,80.1 //
GP12garup1_u:5221: sunīlakaṃ devakaromakañca sthānāni teṣu prabhavaṃ surāgam // GarP_1,80.2 //
GP12garup1_u:5222: anyatra jātaṃ ca na tatpradhānaṃ mūlyaṃ bhavecchilpiviśeṣayogāt /
GP12garup1_u:5223: prasannaṃ komalaṃ snigdhaṃ surāgaṃ vidrumaṃ hi tat // GarP_1,80.3 //
GP12garup1_u:5227: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vidrumaparīkṣaṇaṃ nāmāśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5234: sarvatra sulabhā gaṅgātriṣu sthāneṣu durlabhā // GarP_1,81.1 //
GP12garup1_u:5236: prayāgaṃ paramaṃ tīrthaṃ mṛtānāṃ bhuktimuktidam // GarP_1,81.2 //
GP12garup1_u:5238: vārāṇasī paraṃ tīrthaṃ viśveśo yatra keśavaḥ // GarP_1,81.3 //
GP12garup1_u:5240: prabhāsaṃ paraṃ tīrthaṃ somanātho hi tatra ca // GarP_1,81.4 //
GP12garup1_u:5242: prācī sarasvatī puṇyā saptasārasvataṃ param // GarP_1,81.5 //
GP12garup1_u:5245: śvetadvīpaṃ purī māyā naimiṣaṃ puṣkaraṃ param /
GP12garup1_u:5246: ayodhyā cārghyatīrthaṃ tu citrakūṭaṃ ca gomatī // GarP_1,81.7 //
GP12garup1_u:5253: mahā keśī ca kāverī candrabhāgā vipāśayā /
GP12garup1_u:5254: ekāmraṃ ca tathā tīrthaṃ brahmeśaṃ devakoṭakam // GarP_1,81.11 //
GP12garup1_u:5255: mathurā ca purī ramyā śoṇaścaiva mahānadaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5256: jambūsaro mahātīrthaṃ tāni tīrthāni viddhi ca // GarP_1,81.12 //
GP12garup1_u:5257: sūryaḥ śivo gaṇo devī hariryatra ca tiṣṭhati /
GP12garup1_u:5258: eteṣu ca yathānyeṣu snānaṃ dānaṃ japastapaḥ // GarP_1,81.13 //
GP12garup1_u:5259: pūjā śrāddhaṃ piṇḍadānaṃ sarvaṃ bhavati cākṣayam /
GP12garup1_u:5260: śālagrāmaṃ sarvadaṃ syāttīrthaṃ paśupateḥ param // GarP_1,81.14 //
GP12garup1_u:5261: kokāmukhaṃ ca vārāhaṃ bhā (bhu) ṇḍīraṃ svāmisaṃjñakam /
GP12garup1_u:5264: puṇḍravardhanakaṃ tīrthaṃ kārtikeyaśca yatra ca // GarP_1,81.16 //
GP12garup1_u:5266: mahendraparvatastīrthaṃ kāverī ca nadī parā // GarP_1,81.17 //
GP12garup1_u:5268: vindhyaḥ pāpaharaṃ tīrthaṃ narmadābheda uttamaḥ // GarP_1,81.18 //
GP12garup1_u:5269: gokarṇaṃ paramaṃ tīrthaṃ tīrthaṃ māhiṣmatī purī /
GP12garup1_u:5271: kṛte śauce muktidaṃ ca śārṅgadhārī tadantike /
GP12garup1_u:5272: virajaṃ sarvadaṃ tīrthaṃ svarṇākṣaṃ tīrthamuttamam // GarP_1,81.20 //
GP12garup1_u:5274: nāsikyaṃ ca mahātīrthaṃ govardhanamataḥ param // GarP_1,81.21 //
GP12garup1_u:5276: tīrthaṃ bindusaraḥ puṇyaṃ viṣṇupādodakaṃ param // GarP_1,81.22 //
GP12garup1_u:5278: damastīrthaṃ tu paramaṃ bhavaśuddhiḥ paraṃ tathā // GarP_1,81.23 //
GP12garup1_u:5280: yaḥ snāti mānase tīrthe sa yāti paramāṃ gatim // GarP_1,81.24 //
GP12garup1_u:5281: idaṃ tīrthamidaṃ neti ye narā bhedadarśinaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5282: teṣāṃ vidhīyate tīrthagamanaṃ tatphalaṃ ca yat // GarP_1,81.25 //
GP12garup1_u:5286: śrīraṅgaṃ ca harestīrthaṃ tāpī śreṣṭhā mahānadī // GarP_1,81.27 //
GP12garup1_u:5288: mahālakṣmīryatra devī praṇītā paramā nadī // GarP_1,81.28 //
GP12garup1_u:5291: snātvā kanakhale tīrthe sa bhavenna punarbhave /
GP12garup1_u:5293: etānyanyāni tīrthāni snānādyaiḥ sarvadāni hi // GarP_1,81.30 //
GP12garup1_u:5297: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sarvatīrtha māhātmyaṃ nāmaikāśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5308: śaraṇaṃ harirūce tān bhavitavyaṃ śivātmabhaiḥ // GarP_1,82.3 //
GP12garup1_u:5314: tasya deho liṅgarūpī sthitaḥ śuddhe pitāmahaḥ // GarP_1,82.6 //
GP12garup1_u:5317: yajñaṃ śrāddhaṃ piṇḍadānaṃ snānādi kurute naraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5318: sa svargaṃ brahmalokaṃ ca gacchenna narakaṃ naraḥ // GarP_1,82.8 //
GP12garup1_u:5319: gayātīrthaṃ paraṃ jñātvā yāgaṃ cakre pitāmahaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5326: mā bhūttraipuruṣī vidyā mā bhūttraipuruṣaṃ dhanam // GarP_1,82.12 //
GP12garup1_u:5329: lokāḥ puṇyā gayāyāṃ hi śrāddhino brahmalokagāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5330: yuṣmānye pūjayiṣyanti tairahaṃ pūjitaḥ sadā // GarP_1,82.14 //
GP12garup1_u:5332: vāsaḥ puṃsāṃ kurukṣetre muktireṣā caturvidhā // GarP_1,82.15 //
GP12garup1_u:5334: snātukāmā gayātīrthaṃ vyāsa yāsa yānti na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,82.16 //
GP12garup1_u:5337: asaṃskṛtā mṛtā ya ca paśucorahatāśca ye /
GP12garup1_u:5338: sarpadaṣṭā gayāśrāddhānmuktāḥ svargaṃ vrajanti te // GarP_1,82.18 //
GP12garup1_u:5340: na tacchakyaṃ mayā vaktuṃ varṣakoṭiśatairapi // GarP_1,82.19 //
GP12garup1_u:5341: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe gayāmāhātmyaṃ nāma dvyaśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5345: kīkaṭeṣu gayā puṇyā puṇyaṃ rājagṛhaṃ vanam /
GP12garup1_u:5346: viṣayaścāraṇaḥ puṇyo nadīnāṃ ca punaḥ punā // GarP_1,83.1 //
GP12garup1_u:5356: taṃ dṛṣṭvā puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ mucyate vai ṛṇatrayāt // GarP_1,83.6 //
GP12garup1_u:5358: kāleśvaraṃ ca kedāraṃ pitṝṇāmanṛṇo bhavet // GarP_1,83.7 //
GP12garup1_u:5360: lokaṃ tvanāmayaṃ yāti dṛṣṭvā ca prapitāmaham // GarP_1,83.8 //
GP12garup1_u:5362: taṃ praṇamya prayatnena na bhūyo jāyate naraḥ // GarP_1,83.9 //
GP12garup1_u:5364: dṛṣṭvā maunena viprarṣe pitṝṇāmanṛṇo bhavet // GarP_1,83.10 //
GP12garup1_u:5366: gāyattrīṃ pratarutthāya yastu paśyati mānavaḥ // GarP_1,83.11 //
GP12garup1_u:5368: sāvitrīṃ caiva madhyāhne dṛṣṭvā yajñaphalaṃ labhet // GarP_1,83.12 //
GP12garup1_u:5369: sarasvatīṃ ca sāyāhne dṛṣṭvā dānaphalaṃ labhet /
GP12garup1_u:5372: devaṃ gṛdhreśvaraṃ dṛṣṭvā ko na mucyeta bandhanāt // GarP_1,83.14 //
GP12garup1_u:5374: prabhāseśaṃ prabhāse ca dṛṣṭvā yāti parāṃ gatim // GarP_1,83.15 //
GP12garup1_u:5378: brahmeśvaraṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā mucyate brahmahatyayā // GarP_1,83.17 //
GP12garup1_u:5380: phalgvīśaṃ phalgucaṇḍīṃ ca gaurīṃ dṛṣṭvā ca maṅgalām // GarP_1,83.18 //
GP12garup1_u:5382: aṅgāreśaṃ ca siddheśaṃ gayādityaṃ gajaṃ tathā // GarP_1,83.19 //
GP12garup1_u:5384: phalgutīrthe naraḥ snātvā dṛṣṭvā devaṃ gadādharam // GarP_1,83.20 //
GP12garup1_u:5385: etena kiṃ na paryāptaṃ nṝṇāṃ sukṛtakāriṇām /
GP12garup1_u:5387: pṛthivyāṃ yāni tīrthānī ye samudrāḥ sarāṃsi ca /
GP12garup1_u:5389: pṛthivyāṃ ca gayā puṇyā gayāyāṃ ca gayāśiraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5390: śreṣṭhaṃ tathā phalgutīrthaṃ tanmukhaṃ ca surasya hi // GarP_1,83.23 //
GP12garup1_u:5396: koṭitītha gayālole vaitaraṇyāṃ ca gomake // GarP_1,83.26 //
GP12garup1_u:5400: uttare mānase śrāddhī na bhūyo jāyate naraḥ // GarP_1,83.28 //
GP12garup1_u:5404: gṛdhreśvare tathā śrāddhī pitṝṇāmanṛṇo bhavet // GarP_1,83.29 //
GP12garup1_u:5406: tiladhenupradaḥ snātvā dṛṣṭvā dhenuṃ na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,83.30 //
GP12garup1_u:5407: aindre vā naratīrthe ca vāsave vaiṣṇave tathā /
GP12garup1_u:5409: gāyattre caiva sāvitre tīrthe sārasvate tathā /
GP12garup1_u:5411: pitṝṇāṃ tu kulaṃ brahmalokaṃ nayati mānavaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5416: dharmayūpe ca kūpe ta pitṝṇāmanṛṇo bhavet // GarP_1,83.35 //
GP12garup1_u:5419: rāmatīrthe narāḥ snātvā śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā prabhāsake /
GP12garup1_u:5423: gayāyāṃ na hi tatsthānaṃ yatra tīrthaṃ na vidyate /
GP12garup1_u:5424: pañcakrośe gayākṣetre yatra tatra tu piṇḍadaḥ // GarP_1,83.39 //
GP12garup1_u:5426: janārdanasya haste tu piṇḍaṃ dadyātsvakaṃ naraḥ // GarP_1,83.40 //
GP12garup1_u:5427: eṣa piṇḍe mayā dattastava haste janārdana ! /
GP12garup1_u:5430: gayāyāṃ dharmapṛṣṭhe ca sarasi brahmaṇastathā // GarP_1,83.42 //
GP12garup1_u:5434: brahmāraṇyaṃ mahānadyāḥ paścimo bhāga ucyate // GarP_1,83.44 //
GP12garup1_u:5436: bharatasyāśrame śrāddhī mataṅgasya pade bhavet // GarP_1,83.45 //
GP12garup1_u:5438: tatsmṛtaṃ campakavanaṃ tatra pāṇḍuśilāsti hi // GarP_1,83.46 //
GP12garup1_u:5442: padāni tatra krauñcasya śrāddhī svargaṃ nayetpitṝn // GarP_1,83.48 //
GP12garup1_u:5448: sāvitre paṭhyate sandhyā kṛtā syāddvādaśābdikī // GarP_1,83.51 //
GP12garup1_u:5449: śuklakṛṣṇāvubhau pakṣau gayāyāṃ yo vasennaraḥ punātyāsaptamaṃ caiva kulaṃ nāstyatra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,83.52 //
GP12garup1_u:5450: gayāyāṃ muṇāḍapṛṣṭhaṃ ca aravindaṃ ca parvatam /
GP12garup1_u:5451: tṛtīyaṃ kraiñcapādaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā pāpaiḥ pramucyate // GarP_1,83.53 //
GP12garup1_u:5453: durlabhaṃ triṣu lokeṣu gayāyāṃ piṇḍapātanam // GarP_1,83.54 //
GP12garup1_u:5455: guhāyāṃ gṛdhrakūṭasya śrāddhaṃ dattaṃ (sapta) mahāphalam // GarP_1,83.55 //
GP12garup1_u:5456: yatra māheśvarī dhārā śrāddhī tatrānṛṇo bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:5457: puṇyāṃ viśālāmāsādya nadīṃ trailokya viśrutām // GarP_1,83.56 //
GP12garup1_u:5459: śrāddhī māsapade snātvā vājapeyaphalaṃ labhet // GarP_1,83.57 //
GP12garup1_u:5461: gayāstho yo dadātyannaṃ pitarastena putriṇaḥ // GarP_1,83.58 //
GP12garup1_u:5465: pabhdyāmapi jalaṃ spṛṣṭvā asmabhyaṃ kila dāsyati // GarP_1,83.60 //
GP12garup1_u:5466: ātmajo vā tathānyo vā gayākūpe yadā tadā /
GP12garup1_u:5467: yannāmnā pātayetpiṇḍaṃ taṃ nayedbrahma śāśvatam // GarP_1,83.61 //
GP12garup1_u:5469: yā sā vaitaraṇī nāma triṣu lokeṣu viśrutā // GarP_1,83.62 //
GP12garup1_u:5475: teṣāṃ brahmasadaḥ sthānaṃ somapānaṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_1,83.65 //
GP12garup1_u:5477: pūjitaiḥ pūjitāḥ sarve pitṛbhiḥ saha devatāḥ // GarP_1,83.66 //
GP12garup1_u:5479: sthānaṃ dehaparityāge gayāyāṃ tu vidhīyate // GarP_1,83.67 //
GP12garup1_u:5481: agniṣṭomaśataṃ puṇyaṃ labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,83.68 //
GP12garup1_u:5485: tebhyo vyāsagayābhūmau piṇḍo deyo vidhānataḥ // GarP_1,83.70 //
GP12garup1_u:5487: mataṅgavāpyāṃ snātvā ca gosahasraphalaṃ labhet // GarP_1,83.71 //
GP12garup1_u:5489: vasiṣṭhasyāśrame snātvā vājapeyaṃ ca vindati // GarP_1,83.72 //
GP12garup1_u:5492: samīpe tvagnidhāreti viśrutā kapilā hi sā /
GP12garup1_u:5496: somakuṇḍe naraḥ snātvā somalokaṃ ca gacchati /
GP12garup1_u:5497: saṃvartasya naro vāpyāṃ subhagaḥ syāttu piṇḍadaḥ // GarP_1,83.76 //
GP12garup1_u:5498: dhautapāpo naro yāti pretakuṇḍe ca piṇḍadaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5502: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe gayāmāhātmyaṃ nāma tryaśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5506: udyatastu gayāṃ gantuṃ śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā vidhānataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5513: varjayitvā kurukṣetraṃ viśālāṃ virajāṃ gayām // GarP_1,84.4 //
GP12garup1_u:5514: divā ca sarvadā rātrau gayāyāṃ śrāddhakṛdbhavet /
GP12garup1_u:5515: vārāṇasyāṃ kṛtaṃ śrāddhaṃ tīrthe śoṇanade tathā // GarP_1,84.5 //
GP12garup1_u:5517: uttaraṃ mānasaṃ gatvā siddhiṃ prāpnotyanuttamām // GarP_1,84.6 //
GP12garup1_u:5519: kāmānsa labhate divyānmokṣopāyaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ // GarP_1,84.7 //
GP12garup1_u:5520: dakṣiṇaṃ mānasaṃ gatvā maunī piṇḍādi kārayet /
GP12garup1_u:5524: nāmnā kanakhalaṃ tīrthaṃ triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam /
GP12garup1_u:5526: tatra snātvā divaṃ yāti śrāddhaṃ dattamathākṣayam /
GP12garup1_u:5531: madīyāḥ pitaro ye ca kule jātāḥ sanābhayaḥ // GarP_1,84.13 //
GP12garup1_u:5535: phalgutīrthe naraḥ snātvā dṛṣṭvā devaṃ gadādharam // GarP_1,84.15 //
GP12garup1_u:5541: śrāddhaṃ piṇḍodakaṃ kāryaṃ madhye vai kūpayūpayoḥ // GarP_1,84.18 //
GP12garup1_u:5543: tṛtīye 'bahni brahmasado gatvā snātvātha tarpaṇam // GarP_1,84.19 //
GP12garup1_u:5544: kṛtvā śrāddhādikaṃ piṇḍaṃ madhye vai yūpakūpayoḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5553: anvaṣṭakāsu vṛddhau ca gayāyāṃ mṛtavāsare // GarP_1,84.24 //
GP12garup1_u:5554: atra mātuḥ pṛthak śrāddhamanyatra patinā saha /
GP12garup1_u:5555: snātvā daśāśvamedhe tu dṛṣṭvā devaṃ pitāmaham // GarP_1,84.25 //
GP12garup1_u:5556: rudrapādaṃ naraḥ spṛṣṭvā na cehāvartate punaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5560: pitaro yānti devatvaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GP12garup1_u:5561: muṇḍapṛṣṭe padaṃ nyastaṃ mahādevena dhīmatā // GarP_1,84.28 //
GP12garup1_u:5563: gayāśīrṣe tu yaḥ piṇḍānnāmnā yeṣāṃ tu nirvapet // GarP_1,84.29 //
GP12garup1_u:5565: pañcame 'hni gandālole snātvā vaṭatale tataḥ // GarP_1,84.30 //
GP12garup1_u:5569: kṛte śrāddhe 'kṣayavaṭe dṛṣṭvā ca prapitāmaham // GarP_1,84.32 //
GP12garup1_u:5571: eṣṭavyā bahavaḥ puttrā yadyeko 'pi gayāṃ vrajet // GarP_1,84.33 //
GP12garup1_u:5581: gayāyāṃ piṇḍadānena tava sarvaṃ bhaviṣyati // GarP_1,84.38 //
GP12garup1_u:5583: dṛṣṭvākāśe sitaṃ raktaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ puruṣamabravīt // GarP_1,84.39 //
GP12garup1_u:5584: ke yūyaṃ teṣu caivaikaḥ sitaḥ proce viśālakam /
GP12garup1_u:5585: ahaṃ sitaste janaka indralokaṃ gataḥ śabham // GarP_1,84.40 //
GP12garup1_u:5586: mama putra pitā rakto brahmahā pāpakṛtparam /
GP12garup1_u:5587: ayaṃ pitāmahaḥ kṛṣṇa ṛṣayo 'nena ghātitāḥ // GarP_1,84.41 //
GP12garup1_u:5588: avīciṃ narakaṃ prāptau muktau jātau ca piṇḍada /
GP12garup1_u:5590: kṛtakṛtyo viśālo 'pi rājyaṃ kṛtvā divaṃ yayau /
GP12garup1_u:5593: yeṣāṃ dāho na kriyāca ye 'gnidagdhāstathāpare // GarP_1,84.44 //
GP12garup1_u:5594: bhūmau dattena tṛpyantu tṛptā yāntu parāṃ gatim /
GP12garup1_u:5597: tathā mātāmahaścaiva pramātāmaha eva ca // GarP_1,84.46 //
GP12garup1_u:5601: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe gayāmāhātmyaṃ nāma caturaśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5607: asmatkule mṛtā ye ca gatiryeṣāṃ na vidyate /
GP12garup1_u:5609: pitavaṃśe mṛtā ye ca mātṛvaṃśe ca ye mṛtāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5611: mātāmahakule ye ca gatiryeṣāṃ na vidyate /
GP12garup1_u:5613: ajātadantā ye kecidye ca garbhe prapīḍitāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5616: svagotre paragotre vā gatiryeṣāṃ na vidyate /
GP12garup1_u:5619: ātmopaghātino ye ca tebhyaḥ piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham // GarP_1,85.7 //
GP12garup1_u:5621: daṃṣṭribhiḥ śṛṅgibhirvāpi teṣāṃ piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham // GarP_1,85.8 //
GP12garup1_u:5623: vidyuccaurahatā ye ca tebhyaḥ piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham // GarP_1,85.9 //
GP12garup1_u:5624: raurave cāndhatāmistre kālasūtre ca ye gatāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5626: asipatravane ghore kaṃbhīpāke ca ye gatāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5631: athavā vṛkṣayoni sthāstebhyaḥ piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham // GarP_1,85.13 //
GP12garup1_u:5635: mānuṣyaṃ durlabhaṃ yeṣāṃ tebhyaḥ piṇḍaṃ dadāmyaham // GarP_1,85.15 //
GP12garup1_u:5639: te sarve tṛptimāyāntu piṇḍadānena sarvadā // GarP_1,85.17 //
GP12garup1_u:5640: ye me pitṛkule jātāḥ kule mātustathaiva ca /
GP12garup1_u:5641: guruśvaśurabandhūnāṃ ye cānye bāndhavā mṛtāḥ // GarP_1,85.18 //
GP12garup1_u:5643: kriyālo pahatā ye ca jātyandhāḥ paṅgavastathā // GarP_1,85.19 //
GP12garup1_u:5647: maya gayāṃ samāsādya pitṝṇāṃ niṣkatiḥ kṛtā // GarP_1,85.21 //
GP12garup1_u:5652: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe purvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe gayāmāhātmyaṃ nāma pañcāśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5656: yeyaṃ pretaśilā khyātā gayāyāṃ sā tridhā sthitā /
GP12garup1_u:5659: pretatvaṃ ye gatā nṝṇāṃ mitrādyā bāndhavādayaḥ // GarP_1,86.2 //
GP12garup1_u:5661: ato 'tra munayo bhūpā rājapatnyādayaḥ sadā // GarP_1,86.3 //
GP12garup1_u:5663: gayāsurasya yanmuṇḍaṃ tasya pṛṣṭhe śilā yataḥ // GarP_1,86.4 //
GP12garup1_u:5669: gadādharādayo devā ādyā ādau vyavasthitāḥ // GarP_1,86.7 //
GP12garup1_u:5677: yathā dāśarathī rāmaḥ kṛṣṇobuddho 'tha kalkyapi // GarP_1,86.11 //
GP12garup1_u:5681: gadādharaṃ suraiḥ sārdhamādyaṃ gatvā dadāti yaḥ // GarP_1,86.13 //
GP12garup1_u:5682: arghyaṃ pātraṃ ca pādyaṃ ca gandhapuṣpaṃ ca dhūpakam /
GP12garup1_u:5683: dīpaṃ naivaidyamutkaṣṭaṃ mālyāni vividhāni ca // GarP_1,86.14 //
GP12garup1_u:5693: jñānaṃ prāpya śriyaṃ putrānvrajanti puruṣottamam // GarP_1,86.19 //
GP12garup1_u:5702: vidyāṃ sarasvatīṃ prārcya lakṣmīṃ saṃpūjya ca śriyam /
GP12garup1_u:5709: subhadrāṃ pūjayitvā tu saubhāgyaṃ paramāpnuyāt // GarP_1,86.27 //
GP12garup1_u:5711: nārāyaṇaṃ tu saṃpūjya narāṇāmadhipo bhavet // GarP_1,86.28 //
GP12garup1_u:5712: spṛṣṭvā natvā nārasiṃhaṃ saṃgrāme vijayī bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:5719: brahmeśvaraṃ naraḥ stutvā brahmalokāya kalpyate // GarP_1,86.32 //
GP12garup1_u:5721: kedāraṃ pūjayitvā tu śivaloke mahīyate // GarP_1,86.33 //
GP12garup1_u:5722: siddheśvaraṃ ca saṃpūjya siddho brahmapuraṃ vrajet /
GP12garup1_u:5723: ādyai rudrādibhiḥ sārdhaṃ dṛṣṭvā hyādigadādharam // GarP_1,86.34 //
GP12garup1_u:5729: putrānputrārthinī strī ca saubhāgyaṃ ca tadarthinī // GarP_1,86.37 //
GP12garup1_u:5733: pṛthivyāṃ sarvatīrthebhyo yathā śreṣṭhā gayā purī // GarP_1,86.39 //
GP12garup1_u:5735: tasmindṛṣṭe śilā dṛṣṭā yataḥ sarvaṃ gadādharaḥ // GarP_1,86.40 //
GP12garup1_u:5736: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe gayāmāhātmyaṃ nāma ṣaḍaśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5748: sa hato viṣṇunā daityaścakreṇa sumahātmanā // GarP_1,87.4 //
GP12garup1_u:5750: citrako vinataścaiva karṇānto vidyuto raviḥ // GarP_1,87.5 //
GP12garup1_u:5752: ūrja stambastathā prāṇa ṛṣabho niścala (ra) stathā // GarP_1,87.6 //
GP12garup1_u:5754: tuṣitā dvādaśa proktāstathā pārāvatāśca ye // GarP_1,87.7 //
GP12garup1_u:5758: vinītaśca suketuśca sumitraḥ subalaḥ śuciḥ // GarP_1,87.9 //
GP12garup1_u:5763: pañca devagaṇāḥ proktā sarve dvādaśakāstu te /
GP12garup1_u:5764: indraḥ svaśāntistacchukraḥ pralambo nāma dānavaḥ // GarP_1,87.12 //
GP12garup1_u:5766: tāmasasya manoḥ putrā jānujaṅgho 'tha nirbhayaḥ // GarP_1,87.13 //
GP12garup1_u:5770: munayaḥ kīrtitāḥ sapta surāgāḥ sudhiyastathā // GarP_1,87.15 //
GP12garup1_u:5771: harayo devatāmāṃ ca catvāraḥ pañca (sapta) viṃśakāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5772: gaṇā indraḥ śivistasya śatrurbhomarathāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,87.16 //
GP12garup1_u:5774: raivatasya manoḥ putro mahā prāṇaśca sādhakaḥ // GarP_1,87.17 //
GP12garup1_u:5778: hiraṇyaromā parjanyaḥ satyanetraḥ (nāmā) svadhāma ca // GarP_1,87.19 //
GP12garup1_u:5780: vaikuṇṭha (ṇṭhāḥ ścāmṛta (tā) ścaiva catvāro devatāgaṇāḥ // GarP_1,87.20 //
GP12garup1_u:5782: śāntaḥ śatrurhato daityo haṃsarūpeṇa viṣṇunā // GarP_1,87.21 //
GP12garup1_u:5788: āryāḥ prabhūtā bhāvyāśca lekhāśca pṛthukāstathā // GarP_1,87.24 //
GP12garup1_u:5789: aṣṭakasya gaṇāḥ pañca tathā proktā divaukasām /
GP12garup1_u:5794: nariṣyantastathā pāṃsurnabho nediṣṭha eva ca // GarP_1,87.27 //
GP12garup1_u:5800: ekādaśā tathā rudrā vasavo 'ṣṭau prakīrtitāḥ // GarP_1,87.30 //
GP12garup1_u:5803: tejasvī nāma vai śakro hiraṇyākṣo ripuḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5808: aśvatthāmā kṛpo vyāso gālavo dīptimānatha // GarP_1,87.34 //
GP12garup1_u:5810: sutapā amṛtābhāśca mukhyāścāpi tathā surāḥ // GarP_1,87.35 //
GP12garup1_u:5811: teṣāṃ gaṇastu devānā mekaiko viṃśakaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5817: pṛtuśravā bṛhadūdyumna ṛcīko bṛhato guṇaḥ // GarP_1,87.38 //
GP12garup1_u:5820: paro marīcirgarbhaśca sva (su) dharmāṇaśca te trayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5822: bhaviṣyanti tadā devā ekaiko dvādaśo gaṇaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5824: dhamaputrasya putrāṃstu daśa masya manoḥ śṛṇu /
GP12garup1_u:5832: baliḥ śatrustaṃ hariśca gadayā ghātayiṣyati // GarP_1,87.44 //
GP12garup1_u:5834: sarvatragaḥ suśarmā ca devānīkaḥ pururguruḥ // GarP_1,87.45 //
GP12garup1_u:5848: surārayo gaṇāścaite pratyekaṃ daśako gaṇaḥ // GarP_1,87.52 //
GP12garup1_u:5849: ṛtadhāmā ca bhadre (tatre) ndrastārako nāma tadripuḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5856: sva (su) romāṇaḥ sva (su) dharmāṇaḥ sva (su) karmāṇastathāmarāḥ // GarP_1,87.56 //
GP12garup1_u:5858: indro divaspatiḥ śatrustviṣṭibho nāma dānavaḥ // GarP_1,87.57 //
GP12garup1_u:5861: ururgabhīro dhṛṣṭaśca tarasvīgrā (gra) ha eva ca /
GP12garup1_u:5863: tejasvī durlabhaścaiva bhautyasyaite manoḥ sutāḥ // GarP_1,87.59 //
GP12garup1_u:5865: ajito muktaśukrau ca ṛṣayaḥ sapta kīrtitāḥ // GarP_1,87.60 //
GP12garup1_u:5867: vacovṛddhā devagaṇāḥ pañca proktāstu saptakāḥ // GarP_1,87.61 //
GP12garup1_u:5869: eko devaścaturdhā tu vyāsarūpeṇa viṣṇunā // GarP_1,87.62 //
GP12garup1_u:5871: aṅgāni caturo vedā mīmāṃsā nyāyavistaraḥ // GarP_1,87.63 //
GP12garup1_u:5873: dhanurvedaśca gāndharvo vidyā hyaṣṭādaśaiva tāḥ // GarP_1,87.64 //
GP12garup1_u:5874: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe manutadvaṃśanirūpaṇaṃ nāma spatāśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5879: mārkaṇḍeyaḥ pitṛsto traṃ krauñcukiṃ prāha tacchṛṇu // GarP_1,88.1 //
GP12garup1_u:5884: nimuktasaṃgaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā procuḥ svapitaro munim // GarP_1,88.3 //
GP12garup1_u:5886: vatsa kasmāttvayā puṇyo na kṛto dāra saṃgrahaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5895: akṛtvā ca kathaṃ māṇḍyaṃ svargatiṃ prāptumicchasi // GarP_1,88.8 //
GP12garup1_u:5897: mṛtasya narakaṃ tyaktvā kleśa evānyajanmani // GarP_1,88.9 //
GP12garup1_u:5900: bhavatyato mayā pūrvaṃna kṛto dārasaṃgrahaḥ // GarP_1,88.10 //
GP12garup1_u:5904: mama tvapaṅkadigdho 'pi vidyāmbhobhirvaraṃ hi tat // GarP_1,88.12 //
GP12garup1_u:5909: kiṃ tu nopāyamārgo 'yaṃ yatastvaṃ putra vartase // GarP_1,88.14 //
GP12garup1_u:5912: evaṃ na bandho bhavati kurvataḥ kāraṇātmakam /
GP12garup1_u:5913: na ca bandhāya tatkarma bhavatyanatisannibham // GarP_1,88.16 //
GP12garup1_u:5915: sukhaduḥ khātmakairvatsa puṇyā puṇyātmakaṃ nṛṇām // GarP_1,88.17 //
GP12garup1_u:5920: tatkathaṃ karmaṇo mārge bhavanto yojayanti mām // GarP_1,88.19 //
GP12garup1_u:5923: kiṃ tu vidyāpariprāptau hetuḥ karma na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,88.20 //
GP12garup1_u:5924: vihitākaraṇānartho na sadbhiḥ kriyate tu yaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5929: anuṣṭhānā bhyupāyena bandhayogyāpi no hi sā // GarP_1,88.23 //
GP12garup1_u:5933: vṛddho 'haṃ sāmprataṃ ko me pitaraḥ sampridāsyati /
GP12garup1_u:5937: nūnaṃ bhāvi bhavitrī ca nābhinandasi no vacaḥ // GarP_1,88.26 //
GP12garup1_u:5939: babhūvuḥ sahasādṛśyā dīpā vātahatā iva // GarP_1,88.27 //
GP12garup1_u:5942: iti śrāgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe karmajñānamā nāmāṣṭāśītitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:5951: kiṃ karomi kra gacchāmi kathaṃ me dārasaṃgrahaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5957: ārādhanāya sa tadā paraṃ niyamamāsthitaḥ // GarP_1,89.5 //
GP12garup1_u:5964: sṛṣṭvā prajāḥ sutānvipra samutpādya kriyāstathā // GarP_1,89.8 //
GP12garup1_u:5966: satvaṃ yathoktaṃ pitṛbhiḥ kuru dāraparigraham // GarP_1,89.9 //
GP12garup1_u:5968: ta eva tuṣṭāḥ pitaraḥ pradāsyanti tavepsitam /
GP12garup1_u:5969: patnīṃ sutāṃśca santuṣṭāḥ kiṃ na dadyuḥ pitāmahāḥ // GarP_1,89.10 //
GP12garup1_u:5972: nadyā vivikte puline cakāra pitṛtarpaṇam // GarP_1,89.11 //
GP12garup1_u:5977: devairapi hi tarpyante ye śrāddheṣu svadhottaraiḥ // GarP_1,89.13 //
GP12garup1_u:5978: namasye 'haṃ pitṝn svarge ye tarpyante maharṣibhiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:5997: santarpyate jagatkṛtsnaṃ nāmnā khyātāḥ sukālinaḥ // GarP_1,89.23 //
GP12garup1_u:6004: pitṝnnamasye nivasanti sākṣādye devaloke 'tha mahītale vā /
GP12garup1_u:6005: tathāntarikṣe ca surāripūjyāste vai pratīcchantu mayopanītam // GarP_1,89.27 //
GP12garup1_u:6006: pitṝnnamasye paramārthabhūtā ye vai vimāne nivasantyamūrtāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:6008: pitṝnnamasye divi ye ca mūrtāḥ svadhābhujaḥ kāmyaphalābhisandhau /
GP12garup1_u:6010: tṛpyantu te 'sminpitaraḥ samastā icchāvatāṃ ye pradiśanti kāmān /
GP12garup1_u:6012: somasya ye raśmiṣu yer'kabimbe śukle vimāne ca sadā vasanti /
GP12garup1_u:6014: yeṣāṃ hute 'gnau haviṣā ca tṛptirye bhuñjate vipraśarīrasaṃsthāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:6015: ye piṇḍadānena mudaṃ prayānti tṛpyantu te 'sminpitaro 'nnatoyaiḥ // GarP_1,89.32 //
GP12garup1_u:6017: kālena śākena maharṣivaryaiḥ saṃprīṇitāste mudamatra yāntu // GarP_1,89.33 //
GP12garup1_u:6018: kavyānyaśeṣāṇi ca yānyabhīṣṭānyatīva teṣāṃ mama pūjitānām /
GP12garup1_u:6019: teṣāñca sānnidhyamihāstu puṣpagandhāmbubhojyeṣu mayā kṛteṣu // GarP_1,89.34 //
GP12garup1_u:6020: dinedine ye pratigṛhṇater'cāṃ māsāntapūjyā bhuvi ye 'ṣṭakāsu /
GP12garup1_u:6021: ye vatsarānte 'bhyudaye ca pūjyāḥ prayāntu te me pitaro 'tra tuṣṭim // GarP_1,89.35 //
GP12garup1_u:6022: pūjyā dvijānāṃ kumudendubhāso ye kṣattriyāṇāṃ jvalanārkavarṇāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:6023: tathā viśāṃ ye kanakāvadātā nīlīprabhāḥ śūdrajanasya ye ca // GarP_1,89.36 //
GP12garup1_u:6025: tathāgnihomena ca yānti tṛptiṃ sadā pitṛbhyaḥ praṇato 'smi tebhyaḥ // GarP_1,89.37 //
GP12garup1_u:6027: tṛptāśca ye bhūtisṛjo bhavanti tṛpyantu te 'sminpraṇato 'smi tebhyaḥ // GarP_1,89.38 //
GP12garup1_u:6032: agniṣvāttāḥ pitṛgaṇāḥ prācīṃ rakṣantu me diśam /
GP12garup1_u:6033: tathā barhiṣadaḥ pāntu yāmyāṃ me pitaraḥ sadā /
GP12garup1_u:6036: sarvataḥ pitaro rakṣāṃ kurvantu mama nityaśaḥ // GarP_1,89.42 //
GP12garup1_u:6038: bhūtido bhūtikṛd bhūtiḥ pitṝṇāṃ ye gaṇā nava // GarP_1,89.43 //
GP12garup1_u:6040: kalyatāheturanghaḥ ṣaḍime te gaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,89.44 //
GP12garup1_u:6042: viśvapātā tathā dhātā saptaite ca gaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,89.45 //
GP12garup1_u:6044: gaṇāḥ pañca tathaivaite pitṝṇāṃ pāpanāśanāḥ // GarP_1,89.46 //
GP12garup1_u:6046: pitṝṇāṃ kathyate caiva tathā gaṇacatuṣṭayam // GarP_1,89.47 //
GP12garup1_u:6048: ta evātra pitṛgaṇāstuṣyantu ca madāhitāt // GarP_1,89.48 //
GP12garup1_u:6056: namasyāmi sadā teṣāṃ dhyānināṃ divyacakṣuṣām // GarP_1,89.51 //
GP12garup1_u:6068: namasyāmi tathā somaṃ pitaraṃ jagatāmaham // GarP_1,89.57 //
GP12garup1_u:6071: ye ca tejasi ye caite somasūryāgnimūrtayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:6079: tadbhūṣitānatha sa tāndadṛśe purataḥ sthitān // GarP_1,89.62 //
GP12garup1_u:6086: so 'haṃ patnīmabhīpsāmi dhanyāṃ divyāṃ prajāvatīm // GarP_1,89.65 //
GP12garup1_u:6089: tasyāñca putro bhavitā bhavato munisattama ! // GarP_1,89.66 //
GP12garup1_u:6091: ruce ! raucya iti khyātiṃ prayāsyati jagattraye // GarP_1,89.67 //
GP12garup1_u:6094: tvaṃ ca prijāpatirbhūtvā prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā caturvidhāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:6097: tasya tuṣṭā vayaṃ bhogānātmajaṃ dhyānamuttamam // GarP_1,89.70 //
GP12garup1_u:6099: vāñchadbhiḥ satataṃ stavyāḥ stotreṇānena vai yataḥ // GarP_1,89.71 //
GP12garup1_u:6100: śrāddheṣu ya imaṃ bhaktyā tvasmatprītikaraṃ stavam /
GP12garup1_u:6101: paṭhiṣyati dvijāgryāṇāṃ bhuñjatāṃ purataḥ sthitaḥ // GarP_1,89.72 //
GP12garup1_u:6107: akāle 'pyatha vā deśe vidhihīnamathāpi vā // GarP_1,89.75 //
GP12garup1_u:6113: śiśire dviguṇābdāni tṛptiṃ stotramidaṃ śubham // GarP_1,89.78 //
GP12garup1_u:6121: sannidhānaṃ kṛte śrāddhe tatrāsmākaṃ bhaviṣyati // GarP_1,89.82 //
GP12garup1_u:6124: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe rucikṛtapitṛstotraṃ nāmaikonanavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:6129: pramlaucā nāma tanvaṅgī tatsamīpe varāpsarāḥ // GarP_1,90.1 //
GP12garup1_u:6131: prasādayāmāsa bhūyaḥ pramlocā ca varāpsarāḥ // GarP_1,90.2 //
GP12garup1_u:6134: tāṃ gṛhāṇa mayā dattāṃ bhāryārthe varavarṇinīm /
GP12garup1_u:6138: uddadhāra tataḥ kanyāṃ māninīṃ nāma nāmataḥ // GarP_1,90.5 //
GP12garup1_u:6141: tasyāṃ tasya suto jajñe mahāvīryo mahādyutiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:6148: ākaśena vihīnaṃ vai tejasā parivarjitam // GarP_1,91.2 //
GP12garup1_u:6165: sarvadṛṣṭaṃ tathā mūrtaṃ sūkṣmaṃ sūkṣmataraṃ param /
GP12garup1_u:6170: buddhidharmavihīnaṃ vai nirādhāraṃ śivaṃ harim // GarP_1,91.13 //
GP12garup1_u:6172: vedarūpaṃ paraṃ bhūtamindriyebhyaḥ paraṃ śubham // GarP_1,91.14 //
GP12garup1_u:6176: anādi brahma randhrāntamahaṃ brahmāsmi kevalam // GarP_1,91.16 //
GP12garup1_u:6178: dhyānaṃ yaḥ kurute hyevaṃ sa bhavedbahma mānavaḥ // GarP_1,91.17 //
GP12garup1_u:6181: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe haridhyānaṃ nāmaikanavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:6190: amūrtaṃ rudra kathitaṃ hanta mūtta bravīmyaham /
GP12garup1_u:6193: viśālena susaumyena śaṅkhena ca samanvitaḥ // GarP_1,92.4 //
GP12garup1_u:6195: cakreṇa cānvitaḥ śānto gadāhastaḥ śubhānanaḥ // GarP_1,92.5 //
GP12garup1_u:6211: śaraṇyaḥ lasukhakārī ca saumyarūpo maheśvaraḥ // GarP_1,92.13 //
GP12garup1_u:6218: dhyāyantyevaṃ ca ye viṣṇuṃ te yānti paramāṃ gatim /
GP12garup1_u:6219: yājñavalkyaḥ purā hyevaṃ dhyātvā viṣṇuṃ sureśvaram // GarP_1,92.17 //
GP12garup1_u:6221: tasmāttvamapi deveśa ! viṣṇuṃ cintaya śaṅkara ! // GarP_1,92.18 //
GP12garup1_u:6222: viṣṇudhyānaṃ paṭhedyastu prāpnoti paramāṃ gatim // GarP_1,92.19 //
GP12garup1_u:6223: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇudhyānaṃ nāma dvinavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:6227: yājñavalkyena yatpūrvaṃ dharmaṃ proktaṃ kayaṃ hare ! /
GP12garup1_u:6228: tanme kāthaya keśighna ! yathā tattvena mādhava ! // GarP_1,93.1 //
GP12garup1_u:6232: tebhyaḥ sa kathayāmāsa viṣṇuṃ dhyātvā jitendriyaḥ // GarP_1,93.2 //
GP12garup1_u:6236: vedāḥ sthānāni vidyānāṃ dharmasya ca caturdaśa /
GP12garup1_u:6241: ete viṣṇuṃ samārādhya jātā dharmopadeśakāḥ // GarP_1,93.6 //
GP12garup1_u:6245: ayaṃ ca paramo dharmo yadyogenātmadarśanam // GarP_1,93.8 //
GP12garup1_u:6247: sā brūte yatsvadharmaḥ syādeko vādhyātmavittamaḥ // GarP_1,93.9 //
GP12garup1_u:6249: niṣekādyāḥ śmaśānāntāsteṣāṃ vai mantrataḥ kriyāḥ // GarP_1,93.10 //
GP12garup1_u:6251: ṣaṣṭhe 'ṣṭame vā sīmantaḥ prasave jātakarma ca // GarP_1,93.11 //
GP12garup1_u:6255: tūṣṇa īmetāḥ kriyāḥ strīṇāṃ vivāhaśca samantrakaḥ // GarP_1,93.13 //
GP12garup1_u:6256: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktavarṇadharṃmanirūpaṇaṃ nāma trinavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:6269: prāgvā brāhmeṇa tīrthena dvijo nityamupaspṛśet // GarP_1,94.5 //
GP12garup1_u:6277: sūryasya cāpyupasthānaṃ gāyattrayāḥ pratyayaṃ japaḥ // GarP_1,94.9 //
GP12garup1_u:6297: sa gururyaḥ kriyāḥ kṛtvā vedamasmai prayacchati // GarP_1,94.19 //
GP12garup1_u:6301: prativedaṃ brahmacaryaṃ dvādaśābdāni pañca vā // GarP_1,94.21 //
GP12garup1_u:6309: yajñānāṃ tapasāṃ caiva śubhānāṃ caiva karmaṇām // GarP_1,94.25 //
GP12garup1_u:6310: veda eva dvijātīnāṃ niḥ śreyasakaraḥ paraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:6311: madhunā payasā caiva sa devāṃstarpayeddvijaḥ // GarP_1,94.26 //
GP12garup1_u:6315: vākovākyaṃ purāṇaṃ ca nārāśaṃsīśca gāthikāḥ // GarP_1,94.28 //
GP12garup1_u:6324: brahmalokamavāpnoti na ceha jāyate punaḥ // GarP_1,94.32 //
GP12garup1_u:6325: ita śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākye ācārakāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktavarṇadharmanirūpaṇaṃ nāma caturnavatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:6330: gurave ca dhanaṃ dattvā snātvā ca tadanujñayā // GarP_1,95.1 //
GP12garup1_u:6336: savarṇaḥ śrotriyo vidvānvaro doṣānvito na ca // GarP_1,95.4 //
GP12garup1_u:6338: na tanmama mataṃ yasmāttatrāyaṃ jāyate svayam // GarP_1,95.5 //
GP12garup1_u:6345: ityuktvā caratāṃ dharmaṃ saha yā dīyate 'rthine /
GP12garup1_u:6346: sa kāyaḥ pāvayettajjaḥ ṣaḍvaṃśyānātmanā saha // GarP_1,95.9 //
GP12garup1_u:6350: rājñastathāsuro vaiśye śūdre cāntyastu garhitaḥ // GarP_1,95.11 //
GP12garup1_u:6353: pitā pitāmaho bhrātā sakulyo jananī tathā /
GP12garup1_u:6354: kanyāpradaḥ pūrvanāśe prakṛtīsthaḥ paraḥ paraḥ // GarP_1,95.13 //
GP12garup1_u:6356: eṣāmabhāve dātṝṇāṃ kanyā kuryāt svayaṃvaram // GarP_1,95.14 //
GP12garup1_u:6358: aduṣṭāṃ hi tyajandaṇḍyaḥ suduṣṭāṃ tu parityajet // GarP_1,95.15 //
GP12garup1_u:6360: sapiṇḍo vā samotro vā ghṛtābhyakta ṛtāviyāt // GarP_1,95.16 //
GP12garup1_u:6362: anena vidhinā jāta kṣetrapasya bhavetsutaḥ // GarP_1,95.17 //
GP12garup1_u:6365: somaḥ śaucaṃ dadau tāsāṃ gandharvaśca subhāṃ giram /
GP12garup1_u:6366: pāvakaḥ sarvamedhyatvaṃ medhyā vai yoṣito yataḥ // GarP_1,95.19 //
GP12garup1_u:6368: garbhabhartṛvadhe tāsāṃ tathā mahati pātake // GarP_1,95.20 //
GP12garup1_u:6370: adhivinnā ca bhartavyā mahadenonyathā bhavet // GarP_1,95.21 //
GP12garup1_u:6372: mṛte jīvati yā patyau yā nānyamupagacchati // GarP_1,95.22 //
GP12garup1_u:6376: ṣoḍaśartuniśāḥ strīṇāṃ tāsu yugmāsu saṃviśet // GarP_1,95.24 //
GP12garup1_u:6378: evaṃ gacchaṃ striyaṃ kṣāmāṃ maghāṃ mūlāṃ ca varjayet // GarP_1,95.25 //
GP12garup1_u:6380: yathā kāmī bhavedvāpi strīṇāṃ (sma) valamanusmaran // GarP_1,95.26 //
GP12garup1_u:6384: saṃyato paskarā dakṣā hṛṣṭā vyayaparāṅmukhī // GarP_1,95.28 //

GP12garup1_u:6997: tato na roditavyaṃ hi tvanityā jīvasaṃ sthitiḥ // GarP_1,106.7 //
GP12garup1_u:6999: vidaśya nimbapatrāṇi niyatā dvāri veśmanaḥ // GarP_1,106.8 //
GP12garup1_u:7001: praviśeyuḥ samālabhya kṛtvāśmani padaṃ śanaiḥ // GarP_1,106.9 //
GP12garup1_u:7011: ūnadvivarṣa ubhayoḥ sūtakaṃ mātureva hi // GarP_1,106.14 //
GP12garup1_u:7013: daśa dvādaśa varṇānāṃ tathā pañcadaśaiva ca // GarP_1,106.15 //
GP12garup1_u:7022: dāne vivāhe yajñe ca saṃgrāme deśaviplave /
GP12garup1_u:7023: āpadyapi ca kaṣṭāyāṃ sadyaḥ śaucaṃ vidhīyate // GarP_1,106.20 //
GP12garup1_u:7027: kṣāttreṇa karmaṇā jīvedviśāṃ vāpyāpadi dvijaḥ // GarP_1,106.22 //
GP12garup1_u:7031: eṇatvacaṃ ca kauśeyaṃ lavaṇaṃ māsameva ca // GarP_1,106.24 //
GP12garup1_u:7033: dharmārthaṃ vikrayaṃ neyāstilā dhānyena tatsamāḥ // GarP_1,106.25 //
GP12garup1_u:7038: rājā dharmyāṃ prakurvīta vṛttiṃ viprādikasya ca // GarP_1,106.27 //
GP12garup1_u:7039: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe yājñavalkyoktāśaucāpadvṛttyornirūpaṇaṃ nāma paḍuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:7044: kalpekalpe kṣayotpattyā kṣīyante nu prajādayaḥ // GarP_1,107.1 //
GP12garup1_u:7045: śrutiḥ smṛtiḥ sadācaro yaḥ kaścidve dakartṛkaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7046: vedāḥ smṛtā brāhmaṇādau dharmā manvādibhiḥ sadā // GarP_1,107.2 //
GP12garup1_u:7047: dānaṃ kaliyuge dharmaḥ kartāraṃ ca kalau tyajet /
GP12garup1_u:7048: pāpakṛtyaṃ tu tatraiva śāpaṃ phalati varṣataḥ // GarP_1,107.3 //
GP12garup1_u:7050: sandhyā snānaṃ japo homo devātithyādipūjanam // GarP_1,107.4 //
GP12garup1_u:7052: kṣattriyaḥ parasainyāni jitvā pṛthvīṃ prapālayet // GarP_1,107.5 //
GP12garup1_u:7055: kṛṣiṃ kurvandvijaḥ śrāntaṃ balīvardaṃ na vāhayet /
GP12garup1_u:7057: nirvapetpañca yajñāni krūre nindāṃ ca kārayet /
GP12garup1_u:7059: rājño dattvā tu ṣaḍbhāgaṃ devatānāṃ ca viṃśatim /
GP12garup1_u:7060: trayastriṃśacca viprāṇāṃ kṛṣikartā na lipyate // GarP_1,107.9 //
GP12garup1_u:7064: yāti vipro daśāhāttu kṣattro dvādaśakāddināt // GarP_1,107.11 //
GP12garup1_u:7067: janmanā ca vipattau ca bhavetteṣāṃ ca sūtakam /
GP12garup1_u:7068: caturthe daśarātraṃ syātṣaṇṇiśāḥ puṃsi pañcame // GarP_1,107.13 //
GP12garup1_u:7069: ṣaṣṭhe catura hācchuddhiḥ saptame ca dinatrayam /
GP12garup1_u:7070: deśāntare mṛte bāle sadyaḥ śuddhiryato mṛte // GarP_1,107.14 //
GP12garup1_u:7071: ajātadantā ye bālā ye ca garbhādviniḥ sṛtāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7072: na teṣāmagnisaṃskāro na piṇḍaṃ nodakakriyā // GarP_1,107.15 //
GP12garup1_u:7073: yadi garbho vipadyata stravate vāpi yoṣitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7080: agnimāñchrotriyo rājā sadyaḥ śaucāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // GarP_1,107.19 //
GP12garup1_u:7082: saṅgātsūtau sūtakaṃ syādupaspṛśya pitā śuciḥ // GarP_1,107.20 //
GP12garup1_u:7090: gohataṃ kṛmidaṣṭaṃ ca spṛṣṭvā kṛcchreṇa śudhyati // GarP_1,107.24 //
GP12garup1_u:7092: saptajanma bhavetstrītvaṃ vaidhavyaṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ // GarP_1,107.25 //
GP12garup1_u:7093: bālahatyā tvagamanādṛtau ca strī tu sūkari /
GP12garup1_u:7095: aurasaḥ kṣetrajaḥ putraḥ pitṛjau piṇḍadau pituḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7096: parivittestu kṛcchraṃ syātkanyāyāḥ kṛcchrameva ca // GarP_1,107.27 //
GP12garup1_u:7100: naṣṭe mṛte pravrajite klībe vā patite patau // GarP_1,107.29 //
GP12garup1_u:7102: bhartrā sahamṛtā nārī romābdāni vaseddivi // GarP_1,107.30 //
GP12garup1_u:7105: kṣīraiḥ prakṣālya tasyāsthi svāgninā mantrato dahet /
GP12garup1_u:7106: pravāse tu mṛte bhūyaḥ kṛtvā kuśamayaṃ dahet // GarP_1,107.32 //
GP12garup1_u:7108: śamīṃ śiśre viniḥ kṣipya araṇiṃ vṛṣaṇe kṣipet // GarP_1,107.33 //
GP12garup1_u:7110: pārśve tūlūkhalaṃ dadyātpṛṣṭhe tu musalaṃ dadet // GarP_1,107.34 //
GP12garup1_u:7112: śrotra ca prokṣaṇīṃ dādyadājyasthālīṃ ca cakṣuṣoḥ // GarP_1,107.35 //
GP12garup1_u:7113: karṇe netre mukhe ghrāṇe hiraṇyaśakalān kṣipet /
GP12garup1_u:7121: kṣattraṃ cāndrāyaṇaṃ vipraṃ dvāviṃśātriṃśamāhare (vahe) t // GarP_1,107.39 //
GP12garup1_u:7122: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākye ācārakāṇḍe parāśaroktadharmanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:7128: sadbhiḥ saṅgaṃ prakurvīta siddhikāmaḥ sadā naraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7131: virodhaṃ saha mitreṇa saṃprītiṃ śatrusevinā // GarP_1,108.3 //
GP12garup1_u:7138: kālaḥ pacati bhūtāni kālaḥ saṃharate prajāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7139: kālaḥ supteṣu jāgarti kālo hi duratikramaḥ // GarP_1,108.7 //
GP12garup1_u:7140: kāleṣu harate vīryaṃ kāle garbhe ca vartate /
GP12garup1_u:7141: kālo janayate sṛṣṭiṃ punaḥ kālo 'pi saṃharet // GarP_1,108.8 //
GP12garup1_u:7148: uttamaiḥ saha sāṅgatyaṃ paṇḍitaiḥ saha satkathām /
GP12garup1_u:7149: alubdhaiḥ saha mitratvaṃ kurvāṇo nāvasīdati // GarP_1,108.12 //
GP12garup1_u:7151: paraveśmani vāsaṃ ca na kurvīta kadācana // GarP_1,108.13 //
GP12garup1_u:7154: sa bandhuryo hite yuktaḥ sa pitā yastu poṣakaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7155: tanmitraṃ yatra viśvāsaḥ sa deśo yatra jīvyate // GarP_1,108.15 //
GP12garup1_u:7156: sa bhṛtyo yo vidheyastu tadbījaṃ yatprarohati /
GP12garup1_u:7157: sā bhāryā yā priyaṃ brūte sa putro yastu jīvati // GarP_1,108.16 //
GP12garup1_u:7158: sa jīvati guṇā yasya dharmo yasya sa jīvati /
GP12garup1_u:7159: guṇadharmavihīno yo niṣphala tasya jīvanam // GarP_1,108.17 //
GP12garup1_u:7160: sā bhāryā yā gṛhe dakṣā sā bhāryāyā priyaṃvadā /
GP12garup1_u:7161: sā bhāryā yā patiprāṇā sā bhāryā yā pativratā // GarP_1,108.18 //
GP12garup1_u:7162: nitya snātā sugandhā ca nityaṃ ca priyavādinī /
GP12garup1_u:7165: satataṃ priyavakrī ca satataṃ tvṛtukāminī // GarP_1,108.20 //
GP12garup1_u:7167: yasyedṛśī bhavedbhāyyā sa devendrona mānuṣaḥ // GarP_1,108.21 //
GP12garup1_u:7169: uttarottaravādā syā sā jarā na jarā jarā // GarP_1,108.22 //
GP12garup1_u:7171: kukriyā tyaktalajjā ca sā jarā na jarā jarā // GarP_1,108.23 //
GP12garup1_u:7173: alpālpena tu santuṣṭā sā priyā na priyā priyā // GarP_1,108.24 //
GP12garup1_u:7175: sasarpe ca gṛhe vāsomṛtyureva na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,108.25 //
GP12garup1_u:7178: vyālīkaṇṭhapradeśāhyapi ca phaṇabhṛdbhāṣaṇā yā ca raudrī yā kṛṣṇā vyākulāgī rudhiranayanasaṃvyākulā vyāghrakalpā /
GP12garup1_u:7179: krodhe yaivogravaktrā sphuradanalaśikhā kākajihvā karālā sevyā na strī vidagdhā parapuragamanā bhrāntacittā virākta // GarP_1,108.27 //
GP12garup1_u:7180: saktiḥ sutoke sukṛtaṃ kṛtaghne śatiṃ ca vahnau (sītāpahau hyatapayaiva)?haime /
GP12garup1_u:7181: utpadyate daivavaśātkadācidveśyāsu rāgo na bhavetkadācit // GarP_1,108.28 //
GP12garup1_u:7182: bhujaṅgame veśmani dṛṣṭidṛṣṭe vyādhau cikitsāvinivartite ca /
GP12garup1_u:7183: dehe ca bālyādivayo 'nvite ca kālā vṛto 'sau labhate dhṛtiṃ kaḥ // GarP_1,108.29 //
GP12garup1_u:7184: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bṛhaspatiproktanītisāranirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:7191: grāmaṃ janapadasyārthe ātmārthe pṛthivīṃ tyajet // GarP_1,109.2 //
GP12garup1_u:7192: varaṃ hi narake vāso na tu duścarite gṛhe /
GP12garup1_u:7195: na parīkṣya paraṃ sthānaṃ pūrvamāyatanaṃ tyajet // GarP_1,109.4 //
GP12garup1_u:7198: arthena kiṃ kṛpaṇahastagatena kena jñānena kiṃ bahuśaṭhāgrahasaṃkulena /
GP12garup1_u:7199: rūpeṇa kiṃ guṇaparākramavarjitena mitreṇa kiṃ vyasanakālaparāṅmukhena // GarP_1,109.6 //
GP12garup1_u:7200: adṛṣṭapūrvā bahavaḥ sahāyāḥ sarve padasthasya bhavanti mitrāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7201: arthairvihīnasya padacyutasya bhavatyakāle svajano 'pi śatruḥ // GarP_1,109.7 //
GP12garup1_u:7202: āpatsu mitraṃ jānī yādraṇe śūraṃ rahaḥ śucim /
GP12garup1_u:7203: māryā ca vibhave kṣīṇe durbhikṣe ca priyātithim // GarP_1,109.8 //
GP12garup1_u:7204: vṛkṣaṃ kṣīṇaphalaṃ tyajanti vihagāḥ śuṣkaṃ saraḥ sārasānirdravyaṃ puruṣaṃ tyajanti gaṇikā bhraṣṭaṃ nṛpaṃ mantriṇaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7205: puṣpaṃ paryuṣitaṃ tyajanti madhupāḥ dargdha vanāntaṃ mṛgāḥ sarvaḥ kāryavaśājjano hi ramate kasyāsti ko vallabhaḥ // GarP_1,109.9 //
GP12garup1_u:7207: mūrkhaṃ chandānuvṛttyā ca yāthātathyena paṇḍitam // GarP_1,109.10 //
GP12garup1_u:7208: sadbhāvena hi tuṣyanti devāḥ satpuruṣā dvijāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7212: yasyayasya hi yo bhāvastasyatasya hitaṃ vadan /
GP12garup1_u:7214: nadīnāṃ ca nakhīnāṃ ca śṛṅgiṇāṃ śastrapāṇinām /
GP12garup1_u:7215: viśvāso naiva gantavyaḥ striṣu rājakuleṣu ca // GarP_1,109.14 //
GP12garup1_u:7217: vañcanaṃ cāpa mānaṃ ca matimānna prikāśayet // GarP_1,109.15 //
GP12garup1_u:7220: kasya doṣaḥ kule nāsti vyādhinā ko pīḍitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7221: kena na vyasanaṃ prāptaṃ śriyaḥ kasya nirantarāḥ // GarP_1,109.17 //
GP12garup1_u:7222: kor'thaṃ prāpya na garvito bhuvi naraḥ kasyāpadonāgatāḥ strībhiḥ kasya na khaṇḍitaṃ bhuvi manaḥ ko nāma rājñāṃ priyaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7223: kaḥ kālasya na gocarāntaragataḥ kor'tho gato gauravaṃ ko vā durjanavāgurānipatitaḥ kṣemeṇa yātaḥ pumān // GarP_1,109.18 //
GP12garup1_u:7226: vipattau ca mahadduḥkhaṃ tadvudhaḥ kathamācaret // GarP_1,109.19 //
GP12garup1_u:7227: yasmindeśe na saṃmānaṃ na prītirna ca bāndhavāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7228: na ca vidyāgamaḥ kaścittaṃ deśaṃ parivarjayet // GarP_1,109.20 //
GP12garup1_u:7229: dhanasya yasya rājato bhayaṃ na cāsti caurataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7230: mṛtaṃ ca yanna mucyate samarjayasva taddhanam // GarP_1,109.21 //
GP12garup1_u:7231: yadarjitaṃ prāṇaharaiḥ pariśramairmṛtasya taṃ vai vibhajantirikthinaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7232: kṛtaṃ ca yadduṣkṛtamarthalipsayā tadeva doṣopahatasya yautukam // GarP_1,109.22 //
GP12garup1_u:7234: ākhoriva kadaryasya dhanaṃ duḥ khāya kevalam // GarP_1,109.23 //
GP12garup1_u:7237: śikṣayanti ca yācante dehīti kṛpaṇā janāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7239: sañcitaṃ kratuśatairna yujyate yācitaṃ guṇavate na dīyate /
GP12garup1_u:7241: na devebhyo na viprobhyo bandhubhyo naiva cātmane /
GP12garup1_u:7244: arervā praṇipātena mā bhūtaste kadācana // GarP_1,109.28 //
GP12garup1_u:7246: vyādhīnāṃ bhojanaṃ jīrṇaṃ śatrorghātaḥ prapañcatā // GarP_1,109.29 //
GP12garup1_u:7248: pṛthak śayyā tu nārīṇāṃ brāhmaṇasyānimantraṇam // GarP_1,109.30 //
GP12garup1_u:7249: durjanāḥ śilpino dāsā duṣṭāśca paṭahāḥ striyaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7250: tāḍitā mārdavaṃ yānti na te satkārabhājanam // GarP_1,109.31 //
GP12garup1_u:7252: mitramāpadi kāle ca bhāryāñca vibhavakṣaye // GarP_1,109.32 //
GP12garup1_u:7253: strīṇāṃ dviguṇa āhāraḥ prajñā caiva caturguṇā /
GP12garup1_u:7255: na svapnena jayennidrāṃ na kāmena striyaṃ jayet /
GP12garup1_u:7256: na cendhanairjayedvahniṃ na madyena tṛṣāṃ jayet // GarP_1,109.34 //
GP12garup1_u:7260: hṛdyaṃ hi puruṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā yoniḥ praklidyate striyāḥ // GarP_1,109.36 //
GP12garup1_u:7261: suveṣaṃ puruṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhrātaraṃ yadi vā sutam /
GP12garup1_u:7262: yoniḥ klidyati nārīṇāṃ satyaṃsatyaṃ hi śaunaka ! // GarP_1,109.37 //
GP12garup1_u:7264: toyaiśca doṣaiśca nipātayanti nadyo hi kūlāni kulā ni nāryaḥ // GarP_1,109.38 //
GP12garup1_u:7265: nadī pātayate kūlaṃ nārī pātayate kulam /
GP12garup1_u:7266: nārīṇāñca nadīnāṃ ca svacchandā lalitā gatiḥ // GarP_1,109.39 //
GP12garup1_u:7268: nāntakaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ na puṃsāṃ vāmalocanāḥ // GarP_1,109.40 //
GP12garup1_u:7270: sukhānāñca sutānāñca jīvitasya varasya ca // GarP_1,109.41 //
GP12garup1_u:7271: rājā na tapto dhanasaṃcayena na sāgarastṛptimagājjalena /
GP12garup1_u:7272: na paṇḍitastṛpyati bhāṣitena tṛptaṃ na cakṣurnṛpadarśanena // GarP_1,109.42 //
GP12garup1_u:7273: svakarma dharmārjitajīvitānāṃ śāstreṣu dāreṣu sadā ratānām /
GP12garup1_u:7277: na dānena na mānena nārjavena na savayā /
GP12garup1_u:7278: na śastreṇa na śāstreṇa sarvathā viṣamā striyaḥ // GarP_1,109.45 //
GP12garup1_u:7280: śanaiḥ kāmaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca pañcaitāni śanaiḥ śanaiḥ // GarP_1,109.46 //
GP12garup1_u:7282: śāśvataṃ saguṇā vidyā suhṛnmitraṃ ca śāśvatam // GarP_1,109.47 //
GP12garup1_u:7283: ye bālabhāvānna paṭhanti vidyāṃ ye yauvanasthā hyadhanātmadārāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7284: te śocanīyā iha jīvaloke manuṣyarūpeṇa mṛgāścaranti // GarP_1,109.48 //
GP12garup1_u:7287: ye bālabhāve na paṭhanti vidyāṃ kāmāturā yauvananaṣṭavittāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7288: te vṛddhabāve paribhūyamānāḥ saṃdahyamānāḥ śiśire yathābjam // GarP_1,109.50 //
GP12garup1_u:7289: tarke 'pratiṣṭhā śrutayo vibhinnāḥ nāsāvṛṣiryasya mataṃ na bhinnam /
GP12garup1_u:7290: dharmasya tattvaṃ nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ mahājano yena gataḥ sa panthāḥ // GarP_1,109.51 //
GP12garup1_u:7293: anuktamapyūhati paṇḍito janaḥ pareṅgitajñānaphalā hi buddhayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7294: udīritorthaḥ paśunāpi gṛhyate hayāśca nāgāśca vahanti darśitam // GarP_1,109.53 //
GP12garup1_u:7295: arthādbhraṣṭastīrthayātrāṃ tu gacchetsatyādbhraṣṭo rauravaṃ vai vrajecca /
GP12garup1_u:7296: yogādbhraṣṭaḥ satyaghṛtiñca gacchedrājyādbhraṣṭo mṛgayāyāṃ vrajecca // GarP_1,109.54 //
GP12garup1_u:7297: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bṛhadṛ nītisāre navottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:7302: dhruvāṇi tasya naśyanti hyadhruvaṃ naṣṭameva ca // GarP_1,110.1 //
GP12garup1_u:7303: vāgyantrahīnasya narasya vidyā śastraṃ yathā kāpuruṣasya haste /
GP12garup1_u:7304: na tuṣṭimutpādayate śarīre hyandhasya dārā iva darśanīyāḥ // GarP_1,110.2 //
GP12garup1_u:7306: vibhave dānaśaktiśca nālpasya tapasaḥ phalam // GarP_1,110.3 //
GP12garup1_u:7311: arthenāpi hi kiṃ tena yasyānarthe tu saṃgatiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7312: ko hi nāma śikhājātaṃ pannagasya maṇiṃ haret // GarP_1,110.6 //
GP12garup1_u:7317: na rājñā saha mitratvaṃ na sarpo nirviṣaḥ kracit /
GP12garup1_u:7318: na kulaṃ nirmalaṃ tatra strījano yatra jāyate // GarP_1,110.9 //
GP12garup1_u:7322: na hi cūḍāmaṇiḥ pāde śobhate vai kadācana // GarP_1,110.11 //
GP12garup1_u:7324: athavā pṛthivīpālo mūrdhni pāde pramādataḥ // GarP_1,110.12 //
GP12garup1_u:7326: mūrdhni vā sarvalokānāṃ śīrṣataḥ patito vane // GarP_1,110.13 //
GP12garup1_u:7328: na ca virauti na cāpi sa śobhate bhavati yojayiturvacanīyatā // GarP_1,110.14 //
GP12garup1_u:7332: adhaḥ khalenāpi kṛtasya vahnernādhaḥ śikhā yāti kadācideva // GarP_1,110.16 //
GP12garup1_u:7333: na sadaśvaḥ kaśāghātaṃ siṃho na gajagarjitam /
GP12garup1_u:7334: vīro vā paranirdiṣṭaṃ na sahedbhīmaniḥ svanam // GarP_1,110.17 //
GP12garup1_u:7335: yadi vibhavavihīnaḥ pracyuto vāśu daivānna tu khalajanasevāṃ kāṅkṣayennaiva nīcām /
GP12garup1_u:7336: na tṛṇamadanakārye sukṣudhārto 'tti siṃhaḥ pibati rudhiramuṣṇaṃ prāyaśaḥ kuñcarāṇām // GarP_1,110.18 //
GP12garup1_u:7340: tānyeva kāleṣu vipatkarāṇi viṣasya pātrāṇyapi dāruṇāni // GarP_1,110.20 //
GP12garup1_u:7344: svayameva patiṣyanti kūlajātā iva drumāḥ // GarP_1,110.22 //
GP12garup1_u:7346: bhavanti te vināśāya daivāyattasya vai sadā // GarP_1,110.23 //
GP12garup1_u:7348: sānukūle tu daive śaṃ puṃsaḥ sarvatra jāyate // GarP_1,110.24 //
GP12garup1_u:7350: āhāre vyavahāre ca tyaktalajjaḥ sadā bhavet // GarP_1,110.25 //
GP12garup1_u:7351: dhaninaḥ śrotriyo rājā nadī vaidyastu pañcamaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7352: pañca yatra na vidyante na kuryāttatratra saṃsthitim // GarP_1,110.26 //
GP12garup1_u:7354: pañca yatra na vidyante na tatra divasaṃ vaset // GarP_1,110.27 //
GP12garup1_u:7356: ete yatra na vidyante tatra vāsaṃ na kārayet // GarP_1,110.28 //
GP12garup1_u:7358: sarvaḥ sarvaṃ na jānāti sarvajño nāsti kutracit // GarP_1,110.29 //
GP12garup1_u:7359: na sarvavitkaścidihāsti loke nātyantamūrkho bhuvi cāpi kaścit /
GP12garup1_u:7360: jñānena nīcottamamadhyamena yo 'yaṃ vijānāti sa tena vidvān // GarP_1,110.30 //
GP12garup1_u:7361: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bṛhadṛ nītisāre daśottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:7366: sarvāṇi hi mahīpālaḥ samyaṅnityaṃ parīkṣayet // GarP_1,111.1 //
GP12garup1_u:7368: nirjitya parasainyāni kṣitaṃ dharmeṇa pālayet // GarP_1,111.2 //
GP12garup1_u:7372: pararāṣṭraṃ mahīpālairbhoktavyaṃ na ca dūṣayet // GarP_1,111.4 //
GP12garup1_u:7373: nodhaśchindyāttu yo dhenvāḥ kṣārārtho labhate payaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7374: evaṃ rāṣṭraṃ prayogeṇa pīḍyamānaṃ na vardhate // GarP_1,111.5 //
GP12garup1_u:7378: prajāḥ pālayituṃ śaktaḥ pārthivo vijitendriyaḥ // GarP_1,111.7 //
GP12garup1_u:7381: satyaṃ manoramāḥ kāmāḥ satyaṃ ramyā vibhūtayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7382: kintu vai vanitāpāṅgabhaṅgilolaṃ hi jīvitam // GarP_1,111.9 //
GP12garup1_u:7383: vyāghrīva tiṣṭhati jarā paritarjayantī rogāśca śatrava iva prabhavanti gātre /
GP12garup1_u:7384: āyuḥ paristravati bhinnaghaṭādivāmbho loko na cātmahitamācaratīha kaścit // GarP_1,111.10 //
GP12garup1_u:7385: niḥ śaṅkaṃ kiṃ manuṣyāḥ kuruta parahitaṃ yuktamagre hitaṃ yanmodadhvaṃ kāminībhirmadanaśarahatā mandamandātidṛṣṭyā /
GP12garup1_u:7386: mā pāpaṃ saṃkurudhvaṃ dvijahariparamāḥ saṃbhajadhvaṃ sadaiva āyurniḥ śeṣameti skhalati jalaghaṭībhūtamṛtyucchalena // GarP_1,111.11 //
GP12garup1_u:7388: ātmavat sarvabhūteṣu yaḥ paśyati sa paṇḍitaḥ // GarP_1,111.12 //
GP12garup1_u:7390: yadeṣāṃ sarvakāryeṣu vaco na pratihanyate // GarP_1,111.13 //
GP12garup1_u:7392: rakṣayitvā tu cātmānaṃ yaddhanaṃ taddvijātaye // GarP_1,111.14 //
GP12garup1_u:7394: sa rājā vardhate yogādvyādhibhiśca na badhyate // GarP_1,111.15 //
GP12garup1_u:7398: yasyārthāḥ sa mumāṃllāke yasyārthāḥ sa ca paṇḍitaḥ // GarP_1,111.17 //
GP12garup1_u:7399: tyajanti mitrāṇi dhanairvihīnaṃ putrāśca dārāśca suhṛjjanāśca /
GP12garup1_u:7400: te cārthavantaṃ punarāśrayanti hyartho hi loke puruṣasya bandhuḥ // GarP_1,111.18 //
GP12garup1_u:7401: andhā hi rājā bhavati yastu sāstravivarjitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7402: andhaḥ paśyati cāreṇa śāstrahīno na paśyati // GarP_1,111.19 //
GP12garup1_u:7404: indriyāṇi prasuptāni tasya rājyaṃ ciraṃ na hi // GarP_1,111.20 //
GP12garup1_u:7408: sahi naśyati vai rājā iha loke paratra ca // GarP_1,111.22 //
GP12garup1_u:7409: manastāpaṃ na kurvīta āpadaṃ prāpya pārthivaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7410: samabuddhiḥ prasannātmā prasannātmā sukhaduḥkhe samo bhavet // GarP_1,111.23 //
GP12garup1_u:7412: praviśya vadanaṃ rāhoḥ kiṃ nodati punaḥ śaśī // GarP_1,111.24 //
GP12garup1_u:7413: dhigdhik śarīrasukhalālitamānaveṣu mā khedayeddhanakṛśaṃ hi śarīrameva /
GP12garup1_u:7414: saddārakā hyadhanapāṇḍusutāḥ śrutā hi duḥkhaṃ vihāya punareva sukhaṃ prapannāḥ // GarP_1,111.25 //
GP12garup1_u:7417: kāraṇena vinā bhṛtye yastu kupyati pārthivaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7420: mānave śrotriye caiva bhṛtyavarge sadaiva hi // GarP_1,111.28 //
GP12garup1_u:7422: śāsane sarvadā kṣipraṃ ripubhiḥ paribhūyate // GarP_1,111.29 //
GP12garup1_u:7423: huṅkāre bhṛkuṭīṃ naiva sadā kurvīta pārthivaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7424: vinā doṣeṇa yo bhṛtyānrājādhamaṇa śāsti ca /
GP12garup1_u:7426: sukhapravṛttaiḥ sādhyantai śatravo vigrahe sthitaiḥ // GarP_1,111.31 //
GP12garup1_u:7428: ṣaḍvidho yasya utsāhastasya devo 'pi śaṅkate // GarP_1,111.32 //
GP12garup1_u:7429: udyogena kṛte kārye siddharyasya na vidyate /
GP12garup1_u:7430: daivaṃ tasya pramāṇaṃ hi kartavyaṃ pauruṣaṃ sadā // GarP_1,111.33 //
GP12garup1_u:7431: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bṛhadṛ nītisāre ekādaśottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:7437: bhṛtye parikṣaṇaṃ vakṣye yasyayasya hi yo guṇaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7438: tamimaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi ye yathākathitaṃ kila // GarP_1,112.2 //
GP12garup1_u:7440: tathā caturbhirbhṛtakaṃ parīkṣayedvatena śīlena kalena karmaṇā // GarP_1,112.3 //
GP12garup1_u:7446: apramādī pramāthī ca pratīhāraḥ sa ucyate // GarP_1,112.6 //
GP12garup1_u:7448: sarvaśāstrasamālokī hyeṣa sādhuḥ sa lekhakaḥ // GarP_1,112.7 //
GP12garup1_u:7450: krūro yathoktavādī ca eṣa dūto vidhīyate // GarP_1,112.8 //
GP12garup1_u:7454: śuciśca kaṭhinaścaiva sūpakāraḥ sa ucyate // GarP_1,112.10 //
GP12garup1_u:7456: āyuḥ śīlaguṇopeto vaidya eva vidhīyate // GarP_1,112.11 //
GP12garup1_u:7464: maṇinā bhūṣitaḥ sarpaḥ kimasau na bhayaṅkaraḥ // GarP_1,112.15 //
GP12garup1_u:7465: akāraṇaviṣkṛtakopadhāriṇaḥ khalādbhayaṃ kasya na nāma jāyate /
GP12garup1_u:7466: viṣaṃ mahāherviṣamasya durvacaḥ saduḥ sahaṃ sannipatetsadā mukhe // GarP_1,112.16 //
GP12garup1_u:7468: ardharājyaharaṃ bhṛtyaṃ yo hanyātsa na hanyate // GarP_1,112.17 //
GP12garup1_u:7470: prāgeva paścādviparī tarupā ye te tu bhṛtyā na hitā bhavanti // GarP_1,112.18 //
GP12garup1_u:7472: sukhaduḥ khasamā dhīrā bhṛtyā lokeṣu durlabhāḥ // GarP_1,112.19 //
GP12garup1_u:7475: aśakto bhayabhītaśca rājñā tyaktavya eva saḥ // GarP_1,112.20 //
GP12garup1_u:7477: durge praveśitavyāni tataḥ śatruṃ nipātayet // GarP_1,112.21 //
GP12garup1_u:7482: yatkiñcitkurute karma śubhaṃ vā yādi vāśubham /
GP12garup1_u:7483: tena sma vardhate rājā sūkṣmato bhṛtyakāryataḥ // GarP_1,112.24 //
GP12garup1_u:7486: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bṛhaspatyukta nītiptāre dvādaśottarakaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:7491: paṇḍitasya guṇāḥ sarve mūrve doṣāśca kevalāḥ // GarP_1,113.1 //
GP12garup1_u:7495: bandhstho 'pi tiṣṭhecca na tu rājye khalaiḥ saha // GarP_1,113.3 //
GP12garup1_u:7499: vatsāpekṣī duhetkṣīraṃ bhūmiṃ gāñcaiva pārthipaḥ // GarP_1,113.5 //
GP12garup1_u:7501: tathā vittamu pādāya rājā kurvīta sañcayam // GarP_1,113.6 //
GP12garup1_u:7506: vane 'pi doṣāḥ prabhavanti rāgiṇāṃ gṛhe 'pi pañcendriyanigrahastapaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7507: akutsite karmaṇi yaḥ pravartate nivṛttarāgasya gṛhaṃ tapovanam // GarP_1,113.9 //
GP12garup1_u:7508: satyena rakṣyate dharmo vidyā yogena rakṣyate /
GP12garup1_u:7509: mṛjayā rakṣyate pātraṃ kulaṃ śalina rakṣyate // GarP_1,113.10 //
GP12garup1_u:7510: varaṃ vindhyāṭavyāṃ nivasanamabhuktasya maraṇaṃ varaṃ sarpākīrṇe śayanamatha kūpe nipatanam /
GP12garup1_u:7511: varaṃ bhrāntāvarte sabhayajalamadhye praviśanaṃ na tu svīye pakṣe hi dhanamaṇu dehīti kathanam // GarP_1,113.11 //
GP12garup1_u:7513: pūrvārjite hi sukṛte na naśyanti kadācana // GarP_1,113.12 //
GP12garup1_u:7514: viprāṇāṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ vidyā pṛthivyā bhūṣaṇaṃ nṛpaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7515: nabhaso bhūṣaṇaṃ candraḥ śīlaṃ sarvasya bhūṣaṇam // GarP_1,113.13 //
GP12garup1_u:7516: ete te candratulyāḥ kṣitipatitanayā bhīmasenārjunādyāḥ śurāḥ satyapratijñā dinakaravapuṣaḥ keśavenopagūḍhāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7517: te vai duṣṭagrahasthāḥ kṛpaṇavaśagatā bhaikṣyacaryāṃ prayātāḥ ko vā kasminsamartho bhavati vidhivaśādbhrāmayetkarmarekhā // GarP_1,113.14 //
GP12garup1_u:7518: brahmā yena kulālavanniyamito brahmāṇḍabhāṇḍodare viṣṇuryena daśāvatāragahane kṣipto mahāsaṅkaṭe /
GP12garup1_u:7519: rudroyena kapālapāṇipuṭake bhikṣāṭanaṃ kāritaḥ sūryo bhrāmyati nityameva gagane taramai namaḥ karṇaṇe // GarP_1,113.15 //
GP12garup1_u:7520: dātā baliryācakako murārirdānaṃ mahī vipramukhasya madhye /
GP12garup1_u:7521: dattvā phalaṃ bandhanameva labdhaṃ namo 'stu te daiva yatheṣṭakāriṇe // GarP_1,113.16 //
GP12garup1_u:7526: ātmanā vihitaṃ duḥ khamātmanā vihitaṃ sakham /
GP12garup1_u:7528: na cāntarikṣe na samudramadhye na parvatānāṃ vivarapraveśe /
GP12garup1_u:7529: na mātṛmūrdhni pradhṛtastathāṅke tyaktuṃ kṣamaḥ karma kṛtaṃ naro hi // GarP_1,113.20 //
GP12garup1_u:7530: dugastrikūṭaḥ parikhā samudro rakṣāṃsi yodhāḥ paramā ca vṛttiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7531: śāstrañca vai tūśanasā pradiṣṭaṃ sa rāvaṇaḥ kālavaśādvinaṣṭaḥ // GarP_1,113.21 //
GP12garup1_u:7532: yasminvayasi yatkāle yaddivā yacca vā niśi /
GP12garup1_u:7533: yanmuhūrte kṣaṇe vāpi tattathā na tadanyathā // GarP_1,113.22 //
GP12garup1_u:7536: purādhītā ca yā vidyā purā dattañca yaddhanam /
GP12garup1_u:7537: purā kṛtāni karmāṇi hyagre dhāvanti dhāvataḥ // GarP_1,113.24 //
GP12garup1_u:7540: sthūlajaṅgho yadā rāmaḥ śabdagāmī ca lakṣmaṇaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7541: ghanakeśī yadā sītā trayaste duḥ khabhājanam // GarP_1,113.26 //
GP12garup1_u:7542: na pituḥ karmaṇā putraḥ pitā vā putrakarmaṇā /
GP12garup1_u:7543: svayaṃ kṛtena gacchanti svayaṃ baddhāḥ svakarmaṇā // GarP_1,113.27 //
GP12garup1_u:7545: śarā iva patantīha vimuktā dṛḍhadhanvibhiḥ // GarP_1,113.28 //
GP12garup1_u:7548: bālo yuvā ca vṛddhaśca yaḥ karoti śubhāśubham /
GP12garup1_u:7552: prāptavyamarthaṃ labhate manuṣyo devo 'pi taṃ vārayituṃ na śaktaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7553: ato na śocāmi na vismayo me lalāṭalekhā na punaḥ prayāti (yadasmadīyaṃ na tu tat pareṣām // GarP_1,113.32 //
GP12garup1_u:7554: sarpaḥ kūpe gajaḥ skandhe bila ākhuśca dhāvati /
GP12garup1_u:7555: naraḥ śīghratarādeva karmaṇaḥ kaḥ palāyate // GarP_1,113.33 //
GP12garup1_u:7558: yer'thā dharmeṇa te satyā ye 'dharmeṇa gatāḥ śriyaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7559: dharmārtho ca mahāṃlloke tatsmṛtvā hyarthakāraṇāt // GarP_1,113.35 //
GP12garup1_u:7560: annārtho yāni duḥ khāni karoti kṛpaṇo janaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7561: tānyeva yadi dharmārtho na bhūyaḥ kleśabhājanam // GarP_1,113.36 //
GP12garup1_u:7563: yo 'nnārthaiḥ śuciḥ śaucānna mṛdā vāriṇā śuciḥ // GarP_1,113.37 //
GP12garup1_u:7565: sarvabhūte dayā śaucaṃ jalaśaucañca pañcamam // GarP_1,113.38 //
GP12garup1_u:7566: yasya satyañca śaucañca tasya svargo na durlabhaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7567: satyaṃ hi vacanaṃ yasya so 'śvamedhādviśiṣyate // GarP_1,113.39 //
GP12garup1_u:7570: yasya hastau ca pādau ca manaścaiva susaṃyatam /
GP12garup1_u:7571: vidyā tapaśca kīrtiśca sa tīrthaphalamaśnute // GarP_1,113.41 //
GP12garup1_u:7573: na kruddhaḥ paruṣaṃ brūyādetatsādhostu lakṣaṇam // GarP_1,113.42 //
GP12garup1_u:7575: kāle śrutvā hitaṃ vākyaṃ na kaścitparituṣyati // GarP_1,113.43 //
GP12garup1_u:7577: alabhyaṃ labhyate martyaistatra kā parivedanā // GarP_1,113.44 //
GP12garup1_u:7581: prabhāte 'nyadiśo yānti kā tatra parivedanā // GarP_1,113.46 //
GP12garup1_u:7583: yastvekastvarito yāti kā tatra parivedanā // GarP_1,113.47 //
GP12garup1_u:7587: kuśāgreṇa tu saṃspṛṣṭaṃ prāptakālo na jīvati // GarP_1,113.49 //
GP12garup1_u:7589: prāptavyānyeva prāpnāti duḥ khāni ca sukhāni ca // GarP_1,113.50 //
GP12garup1_u:7591: ācodyamānāni yathā puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca /
GP12garup1_u:7592: svakālaṃ nātivartante tathā karma purākṛtam // GarP_1,113.51 //
GP12garup1_u:7593: śīlaṃ kulaṃ naiva na caiva vidyā jñānaṃ guṇā naiva na bījaśuddhiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7594: bhāgyāni pūrvaṃ tapasārjitāni kāle phalantyasya yathaiva vṛkṣāḥ // GarP_1,113.52 //
GP12garup1_u:7595: tatra mṛtyuryatra hantā tatra śrīryatra sampadaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7596: tatra tatra svayaṃ yāti preryamāṇaḥ svakarmabhiḥ // GarP_1,113.53 //
GP12garup1_u:7598: yathā dhenusahasreṣu vatso vindanti mātaram // GarP_1,113.54 //
GP12garup1_u:7600: sukṛtaṃ bhuṅkṣva cātmīyaṃ mūḍha kiṃ paritapyase // GarP_1,113.55 //
GP12garup1_u:7601: yathā pūrvakṛtaṃ karma śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham /
GP12garup1_u:7602: tathā janmāntare tadvai kartā ramanugacchati // GarP_1,113.56 //
GP12garup1_u:7604: ātmano balivamātrāṇi paśyannapi na paśyati // GarP_1,113.57 //
GP12garup1_u:7606: vicārya khalu paśyāmi tatsukhaṃ yatra nirvṛtiḥ // GarP_1,113.58 //
GP12garup1_u:7607: yatra sneho bhayaṃ tatra sneho duḥ khasya bhājanam /
GP12garup1_u:7608: snehamūlāni duḥ khāni tasmistyakte mahatsukham // GarP_1,113.59 //
GP12garup1_u:7609: śarīramevāyatanaṃ duḥ khasya ca sukhasya ca /
GP12garup1_u:7610: jīvitañca śarīrañca jātyaiva saha jāyate // GarP_1,113.60 //
GP12garup1_u:7611: sarvaṃ paravaśaṃ duḥ khaṃ sarva mātmavaśaṃ sukham /
GP12garup1_u:7613: sukhasyānantaraṃ duḥ khaṃ duḥ khasyānantaraṃ sukham /
GP12garup1_u:7614: śukhaṃ duḥ khaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ cakravatparivartate // GarP_1,113.62 //
GP12garup1_u:7616: vartamānena varteta na sa śokena bādhyate // GarP_1,113.63 //
GP12garup1_u:7617: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bṛhadṛ nītisāre trayośottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:7626: baddhaḥ parikarastena mokṣāya gamanaṃ prati // GarP_1,114.3 //
GP12garup1_u:7627: na mātari na dāreṣu na sodarye na cātmaje /
GP12garup1_u:7631: mātrā svastrā duhitrā vā na viviktāsano vaset /
GP12garup1_u:7634: yathopāyo vadho daṇḍastathaiva hyanu vartate // GarP_1,114.7 //
GP12garup1_u:7636: śakyate prasaro boddhuṃ na hyaraktasye catasaḥ // GarP_1,114.8 //
GP12garup1_u:7637: kṣaṇo nāsti raho nāsti na sti prārthayitā janaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7643: parādhīnā nidrā paradṛdayakṛtyānusaraṇaṃ sadā helā hāsyaṃ niyatamapi śokena rahitam /
GP12garup1_u:7644: paṇe nyastaḥ kāyo viṭajanakhurairdāritagalo bahūtkaṇṭhavṛtirjagati gaṇikrāyā bahumataḥ // GarP_1,114.12 //
GP12garup1_u:7645: agnirāpaḥ striyo mūrkhāḥ sarpā rājakulāni ca /
GP12garup1_u:7646: nityaṃ paropasevyāni sadyaḥ prāṇaharāṇi ṣaṭ // GarP_1,114.13 //
GP12garup1_u:7648: śāstrakuśalo vipro bhavetpaṇḍitaḥ kiṃ citraṃ yadi daṇḍanītikuśalo rājā bhaveddhārmikaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7649: kiṃ citraṃ yadi rūpayauvanavatī sādhvī bhavetkāminī taccitraṃ yadi nirdhano 'pi puruṣaḥ pāpaṃ na kuryātkracit // GarP_1,114.14 //
GP12garup1_u:7653: yadi no cikurodbhedāllabhyante kaiḥ striyo na hi // GarP_1,114.16 //
GP12garup1_u:7655: na tathā bādhate śatruḥ kṛtavairo bahiḥ sthitaḥ // GarP_1,114.17 //
GP12garup1_u:7656: sa paṇḍito yo hyanuñjayedvai miṣṭena bālaṃ viniyena śiṣṭam /
GP12garup1_u:7657: arthena nārīṃ tapasā hi devānsarvāṃśca lokāṃśca susaṃgraheṇa // GarP_1,114.18 //
GP12garup1_u:7658: chalena mitraṃ kaluṣeṇa dharmaṃ paropatāpena samṛddhibhāvanam /
GP12garup1_u:7659: sukhena vidyāṃ puruṣeṇa nārīṃ vāñchanti vai ye na ca paṇḍitāste // GarP_1,114.19 //
GP12garup1_u:7661: niṣphalaṃ tasya vai kāryāṃ mahādoṣamavāpnuyāt // GarP_1,114.20 //
GP12garup1_u:7662: sadhano hi tapasvī ca dūrato vai kṛtaśramaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7663: madyapa strī satītyevaṃ vipra na śraddadhāmyaham // GarP_1,114.21 //
GP12garup1_u:7665: kadācitkupitaṃ mitraṃ sarvaṃ guhyaṃ prakāśayet // GarP_1,114.22 //
GP12garup1_u:7670: vṛddhāḥ striyo navaṃ madyaṃ śuṣkaṃ māṃsaṃ trimūlakam /
GP12garup1_u:7671: rātrau dadhi divā svapnaṃ vidvānṣaṭ parivarjayet // GarP_1,114.25 //
GP12garup1_u:7672: viṣaṃ goṣṭhī daridrasya vṛddhasya taruṇī viṣam /
GP12garup1_u:7673: viṣaṃ kuśikṣitā vidyā ajīrṇe bhojanaṃ viṣam // GarP_1,114.26 //
GP12garup1_u:7675: priyaṃ dānaṃ daridrasya bhūnaścataruṇī priyā // GarP_1,114.27 //
GP12garup1_u:7677: divāśayo jāgaraṇañca rātrau ṣaḍbhirnarāṇāṃ nivasanti rogāḥ // GarP_1,114.28 //
GP12garup1_u:7680: śuṣkaṃ māṃsaṃ striyo vṛddhā bālārkastaruṇaṃ dadhi /
GP12garup1_u:7681: prabhāte maithunaṃ nidrā sadyaḥ prāṇaharāṇi ṣaṭ // GarP_1,114.30 //
GP12garup1_u:7682: sadyaḥ pakraghṛtaṃ drākṣā bālā strī kṣīrabhojanam /
GP12garup1_u:7683: uṣṇodakaṃ tarucchāyā sadyaḥ prāṇaharāṇi ṣaṭ // GarP_1,114.31 //
GP12garup1_u:7687: trayo balaharāḥ sadyo hyadhvā ve maithunaṃ jvaraḥ // GarP_1,114.33 //
GP12garup1_u:7688: śuṣkaṃ māṃsaṃ payo nityaṃ bhāryāmitraiḥ sahaiva tu /
GP12garup1_u:7689: na bhāktavyaṃ nṛpaiḥ sārdhaṃ viyogaṃ kurute kṣaṇāt // GarP_1,114.34 //
GP12garup1_u:7691: sūryodaye hyastamaye 'pi śāyinaṃ vimuñcati śrīrapi cakrapāṇinam // GarP_1,114.35 //
GP12garup1_u:7692: nityaṃ chedastṛṇānaṃ dharaṇivilakhanaṃ pādayoścāpamārṣṭiḥ dantānāmapyaśaucaṃ malinavasanatā rūkṣatā mūrdhajānām /
GP12garup1_u:7693: dve sadhye cāpi nidrā vivasanaśayanaṃ grāsahāsātirekaḥ svāṅge pīṭhe ca vādyaṃ nidhanamupanayetkeśavasyāpi lakṣmīm // GarP_1,114.36 //
GP12garup1_u:7696: yasya kasya tu puṣpasya pāṇāḍarasya viśeṣataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7698: dīpasya paścimā chāyā chāyā śayyāsanasya ca /
GP12garup1_u:7700: bālātapaḥ pretadhūmaḥ strī vṛddhā taruṇaṃ dadhi /
GP12garup1_u:7701: āyuṣkāmo na seveta tathā saṃmārjanīrajaḥ // GarP_1,114.40 //
GP12garup1_u:7709: keśāmbu mārjanīreṇurhanti puṇyaṃ purā kṛtam // GarP_1,114.44 //
GP12garup1_u:7711: antareṇa na gantavyaṃ hayasya vṛṣabhasya ca // GarP_1,114.45 //
GP12garup1_u:7713: bhogāsvādeṣu viśvāsaṃ kaḥ prājñaḥ kartumarhati // GarP_1,114.46 //
GP12garup1_u:7716: vairiṇā saha sandhāya viśvasto yadi tiṣṭhati /
GP12garup1_u:7717: sa vṛkṣāgre prasupto hi patitaḥ pratibudhyate // GarP_1,114.48 //
GP12garup1_u:7719: mṛdunaiva mṛduṃ hanti dāruṇenaiva dāruṇam // GarP_1,114.49 //
GP12garup1_u:7722: namanti phalino vṛkṣā namanti guṇino janāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7723: śuṣkavṛkṣāśca mūrkhāśca bhidyante na namanti ca // GarP_1,114.51 //
GP12garup1_u:7724: aprārthitāni duḥ khāni yathaivāyānti yānti ca /
GP12garup1_u:7725: mārjāra iva lumpeta tathā prārthayitāra naraḥ // GarP_1,114.52 //
GP12garup1_u:7727: viparītamanārye ca yathecchasi tathā cara // GarP_1,114.53 //
GP12garup1_u:7729: dvikarṇasya tu mantrasya brahmāpyanta na budhyate // GarP_1,114.54 //
GP12garup1_u:7730: tayā gavā kiṃ kriyate yā na dogdhrī na garbhiṇī /
GP12garup1_u:7731: kor'tha putreṇa jātena yo na vidvānna dhārmikaḥ // GarP_1,114.55 //
GP12garup1_u:7733: kulaṃ puruṣasiṃhena candreṇa gaganaṃ yathā // GarP_1,114.56 //
GP12garup1_u:7735: vanaṃ suvāsitaṃ sarvaṃ suputreṇa kulaṃ yathā // GarP_1,114.57 //
GP12garup1_u:7736: eko hi guṇavānputro nirguṇena śatena kim /
GP12garup1_u:7737: candro hanti tamāṃsyeko na ca jyotiḥ sahasrakam // GarP_1,114.58 //
GP12garup1_u:7739: prāpte tu ṣoḍaśe varṣe putraṃ mitravadācaret // GarP_1,114.59 //
GP12garup1_u:7745: yadenaṃ kṣamayā yuktamaśaktaṃ manyate janaḥ // GarP_1,114.62 //
GP12garup1_u:7747: snigdheṣu ca vidagdhasya matayo vai hyanākulāḥ // GarP_1,114.63 //
GP12garup1_u:7748: jyeṣṭhaḥ pitṛsamo bhrātā mṛte pitari śaunaka /
GP12garup1_u:7749: sarveṣāṃ sa pitā hi syātsarveṣāmanupālakaḥ // GarP_1,114.64 //
GP12garup1_u:7754: apahṛtya parasvaṃ hi yastu dānaṃ prayacchati /
GP12garup1_u:7755: sa dātā narakaṃ yāti yasyārthāstasya tatphalam // GarP_1,114.67 //
GP12garup1_u:7758: brahmaghne ca surāpe ca core bhagnavrate tathā /
GP12garup1_u:7759: niṣkṛtirvihitā sadbhiḥ kṛtaghne nāsti niṣkṛtiḥ // GarP_1,114.69 //
GP12garup1_u:7763: caturo viddhi cāṇḍālāñjātyā jāyeta pañcamaḥ // GarP_1,114.71 //
GP12garup1_u:7766: nave vayasi yaḥ śāntaḥ sa śānta iti me matiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7767: dhātuṣu kṣīyamāṇeṣu śamaḥ kasya na jāyate // GarP_1,114.73 //
GP12garup1_u:7769: madīyā iti matvā vai na hi harṣayuto bhavet // GarP_1,114.74 //
GP12garup1_u:7770: cittāyattaṃ dhātuvaśyaṃ śarīraṃ citte naṣṭe dhātavo yānti nāśam /
GP12garup1_u:7771: tasmāccittaṃ sarvadā rakṣaṇīyaṃ svasthe citte dhātavaḥ sambhavanti // GarP_1,114.75 //
GP12garup1_u:7772: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bṛhadṛ nītisāre caturdaśottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:7776: kumāryāṃ ca kumitraṃ ca kurājānaṃ kuputrakam /
GP12garup1_u:7777: kukanyāṃ ca kudeśaṃ ca dūrataḥ parivarjayet // GarP_1,115.1 //
GP12garup1_u:7778: dharmaḥ pravrajitastapaḥ pracalitaṃ satyaṃ ca dūraṃ gataṃ pṛthvī vandhyaphalā janāḥ kapaṭino laulye sthitā brāhmaṇāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7779: martyāḥ strīvaśagāḥ striyaśca capalā nīcā janā unnatāḥ hā kaṣṭaṃ khalujīvitaṃ kaliyuge dhanyā janā ye mṛtāḥ // GarP_1,115.2 //
GP12garup1_u:7780: dhanyāste ye na paśyanti deśabhaṅgaṃ kulakṣayam /
GP12garup1_u:7783: sumitra nāsti viśvāsaḥ kurājye nāsti jīvitam // GarP_1,115.4 //
GP12garup1_u:7784: parānnaṃ ca parasvaṃ ca paraśayyāḥ parastriyaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7788: striyo naśyanti rūpeṇa tapaḥ krodhana naśyati /
GP12garup1_u:7791: tataḥ saṃkramate pāpaṃ ghaṭāddhaṭa ivodakam // GarP_1,115.8 //
GP12garup1_u:7793: tasmācchiṣyaṃ ca putraṃ ca tāḍayenna tu lālayet // GarP_1,115.9 //
GP12garup1_u:7794: adhvā jarā dehavatāṃ parvatānāṃ jalaṃ jarā /
GP12garup1_u:7797: uttamā mānamicchanti māno hi mahatāṃ dhanam // GarP_1,115.11 //
GP12garup1_u:7798: māno hi mūlamarthasya māne sati dhanena kim /
GP12garup1_u:7801: uttamā mānamicchanti māno hi mahatāṃ dhanam // GarP_1,115.13 //
GP12garup1_u:7802: vane 'pi siṃhā na namanti kaṃ ca bubhu kṣitā māṃsanirīkṣaṇaṃ ca /
GP12garup1_u:7803: dhanairvihīnāḥ sukuleṣu jātā na nīcakarmāṇi samārabhante // GarP_1,115.14 //
GP12garup1_u:7804: nābhiṣeko na saṃskāraḥ siṃhasya kriyate vane /
GP12garup1_u:7806: vaṇikpramādī bhṛkaśca mānī bhikṣurvilāsī hyadhanaśca kāmī /
GP12garup1_u:7807: varāṅganā cāpriyavādinī ca na te ca karmāṇi samārabhante // GarP_1,115.16 //
GP12garup1_u:7808: dātā daridraḥ kṛpaṇor'thayuktaḥ puttro 'vidheyaḥ kujanasya sevā /
GP12garup1_u:7809: paropakāreṣu narasya mṛtyuḥ prajāyate duścaritāni pañca // GarP_1,115.17 //
GP12garup1_u:7810: kāntāviyogaḥ svajanāpamānaṃ ṛṇasya śeṣaḥ kujanasya sevā /
GP12garup1_u:7811: dāridrayābhāvādvimukhāśca mitrā vināgninā pañca dahanti tīvrāḥ // GarP_1,115.18 //
GP12garup1_u:7813: nīcāpamānaṃ kṣudhitaṃ kalatraṃ bhāryā viraktā sahajoparodhaḥ // GarP_1,115.19 //
GP12garup1_u:7814: vaśyaśca purtrer'tha karī ca vidyā arogitā sajjanasaṅgatiśca /
GP12garup1_u:7815: iṣṭā ca bhāryā vaśavartinī ca duḥ khasya mūloddharaṇāni pañca // GarP_1,115.20 //
GP12garup1_u:7817: ekaḥ pramāthī sa kathaṃ na ghātyo yaḥ sevate pañcabhireva pañca // GarP_1,115.21 //
GP12garup1_u:7819: pañca viprā na pūjyante bṛhaspatisamā api // GarP_1,115.22 //
GP12garup1_u:7820: āyuḥ karma ca vittaṃ ca vidyā nidhanameva ca /
GP12garup1_u:7823: patitasya samutthāne śastāḥ pañca (hyete) guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,115.24 //
GP12garup1_u:7825: pañcaite hyasthirā bhāvā yauvanāni dhanāni ca // GarP_1,115.25 //
GP12garup1_u:7827: asthiraṃ puttradārādyaṃ dharmaḥ kīrtiryaśaḥ sthiram // GarP_1,115.26 //
GP12garup1_u:7830: āyurvarṣaśataṃ nṛṇāṃ parimitaṃ rātrau tadardhaṃ gataṃ tasyārdhasthitakiñcidardhamadhikaṃ bālyasya kāle gatam /
GP12garup1_u:7831: kiñcidvandhuviyogaduḥ khamaraṇairbhūpālasevāgataṃ śeṣaṃ vāritaraṅgagarbhacapalaṃ mānena kiṃ māninām // GarP_1,115.28 //
GP12garup1_u:7833: mṛtyurgrasati bhūtāni pavanaṃ pannago yathā // GarP_1,115.29 //
GP12garup1_u:7834: gacchatastiṣṭhato vāpi jāgrataḥ svapato na cet /
GP12garup1_u:7837: udarabharaṇamātratuṣṭabuddheḥ puruṣapaśośca paśośca ko viśeṣaḥ // GarP_1,115.31 //
GP12garup1_u:7838: śaurye tapasi dāne ca yasya na prathitaṃ yaśaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7839: vidyāyāmarthalābhe vā māturuccāra eva saḥ // GarP_1,115.32 //
GP12garup1_u:7841: tannāma jīvitamiti pravadanti tajjñāḥ kāko 'pi jīvati ciraṃ ca baliṃ ca bhuṅkte // GarP_1,115.33 //
GP12garup1_u:7842: kiṃ jīvitena dhanamānavivarjitena mitreṇa kiṃ bhavati bhītisaśaṅkitena /
GP12garup1_u:7843: siṃhavrataṃ carata gacchata mā viṣādaṃ kāko 'pi jīvati ciraṃ ca baliṃ ca bhuṅkte // GarP_1,115.34 //
GP12garup1_u:7844: yo vātmanīha na gurau na ca bhṛtyavarge dīne dayāṃ na kurute na ca mitrakārye /
GP12garup1_u:7845: kiṃ tasya jīvitaphalenamanuṣyaloke kāko 'pi jīvati ciraṃ ca baliṃ ca bhuṅkte // GarP_1,115.35 //
GP12garup1_u:7847: sa lauhakārabhastreva śvasannapi na jīvati // GarP_1,115.36 //
GP12garup1_u:7849: ye parādhīnakarmāṇo jīvanto 'pi ca te mṛtāḥ // GarP_1,115.37 //
GP12garup1_u:7850: su(sva) pūrā vai kāpuruṣāḥ su(sva) pūro mūṣikāñjaliḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7853: veśyārāgaḥ khale prītiḥ ṣaḍete budvudopamāḥ // GarP_1,115.39 //
GP12garup1_u:7854: vācā vihitasārthena loko na ca sukhāyate /
GP12garup1_u:7855: jīvitaṃ mānamūlaṃ hi māne mlāne kutaḥ sukham? // GarP_1,115.40 //
GP12garup1_u:7856: abalasya balaṃ rājā bālasya ruditaṃ balam /
GP12garup1_u:7857: balaṃ mūrkhasya maunaṃ hi taskarasyānṛtaṃ balam // GarP_1,115.41 //
GP12garup1_u:7859: tathātathāsya medhā syādvijñānaṃ cāsya rocate // GarP_1,115.42 //
GP12garup1_u:7860: yathāyathā hi puruṣaḥ kalyāṇe kurute matim /
GP12garup1_u:7861: tathātathā hi sarvatra śliṣyate lokasupriyaḥ // GarP_1,115.43 //
GP12garup1_u:7863: tasmāllobho na kartavyaḥ pramādo nona viśvaset // GarP_1,115.44 //
GP12garup1_u:7865: utpanne tu bhaye tīvre sthātavyaṃ vai hyabhītavat // GarP_1,115.45 //
GP12garup1_u:7867: punaḥ punaḥ pravardhante tasmāccheṣaṃ na kārayet // GarP_1,115.46 //
GP12garup1_u:7869: na tatra doṣaṃ paśyāmi duṣṭe doṣaṃ samācaret // GarP_1,115.47 //
GP12garup1_u:7876: tadbhujyate yaddvijabhuktaśeṣaṃ sa buddhimānyo na karoti pāpam /
GP12garup1_u:7877: tatsauhṛdaṃ yakriyate parokṣe dambhairvinā yaḥ kriyate sa dharmaḥ // GarP_1,115.51 //
GP12garup1_u:7878: na sā sabhā yatra na santi vṛddhāḥ vṛddhā na te ye na vadanti dharmam /
GP12garup1_u:7879: dharmaḥ sa no yatra na satyamasti naitatsatyaṃ yacchalenānuviddham // GarP_1,115.52 //
GP12garup1_u:7882: tanmaṅgalaṃ yatra manaḥ prasannaṃ tajjīvanaṃ yanna parasya sevā /
GP12garup1_u:7883: tadarjitaṃ yatsvajanena bhuktaṃ tadgarjitaṃ yatsamare ripūṇām // GarP_1,115.54 //
GP12garup1_u:7884: sā strīyā na madaṃ kuryātsa sukhī tṛṣṇayojjhitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7885: tanmitraṃ yatra viśvāsaḥ puruṣaḥ sa jitendriyaḥ // GarP_1,115.55 //
GP12garup1_u:7887: tadeva kevalaṃ ślaghyaṃ yasyātmā kriyate stutau // GarP_1,115.56 //
GP12garup1_u:7889: mūlānveṣo na kartavyo mūlāddoṣo na hīyate // GarP_1,115.57 //
GP12garup1_u:7891: ṣaiśunyaṃ janavārtāntaṃ vittaṃ duḥ khatrayāntakam // GarP_1,115.58 //
GP12garup1_u:7893: ācāntaṃ ghoṣavāsāntaṃ kulasyāntaṃ striyā prabho (bhuḥ) // GarP_1,115.59 //
GP12garup1_u:7895: saṃyogā viprayogāntā maraṇāntaṃ hi jīvitam // GarP_1,115.60 //
GP12garup1_u:7898: anāyake na vastavyaṃ na caiva bahunāyake /
GP12garup1_u:7899: strīnāyake na vastavyaṃ vastavyaṃ bālanāyake // GarP_1,115.62 //
GP12garup1_u:7900: pitā rakṣati kaumāre bhattā rakṣati yauvane /
GP12garup1_u:7901: putrastu sthavire kāle na strī svātantryamarhati // GarP_1,115.63 //
GP12garup1_u:7906: aśvaṃ śrāntaṃ gajaṃ mattaṃ gāvaḥ prathamasūtikāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7907: anūdake ca maṇḍūkānprājño dūreṇa varjayet // GarP_1,115.66 //
GP12garup1_u:7908: arthāturāṇāṃ na suhṛnna bandhuḥ kāmāturāṇāṃ na bhayaṃ na lajjā /
GP12garup1_u:7909: cintāturāṇāṃ na sukhaṃ na nidrā kṣudhāturāṇāṃ na balaṃ na tejaḥ // GarP_1,115.67 //
GP12garup1_u:7913: sāvakāśastu vai bhuṅkte yastu dārairna saṅgataḥ // GarP_1,115.69 //
GP12garup1_u:7915: svasvāminā balavatā bhṛtyo bhavati garvitaḥ // GarP_1,115.70 //
GP12garup1_u:7918: ye padasthasya mittrāṇi te tasya riputāṃ gatāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7919: bhānoḥ padme jale prītiḥ sthaloddharaṇaśoṣaṇaḥ // GarP_1,115.72 //
GP12garup1_u:7920: sthānasthitāni pūjyante pūjyante ca pade sthitāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7921: sthānabhraṣṭā na pūjyante keśā dantā nakhā narāḥ // GarP_1,115.73 //
GP12garup1_u:7924: vṛthā vṛṣṭiḥ samudrasya vṛthā tṛptasya bhojanam /
GP12garup1_u:7925: vṛthā dānaṃ samṛddhasya nīcasya sukṛtaṃ vathā // GarP_1,115.75 //
GP12garup1_u:7926: dūrastho 'pi samīpastho yo yasya hṛdaye sthitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:7929: maraṇe yāni cihnāni tāni cihnāni yācake // GarP_1,115.77 //

GP12garup1_u:7943: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śaunakoktanītisārādivarṇanaṃ nāma pañcadaśottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:7947: vratāni vyāsa vakṣyāmi hariryaiḥ sarvado bhavet /

GP12garup1_u:7960: caturdaśyāṃ pañcadaśyāṃ brahmā ca pitaror'thadāḥ // GarP_1,116.7 //
GP12garup1_u:7962: nakṣatrāṇi ca yogāśca pūjitāḥ sarvadāyakāḥ // GarP_1,116.8 //

GP12garup1_u:7989: khādiraṃ dantakāṣṭhaṃ ca kārtike rudramarcayet // GarP_1,117.11 //

GP12garup1_u:8004: māgaśīrṣe site pakṣe gavyāśī samupoṣitaḥ // GarP_1,118.1 //

GP12garup1_u:8013: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe 'khaṇḍadvādaśīvratakathanaṃnāmāṣṭādaśottara śatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ

GP12garup1_u:8029: bhojayecca dvijānsapta varṣaṃ kṛtvā tu sarvabhāk // GarP_1,119.6 //

GP12garup1_u:8041: kundaiḥ kṛtvā dantakāṣṭhaṃ jīvāśaḥ śaṣkulīpradaḥ // GarP_1,120.4 //
GP12garup1_u:8043: dadhiprāśo dantakāṣṭhaṃ tagaraṃ śrīmukhīṃ yajet // GarP_1,120.5 //
GP12garup1_u:8046: lavaṅgāśo bhavedeva āṣāḍhe mādhavīṃ yajet // GarP_1,120.6 //

GP12garup1_u:8064: idaṃ vrataṃ mayā deva gṛhītaṃ puratastava /
