GP12garup1_u:8122: gomūtraṃ ca dadhi kṣīraṃ pañcame pañcagavyakam /
GP12garup1_u:8126: ekādaśī dvādaśī ca niśānte ca trayodaśī /
GP12garup1_u:8127: nityamekādaśī yatra tatra sannihito hariḥ // GarP_1,123.12 //
GP12garup1_u:8129: dvādaśyāṃ pāraṇa kuryātsūtake mṛtake caret // GarP_1,123.13 //
GP12garup1_u:8135: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhīṣmapañcakādivrataṃ nāma trayoviṃśatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:8140: yathā ca gaurī bhūteśaṃ pṛcchati sma paraṃ vratam // GarP_1,124.1 //
GP12garup1_u:8147: sa kukruraiḥ samāyukto mṛgānhantuṃ vanaṃ gataḥ // GarP_1,124.4 //

GP12garup1_u:8152: tena dhūlinirodhāya kṣiptaṃ nīraṃ ca liṅgake /

GP12garup1_u:8157: kāle mṛto yamabhaṭaiḥ pāśairbaddhvā tu nīyate // GarP_1,124.9 //

GP12garup1_u:8173: kṣamasva jagatāṃ nātha ! trailokyādhipate hara ! // GarP_1,124.17 //
GP12garup1_u:8176: prasanno bhava me śrīman gṛhaṃ prati ca gamyatām /
GP12garup1_u:8180: yanmayā śraddhayā dattaṃ prīyatāṃ tena me prabhuḥ /

GP12garup1_u:8300: sauro māso vivāhāya yajñādau sāvanasthitiḥ // GarP_1,128.15 //
GP12garup1_u:8302: rudreṇa dvādaśī yuktā caturdaśyātha pūrṇimā // GarP_1,128.16 //

GP12garup1_u:8305: prārabdhatapasā strīṇāṃ rajo hanyādvrataṃ na hi /

GP12garup1_u:8333: gaurī kālī umā bhadrā durgā kāntiḥ sarasvatī // GarP_1,129.9 //

GP12garup1_u:8339: gaḥ svāhā mūlamantro 'yaṃ praṇavena samanvitaḥ // GarP_1,129.12 //
GP12garup1_u:8340: glaiṃ glāṃhṛdaye gāṃ gīṃ hūṃ hrīṃ hrīṃ śiraḥ śikhā /
GP12garup1_u:8341: gūṃ varma goṃ ca gaiṃ netraṃ goṃ ca āvāhanādiṣu // GarP_1,129.13 //
GP12garup1_u:8343: dīpolkāya maholkāya baliścātha visa (mār) janam // GarP_1,129.14 //
GP12garup1_u:8345: oṃ mahākarṇāya vidmahe--vakratuṇḍāya dhīmahi--tanno dantiḥ pracodayāt // GarP_1,129.15 //
GP12garup1_u:8347: gaṇāya gaṇapataye svāhā kūṣmāṇḍakāya ca // GarP_1,129.16 //
GP12garup1_u:8349: oṃ śyāma (va) dantavikarālāsyāhavepāya vai namaḥ // GarP_1,129.17 //
GP12garup1_u:8350: padmadaṃṣṭāya svāhānte mudrā vai nartanaṃ gaṇe /
GP12garup1_u:8359: āṃ gaṇapataye namaḥ caturthyantaṃ yajedgaṇam // GarP_1,129.22 //
GP12garup1_u:8369: śrāvaṇe cāśvine bhādre pañcamyāṃ kāttika śubhe // GarP_1,129.27 //
GP12garup1_u:8373: anantaṃ vāsukiṃ śaṅkhaṃ padmaṃ kambalameva ca // GarP_1,129.29 //
GP12garup1_u:8374: tathā karkāṭakaṃ nāgaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ ca śaṅkhakam /
GP12garup1_u:8375: kālīyaṃ takṣakaṃ caiva piṅgalaṃ māsimāsi ca // GarP_1,129.30 //
GP12garup1_u:8377: dvārasyobhayato lekhyāḥ śrāvaṇe tu site yajet // GarP_1,129.31 //
GP12garup1_u:8381: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe daṣṭoddhārapañcamavritaṃ nāmaikonatriṃśottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:8388: oṃ khakholkāyamṛtatvaṃ (tantaṃ) priyasaṅgamo bhava sada svāhā // GarP_1,130.2 //
GP12garup1_u:8390: saptamyāṃ niyataḥ snātvā pūjayitvā divākaram // GarP_1,130.3 //
GP12garup1_u:8393: sarve bhavantu saphalā mama kāmāḥ samantataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:8395: saṃpūjya devaṃ saptamyāṃ pāyasenātha bhojayet // GarP_1,130.5 //
GP12garup1_u:8396: viprāṃśca dakṣiṇāṃ dattvā svayaṃ cātha payaḥ pibet /
GP12garup1_u:8397: bhakṣyaṃ coṣyaṃ tathā lehyaṃ odanaṃ ceti kīrtitam // GarP_1,130.6 //
GP12garup1_u:8402: abhyañjanāñjanatilāṃśca vivarjayedyaḥ tasyeṣitaṃ bhavati saptasu saptamīṣu // GarP_1,130.8 //
GP12garup1_u:8404: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe saptamīvratanirūpaṇaṃ nāma triṃśottaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:8409: dūrvāṃ saurīṃ gaṇeśaṃ ca phalapuṣpaiḥ śivaṃ yajet // GarP_1,131.1 //
GP12garup1_u:8415: kāryā viddhāpi saptamyā hanti pāpaṃ trijanmanaḥ /

GP12garup1_u:9056: dharmaṃ kuryātsthiraṃ yena pāpaṃ hitvā hariṃ vrajet // GarP_1,141.16 //
GP12garup1_u:9057: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhaviṣya rājavaṃśa dṛ nāmaikacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:9064: matsyo bhūtvā hayagrīvaṃ daityaṃ hatvājikaṇṭakam // GarP_1,142.2 //
GP12garup1_u:9066: mandaraṃ dhārayāmāsa kūrmo bhūtvā hitāya ca // GarP_1,142.3 //
GP12garup1_u:9070: amṛtaṃ pāyayāmāsa strīrūpī ca surānhariḥ // GarP_1,142.5 //
GP12garup1_u:9076: triḥ saptakṛtvaḥ pṛthivīṃ cakre niḥ kṣattriyāṃ hariḥ // GarP_1,142.8 //
GP12garup1_u:9078: yāgaṃ kṛtvā mahābāhurmahendre parvate sthitaḥ // GarP_1,142.9 //
GP12garup1_u:9086: rāvaṇaṃ cānujaṃ tasya laṅkāpuryāṃ vibhīṣaṇam // GarP_1,142.13 //
GP12garup1_u:9088: āruhya puṣpakaṃ sārdhaṃ sītayā patibhaktayā // GarP_1,142.14 //
GP12garup1_u:9090: rājyaṃ cakāra devādīnpālayāmāsa sa prajāḥ // GarP_1,142.15 //
GP12garup1_u:9092: sā mahīpatinā reme rāmeṇaiva yathāsukham // GarP_1,142.16 //
GP12garup1_u:9093: rāvaṇasya gṛhe sītā sthitā bheje na rāvaṇam /
GP12garup1_u:9094: karmaṇā manasā vācā sā gatā rāghavaṃ sadā // GarP_1,142.17 //
GP12garup1_u:9095: pativratā tu sā sītā hyanasūyā yathaiva tu /
GP12garup1_u:9096: pativratāyā māhātmyaṃ śṛṇu tvaṃ kathayāmyaham // GarP_1,142.18 //
GP12garup1_u:9098: taṃ tathā vyādhitaṃ bhāryā patiṃ devamivārcayat // GarP_1,142.19 //
GP12garup1_u:9106: tacchrutvā prāha tadbhāryā sūryo nodayameṣyati // GarP_1,142.23 //
GP12garup1_u:9108: bahūnyabdapramāṇāni tato devā bhayaṃ yayuḥ // GarP_1,142.24 //
GP12garup1_u:9115: taiḥ sā prasāditā gatvā hyanasūyā pativratā /
GP12garup1_u:9118: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe daśāvatāradṛ nāma dvicatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:9131: astragrāmaṃ tato yakṣīṃ tāṭakāṃ prajaghāna ha // GarP_1,143.5 //
GP12garup1_u:9133: janakasya kratuṃ gatvā upayeme 'tha jānakīm // GarP_1,143.6 //
GP12garup1_u:9134: ūrmilāṃ lakṣmaṇo vīro bharato māṇḍavīṃ sutām /
GP12garup1_u:9135: śatrughno vai kīrtimatīṃ kuśadhvajasute ubhe // GarP_1,143.7 //
GP12garup1_u:9139: sa rāmāya tatputrāya kaikeyyā prārthitastadā // GarP_1,143.9 //
GP12garup1_u:9141: rāmaḥ pitṛhitārthañca lakṣmaṇena ca sītayā // GarP_1,143.10 //
GP12garup1_u:9143: rathaṃ tyaktvā prayāgañca citrakūṭagiriṃ gataḥ // GarP_1,143.11 //
GP12garup1_u:9144: rāmasya tu viyogena rājā svargaṃ samāśritaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9147: sa naicchatpāduke dattvā rājyāya bharatāya tu // GarP_1,143.13 //
GP12garup1_u:9149: nandigrāme sthito bhakto hyayodhyāṃ nāviśadvratī // GarP_1,143.14 //
GP12garup1_u:9153: nikṛtya karṇo nāse ca rāmeṇāthāpavāritā // GarP_1,143.16 //
GP12garup1_u:9159: sītayā prerito rāmo mārīcaṃ nijaghāna ha // GarP_1,143.19 //
GP12garup1_u:9160: mriyamāṇaḥ sa ca prāha hā sīte ! lakṣmaṇoti ca /
GP12garup1_u:9162: uvāca rākṣasī māyā nūnaṃ sītā hṛteti saḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9164: jaṭāyuṣaṃ vinirbhidya yayau laṅkāṃ tato balī /
GP12garup1_u:9166: āgatya rāmaḥ sūnyāñca parṇaśālāṃ dadarśa ha /
GP12garup1_u:9167: śokaṃ kṛtvātha jānakyā mārgaṇaṃ kṛtavānprabhuḥ // GarP_1,143.23 //
GP12garup1_u:9169: gatvā sakhyaṃ tataścakre sugrīveṇa ca rāghavaḥ // GarP_1,143.24 //
GP12garup1_u:9175: pratīcīmuttarāṃ prācīṃ diśaṃ gatvā samāgatāḥ // GarP_1,143.27 //
GP12garup1_u:9176: dakṣiṇāntu diśaṃ ye ca mārgayanto 'tha jānakīm /
GP12garup1_u:9183: bhava bhāryeti vadatā cintayantīñca rāghavam // GarP_1,143.31 //
GP12garup1_u:9185: rāmasya tasya dūto 'haṃ śokaṃ mā kuru maithili // GarP_1,143.32 //
GP12garup1_u:9186: svābhijñānañca me dehi yena rāmaḥ smariṣyati /
GP12garup1_u:9187: tacchrutvā pradadau sītā veṇīratnaṃ hanūmate // GarP_1,143.33 //
GP12garup1_u:9188: yathā rāmo nayecchīghraṃ tathā vācyaṃ tvayā kape /
GP12garup1_u:9189: tathetyuktvā tu hanumānvanaṃ divyaṃ babhañja ha // GarP_1,143.34 //
GP12garup1_u:9195: dagdhvā laṅkāṃ samāyāto rāmapārśvaṃ sa vānaraḥ // GarP_1,143.37 //
GP12garup1_u:9197: veṇīratnañca rāmāya rāmo laṅkāpurrī yayau // GarP_1,143.38 //
GP12garup1_u:9199: vibhīṣaṇo 'pi samprāptaḥ śaraṇaṃ rāghavaṃ prati // GarP_1,143.39 //
GP12garup1_u:9201: rāmo nalena setuñca kṛtvābdhau cottatāra tam // GarP_1,143.40 //
GP12garup1_u:9203: atha te vānarā vīrā nīlāṅgadanalādayaḥ // GarP_1,143.41 //
GP12garup1_u:9207: rāmaḥ salakṣmaṇo hatvā sakapiḥ sarvarākṣasān // GarP_1,143.43 //
GP12garup1_u:9214: sītāṃ śuddhāṃ gṛhītvātha vimāne puṣpake sthitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9215: savānaraḥ samāyāto hyayodhyāṃ pravarāṃ purīm // GarP_1,143.47 //
GP12garup1_u:9219: putrau kuśalavau dṛṣṭvā tau ca rājye 'bhyaṣecayat // GarP_1,143.49 //
GP12garup1_u:9221: śatrughno lavaṇaṃ jaghne śailūṣaṃ bhatastataḥ // GarP_1,143.50 //
GP12garup1_u:9223: svargaṃ gato janaiḥ sārdhamayodhyāsthaiḥ kṛtārthakaḥ // GarP_1,143.51 //
GP12garup1_u:9224: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe rāmāyaṇavarṇanaṃ nāma tricatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:9231: kṛṣṇaḥ pītvā stanau gāḍhaṃ pūtanāmanayatkṣayam // GarP_1,144.2 //
GP12garup1_u:9233: damitaḥ kāliyo nāgo dhenuko vinipātitaḥ // GarP_1,144.3 //
GP12garup1_u:9237: keśī vinihato daityo gopādyāḥ paritoṣitāḥ // GarP_1,144.5 //
GP12garup1_u:9239: rukmiṇīsatyabhāmādyāḥ hyaṣṭau patnyo hareḥ parāḥ // GarP_1,144.6 //
GP12garup1_u:9241: tāsāṃ putrāśca pautrādyāḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ // GarP_1,144.7 //
GP12garup1_u:9246: narako nihato yena pārijātaṃ jahāra yaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9247: balaśca śisupālaśca hataśca dvividaḥ kapiḥ // GarP_1,144.10 //
GP12garup1_u:9248: aniruddhādabhūdvajraḥ sa ca rājā gate harau /
GP12garup1_u:9250: mathurāyāṃ cograsenaṃ pālanaṃ ca divaukasām // GarP_1,144.11 //
GP12garup1_u:9251: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe harivaṃśavarṇanaṃ nāma catuścātvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:9262: śantanoḥ satyavatyāṃ ca dvau putrau saṃbabhūvatuḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9269: pāṇḍoḥ kuntyāñca mādyāṃ ca pañca putrāḥ prajajñire // GarP_1,145.8 //
GP12garup1_u:9274: dagdhā jatugṛhe vīrāste muktāḥ svadhiyāmalāḥ // GarP_1,145.11 //
GP12garup1_u:9280: ardvarājyaṃ tataḥ prāptā indraprasthe purottame // GarP_1,145.14 //
GP12garup1_u:9285: gāṇḍīvaṃ nāma taddivyaṃ triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam /
GP12garup1_u:9287: sa tena dhanuṣā vīraḥ pāṇḍavo jātavedasam /
GP12garup1_u:9290: yudhiṣṭhirāya mahate bhrātre nītivide mudā // GarP_1,145.18 //
GP12garup1_u:9305: pāṇḍavānāṃ śikhaṇḍī ca tayoryuddhaṃ babhūva ha /
GP12garup1_u:9310: ānande tu pade līno vimale muktakilbiṣe // GarP_1,145.27 //
GP12garup1_u:9311: tato droṇo yayau yoddhuṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnena bīryavān /
GP12garup1_u:9313: yatra te pṛthivīpālā hatāḥ pārthena saṃgare /
GP12garup1_u:9317: nimagnaḥ sūryalokantu tataḥ prāpa sa vīryavān // GarP_1,145.30 //
GP12garup1_u:9318: tataḥ śalyo yayau yoddhuṃ dharmarājena dhīmatā /
GP12garup1_u:9323: aśvatthāmā gato drauṇiḥ suptasainyaṃ tato niśi // GarP_1,145.33 //
GP12garup1_u:9327: aiṣikāstreṇa taṃ jitvā jagrāhārjuna uttamam // GarP_1,145.35 //
GP12garup1_u:9329: snātvā santarpya devāṃśca pitṝnatha pitāmahān // GarP_1,145.36 //
GP12garup1_u:9333: śrutvā tu mausale rājā japtvā nāmasahasrakam // GarP_1,145.38 //
GP12garup1_u:9339: duṣṭānāñca vadhārthāya hyavatāraṃ karoti ca // GarP_1,145.41 //
GP12garup1_u:9344: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhāratādivarṇanaṃ nāma pañcacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:9350: rogaḥ pāpmā jvaro vyādhirvikāro duṣṭa āmayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9353: saṃprāptiścaiti vijñānaṃ rogāṇāṃ pañcadhā smṛtam // GarP_1,146.3 //
GP12garup1_u:9355: nidānamāhuḥ paryāyaiḥ prāgrūpaṃ yena lakṣyate // GarP_1,146.4 //
GP12garup1_u:9359: saṃsthānāṃ vyañjanaṃ liṅgaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ cihnamākṛtiḥ // GarP_1,146.6 //
GP12garup1_u:9362: vidyādupaśayaṃ vyādheḥ sa hi sātmyamiti smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9367: sā bhidyate yathātraiva vakṣyante 'ṣṭau jvarā iti // GarP_1,146.10 //
GP12garup1_u:9373: sarveṣāmeva rogāṇāṃ nidānaṃ kupitā malāḥ // GarP_1,146.13 //
GP12garup1_u:9385: pūrvāhne pūrvarātre ca śleṣmā vakṣyāmi saṅkarān // GarP_1,146.19 //
GP12garup1_u:9396: rasāyanaṃ prapadyāśu doṣā dehe vikurvate // GarP_1,146.24 //
GP12garup1_u:9397: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākye ācārakāṇḍe sarvaroganidānaṃ nāma ṣaṭcatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:9407: indramado jaladeṣvapsu nīlikā jyotiroṣadhīṣu bhūmyāmūṣaro nāma // GarP_1,147.3 //
GP12garup1_u:9409: aṅgeṣu ca samudbhūtāḥ piḍakāśca kaphodbhave // GarP_1,147.4 //
GP12garup1_u:9417: na vijīrṇaṃ na ca mlānirjvarasyāmasya lakṣaṇam // GarP_1,147.7 //
GP12garup1_u:9426: mohastandrāliptatiktāsyatā ca jñeyaṃ rūpaṃ śleṣmapittajvarasya // GarP_1,147.11 //
GP12garup1_u:9428: taducchītaṃ mahā nidrā divā jāgaraṇaṃ niśi // GarP_1,147.12 //
GP12garup1_u:9429: sadā vā naiva vā nidrā mahāsvedo hi naiva vā /
GP12garup1_u:9433: sasvanau sarujau karṇau mahāśītau hi naiva vā /
GP12garup1_u:9436: koṣṭhānāṃ śyāvaraktānāṃ maṇḍalānāṃ ca darśanam // GarP_1,147.16 //
GP12garup1_u:9447: tvaci koṣṭhe ca vā dāhaṃ vidadhāti puro 'nu vā // GarP_1,147.21 //
GP12garup1_u:9449: śītādau tatra pittena kaphe syānditaśoṣite // GarP_1,147.22 //
GP12garup1_u:9450: pitte śānte 'tha vai mūrchā madastṛṣṇā ca jāyate /
GP12garup1_u:9451: dāhādau punaranteṣu tandrālasye vamiḥ kramāt // GarP_1,147.23 //
GP12garup1_u:9453: caturdhā tu kṛtaḥ svedo dāhādyairabhighātajaḥ // GarP_1,147.24 //
GP12garup1_u:9468: iti jvaro 'ṣṭadhā dṛṣṭaḥ samāsāddvibidhastu saḥ // GarP_1,147.32 //
GP12garup1_u:9470: prākṛto vaikṛtaḥ sādhyo 'sādhyaḥ sāmo nirāmakaḥ // GarP_1,147.33 //
GP12garup1_u:9471: pūrvaṃ śarire śarīre tāpo manasi mānase /
GP12garup1_u:9473: dāhaḥ pittayute miśraṃ miśre 'ntaḥ saṃśraye punaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9474: jvare 'dhikaṃ vikārāḥ syurantaḥ kṣobho malagrahaḥ // GarP_1,147.35 //
GP12garup1_u:9475: bahireva bahirvege tāpo 'pi ca sa sādhitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9477: vaikṛto 'nyaḥ sa duḥ sādhyaḥ prāyaśca prākṛto 'nilāt /
GP12garup1_u:9478: varṣāsu māruto duṣṭaḥ pittaśleṣmānvitaṃ jvaram // GarP_1,147.37 //
GP12garup1_u:9479: kuryācca pittaṃ śaradi tasya cānucaraḥ kaphaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9496: malaṃ jvaroṣṇadhātūnvā sa śīghraṃ kṣapayettataḥ // GarP_1,147.46 //
GP12garup1_u:9499: prāyo 'nuyāti maryādāṃ mokṣāya ca vadhāya ca /
GP12garup1_u:9500: ityagniveśasya mataṃ hārītasya punaḥ smṛtiḥ // GarP_1,147.48 //
GP12garup1_u:9501: dviguṇā saptamī yā ca navamyekādaśī tathā /
GP12garup1_u:9502: eṣā tridoṣamaryādā mokṣāya ca vadhāya ca // GarP_1,147.49 //
GP12garup1_u:9508: doṣaḥ pravartate teṣāṃ sve kāle jvarayanbalī // GarP_1,147.52 //
GP12garup1_u:9510: kṣīṇadoṣo jvaraḥ sūkṣmo rasādiṣveva līyate // GarP_1,147.53 //
GP12garup1_u:9513: āśu sarvasya vapuṣo vyāptidoṣo na jāyate /
GP12garup1_u:9516: doṣo raktāśrayaḥ prāyaḥ karoti santataṃ jvaram // GarP_1,147.56 //
GP12garup1_u:9534: kramo yatnena vicchinnaḥ satāpo lakṣyate jvaraḥ // GarP_1,147.65 //
GP12garup1_u:9539: bhūmau sthitaṃ jalaiḥ siktaṃ kālaṃ naiva pratīkṣate /
GP12garup1_u:9540: aṅkurāya yathā bījaṃ doṣabījaṃ bhavettathā // GarP_1,147.68 //
GP12garup1_u:9544: utkleśo gauravaṃ dainyaṃ bhaṅgo 'ṅgānāṃ vijṛmbhaṇam // GarP_1,147.70 //
GP12garup1_u:9550: svedo 'titṛṣṇā vamanaṃ daurgandhyaṃ vā sahiṣṇutā // GarP_1,147.73 //
GP12garup1_u:9553: antardāho bahiḥ śaityaṃ śvāso hikkā hi majjame /
GP12garup1_u:9556: uttarottaraduḥ sādhyāḥ pañcānye tu viparyaye // GarP_1,147.76 //
GP12garup1_u:9562: sa vai hāridrako nāma jvarabhedo 'ntakaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,147.79 //
GP12garup1_u:9564: tīkṣṇo 'tha vā divā mando jāyate rātrijo jvaraḥ // GarP_1,147.80 //
GP12garup1_u:9568: tadardhaṃ śītalaṃ dehe hyardhaṃ coṣṇaṃ prajāyate // GarP_1,147.82 //
GP12garup1_u:9569: kāye pittaṃ yadā nyastaṃ śleṣmā cānte vyavasthitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:9570: uṣṇatvaṃ tena dehasya śītatvaṃ karapādayoḥ // GarP_1,147.83 //
GP12garup1_u:9576: svedaḥ kṣuvaḥ prakṛtiyogimano 'nnalipsā kaṇḍūśca mūrdhni vigatjvaralakṣaṇāni // GarP_1,147.86 //
GP12garup1_u:9577: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe jvaranidānādikaṃ nāma saptacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:9584: kupitaṃ paittikaiḥ pittaṃ dravaṃ raktañca mūrchati // GarP_1,148.2 //
GP12garup1_u:9590: chardhitaśchardibai bhatsyaṃ kāsaḥ śvāso bhramaḥ klamaḥ // GarP_1,148.5 //
GP12garup1_u:9598: bahvauṣadhāni pittasya vireko hi varauṣadham // GarP_1,148.9 //
GP12garup1_u:9599: anubandhī kapho yatra tatra tasyāpi śuddhikṛt /
GP12garup1_u:9600: kaṣāyāḥ svādavo yasya viśuddhau śleṣmalā hitāḥ // GarP_1,148.10 //
GP12garup1_u:9604: anubandhi balaṃ yasya śāntapittanarasya ca // GarP_1,148.12 //
GP12garup1_u:9608: na hi saṃśodhanaṃ kiñcidasya ca pratilominaḥ // GarP_1,148.14 //
GP12garup1_u:9611: saṃsṛṣṭeṣu hi doṣeṣu sarvathā chardanaṃ hitam /
GP12garup1_u:9612: tatra doṣo 'tra gamanaṃ śivāstra iva lakṣyate // GarP_1,148.16 //
GP12garup1_u:9614: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe raktapittanidānaṃ nāmāṣṭacatvāriṃśaduttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:9618: āśukārī yataḥ kāsaḥ sa evātaḥ pravakṣyate /
GP12garup1_u:9621: teṣāṃ bhaviṣyatāṃ rūpaṃ kaṇṭhe kaṇḍūrarocakaḥ // GarP_1,149.2 //
GP12garup1_u:9623: ūrdhvaṃ pravṛttaḥ prāpyo rastasminkaṇṭhe ca saṃsṛjan // GarP_1,149.3 //
GP12garup1_u:9625: kṣipannivākṣiṇī kliṣṭasvaraḥ pārśve ca pīḍayan // GarP_1,149.4 //
GP12garup1_u:9629: soṃgaharṣo kaphaṃ śuṣkaṃ kṛchrānmuktvālpatāṃ vrajet // GarP_1,149.6 //
GP12garup1_u:9631: pittāsṛgvamanaṃ tṛṣṇā vaisvaryaṃ dhūmako madaḥ // GarP_1,149.7 //
GP12garup1_u:9637: upasyantaḥ kṣato vāyuḥ pittenānugato balī // GarP_1,149.10 //

GP12garup1_u:10392: ṛtau yā caiva śūlārtā yati vā yonirogiṇī // GarP_1,160.49 //
GP12garup1_u:10402: pākañcireṇa bhajate naidhate vidradhiḥ punaḥ // GarP_1,160.54 //
GP12garup1_u:10416: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vidradhigulmanidāna nāma ṣaṣṭyuttaraśatatamodhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:10421: rogāḥ sarve 'pi mandāgnau sutarāmudarāṇi tu // GarP_1,161.1 //
GP12garup1_u:10425: ādhmāpya kukṣimudaramaṣṭadhā te ca bhedataḥ // GarP_1,161.3 //
GP12garup1_u:10429: puruṣāḥ syuḥ pretarūpā bhāvinastasya lakṣaṇam // GarP_1,161.5 //
GP12garup1_u:10431: jīrṇānnaṃ yo na jānāti so 'pathyaṃ sevatenaraḥ // GarP_1,161.6 //
GP12garup1_u:10438: sarvatra toye maraṇaṃ śocanaṃ tatra niṣphalam /
GP12garup1_u:10443: nātimātraṃ bhavellaulyaṃ narasya virasaṃ mukham // GarP_1,161.12 //
GP12garup1_u:10449: ādhmātamudare śabdamadbhutaṃ vā karoti saḥ // GarP_1,161.15 //
GP12garup1_u:10451: pittodare jvaro mūrchā dāhitvaṃ kaṭukāsyatā // GarP_1,161.16 //
GP12garup1_u:10476: pakve bhūte yakṛti ca sadā baddhamalo gude /
GP12garup1_u:10479: apāno jaṭhare tena saṃruddho jvararukkaraḥ // GarP_1,161.30 //
GP12garup1_u:10483: nābherupari ca prāyo gopucchākṛti jāyate // GarP_1,161.32 //
GP12garup1_u:10489: vardhate tadadho nābherāśu caiti jalātmatām // GarP_1,161.35 //
GP12garup1_u:10490: udrikte doṣarūpe ca vyāpte ca śvāsatṛṭbhramaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:10505: hīnabalaṃ tathā ghoraṃ nāḍyāṃ spṛṣṭañca sapati // GarP_1,161.43 //
GP12garup1_u:10509: janmanaivodaraṃ sarvaṃ prāyaḥ kṛcchratamaṃ matam // GarP_1,161.45 //
GP12garup1_u:10510: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇme pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ekaṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:10519: tvaṅmāṃsayostu kurute tvaci varṇān pṛthagvidhān // GarP_1,162.3 //
GP12garup1_u:10520: svayaṃ haridrā hāridraṃ pāṇḍutvaṃ teṣu cādhikam /
GP12garup1_u:10521: yāto 'yaṃ prahatedugraḥ sa rogastena gauravam // GarP_1,162.4 //
GP12garup1_u:10527: mandaśaktirjvarī śvāsī karṇaśūlī tathā bhramī // GarP_1,162.7 //
GP12garup1_u:10541: srotasāṃ saṃkṣayaṃ kuryādanurudhya ca pūrvavat // GarP_1,162.14 //
GP12garup1_u:10544: yaḥ pittarogī seveta pittalaṃ tasya kāmalam /
GP12garup1_u:10549: upekṣayā ca śothādyāḥ sakṛcchrāḥ kumbhakāmalāḥ // GarP_1,162.18 //
GP12garup1_u:10551: vātapitte bhramastṛṣṇā strīṣu harṣo mṛdujvaraḥ // GarP_1,162.19 //
GP12garup1_u:10554: śothaḥ pradhānaḥ kathitaḥ sa evāto nigadyate /
GP12garup1_u:10567: pacyate mārgagamanaṃ yānena kṣobhiṇāpi vā // GarP_1,162.27 //
GP12garup1_u:10579: śīghraṃ nāsau vā praśamenmadhye prāgdahate tanum // GarP_1,162.33 //
GP12garup1_u:10581: sābhilāṣī śakṛdbhedo gandhaḥ sparśasaho mṛduḥ // GarP_1,162.34 //
GP12garup1_u:10594: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe pāṇḍusothanidānaṃ nāma dviṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:10601: yathāttarañca duḥ sādhyastatra doṣo yathāyatham // GarP_1,163.2 //
GP12garup1_u:10603: dehe śīghraṃ viśantīha te 'ntare hi sthitā bahiḥ // GarP_1,163.3 //
GP12garup1_u:10616: yaṃyaṃ deśaṃ visarpaśca visarpati bhavetsasaḥ // GarP_1,163.9 //
GP12garup1_u:10617: śāntāṅgārāsito nīlo rakto vāsu ca cīyate /
GP12garup1_u:10618: agnidagdha iva sphoṭaiḥ śīghragatvāddrutaṃ sa ca // GarP_1,163.10 //
GP12garup1_u:10625: kaphena ruddhaḥ pavano bhittvātaṃ bahudhā kapham /
GP12garup1_u:10635: āmopaveśanaṃ lepaḥ srotasāṃ sa ca sarpati // GarP_1,163.18 //
GP12garup1_u:10642: śavagandhī ca vīsarpaḥ kardamākhyamuśanti tam // GarP_1,163.21 //
GP12garup1_u:10649: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vīsarpanidānaṃ nāma tripaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:10658: tvacaḥ kurvānti vaivarṇyaṃ śiṣṭāḥ kuṣṭhamuśantitam // GarP_1,164.3 //
GP12garup1_u:10664: kuṣṭhāni saptadhā doṣaiḥ pṛthagdvandvaiḥ samāgataiḥ // GarP_1,164.6 //
GP12garup1_u:10666: vātena kuṣṭhaṃ kāpālaṃ pittenaudumbaraṃ kaphāt // GarP_1,164.7 //
GP12garup1_u:10670: puṇḍarīkaṃ savisphoṭaṃ pāmā carmadalaṃ tathā // GarP_1,164.9 //
GP12garup1_u:10672: puṇḍarīkaryajihve ca mahākuṣṭhāni sapta tu // GarP_1,164.10 //
GP12garup1_u:10680: kāpālaṃ todabahulaṃ tatkuṣṭhaṃ viṣamaṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,164.14 //
GP12garup1_u:10684: sthiraṃ satyānaṃ guru snigdhaṃ śvetaraktaṃ malānvitam // GarP_1,164.16 //
GP12garup1_u:10693: antā rūkṣaṃ bahiḥ snigdhamantarghṛṣṭaṃ rajaḥ kiret /
GP12garup1_u:10704: puṇḍarīkaṃ bhavettaddhi citaṃ sphoṭaiḥ sitāruṇaiḥ // GarP_1,164.26 //
GP12garup1_u:10706: sūkṣmā śyāmāruṇā rūkṣā prāyaḥ sphikpāṇikūrpare // GarP_1,164.27 //
GP12garup1_u:10716: tatra tvaci sthite kaṣṭhe kāye vaivarṇyarūkṣātā // GarP_1,164.32 //
GP12garup1_u:10726: sadāhaṃ romavidhvaṃsi kaphācchvetaṃ ghana guru // GarP_1,164.37 //
GP12garup1_u:10735: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe kuṣṭharoganidāna nāma catuḥ ṣaṣṭyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:10750: śvetāstāmrāvabhāsāśca nāmataḥ saptadhā tu te // GarP_1,165.6 //
GP12garup1_u:10752: cyuravo darbhakusumāḥ sugandhāste ca kurvate // GarP_1,165.7 //
GP12garup1_u:10764: sausurādāḥ saśūlākhyā lelihā janayanti hi // GarP_1,165.13 //
GP12garup1_u:10767: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe kriminidānaṃ nāma pañcaṣaṣṭhyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:10772: sarvathānarthakathane vighna eva ca kāraṇam // GarP_1,166.1 //
GP12garup1_u:10774: sa viśvakarmā viśvātmā viśvarūpaḥ prajāpatiḥ // GarP_1,166.2 //
GP12garup1_u:10776: tadvaduktaṃ ca yatnena yatitavyamataḥ sadā // GarP_1,166.3 //
GP12garup1_u:10798: tatra sthānasthitaḥ kuryāt kruddhaḥ śvayathukṛcchratām // GarP_1,166.14 //
GP12garup1_u:10802: yadā tu dhamanīḥ sarvāḥ kruddho 'bhyeti muhurmuhuḥ /
GP12garup1_u:10805: tadāvaṣṭabhya hṛdayaṃ śiraḥ śaṅkhau ca pīḍayet // GarP_1,166.17 //
GP12garup1_u:10806: sakṣipetparito gātraṃ hanuṃ vā cāsya nāmayat /
GP12garup1_u:10808: kapota iva kūjecca niḥ saṃgaḥ sopatantrakaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:10809: sa eva vāmanāsāyāṃ yuktastu marutā hṛdi // GarP_1,166.19 //
GP12garup1_u:10813: vyāpnoti sakalaṃ dehaṃ yatra cāyāmyate punaḥ // GarP_1,166.21 //
GP12garup1_u:10815: karoti jṛmbhāṃ sadanaṃ daśanānāṃ hatodyamam // GarP_1,166.22 //
GP12garup1_u:10817: dehasya bahirāyāmaṃ pṛṣṭhato hṛdaye śiraḥ // GarP_1,166.23 //
GP12garup1_u:10818: uraścotkṣipyate tatra skandho vā nāmyate tadā /
GP12garup1_u:10819: danteṣvāsye ca vaivarṇyaṃ hyasvedastatra gātrataḥ // GarP_1,166.24 //
GP12garup1_u:10835: tato 'sya kurute mṛdvīṃ vākśaktiṃ stabdhanetratām // GarP_1,166.32 //
GP12garup1_u:10841: raktamāśritya ca śirāḥ kuryānmūrdhadharāḥ śirāḥ? // GarP_1,166.35 //
GP12garup1_u:10843: tanuṃ gṛhītvā vāyuśca snāyustathaiva ca // GarP_1,166.36 //
GP12garup1_u:10851: asādhya eva sarvo hi bhaveddaṇḍāpatānakaḥ // GarP_1,166.40 //
GP12garup1_u:10855: bāhvoḥ karmakṣayakarī vipūcī veti socyate // GarP_1,166.42 //
GP12garup1_u:10857: tadā khañjo bhavejjantuḥ paṅguḥ sakthnordvayorvadhāt // GarP_1,166.43 //
GP12garup1_u:10865: tadāsthi snāti tenorostathā śītānilena tu // GarP_1,166.47 //
GP12garup1_u:10873: satikṣepaṃ nigṛhṇāti gṛdhrasīṃ tāṃ pracakṣate // GarP_1,166.51 //
GP12garup1_u:10874: hṛṣyete caraṇau yasya bhavetāṃ cāpi suptakau /
GP12garup1_u:10878: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vātavyādhinidānaṃ nāma ṣaṭūṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:10885: sthūlānāṃ sukhināṃ cāpi kupyate vātaśoṇitam // GarP_1,167.2 //
GP12garup1_u:10889: tathā vāto gude pīḍāṃ balāsaṃ vātaśoṇitam // GarP_1,167.4 //
GP12garup1_u:10895: bhūtvā bhūtvā praśāmyanti muhurāvirbhavanti ca // GarP_1,167.7 //
GP12garup1_u:10897: ākhoriva vilaṃ kruddhaḥ kṛtsnaṃ dehaṃ bidhāvati // GarP_1,167.8 //
GP12garup1_u:10903: karoti khañjaṃ paṅguṃ vā śarīraṃ sarvataścaran // GarP_1,167.11 //
GP12garup1_u:10910: pitte vidāhaḥ saṃmohaḥ svādo mūrchā madastṛṣā /
GP12garup1_u:10911: sparśāsahatvaṃ rugrāvaḥ śoṣaḥ pāko bhṛśoṣmatā // GarP_1,167.15 //
GP12garup1_u:10913: kaṇḍūrmandā ca rugdbandvaṃ sarvaliṅgañca saṃkarāt // GarP_1,167.16 //
GP12garup1_u:10939: muktiṃ vidyānnirāmaṃ taṃ tandrādīnāṃ viparyayāt // GarP_1,167.29 //
GP12garup1_u:10949: harṣaḥ pipīlikānāṃ ca saṃcāra iva jāyate /
GP12garup1_u:10950: calalagrano mṛduḥ śītaḥ śotho gātreṣu rocakaḥ // GarP_1,167.34 //
GP12garup1_u:10951: āḍhyavāta iva jñeyaḥ sa kṛcchro medasāvataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:10953: majjāvṛte tu viṣamaṃ jṛmbhaṇaṃ pariveṣṭanam // GarP_1,167.35 //
GP12garup1_u:10955: śukrāvṛte tu śothe vai cātivego na vidyate // GarP_1,167.36 //
GP12garup1_u:10956: bhukte kukṣau rujā jīrṇe nikṛttirbhavati dhruvam /
GP12garup1_u:10959: patatyāśu jvarākrānto mūrchāṃ ca labhate naraḥ // GarP_1,167.38 //
GP12garup1_u:10963: bhramo mūrchā rujā dāhaḥ pittena prāṇa āvṛte // GarP_1,167.40 //
GP12garup1_u:10964: rujā tandrā svarabhraṃśo dāho vyāne tu sarvaśaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:10967: dāhaśca syādapāne tu male hāridravarṇatā // GarP_1,167.42 //
GP12garup1_u:10969: śleṣmaṇā prāvṛte prāṇe nādaḥ snoto 'varodhanam // GarP_1,167.43 //
GP12garup1_u:10975: apāne sakalaṃ mūtraṃ śakṛtaḥ syātpravartanam? // GarP_1,167.46 //
GP12garup1_u:10983: sthānānyapekṣya vātānāṃ vṛrdhihāniṃ ca karmaṇām // GarP_1,167.50 //
GP12garup1_u:11002: punarnavā ca bṛhatī nirguṇḍī nimbapatrakam // GarP_1,167.59 //
GP12garup1_u:11007: palaṃ palārdhakaṃ vāpi karṣaṃ karṣārdhameva vā // GarP_1,167.61 //
GP12garup1_u:11008: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vātaraktani saptaṣaṣṭyādhikaśatatamodhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:11018: vāyuḥ kupyati parjanye jīrṇānne dinasaṃkṣaye // GarP_1,168.3 //
GP12garup1_u:11026: kaphapradoṣo bhukte ca vasante ca prakupyati // GarP_1,168.7 //
GP12garup1_u:11030: vāyorliṅgāni tairyuktaṃ rogaṃ vātātmakaṃ vadet // GarP_1,168.9 //
GP12garup1_u:11042: vātapittakaphā doṣā viṇmūtrādyā malāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,168.15 //
GP12garup1_u:11043: vāyuḥ śīto laghuḥ sūkṣmaḥ svaranāśīsthiro balī /
GP12garup1_u:11051: bhavanti rogiṇāṃ śāntyai svasthāne sukhahetavaḥ // GarP_1,168.19 //
GP12garup1_u:11055: pittalo lekhana stambhī kaṣāyo grāhiśoṣaṇaḥ // GarP_1,168.21 //
GP12garup1_u:11059: rasānāṃ dvividhaḥ pāko kaṭureva ca // GarP_1,168.23 //
GP12garup1_u:11067: bāla ā ṣoḍaśānmadhyaḥ saptatervṛddha ucyate // GarP_1,168.26 //
GP12garup1_u:11083: svapne jalaśilālokī śleṣma prakṛtiko naraḥ // GarP_1,168.34 //
GP12garup1_u:11097: tasminsvāpo divā kāryolaṅghanaṃ ca vivarjanam // GarP_1,168.41 //
GP12garup1_u:11099: vidheyaṃ svedanaṃ tatra pānīyaṃ lavaṇodakam // GarP_1,168.42 //
GP12garup1_u:11104: uṣṇāmbu vānupānaṃ ca mākṣikaiḥ pācanaṃ bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:11106: bilvaḥ śoṇā ca gambhārī pāṭalā gaṇikārikā /
GP12garup1_u:11111: kāse śvāse ca tandrāyāṃ pārśvaśūle ca śasyate // GarP_1,168.48 //
GP12garup1_u:11122: bhraṣṭaṃ sthānacyutaṃ yasya sa jahātyacirādasūn // GarP_1,168.53 //
GP12garup1_u:11124: kṛṣṇau sthānacyutau coṣṭhau kṛṣṇāsyaṃ yasyataṃ tyajet // GarP_1,168.54 //
GP12garup1_u:11125: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vaidyakaśāstraparibhāṣā nāmāṣṭaṣaṣṭyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:11136: vṛṣyaḥ śīto guruḥ svādurgodhūmo vātanāśanaḥ // GarP_1,169.4 //
GP12garup1_u:11138: māṣo bahubalo vṛṣyaḥ pittaśleṣmaharo guruḥ // GarP_1,169.5 //
GP12garup1_u:11145: āgkī kaphapittaghno śukralā ca tathā smṛtā /
GP12garup1_u:11146: atasī pittalā jñeyā siddhārthaḥ kaphavātajit // GarP_1,169.9 //
GP12garup1_u:11148: balaghnā rūkṣalāḥ śītā vividhāḥ sasyajātayaḥ // GarP_1,169.10 //
GP12garup1_u:11158: sakṣāraḥ sarvadoṣaghno vāstuko rocanaḥ paraḥ // GarP_1,169.15 //
GP12garup1_u:11168: vātaghnaṃ dāḍimaṃ grāhi nāgaraṅgaphalaṃ guru // GarP_1,169.20 //
GP12garup1_u:11177: kapitthaṃ grāhi doṣaghnaṃ pakvaṃ guru viṣāpaham /
GP12garup1_u:11180: vātaghnaṃ kaphapittaghnaṃ grāhi viṣṭambhi jāmbavam // GarP_1,169.26 //
GP12garup1_u:11182: viṣṭambhi vātalaṃ bilvaṃ priyālaṃ pavanāpaham // GarP_1,169.27 //
GP12garup1_u:11186: māgadhī madhurā pakvā śvāsapittaharā parā // GarP_1,169.29 //
GP12garup1_u:11192: cakṣuṣyaṃ saindhavaṃ vṛṣyaṃ tridoṣaśamanaṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,169.32 //
GP12garup1_u:11194: uṣṇaṃ śūlaharaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ viḍaṅgaṃ vātanāśanam // GarP_1,169.33 //
GP12garup1_u:11195: romakaṃ vātalaṃ svādu rocanaṃ kledanaṃ guru /
GP12garup1_u:11198: doṣaghnaṃ nābhasaṃ vārilaghu hṛdyaṃ viṣāpaham // GarP_1,169.35 //
GP12garup1_u:11199: nādeyaṃ vātalaṃ rūkṣaṃ sārasaṃ madura laghu /
GP12garup1_u:11200: vātaśleṣmaharaṃ vārpyaṃ tāḍāgaṃ vātalaṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,169.36 //
GP12garup1_u:11210: cakṣuṣyaṃ jīvanaṃ strīṇāṃ raktapitte canāvanam // GarP_1,169.41 //
GP12garup1_u:11218: gavyaṃ medhyañca cākṣuṣyaṃ saṃskārācca tridoṣajit // GarP_1,169.45 //
GP12garup1_u:11223: vātaśleṣmaharaṃ balyaṃ tailaṃ kaśyaṃ tilodbhavam // GarP_1,169.47 //
GP12garup1_u:11227: tridoṣaghnaṃ madhu proktaṃ vātalañca prakīrtitam // GarP_1,169.49 //
GP12garup1_u:11230: phāṇitaṃ pittalaṃ tavriṃ surā matsyaṇḍikā laghuḥ /
GP12garup1_u:11231: khaṇḍaṃ vṛṣyaṃ tathā snigdhaṃ svādvasṛkpittavātajit // GarP_1,169.51 //
GP12garup1_u:11233: sa pittaghnaḥ paraḥ pathyaḥ purāṇo 'sṛkprasādanaḥ // GarP_1,169.52 //
GP12garup1_u:11237: pācano dīpanaḥ pathyo maṇḍaḥ syādbhṛṣṭataṇḍulaḥ // GarP_1,169.54 //
GP12garup1_u:11245: svinna niṣpīḍitaṃ śākaṃ hitaṃ snehādisaṃskṛtam // GarP_1,169.58 //
GP12garup1_u:11251: ghṛtapūrṇo 'gnikārī syādvṛṣyā gurvo ca śaṣkulī // GarP_1,169.61 //
GP12garup1_u:11252: bṛṃhaṇāḥ sāmiṣā bhakṣyapiṣṭa kā gukhaḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:11254: atyuṣṇā maṇḍakāḥ pathyāḥ śītalā gukho matāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:11261: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe anupānādividhikathanaṃ nāmaikonasaptatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ

GP12garup1_u:12057: tadbhasma saṃmukhe kṣiptaṃ śatraṇāṃ bhaṅgakṛdbhavet // GarP_1,177.83 //
GP12garup1_u:12059: oṃ ṭha ṭha ṭha cāhīhicāhīhi svāhā /
GP12garup1_u:12061: sudarśanāyā malaṃ tu puṣyarkṣe tu samāhṛtam /
GP12garup1_u:12062: niḥ kṣiptaṃ gṛhamadhye tu bhujaṅgā varjayanti tat // GarP_1,177.85 //
GP12garup1_u:12066: chāga mūtreṇa tallipto mūṣiko mūṣikānharet // GarP_1,177.87 //
GP12garup1_u:12067: mukto hi mandire rudra nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GP12garup1_u:12071: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe netrāñjanādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptasaptatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12078: tāmbūlaṃ yasya dīyeta sa vaśī syātsumantrataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12081: cūrṇokṛtya yasya śire dīyate sa vaśī bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:12083: vaibhī takaṃ śākhoṭakaṃ mūlaṃ patreṇa saṃyutam /
GP12garup1_u:12084: sthāpyate yadgṛhadvāre tatra vai kalaho bhavet // GarP_1,178.4 //
GP12garup1_u:12085: khañjarīṭasya māṃsaṃ tu madhunā saha peṣayet /
GP12garup1_u:12088: guḍena dhūpayitvā tu rājadvāre priyo bhavet // GarP_1,178.6 //
GP12garup1_u:12097: oṃ rudraṃ hrāṃ hrīṃ varaśaktā tvaritāvidyā /
GP12garup1_u:12101: oṃ namaḥ sarvasattvebhyo namaḥ siddhiṃ kuru kuru svāhā /
GP12garup1_u:12103: strīṇāmagre bhrāmayacca kṣaṇādvai sā vaśe bhavet // GarP_1,178.11 //
GP12garup1_u:12104: brahmadaṇḍīṃ vacāṃ patraṃ madhunā saha peṣayet /
GP12garup1_u:12107: mūlaṃ jayantyā vaktrasthaṃ vyavahāre jayapradam // GarP_1,178.13 //
GP12garup1_u:12108: bhṛṅgarājasya mūlaṃ tu piṣṭaṃ śukreṇa saṃyutam /
GP12garup1_u:12109: akṣiṇī cāñjayitvā tu vaśī karyānnaraṃ kila // GarP_1,178.14 //
GP12garup1_u:12112: aṅguṣṭhe ca pade gulphe jānau ca jaghane tathā /
GP12garup1_u:12113: nābhau vakṣasi kukṣau ca kakṣe kaṇṭhe kapolake // GarP_1,178.16 //
GP12garup1_u:12114: oṣṭhe netre lalāṭe ca mūrdhni candrakalāḥ sthitāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12115: strīṇāṃ pakṣe site kṛṣṇe ūrdhvādhaḥ saṃsthitā nṛṇām // GarP_1,178.17 //
GP12garup1_u:12117: catuḥ ṣaṣṭi kalāḥ proktāḥ kāmaśāstre vaśīkarāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12121: oṃ hrīṃ gauri devi saubhāgyaṃ putravaśādi dehi me /
GP12garup1_u:12122: oṃ hrīṃ lakṣmi ! devi saubhāgyaṃ sarvaṃ trailokyamohanam // GarP_1,178.20 //
GP12garup1_u:12135: tatpītvā labhate garbhaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,178.26 //
GP12garup1_u:12139: palāśasya tu bījāni kṣaudreṇa saha peṣayet /
GP12garup1_u:12141: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe hyaṣṭasaptatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12148: dantāḥ syurlohitāḥ puṃsaḥ śvetā rudra na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,179.2 //
GP12garup1_u:12149: mūlakaṃ svidya mandāgnau rasaṃ tasya prapūrayet /
GP12garup1_u:12155: pacettailaṃ tathā strīṇāṃ naśyetkledaḥ prapūraṇāt // GarP_1,179.5 //
GP12garup1_u:12157: satapuṣpāvacā kuṣṭhaṃ dāru śigra rasāñjanam // GarP_1,179.6 //
GP12garup1_u:12159: tathā granthirviḍaṃ mustaṃ madhuyuktaṃ caturguṇam // GarP_1,179.7 //
GP12garup1_u:12161: pakvatailaṃ haredāśu strāvādīṃśca na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,179.8 //
GP12garup1_u:12163: haridrā nimbapatrāṇi pippalyo maricāni ca // GarP_1,179.9 //
GP12garup1_u:12165: gomūtreṇa ca piṣṭvaiva kṛtvā ca vaṭikāṃ hara ! /
GP12garup1_u:12168: eṣā ca śaṅkarī vartiḥ sarvanetrāmayā pahā // GarP_1,179.11 //
GP12garup1_u:12169: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ekonāśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12173: vacā māṃsī ca bilvañca tagaraṃ padmakesaram /
GP12garup1_u:12180: āliptā strī vaśaṃ yāti nānyaṃ puruṣamicchati // GarP_1,180.3 //
GP12garup1_u:12181: oṃ raktacāmuṇḍe amukaṃ me vaśamānaya ānaya oṃ hrīṃ hraiṃ hraḥ phaṭ /
GP12garup1_u:12182: imaṃ japtvāyutaṃ mantraṃ tilakena ca śaṅkara ! /
GP12garup1_u:12185: madhu sarpiḥ sitāyuktaṃ strīṇāṃ tadbhagalepanāt // GarP_1,180.5 //
GP12garup1_u:12187: śaṅkapuṣpī vacā māṃsī soma rājī ca phalgukam // GarP_1,180.6 //
GP12garup1_u:12189: samūlāni sa patrāṇi kṣīreṇājyena peṣayet // GarP_1,180.7 //
GP12garup1_u:12191: daśavāraṃ prasūtāpi punaḥ kanyā bhaviṣyati // GarP_1,180.8 //
GP12garup1_u:12192: sarṣapāśca vacā caiva madanasya phalāni ca /
GP12garup1_u:12199: tena lepanato yonau bhagastambhastu jāyate // GarP_1,180.12 //
GP12garup1_u:12200: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe aśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12205: tathā payaḥ samāyuktaṃ cakṣuḥ śūlaharaṃ param // GarP_1,181.1 //
GP12garup1_u:12206: harītakī vacā kuṣṭhaṃ vyoṣaṃ hiṅgu manaḥ śilā /
GP12garup1_u:12207: kāse śvāse ca hikkāyāṃ lihyātkṣaudraṃ ghṛplutam // GarP_1,181.2 //
GP12garup1_u:12209: naśyate pīnasaḥ kāsaḥ śvāsaśca balavattaraḥ // GarP_1,181.3 //
GP12garup1_u:12211: śvāsaṃ kāsañca hikkāñca madhumiśraṃ vṛṣadhvaja ! // GarP_1,181.4 //
GP12garup1_u:12212: nīlotpalaṃ śarkarā ca madhukaṃ padmakaṃ samam /
GP12garup1_u:12214: śuṇṭhī ca śarkarā caiva tathā kṣaudreṇa saṃyutā /
GP12garup1_u:12220: sudhā ca haritālañca śaṅkhabhasma manaḥ śilā /
GP12garup1_u:12223: śaṅkhamāmalakaṃ patraṃ dhātakyāḥ kusumāni ca // GarP_1,181.10 //
GP12garup1_u:12225: snigdhāḥ śvetāśca dantāśca bhavanti vimalaprabhāḥ // GarP_1,181.11 //
GP12garup1_u:12226: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ekāśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12231: hemante śiśire caiva varṣāsu dadhi śasyate // GarP_1,182.1 //
GP12garup1_u:12232: bhukte tu śarkarā pītā navanītena buddhikṛt /
GP12garup1_u:12239: kandarpasadṛśo martyo nityaṃ bhavati śaṅkara ! // GarP_1,182.4 //
GP12garup1_u:12241: ebhiśca racitāṃ jagdhvā taruṇo balavānbhavet // GarP_1,182.5 //
GP12garup1_u:12242: hiṅgu sauvarcalaṃ śuṇṭhīṃ pītvā tu kvathitodakaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12245: durbalaśca bhavetsthūlo nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,182.7 //
GP12garup1_u:12247: kṣīrāśī ca kṣayī puṣṭiṃ medhāñcaivātulāṃ vrajet // GarP_1,182.8 //
GP12garup1_u:12250: manaḥ śilā śaṅkhacūrṇaṃ tailapakvaṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12garup1_u:12251: lomāni śātayatyeva nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,182.10 //
GP12garup1_u:12252: mālūrasya rasaṃ gṛhya jalaukāṃ tatra peṣayet /
GP12garup1_u:12259: muṇḍītvakca vacā mustaṃ maricaṃ tagaraṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:12260: carvitvā ca tvimaṃ sadyo jihvayā jvalanaṃ lihet // GarP_1,182.14 //
GP12garup1_u:12264: oṃ namo bhagavate jalaṃ stambhaya saṃ saṃ saṃ keka kekaḥ caracara /
GP12garup1_u:12267: areryo nikhaneddvāre pañcatvamu payāti saḥ // GarP_1,182.17 //
GP12garup1_u:12270: puṣpeṇa tu samaṃ piṣṭvā rocanāyāḥ palaikataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12271: striyā puṃsā kṛto rudra ! tilako 'yaṃ vaśīkaraḥ // GarP_1,182.19 //
GP12garup1_u:12272: brahmadaṇḍī tu puṣyeṇa bhakṣye pāne vaśīkaraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12273: yaṣṭi madhu palaikena pakvamuṣṇodakaṃ pibet // GarP_1,182.20 //
GP12garup1_u:12276: mantro 'yaṃ harate rudra ! sarvavṛścikajaṃ viṣam // GarP_1,182.21 //
GP12garup1_u:12278: maricaṃ dadhi kuṣṭhañca nasye pāne viṣaṃ haret // GarP_1,182.22 //
GP12garup1_u:12284: vṛścikasya viṣaṃ hanti lepo 'yaṃ vṛṣabhadhvaja ! // GarP_1,182.25 //
GP12garup1_u:12286: nāśayedrudra ! gulmāni niruddhaṃ raktameva ca // GarP_1,182.26 //
GP12garup1_u:12289: sukhaṃ prasūyate nārī nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,182.27 //
GP12garup1_u:12292: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe dvyāśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12299: devadārurasaṃ pāṭhāṃ kṣīreṇa saha peṣayet // GarP_1,183.2 //
GP12garup1_u:12303: virecanakarī rudra ! bhavatīti na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,183.4 //
GP12garup1_u:12308: ūrustambhaṃ jayantyā vā saptarātreṇa nāśayet // GarP_1,183.6 //
GP12garup1_u:12311: vāyuḥ snāyugataṃ caiva agnimāndyaṃ ca nāśayet // GarP_1,183.7 //
GP12garup1_u:12315: raktapittaṃ vinaśyettu nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,183.9 //
GP12garup1_u:12321: śrotre baddhvā śaṅkhapuṣpīṃ jvaraṃ mantreṇa vai haret /
GP12garup1_u:12322: oṃ jambhinī stambhinī mohaya sarvavyādhīnme vajreṇa ṭhaḥ ṭhaḥ sarvavyādhīnme vajreṇa phaṭ iti // GarP_1,183.12 //
GP12garup1_u:12323: puṣpamaṣṭaśataṃ japtvā haste dattvā nakhaṃ spṛśet /
GP12garup1_u:12324: cāturthiko jvaro rudra anye caiva jvarāstathā // GarP_1,183.13 //
GP12garup1_u:12325: jmbūphalaṃ haridrā ca sarpasyaiva tu kañcukam /
GP12garup1_u:12329: pāmāṃ vicarcikāṃ kuṣṭhamabhyaṅgāddhi vraṇāni vai // GarP_1,183.15 //
GP12garup1_u:12331: plīhā vinaśyate rudra tathā sūraṇasevanāt // GarP_1,183.16 //
GP12garup1_u:12335: saindhavañca viḍaṅgāni somarājī tu sarṣapāḥ // GarP_1,183.18 //
GP12garup1_u:12338: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe tryaśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12346: pānādarśoharaṃ syācca nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,184.2 //
GP12garup1_u:12348: cūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tu lepo 'yaṃ arśarogaharaḥ paraḥ // GarP_1,184.3 //
GP12garup1_u:12353: citāgniḥ khañjarīṭasya viṣṭhā pheno hayasya ca /
GP12garup1_u:12355: adṛśyastridaśaiḥ sarvaiḥ kiṃ punarmānavaiḥ śiva // GarP_1,184.6 //
GP12garup1_u:12356: tilatailaṃ yavāndagdhvā maṣīṃ kṛtvā tu lepayet /
GP12garup1_u:12357: tenaiva saha tailena agnidagdhaḥ sukhī bhavet // GarP_1,184.7 //
GP12garup1_u:12359: oṃ namo bhagavate ṭha ṭha chindhi chindhi jvalanaṃ prajvalitaṃ nāśaya nāśaya huṃ phaṭ // GarP_1,184.8 //
GP12garup1_u:12360: kare baddhaṃ tu nirguṇḍyā mūlaṃ jvaraharaṃ drutam /
GP12garup1_u:12362: haste badhvā nāśayecca arśāṃsyeva na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12365: triphalāyāstu cūrṇaṃ hi sājyaṃ kuṣṭhavināśanam // GarP_1,184.11 //
GP12garup1_u:12367: hareddhakkāṃ śvāsakāsau pītaṃ strīṇāñca garbhakṛt // GarP_1,184.12 //
GP12garup1_u:12370: viḍaṅgaṃ madhukaṃ pāṭhāṃ māṃsīṃ sarjarasaṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:12371: rahidrāṃ triphalāñcaiva mapāmārgaṃ manaḥ śilām // GarP_1,184.14 //
GP12garup1_u:12373: yoniṃ liṅgaṃ ca mrakṣeta strīpusoḥ syātpriyaṃ mithaḥ // GarP_1,184.15 //
GP12garup1_u:12374: namaste īśavaradāya ākarṣiṇi vikarṣiṇi mugdhe svāhā iti /
GP12garup1_u:12377: bīje naiṣāṃ jātikāyā rasena rasamardanam // GarP_1,184.17 //
GP12garup1_u:12383: lāṅgalikāyāḥ śākhā ca svarṇañca dahanādbhavet // GarP_1,184.20 //
GP12garup1_u:12388: vismayaṃ kurute caiva vṛṣavannātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,184.22 //
GP12garup1_u:12389: rātrau ca sārṣapaṃ tailaṃ kīṭaṃ khadyo tanāmakam /
GP12garup1_u:12395: yuddhe vijayate so 'pi mahāśūraśca jāyate // GarP_1,184.25 //
GP12garup1_u:12396: dantaṃ ḍuṇḍubhasarpasya mukhe saṃgṛhya vai kṣipet /
GP12garup1_u:12397: tiṣṭhate ca jalāntastu nirvikalpaṃ sthale yathā // GarP_1,184.26 //
GP12garup1_u:12408: satakraṃ kuśamalaṃ vā markaṭī mūlameva vā /
GP12garup1_u:12409: kāñjikena ca vākucyā mūlaṃ vai dantaroganut // GarP_1,184.31 //
GP12garup1_u:12413: balā cātibalā yaṣṭī śarkarā madhusaṃyutā // GarP_1,184.33 //
GP12garup1_u:12419: takreṇa śarapuṅkhāṃ vā pītvā plīhāṃ vināśayet // GarP_1,184.36 //
GP12garup1_u:12422: śuṇṭhī sauvarcalaṃ hiṅgu pītaṃ hṛdayaroganut // GarP_1,184.37 //
GP12garup1_u:12423: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vaidyaśāstre caturaśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12427: āṃ gaṇapataye iti ayaṃ gaṇapaternmantro dhanavidyāpradāyakaḥ // GarP_1,185.1 //
GP12garup1_u:12429: vyavahāre jayaḥ syācca śataṃ jāpānnṛṇāṃ priyaḥ // GarP_1,185.2 //
GP12garup1_u:12430: tilānāṃ tu ghṛtāktānāṃ kṛṣṇānāṃ rudra homayet /
GP12garup1_u:12434: apājitaḥ syādyuddhe ca sarve tañca siṣevire // GarP_1,185.4 //
GP12garup1_u:12436: śikhāṃ baddhvā rājakule vyavahāre jayo bhavet // GarP_1,185.5 //
GP12garup1_u:12437: hrīṅkāraṃ savisargañca prātaḥ kāle narastu yaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12438: strīṇāṃ lalāṭe vinyasya vaśatāṃ nayati dhruvam // GarP_1,185.6 //
GP12garup1_u:12440: sotkāmāṃ kāminīṃ kuryānnātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,185.7 //
GP12garup1_u:12442: dṛṣṭimātre sadā tasya vaśyamāyānti yoṣitaḥ // GarP_1,185.8 //
GP12garup1_u:12444: kṛta ebhiśca tilake vaśyamāyānti yoṣitaḥ // GarP_1,185.9 //
GP12garup1_u:12446: tenaiva tilakaṃ kṛtvā trailokyaṃ vaśatāṃ nayet // GarP_1,185.10 //
GP12garup1_u:12449: sa karoti vaśe sarvaṃ trailokyaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,185.11 //
GP12garup1_u:12451: etairvaitilakaṃ kṛtvā sā naraṃ yaṃ nirīkṣate /
GP12garup1_u:12452: tatkṣaṇāttaṃ vaśe kuryā nnātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,185.12 //
GP12garup1_u:12457: nijaśukraṃ gṛhī tvā tu vāmahastena yaḥ pumān /
GP12garup1_u:12458: kāminīcaraṇaṃ vāmaṃ liṃpetsa syātstriyāḥ priyaḥ // GarP_1,185.15 //
GP12garup1_u:12460: ebhirlipte tu liṅge vai kāminīvaśakṛdbhavet // GarP_1,185.16 //
GP12garup1_u:12461: puṣpāṇi pañcaraktāni gṛhītvā yāni kāni ca /
GP12garup1_u:12465: śvetasaṣarpa etaiśca liptaliṅgaḥ striyāḥ priyaḥ // GarP_1,185.18 //
GP12garup1_u:12475: ebhistu kvathitaṃ vāri pītaṃ vai sarvaśūlanut // GarP_1,185.22 //
GP12garup1_u:12479: pītaḥ satakro 'tīsāraṃ kṣayaṃ nayati śaṅkara // GarP_1,185.24 //
GP12garup1_u:12489: pītaṃ sarvañca mehantu kṣayaṃ nayati śaṅkara // GarP_1,185.28 //
GP12garup1_u:12491: manaḥ śilāmarīcānāṃ sindūrasya palaṃ palam // GarP_1,185.29 //
GP12garup1_u:12493: pītaṃ snuhīgataṃ dugdhaṃ saindhavaṃ śūlanudbhavet // GarP_1,185.30 //
GP12garup1_u:12497: ebhiśca vartikāṃ kṛtvā tvakṣiṇī cāñjayettataḥ // GarP_1,185.32 //
GP12garup1_u:12499: vibhītakasya vai cūrṇaṃ samadhu śvāsanāśanam // GarP_1,185.33 //
GP12garup1_u:12508: carvitvā dantakīṭānāṃ vināśo hi bhaveddhara // GarP_1,185.37 //
GP12garup1_u:12509: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe mantratantravaidyaprayodṛpañcāśītyadhiśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12513: pītaḥ sāro guḍūcyāśca madhunā ca pramehanut /
GP12garup1_u:12516: tathā hikkāṃ haretpītaṃ sauvarcalayutañca vai // GarP_1,186.2 //
GP12garup1_u:12528: dantīmūlaṃ haridrā ca citrakaṃ tasya lepanāt /
GP12garup1_u:12532: tato na prastravedraktaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,186.9 //
GP12garup1_u:12535: ghoṣāphalaṃ saindhavañca piṣṭvā cārśoharaṃ param // GarP_1,186.10 //
GP12garup1_u:12538: bilvasya ca phalaṃ dagdhaṃ raktārśaḥ pravināśanam /
GP12garup1_u:12542: śuṇṭhyā ca kvathitaṃ vāri pītaṃ cāgniṃ karoti vai /

GP12garup1_u:12545: sājyaṃ sūkaramāṃsaṃ vai pītaṃ cātikṣudhākaram // GarP_1,186.15 //
GP12garup1_u:12546: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ṣaḍaśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12557: tajjagdhaṃ madhunā sārdhaṃ daśavarṣa sahasriṇam // GarP_1,187.4 //
GP12garup1_u:12559: dadhnā nityaṃ bhakṣitantu vajradehakaraṃ bhavet // GarP_1,187.5 //

GP12garup1_u:12564: andhaḥ paśyettu cūrṇasya sājyasyaiva tu bhakṣaṇāt /
GP12garup1_u:12566: khalvāṭasya ca vai keśā bhavanti vṛṣabhadhvaja /
GP12garup1_u:12570: palāśasya ca bījāni śrāvaṇe vituṣāṇi ca /

GP12garup1_u:12572: karṣārdhamekaṃ seveta natvā nityaṃ hariṃ prabhum /
GP12garup1_u:12575: bhṛṅgarājasya vai mūlaṃ puṣyarkṣe tu samāhṛtam /
GP12garup1_u:12576: vidhāya tasya cūrṇaṃ vai sasauvīrañca bhakṣayetaṃ // GarP_1,187.13 //
GP12garup1_u:12578: śatāni pañca jīvecca naro nāgabalo bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:12579: bhavecchrutidharo rudra puṣyarkṣe caiva bhakṣaṇāt // GarP_1,187.14 //
GP12garup1_u:12580: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe āyuṣkarayogodṛsaptāśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12586: tadrasena prahārasya raktastrāvo na pūraṇāt // GarP_1,188.1 //
GP12garup1_u:12588: tena vraṇamukhaṃ liptaṃ śalyaṃ niḥ sa rati vraṇāt /

GP12garup1_u:12593: hiṅgumūlasya vai cūrṇaṃ dattaṃ nāḍīvraṇāpaham // GarP_1,188.4 //
GP12garup1_u:12595: tena ghṛṣṭaṃ raktadoṣaḥ praṇaśyati na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,188.5 //
GP12garup1_u:12605: bhujaṅgacarma vai hiṅgu nimbapatraṃ tathā yavāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12606: gaurasarṣama ebhiḥ syāllepo bhūtaharaḥ śiva // GarP_1,188.10 //
GP12garup1_u:12611: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vraṇāci dṛmāṣṭāśītyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12616: paṭalaṃ nāśamāyāti nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,189.1 //
GP12garup1_u:12620: śvetārkasya tu vai mūlaṃ tasyāstadgulmaśūlanut // GarP_1,189.3 //

GP12garup1_u:12630: sārdhaṃ sa vairaṃ saṃyāti pumānstrī vā na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,189.8 //
GP12garup1_u:12632: sarvaṃ viṣaṃ vinaśyecca nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,189.9 //
GP12garup1_u:12637: trisaptāhena vai pītaṃ kṣayarogaṃ kṣayaṃ nayet // GarP_1,189.11 //
GP12garup1_u:12643: mukhe tu nihitaṃ rudra harennānāviṣaṃ bahu // GarP_1,189.14 //
GP12garup1_u:12644: haste baddhaṃ kāṇḍayuktaṃ kaṇṭhe baddhaṃ grahādihṛt /

GP12garup1_u:12649: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ekonanavatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12654: pītañcāśu haratyeva gaṇḍamālāṃ na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,190.1 //
GP12garup1_u:12663: niḥ kṣipyate samutpāṭya tasya plīhā vinaśyati // GarP_1,190.5 //
GP12garup1_u:12665: pītaṃ vidradhinutsyācca nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,190.6 //
GP12garup1_u:12671: pratyūṣe bhakṣayeccaiva tasya kuṣṭhaṃ vinaśyati // GarP_1,190.9 //
GP12garup1_u:12676: somarājasya bījānāṃ jagdhaṃ pathyena dadrunut // GarP_1,190.11 //
GP12garup1_u:12680: ayaṃ lepo hanti dadruṃ pāmānaṃ ca garaṃ tathā // GarP_1,190.13 //
GP12garup1_u:12683: takrānnapānato rudra nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,190.14 //
GP12garup1_u:12690: mūlakasya tu bījāni hyapā mārgarasena vai /
GP12garup1_u:12691: piṣṭāni tena lepena sidhmakaṃ rudra naśyati // GarP_1,190.18 //
GP12garup1_u:12696: jalapiṣṭā haridrā ca siddhā mandānalenahi // GarP_1,190.20 //
GP12garup1_u:12703: salodhrāṇi ca tallepo dehadurgandhatāṃ haret // GarP_1,190.23 //
GP12garup1_u:12708: madhuyaṣṭī śarkarā ca vāsakasya raso madhu /
GP12garup1_u:12711: prātaḥ kāle toyapānātpīnasaṃ dāruṇaṃ haret // GarP_1,190.27 //
GP12garup1_u:12712: bibhītakasya vai cūrṇaṃ pippalyāḥ saindhavasya ca /
GP12garup1_u:12713: pītaṃ sakāñjikaṃ hanti svarabhedaṃ maheśvara // GarP_1,190.28 //
GP12garup1_u:12715: manaḥ śilā balāmūlaṃ kolapaṇa ca gugguluḥ // GarP_1,190.29 //
GP12garup1_u:12716: jātipatraṃ kolapatraṃ tathā caiva manaḥ śilā /
GP12garup1_u:12718: dhūmapānaṃ kāsaharaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,190.30 //
GP12garup1_u:12720: bhojanādau hi samadhu pipāsājva(tva)ritaṃ haret // GarP_1,190.31 //
GP12garup1_u:12724: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe navatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:12729: vāri pītaṃ tasya pārśva bhavaneṣu na pannagāḥ // GarP_1,191.1 //

GP12garup1_u:12776: ghṛtaṃ kumārīpatraṃ vai dattaṃ salavaṇaṃ hara /

GP12garup1_u:12936: pradyumnaḥ pātu me ghrāṇamaniruddhastu carma ca /

GP12garup1_u:12940: udaraṃ musalaṃ pātu pṛṣṭhaṃ me pātu lāṅgalam /

GP12garup1_u:12943: sarvakāryārthasiddhyarthaṃ pātu māṃ garuḍaḥ sadā // GarP_1,194.9 //
GP12garup1_u:12944: varāho rakṣatu jale viṣameṣu ca vāmanaḥ /

GP12garup1_u:12947: sāṃkhyācāryastu kapilo dhātusāmyaṃ karotu me // GarP_1,194.11 //

GP12garup1_u:12953: tathā nārāyaṇo devo buddhiṃ pālayatāṃ mama // GarP_1,194.14 //
GP12garup1_u:12955: vaḍavāmukho nāśayatāṃ kalmaṣaṃ yatkṛtaṃ mayā // GarP_1,194.15 //
GP12garup1_u:12956: padbhyāṃ dadātu paramaṃ sukhaṃ mūrdhni mama prabhuḥ /
GP12garup1_u:12959: rakṣoghnastu daśarathiḥ pātu nityaṃ mahābhujaḥ // GarP_1,194.17 //
GP12garup1_u:12962: kṛṣṇasya yo bālabhāvaḥ sa me kāmānprayacchatu // GarP_1,194.18 //
GP12garup1_u:12966: dhanyo 'haṃ nirbhayo nityaṃ yasya me bhagavānhariḥ // GarP_1,194.20 //
GP12garup1_u:12968: vaiṣṇavaṃ kavacaṃ baddhvā vicarāmi mahītale // GarP_1,194.21 //

GP12garup1_u:12975: te hi cchindantu pāpānme mama hiṃsantu hiṃsakān // GarP_1,194.24 //
GP12garup1_u:12977: vivāde rājamārgeṣu dyūteṣu kalaheṣu ca // GarP_1,194.25 //
GP12garup1_u:12982: ayaṃ bhagavato mantro mantrāṇāṃ paramo mahān /
GP12garup1_u:12986: oṃ kālāya svāhā / oṃ kālapuruṣāya svāhā / oṃ kṛṣṇāya svāhā /
GP12garup1_u:12987: oṃ kṛṣṇarūpāya svāhā / oṃ caṇḍāya svāhā / oṃ caṇḍarūpāya svāhā /
GP12garup1_u:12988: oṃ pracaṇḍāya svāhā / oṃ pracaṇarūpāya svāhā / oṃ sarvāya svāhā /
GP12garup1_u:12989_0: oṃ sarvarūpāya svāhā / oṃ namo bhuvaneśāya trilokadhātre iha viṭi siviṭi siviṭi svāhā /
GP12garup1_u:12989_1: oṃ namaḥ ayokhetaye ye ye saṃjñāpaya daityadānavayakṣarākṣasabhūtapiśācakūṣmāṇḍāntāpasmārakacchardanaduddharrāṇāmekāhikadvyāhikatryāhikacāturthikamauhūrtikadinajvararātrijvarasandhyājvarasarvajvarādīnāṃ
GP12garup1_u:12989_3: kuru sphuṭa sphuṭa sphuṭa prakoṭa laphaṭa vikaṭadaṃṣṭra pūrvato rakṣatu oṃ hai hai
GP12garup1_u:12989_4: hai hai dinakarasahasrakālasamāhato jaya paścimato rakṣa oṃ nivi nivi pradīptajvalanajvālākāra
GP12garup1_u:12989_5: mahākapila uttarato rakṣa oṃ vili vili mili mili garuḍi garuḍi gaurīgāndhārīviṣamohaviṣamaviṣamāṃ
GP12garup1_u:12989_6: mahohayatu svāhā dakṣiṇato rakṣa māṃ paśya sarvabhūtabhayopadravebhyo rakṣa rakṣa
GP12garup1_u:12989_7: jaya jaya vijaya tena hīyate riputrāsāhaṅkṛtavādyato bhayanudabhayato 'bhayaṃ diśatucyutaṃ /
GP12garup1_u:12993: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vaiṣṇavakavacakathanaṃ nāma caturnavatyuttaraśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13002: tvadrūpāṇi ca sarvāṇi tasmāttubhyaṃ namo namaḥ // GarP_1,195.3 //
GP12garup1_u:13005: mṛnmayīṃ vahasi kṣoṇīṃ tasmai te brahmaṇe namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13011: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākye ācārakāṇḍe pañcanavatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13022: nyaseddhṛdaya oṅkāraṃ manuṃ mūrdhni samastakam // GarP_1,196.4 //
GP12garup1_u:13024: oṃ viṣṇave iti imaṃ mantranyāsamudīrayet // GarP_1,196.5 //
GP12garup1_u:13028: aṭavyāṃ narasiṃhastu rāmo rakṣatu parvate // GarP_1,196.7 //
GP12garup1_u:13030: karmabandhācca kapilo datto rogācca rakṣatu // GarP_1,196.8 //
GP12garup1_u:13032: nārado 'nyārcanāddevaḥ kūrmo vai nairṛte sadā // GarP_1,196.9 //
GP12garup1_u:13037: madhuhā cāparāhne ca sāyaṃ rakṣatu mādhavaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13041: śaṅkhaḥ padmaṃ ca śatrubhyaḥ śārṅgaṃ vai garuḍastathā /
GP12garup1_u:13043: śeṣaḥ sarpasvarūpaśca sadā sarvatra pātu mām /
GP12garup1_u:13044: vidikṣu dikṣu ca sadā nārasiṃhaśca rakṣatu // GarP_1,196.15 //
GP12garup1_u:13046: sa vaśī syādvipāpmā ca rogamukto divaṃ vrajet // GarP_1,196.16 //
GP12garup1_u:13047: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ṣaṇṇavatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13054: kṣityādiṣveva vargāśca hyete vai maṇḍalādhipāḥ // GarP_1,197.2 //
GP12garup1_u:13057: saṣaḍaṅgaḥ śivaḥ prokto hṛcchiraśca śikhā kramāt /
GP12garup1_u:13063: hṛdi pāṇitale dehe karṇe netre karoti ca /
GP12garup1_u:13074: karkoṭaḥ padmanābhaśca vāruṇe tau vyavasthitau // GarP_1,197.12 //
GP12garup1_u:13076: vāyumaṇḍalasaṃsthau ca pañca bhūtāni vinyaset // GarP_1,197.13 //
GP12garup1_u:13078: parvasandhiṣu ca nyasyā jayā ca vijayā tathā // GarP_1,197.14 //
GP12garup1_u:13080: kaniṣṭhādau hṛdādau ca śikhāyāṃ karayornyaset // GarP_1,197.15 //
GP12garup1_u:13082: bhūtānāñca punarnyāsaḥ śivāṅgāni tathaiva ca // GarP_1,197.16 //
GP12garup1_u:13089: karanyāsaṃ svaraiḥ kṛtvā śarīre tu punarnyaset /
GP12garup1_u:13092: evañcāpyāyanaṃ kṛtvā mūrdhni sañcintya cātmanaḥ // GarP_1,197.21 //
GP12garup1_u:13095: etāṃ bhagavatīṃ pṛthvīṃ svadehe vinyased budhaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13098: nābhigrīvāntare nyasya trikoṇaṃ maṇḍalaṃ raveḥ // GarP_1,197.24 //
GP12garup1_u:13104: lakārāntā binduyutā mantrā bhūtakrameṇa tu // GarP_1,197.27 //
GP12garup1_u:13109: tārkṣyaṃ dhyāyettato nityaṃ viṣe sthāvarajaṅgame // GarP_1,197.29 //
GP12garup1_u:13112: dvidhā nyāsaḥ samākhyāto nāgānāṃ caiva bhūtayoḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13113: evaṃ dhyātvā karma kuryādātmatattvādikaṃ kramāt // GarP_1,197.31 //
GP12garup1_u:13114: tritattvaṃ pratham dattvā sivatattvaṃ tataḥ param /
GP12garup1_u:13115: yathā dehe tathā deve aṅgulīnāṃ ca parvasu // GarP_1,197.32 //
GP12garup1_u:13117: kandaṃ nālaṃ tathā padmaṃ dharmaṃ jñānādimeva ca // GarP_1,197.33 //
GP12garup1_u:13119: śaumiti karṇikāmadhye mūrdhni repheṇa saṃyutam // GarP_1,197.34 //
GP12garup1_u:13121: patrāntakesarānte tu dvau dvau pūrvādikau tathā // GarP_1,197.35 //
GP12garup1_u:13123: vāmādyāḥ śaktayaḥ proktāstritattvantu tato nyaset // GarP_1,197.36 //
GP12garup1_u:13125: karṇikāyāṃ nyaseddevaṃ sāṃgaṃ tatra puraḥ saram // GarP_1,197.37 //
GP12garup1_u:13127: tejastu dakṣiṇe patre vāyuṃ pūrveṇa pūjayet // GarP_1,197.38 //
GP12garup1_u:13130: vaṃ ca tvīśe sadā pūjya oṃ hṛdisthañca pūjayet /
GP12garup1_u:13133: āgneyyāṃ hṛdayaṃ pūjya śira īśānagocare // GarP_1,197.41 //
GP12garup1_u:13134: nairṛtye tu śikhāṃ dadyādvāyavyāṃ kavacaṃ nyaset /
GP12garup1_u:13139: pūjayecca sadā mantrī vidhānena pṛthakpṛthak // GarP_1,197.44 //
GP12garup1_u:13149: pādau pātālaṃ saṃsthau ca diśaḥ pakṣāstu saṃśritāḥ // GarP_1,197.49 //
GP12garup1_u:13150: sapta svargā urasi ca brahmāṇḍaṃ kaṇṭhamāśritam /
GP12garup1_u:13155: grasanaṃ bhīmavaktraṃ ca garuḍaṃ mantravigraham // GarP_1,197.52 //
GP12garup1_u:13157: evaṃ nyāsavidhiṃ kṛtvā yadyanmanasi cintayet // GarP_1,197.53 //
GP12garup1_u:13162: evaṃ sa garuḍaṃ proce garuḍaḥ kaśyapāya ca /
GP12garup1_u:13163: maheśvaro yathā gaurīṃ prāha vidyāṃ tathā śṛṇu // GarP_1,197.55 //
GP12garup1_u:13164: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe saptanavatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13169: oṃ hrīṃ āgaccha devi aiṃ hrīṃ hrīṃ rekhākāraṇam /
GP12garup1_u:13170: oṃ hrīṃ kledinī bhaṃ namaḥ madanakṣobhiṇā tathā /
GP12garup1_u:13171: ai yaṃ yaṃ krīṃ vā guṇarekhayā hrīṃ madanāntare ca /
GP12garup1_u:13172: aiṃ hrīṃ hrīṃ ca nirañjanā vāgati madanāntarekhe khanetrāvalīti ca /
GP12garup1_u:13174: oṃ hrīṃ kraiṃ naiṃ kraiṃ nityaṃ madadrave krīṃ namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13176: oṃ hrīṃ krīṃ paścimavaktraṃ oṃ aiṃ hrīṃ hrīṃ ca tathottaram /
GP12garup1_u:13178: oṃ hrīṃ pāśāya krīṃ aṅkuśāya aiṃ kapālāya namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13179: ādyaṃ bhayaṃ aiṃ hrīṃ ca tathā śiraḥ tathā śikhāyai kavace /
GP12garup1_u:13181: pūrve kāmarūpāya asitāṅgāya bhairavāya namo brahmāṇyai /
GP12garup1_u:13182: dakṣiṇe cai kandāya vai namaḥ rurubhaivāya māheśvaryā vā āvāhayet // GarP_1,198.2 //
GP12garup1_u:13184: kaumāryai cottare colkāya krodhāya namaḥ vaiṣṇavyai // GarP_1,198.3 //
GP12garup1_u:13186: rakṣaḥ koṇe sārāya kapāline bhairavāya māherndyai // GarP_1,198.4 //
GP12garup1_u:13192: jvālāmukhīkramaṃ vakṣye sā pūjyā madhyataḥ śubhā // GarP_1,198.7 //
GP12garup1_u:13194: mahendrāṇī ca kalanākarṣiṇī bhāratī tathā // GarP_1,198.8 //
GP12garup1_u:13195: brahmāṇī caiva māheśī kaumārī vaiṣṇavī tathā /
GP12garup1_u:13196: vārāhī caiva māhendrī cāmuṇḍā cāparājitā // GarP_1,198.9 //
GP12garup1_u:13200: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe aṣṭanavatyadhikaśatatamodhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13205: sūryaṃ devīṃ gaṇaṃ soma smṛtvā tu vilikhennaraḥ // GarP_1,199.1 //
GP12garup1_u:13208: dhvajo dhūmo 'tha siṃhaśca śvā vṛṣaḥ kharadantinau /
GP12garup1_u:13209: dhvāṅkṣaśca aṣṭamo jñeyo nāma mantraiśca tānnyaset // GarP_1,199.3 //
GP12garup1_u:13211: dhvajasthāne sthito dhūmro dhātucintā ca lābhakṛt // GarP_1,199.4 //
GP12garup1_u:13214: dhvajasthāne vṛṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā sthānacintā ca lābhakam /
GP12garup1_u:13215: dhvajasthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā duḥ khakleśādikaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,199.6 //
GP12garup1_u:13217: dhvajasthāne tathā dhvāṅkṣe kleśacintā dhanakṣayaḥ // GarP_1,199.7 //
GP12garup1_u:13218: dhūmrasthāne dhvajaṃ dṛṣṭvā pūrvaṃ duḥ khaṃ tato dhanam /
GP12garup1_u:13219: dhūmre dhūmraṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā kaliduḥ khādikaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,199.8 //
GP12garup1_u:13221: dhūmrasthāne śuni sthite jayalābhādikaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,199.9 //
GP12garup1_u:13223: dhūmrasthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā vyādhiścāpi dhanakṣayaḥ // GarP_1,199.10 //
GP12garup1_u:13231: siṃhasthāne gajaṃ dṛṣṭvā grāmasvāmitvameva ca // GarP_1,199.14 //
GP12garup1_u:13235: śunaḥ sthāne sthite dhūmre kalahaṃ kāryanāśanam // GarP_1,199.16 //
GP12garup1_u:13237: sthite śuni śunaḥ sthāne dhananāśo bhaviṣyati // GarP_1,199.17 //
GP12garup1_u:13238: śunaḥ sthāne vṛṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā rogī rogādvi mucyate /
GP12garup1_u:13239: śunaḥ sthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā kalahasya bhayaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,199.18 //
GP12garup1_u:13241: śvasthāne ca sthite dhvāṅkṣe pīḍāsyātkulanāśanam // GarP_1,199.19 //
GP12garup1_u:13245: sthite śuni vṛṣasthāne balaśrīkāma īritaḥ // GarP_1,199.21 //
GP12garup1_u:13247: vṛṣasthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahālābhādikaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,199.22 //
GP12garup1_u:13251: kharasthāne sthite dhūmre taskarādibhayaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,199.24 //
GP12garup1_u:13255: kharasthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā duḥ khīpīḍādi nirdiśet // GarP_1,199.26 //
GP12garup1_u:13257: kharasthāne sthite dhvāṅkṣe kalaho vyādhireva ca // GarP_1,199.27 //
GP12garup1_u:13261: sthite śuni gajasthāne ārogyaṃ sukhasampadaḥ // GarP_1,199.29 //
GP12garup1_u:13263: gajasthāne kharaṃ dṛṣṭvā pūrvaṃ duḥ khaṃ tataḥ sukham // GarP_1,199.30 //
GP12garup1_u:13267: dhvāṅkṣasthāne sthite dhūmre kaliduḥ khaṃ gamiṣyati // GarP_1,199.32 //
GP12garup1_u:13268: dhvāṅkṣasthāne sthite siṃhe vigraho duḥ khameva ca /
GP12garup1_u:13274: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe navanavatyadhikaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13287: saṃkrāntyaḥ ṣoḍaśaproktā divā rātrau varānane // GarP_1,200.5 //
GP12garup1_u:13293: vāyurvahati tatrasthaḥ praśro bhūtasya śobhanaḥ // GarP_1,200.8 //
GP12garup1_u:13294: māhendre vāruṇe vāte ko 'pi doṣo na jāyate /
GP12garup1_u:13296: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe dviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13303: ekāṇḍaścaiva jātāṇḍaḥ kañcukī dvikhurī stanī // GarP_1,201.2 //
GP12garup1_u:13308: asaṃhatā ye ca vāhā hrasvakarṇāstathaiva ca /
GP12garup1_u:13324: nimbapatraṃ paṭo lañca triphalā khadiraṃ tathā // GarP_1,201.12 //
GP12garup1_u:13327: savraṇeṣu ca kuṣṭheṣu tailaṃ sarṣapajaṃ hitam /
GP12garup1_u:13336: kaṭutailaiḥ kaphe vyoṣaiḥ pitte catriphalāmbubhiḥ // GarP_1,201.18 //
GP12garup1_u:13340: bhojayetpāyasaṃ dugdhaṃ satvaraṃ susthiro hayaḥ // GarP_1,201.20 //
GP12garup1_u:13341: vikāre bhojane dugdhaṃ śālyannaṃ vātale dadet /
GP12garup1_u:13344: bādhirye vyādhite grāse tridoṣādau tu gugguluḥ // GarP_1,201.22 //
GP12garup1_u:13347: pāne ca bhojane caiva aśītipalakaṃ param /
GP12garup1_u:13350: mandāgnau śotharoge ca gavāṃ mūtreṇa yojitam // GarP_1,201.25 //
GP12garup1_u:13352: deyaṃ kṛśānāṃ puṣṭyarthaṃ māṃsairyuktaṃ ca bhojanam // GarP_1,201.26 //
GP12garup1_u:13354: prabhāte ghṛtasaṃyuktaṃ śaradgīṣme ca vājinām // GarP_1,201.27 //
GP12garup1_u:13358: catvāri trīṇi madhyasya jaghanyasya palāni hi // GarP_1,201.29 //
GP12garup1_u:13360: mriyate ca yadā kṣipramupasargaṃ tamādiśet // GarP_1,201.30 //
GP12garup1_u:13364: ādau pañca tataḥ pañca vṛddhyā pūrṇaśatāvadhi /
GP12garup1_u:13365: uttamā ca śataṃ mātrāstvaśītiḥ ṣaṣṭireva vā // GarP_1,201.32 //
GP12garup1_u:13373: baliṃ dadyācca bhūtebhyaḥ snāpayecca caturghaṭaiḥ // GarP_1,201.36 //
GP12garup1_u:13375: bhūtarakṣā śubhā medhyā vāraṇaṃ rakṣayetsadā // GarP_1,201.37 //
GP12garup1_u:13380: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe gajāśvāyurvedanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikādhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13385: sarasaṃ yoniniḥ kṣiptaṃ varāṅgasya vyathāṃ haret /
GP12garup1_u:13390: naśyeta ghṛtapakvā ca kāryāvaśyantu polikā // GarP_1,202.3 //
GP12garup1_u:13396: pāṭhāmūlaṃ rudra pītaṃ piṣṭaṃ taṇḍulavāriṇā // GarP_1,202.6 //
GP12garup1_u:13400: ghṛtatulyā rudra lākṣā pītā kṣīreṇa vai saha // GarP_1,202.8 //
GP12garup1_u:13401: pradaraṃ harate rogaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā /
GP12garup1_u:13402: dvijayaṣṭī trikaṭukaṃ cūrṇaṃ pītaṃ harecchiva // GarP_1,202.9 //
GP12garup1_u:13408: pītantu kāñjika rudra kvathitaṃ śarapuṅkhayā // GarP_1,202.12 //
GP12garup1_u:13410: mātuluṅgasya vai mūlaṃ kaṭibaddhaṃ prasūtikṛt // GarP_1,202.13 //
GP12garup1_u:13412: utpāṭyamāne sakale puttraḥ syādānyathā sutā // GarP_1,202.14 //
GP12garup1_u:13413: apāmārgasya vai mūle nārīṇāṃ śirasi sthite /
GP12garup1_u:13414: garbhaśūlaṃ vinaśyeta nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_1,202.15 //
GP12garup1_u:13416: yoniḥ subhā syādvṛddhāyā yuvatyāḥ kiṃ punarhara // GarP_1,202.16 //
GP12garup1_u:13426: saptāhaṃ bhakṣitaṃ rudra jarāṃ nayati saṃkṣayam // GarP_1,202.21 //
GP12garup1_u:13428: jagdhvā māsaṃ yuvā syācca naro vāgīśvarī bhavet // GarP_1,202.22 //
GP12garup1_u:13430: balāni kuryānnāsāyāḥ pratyūṣe bhakṣitaṃ śiva // GarP_1,202.23 //
GP12garup1_u:13436: strīṇāṃ śataṃ mahādeva tatkṣaṇānnātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,202.26 //
GP12garup1_u:13441: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe nānāvidhoṣadhaprayogānirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvyuttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13445: yā gaurdveṣṭiṃ svakaṃ vatsaṃ tasyā deyaṃ svakaṃ payaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13446: lavaṇena samāyuktaṃ tasyā vatsaḥ priyo bhavet // GarP_1,203.1 //
GP12garup1_u:13447: śuno 'sthi kaṇṭhabaddhaṃ hi mahiṣāṇāṃ gavā tathā /
GP12garup1_u:13448: kṛmijālaṃ pātayati sakalaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,203.2 //
GP12garup1_u:13455: kṣīre go-mahīṣasyaiva goḥ puṃsaśca hitaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,203.6 //
GP12garup1_u:13460: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe nānauṣadhaprayoganirūpaṇaṃ nāma tryuttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13465: ata nāmāni vakṣyāmi oṣadhīnāṃ samāsataḥ // GarP_1,204.1 //
GP12garup1_u:13467: lāṅgalī kalasī caiva kroṣṭupucchā guhā matā // GarP_1,204.2 //
GP12garup1_u:13470: jhaṣā nāgabalā jñeyā śvadaṃṣṭrā gokṣuro mataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13471: śatāvarī varā bhīru pīvarīndīvarī varī // GarP_1,204.4 //
GP12garup1_u:13472: vyāghrī tu bṛhatī kṛṣṇā haṃsapādī madhustravā /
GP12garup1_u:13473: dhāmanī kaṇṭakārī syātkṣudrā siṃhī nidigdhikā // GarP_1,204.5 //
GP12garup1_u:13477: tyajā parā ca mahā jñeyā daṇḍayonyaṅkasaṃjñayā /
GP12garup1_u:13478: nyagrodhastu vaṭo jñeyaḥ aśvatthaḥ kapilo mataḥ // GarP_1,204.7 //
GP12garup1_u:13485: tṛtīyā jalajambūḥ syānnādeyī sā ca kīrtitā /
GP12garup1_u:13486: kaṇā kṛṣṇopakuñcī ca śauṇḍī māgadhiketi ca // GarP_1,204.11 //
GP12garup1_u:13488: ūṣaṇaṃ maricaṃ jñeyaṃ śuṇṭhī viśvaṃ mahauṣadham // GarP_1,204.12 //
GP12garup1_u:13490: lāṅgalī halinī ca syāccheyasī gaja pippalī // GarP_1,204.13 //
GP12garup1_u:13493: ṣaḍgranthogrā vacā jñeyā śvetā haimavatīti ca /
GP12garup1_u:13494: kuṭajo vṛkṣakaḥ śakro vatsako girimāllikā // GarP_1,204.15 //
GP12garup1_u:13496: mustakto meghanāmā syātkauntī jñeyā hareṇukā // GarP_1,204.16 //
GP12garup1_u:13497: elā ca bahulā proktā sūkṣmailā ca tathā truṭiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13498: padmā bhārṅgo tathā kāñjī jñeyā brāhmaṇayaṣṭikā // GarP_1,204.17 //
GP12garup1_u:13502: ajājī jīrakaṃ jñeyā kāravī copakuñcikā // GarP_1,204.19 //
GP12garup1_u:13504: tagaraṃ syānnataṃ vakraṃ cocaṃ tvacavarāṅgakam // GarP_1,204.20 //
GP12garup1_u:13511: kāśmarī kaṭphalā jñeyā śrīparṇo ceti kīrtitā /
GP12garup1_u:13512: śallakī gajabhakṣyā ca patrī ca surabhī stravaḥ // GarP_1,204.24 //
GP12garup1_u:13514: pathyābhayā ca vijñeyā pūtanā ca harītakī // GarP_1,204.25 //
GP12garup1_u:13518: dhātakī tāmraparṇo syātsamaṅgā kuñjarā matā // GarP_1,204.27 //
GP12garup1_u:13520: vidyādraktaṃ candanaṃ ca dvitīyaṃ raktacandanam // GarP_1,204.28 //
GP12garup1_u:13521: kākolī ca smṛtā vīrā vayasyā cārkapuṣpikā /
GP12garup1_u:13522: śṛṅgī karkaṭaśṛṅgī ca mahāghoṣā ca kīrtitā // GarP_1,204.29 //
GP12garup1_u:13524: mṛdvikā ca smṛtā drākṣā tathā gostanikā matā // GarP_1,204.30 //
GP12garup1_u:13526: sārañca gopavallī ca gopī bhadrā ca kathyate // GarP_1,204.31 //
GP12garup1_u:13527: dantī kaṭaṅkaṭerī ca jñeyā dāruniśeti ca /
GP12garup1_u:13528: haridrā rajanī proktā pītikā rātrināmikā // GarP_1,204.32 //
GP12garup1_u:13530: vasukoṭaśca vijñeyo vāśiraḥ kāmpillo mataḥ // GarP_1,204.33 //
GP12garup1_u:13532: ghaṇṭākaḥ śuṣkako jñeyo vaco 'tha sūcako mataḥ // GarP_1,204.34 //
GP12garup1_u:13534: vajravṛkṣo mahāvṛkṣaḥ snuhī snukca sudhā guḍā // GarP_1,204.35 //
GP12garup1_u:13538: jñeyā sugandhiparṇoti vāsantī kulajeti ca // GarP_1,204.37 //
GP12garup1_u:13541: indī varaṃ kuvalayaṃ padmaṃ nīlotpalaṃ smṛtam /
GP12garup1_u:13546: kabarī kumbhako dhṛṣṭaḥ kṣudvidho dhanakṛttathā // GarP_1,204.41 //
GP12garup1_u:13548: prācī balā nadīkrāntā kākajaṅghātha vāyasī // GarP_1,204.42 //
GP12garup1_u:13552: aśvatthā bahupatrā ca vijñeyā cāmalakyapi // GarP_1,204.44 //
GP12garup1_u:13553: arūṣakraṃ patra śūkaṃ kṣīrī rājādanaṃ matam /
GP12garup1_u:13554: mahāpatraṃ dāḍimaṃ ca tameva karakaṃ vadet // GarP_1,204.45 //
GP12garup1_u:13557: vidyā kuntī nikumbhā ca tribhaṅgī tripuṭī trivṛt /
GP12garup1_u:13558: saptalā yavatiktā ca carmā carmakaseti ca // GarP_1,204.47 //
GP12garup1_u:13560: gavākṣī cāmṛtā śvetā girikarṇo gavādinī // GarP_1,204.48 //
GP12garup1_u:13562: hemakṣīrī smṛtā pītā gaurī vai kāladugdhikā // GarP_1,204.49 //
GP12garup1_u:13566: pratyakpuṣpī kharī jñeyā apāmārgo mayūrakaḥ // GarP_1,204.51 //
GP12garup1_u:13568: jīvako jīvaśākaśca karburañca śaṭīṃ viduḥ // GarP_1,204.52 //
GP12garup1_u:13576: suraṅgītagaraḥ snāyuḥ kalanāśā tu vāyasī // GarP_1,204.56 //
GP12garup1_u:13588: dhātukāśīśakāśī ca saṃjñeyaṃ tacca kīrtitam // GarP_1,204.62 //
GP12garup1_u:13591: śilā manaḥ śilā jñeyā nepālī kulaṭīti ca /
GP12garup1_u:13592: ālaṃ manastālakaṃ vā haritālaṃ vinirdiśet // GarP_1,204.64 //
GP12garup1_u:13596: mākṣikaṃ madhu ca kṣaudraṃ tacca puṣparasaṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,204.66 //
GP12garup1_u:13598: sītā sitopalā caiva matsyaṇḍīśarkarā smṛtā // GarP_1,204.67 //
GP12garup1_u:13604: tripuṭaḥ puṭasaṃjñaśca kalāpo laṅgako mataḥ // GarP_1,204.70 //
GP12garup1_u:13606: picukaṃ pitalaṃ cākṣaṃ biḍālapadakaṃ tathā // GarP_1,204.71 //
GP12garup1_u:13609: palaṃ bilvañca muṣṭiḥ syāddve pale prasṛtiṃ vadet /
GP12garup1_u:13612: caturbhiḥ kuḍavaiḥ prastha prasthāścatvāra āḍhakaḥ // GarP_1,204.74 //
GP12garup1_u:13614: tulā palaśataṃ proktaṃ bhāgo viṃśatpalaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,204.75 //
GP12garup1_u:13619: śaṅkhaḥ śuktinakhaḥ śaṅkho vyāghro vyāghranakhaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13621: raso gandharaso bole sarjaḥ sarjaraso mataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13622: priyaṅguḥ phalinī śyāmā gaurī kānteti cocyate // GarP_1,204.79 //
GP12garup1_u:13624: śigruḥ śobhāñjano nāma jñānamānaśca kīrtitaḥ // GarP_1,204.80 //
GP12garup1_u:13626: moraṭā pīluparṇo ca tuṇḍī syāttuṇḍikerikā // GarP_1,204.81 //
GP12garup1_u:13627: madano gālavo bodho ghoṭā ghoṭī ca kathyate /
GP12garup1_u:13630: dantī kākendutiktā syātkaṇṭakī ca vikaṅkataḥ // GarP_1,204.83 //
GP12garup1_u:13632: vayasthā ca viśalyā ca cchinnā chinnaruhā matā // GarP_1,204.84 //
GP12garup1_u:13636: nāmānyetāni ca hare vanyānāṃ bheṣajāṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:13637: ato vyākaraṇaṃ vakṣye kumāroktañca śaunaka // GarP_1,204.86 //
GP12garup1_u:13638: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe caturattaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13644: suptiṅantaṃ padaṃ khyātaṃ supaḥ sapta vibhaktayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13645: svaujasaḥ prathamā proktā sā prātipadikātmake // GarP_1,205.2 //
GP12garup1_u:13648: amauśaso dvitīyā syāttatkarma kriyate ca yat /
GP12garup1_u:13651: yena kriyate karaṇaṃ tatkartā yaḥ karoti saḥ // GarP_1,205.5 //
GP12garup1_u:13653: yasmai ditsā dhārayate rocate sampradānakam // GarP_1,205.6 //
GP12garup1_u:13655: yato 'paiti samādatte upādatte bhayaṃ yataḥ // GarP_1,205.7 //
GP12garup1_u:13657: ṅayoḥ supo vai saptamī syātsā cādhikaraṇe bhavet // GarP_1,205.8 //
GP12garup1_u:13663: anureṣu sahārthe ca hīne 'nūpaśca kathyate // GarP_1,205.11 //
GP12garup1_u:13665: aprāṇe hi vibhaktī dbe manyakarmaṇyanādare // GarP_1,205.12 //
GP12garup1_u:13671: nirdhāraṇe dve vibhakto ṣaṣṭhī hetuprayogake // GarP_1,205.15 //
GP12garup1_u:13673: hiṃsārthānāṃ prayoge ca kṛti karmaṇi kartari // GarP_1,205.16 //
GP12garup1_u:13675: dvividhaṃ prātipadikaṃ nāma dhātustathaiva ca // GarP_1,205.17 //
GP12garup1_u:13676: bhūvāndibhyastiṅo laḥ syāllakārā daśa vai smṛtāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13681: nāmni prayujyamāne 'pi prathamaḥ puruṣo bhavet // GarP_1,205.20 //
GP12garup1_u:13683: bhūvādyā dhātavaḥ proktāḥ sanādyantāstathā tataḥ // GarP_1,205.21 //
GP12garup1_u:13688: liṅatīte parokṣe syālliḍ bhūte ḷḍ bhaviṣyati /
GP12garup1_u:13691: kṛtastriṣvapi vartante bhāve karmaṇi kartari // GarP_1,205.25 //
GP12garup1_u:13693: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vyākaraṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13698: viprāḥ svasāgatā vīdaṃ suttamaṃ syātpitṝṣabhaḥ // GarP_1,206.1 //
GP12garup1_u:13702: vadhvāsanañca pitrartho lanubandho naye jayet // GarP_1,206.3 //
GP12garup1_u:13703: nāyako lavaṇaṃ gāvasta ete na ta īśvarāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13704: devīgṛhamatho atra a avehi paṭū imau // GarP_1,206.4 //
GP12garup1_u:13705: amī aśvāḥ ṣaḍasyeti tanna vāk ṣaḍdalāni ca /
GP12garup1_u:13712: kaḥśete caiva kaḥṣaṇḍaḥ kasko yāti ca gauravam // GarP_1,206.8 //
GP12garup1_u:13713: ka ihātra ka evāhurdevā āhuśca bho vraja /
GP12garup1_u:13716: kuṭīcchāyā tathā chāyā sandhayo 'nye tathedṛśāḥ // GarP_1,206.10 //
GP12garup1_u:13717: samāsāḥ ṣaṭ samākhyātāḥ sa dvijaḥ karmadhārayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13718: dvigustrivedī grāmaśca ayaṃ tatpuruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,206.11 //
GP12garup1_u:13722: taddhitāḥ pāṇḍavaḥ śaivo brāhayaṃ ca brahmatādayaḥ // GarP_1,206.13 //
GP12garup1_u:13726: ātmā rājā yuvā panthāḥ pūṣabrahmahaṇau halī // GarP_1,206.15 //
GP12garup1_u:13730: jāyā jarā nadī lakṣmīḥ śrīstrībhūmirvadhūrapi // GarP_1,206.17 //
GP12garup1_u:13731: bhrūḥ punarbhūstathā dhenuḥ svasā mātā ca nau striyaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13736: paṭuḥ kamalabhūḥ kartā sumato bahavaḥ sunauḥ // GarP_1,206.20 //
GP12garup1_u:13738: sarvaviśvobha ye cobhau ekonyānyatarāṇi ca // GarP_1,206.21 //
GP12garup1_u:13746: truṭyati mriyate caiva cicīṣati ninīṣati // GarP_1,206.25 //
GP12garup1_u:13753: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamān- ācāradṛ nāma ṣaḍuttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13757: vāsudevaṃ guruṃ natvā gaṇaṃ śambhuṃ sarasvatīm /
GP12garup1_u:13759: sarvādimadhyāntagalau mnau bhyau jrau stau trikā gaṇāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13762: sānusvāraśca pādānto vā ityukto dvimātrakaḥ // GarP_1,207.3 //
GP12garup1_u:13763: yadā nāpi kramaṃ yoge laghutāpi kvacidguroḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13765: jñeyaḥ pādaśca turyāṃśo yuk samaṃ viṣamantvayuk /
GP12garup1_u:13767: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe chandaḥ śāstrechandaḥsaṃjñāparibhāṣānirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13771: āryālakṣma tvaṣṭa gaṇāḥ sadā jo viṣame na hi /
GP12garup1_u:13772: ṣaṣṭhe jo nlau vāpi bhavet padaṃ ṣaṣṭhe dvitīyalāt // GarP_1,208.1 //
GP12garup1_u:13773: āditaḥ saptame hrasvā dvitīyārdhe śare tataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13780: ṣaṭ kalā viṣame cetsyuḥ same 'ṣṭau na nirantarāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13781: samā parāśritā na syādvaitālīye ralau guruḥ // GarP_1,208.5 //
GP12garup1_u:13784: parāśrito dvitīyo laḥ pādeṣu nikhileṣvapi // GarP_1,208.7 //
GP12garup1_u:13792: nikhile vā saitavasya mrau ntau cābdhestatpūrvakau // GarP_1,208.11 //
GP12garup1_u:13799: guruvo lairdale nityaṃ pramāṇamiti niścitam // GarP_1,208.15 //
GP12garup1_u:13803: saptaviṃśātilā gantā dalayo rucirā dvayoḥ // GarP_1,208.17 //
GP12garup1_u:13804: mātrāvṛttāni coktāni varṇavṛttāni vacmi vai // GarP_1,208.18 //
GP12garup1_u:13805: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe chandaḥ śāstre āryāvṛttādichandolakṣaṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13809: śrīrukthā gena sā jñeyā utyukthā strī gurudvayam /
GP12garup1_u:13810: mo nārī ro mṛgī madhyā magau kanyā pratiṣṭhayā // GarP_1,209.1 //
GP12garup1_u:13811: bho gau paṅktiḥ suprātiṣṭhā tanumadhyā tayau smṛtā /
GP12garup1_u:13812: nayābhyāṃ bālalalitā gāyatrīcchanda eva hi // GarP_1,209.2 //
GP12garup1_u:13814: bhau gau citrapadā khyātā vidyunmālā mamau gagau // GarP_1,209.3 //
GP12garup1_u:13815: māṇavakaṃ bhāttalagā mnau gau haṃsarutaṃ smṛtam /
GP12garup1_u:13818: ranasaiḥ syāddhalamukhī nau maḥ śiśubhṛtā bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:13819: bṛhatīchanda ityuktaṃ smau jagau sa virājitam // GarP_1,209.5 //
GP12garup1_u:13821: rajābhyāñca ragābhyāñca rukmavatī bhamau sagau // GarP_1,209.6 //
GP12garup1_u:13824: tau jo gāvindravajrā syājjatajgā gupapūrvikā // GarP_1,209.8 //
GP12garup1_u:13826: bhabhabhā gau dodhakaṃ syācchālinī matatā gagau // GarP_1,209.9 //
GP12garup1_u:13828: śrīrbhatau nanagāḥ proktā pañcabhiḥ ṣaḍūbhireva ca // GarP_1,209.10 //
GP12garup1_u:13830: rathoddhatār nau ralagāḥ svāgatā ranabhā gagau // GarP_1,209.11 //
GP12garup1_u:13831: vṛttā nanau sagau gaḥ syānnau ralau gaḥ samadrikā /
GP12garup1_u:13832: rajarā lgau śyenikā syājjasatā gau śikhaṇḍitam /
GP12garup1_u:13834: ranau bhasau candravartma vaṃśasthaṃ syājjatau jarau /
GP12garup1_u:13836: nbhau bhrau drutavilambitaṃ puṭaśca syānnanau mayau // GarP_1,209.13 //
GP12garup1_u:13838: nanararaiḥ samākhyātā nayanā yastathā bhavet // GarP_1,209.14 //
GP12garup1_u:13840: jasau jasau ca pādeṣu catūraiḥ stragviṇī matā // GarP_1,209.15 //
GP12garup1_u:13842: prayaṃvadā nabhajraiśca maṇimālā tayau tayau // GarP_1,209.16 //
GP12garup1_u:13844: pramitākṣarā sajasasairujjvalā tu nanau bharau // GarP_1,209.17 //
GP12garup1_u:13847: nau tatau gaḥ kṣamāvṛttaṃ turagaiśca rasairyatiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13848: praharṣiṇī manau jrau gā vahnibhirdaśabhiryatiḥ // GarP_1,209.19 //
GP12garup1_u:13849: jabhau sajau go rucirā caturbhiśca grahairyatiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13851: mañjubhāṣiṇī sajsā jgau sunandinī sajasā magau /
GP12garup1_u:13852: nanau tatau candrikā gaḥ saptabhiśca rasairyatiḥ // GarP_1,209.21 //
GP12garup1_u:13854: nanarāḥ so ladhuguruḥ svaraiḥ proktāparājitā // GarP_1,209.22 //
GP12garup1_u:13856: vasantatilakā siṃhonnatā tabhjā jagau guruḥ // GarP_1,209.23 //
GP12garup1_u:13858: naranā ralagāḥ pāde śarkarī pratipāditā // GarP_1,209.24 //
GP12garup1_u:13862: vasusvarayatiḥ syācca najau bhajrāḥ prabhadrakam // GarP_1,209.26 //
GP12garup1_u:13864: marau mayau yaśca bhavedukteyamati śarkarī // GarP_1,209.27 //
GP12garup1_u:13868: vasugrayatiḥ pṛthvī jasau jasayalā guruḥ // GarP_1,209.29 //
GP12garup1_u:13870: ṣaḍvedāśvaiśca hariṇī nasamā rasalā guruḥ // GarP_1,209.30 //
GP12garup1_u:13872: nardaṭakaṃ najabhajā jalau go yatireva ca // GarP_1,209.31 //
GP12garup1_u:13874: bhūtartvaśvaiḥ kusumitalatā mtau nyau yayau dhṛtiḥ // GarP_1,209.32 //
GP12garup1_u:13878: saptāśvartuḥ suvadanā bhrau manau yabhalā guruḥ // GarP_1,209.34 //
GP12garup1_u:13879: vṛttaṃ rajau rajau pāde rajau go laḥ kṛtirbhavet /
GP12garup1_u:13881: digarkairbhadrakaṃ bhrau nrau naranā go yathākṛtiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13882: najau bhaśvāśvalalitaṃ jabhau jabhalagā bhavet // GarP_1,209.36 //
GP12garup1_u:13887: nau nau go 'tikṛtiḥ proktā cchando hyutkṛtirucyate /
GP12garup1_u:13890: guhaiḥ ṣaḍbhī rasairbāṇairmonāḥ ṣaṭsagagā gaṇāḥ // GarP_1,209.40 //
GP12garup1_u:13893: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe samavṛttalakṣaṇādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma navottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13898: same bhau bhagagāḥ syuśca drutamadhyā bhabhau bhagau // GarP_1,210.1 //
GP12garup1_u:13899: gaḥ pāde viṣame 'nyatra najau jyau ca gaṇau smṛtau // GarP_1,210.2 //
GP12garup1_u:13900: viṣame vegavatī sā gaḥ same bhau bho gagau gaṇāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13901: pāde 'same tajau ro gaḥ same masau jagau garuḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13902: bhavedbhadravirāṭ ketumatī tu viṣame sajau // GarP_1,210.3 //
GP12garup1_u:13903: sagau same bhrau nagagā ākhyānakī tvathāsame /
GP12garup1_u:13904: tau jo gagau same pāde jatajā gurukadvayam // GarP_1,210.4 //
GP12garup1_u:13906: tatau jagau same gaḥ syāt piṅgalena hyudāhṛtam // GarP_1,210.5 //
GP12garup1_u:13907: pāde 'tha viṣame caiva puṣpitāgrā nanau rayau /
GP12garup1_u:13908: same najau jarau gaśca vaitālīyaṃ vadanti hi /
GP12garup1_u:13910: vāṅmatī rajarā yaḥ syādayugme jarajā ragau // GarP_1,210.7 //
GP12garup1_u:13911: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍer'ddhasamavṛttalakṣaṇādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma daśottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13923: sajau salau ca prathame nasajā go dvitīyake /
GP12garup1_u:13924: tṛtīye bhanabhā gaśca caturthe sajasā jagau // GarP_1,211.4 //
GP12garup1_u:13929: gau dvitīye sanajarā gastṛtīye nanau ca saḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13930: nau najau yaścaturthe syāccheṣa pādāśca pūrvavat // GarP_1,211.6 //
GP12garup1_u:13931: tṛtīrye 'ghrau viśeṣaśca vṛttaṃ syānnau sanau nasau // GarP_1,211.7 //
GP12garup1_u:13937: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣamavṛttalakṣaṇādinirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikādaśottaradviśaśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13942: naṣṭamadhye sameṃ'ke laḥ same 'rdhe viṣame guruḥ // GarP_1,212.1 //
GP12garup1_u:13944: saṃkhyā dvirardhe rūpe tu śūnyaṃ śūnye dvirīritam /
GP12garup1_u:13946: pare pūrṇaṃ pare pūrṇaṃ meruḥ prastārato bhavet // GarP_1,212.4 //
GP12garup1_u:13949: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamān- ācā- chandolakṣaṇaṃ nāma dvādaśottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:13954: brāhmaṇādisamācāraṃ sarvadaṃ te tathā vade // GarP_1,213.1 //
GP12garup1_u:13955: śrutismṛtī tu vijñāya śrautaṃ karma samācaret /
GP12garup1_u:13956: śrautaṃ karma na ceduktaṃ tadā smārtaṃ samācaret // GarP_1,213.2 //
GP12garup1_u:13958: śrutismṛtī ha viprāṇāṃ locane karmadarśane // GarP_1,213.3 //
GP12garup1_u:13961: satyaṃ dānaṃ dayālobho vidyejyā pūjanaṃ damaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13962: aṣṭau tāni pavitrāṇi śiṣṭācārasya lakṣaṇam // GarP_1,213.5 //
GP12garup1_u:13968: vidyā vittaṃ tapaḥ śaucaṃ kule janma tvarogitā // GarP_1,213.8 //
GP12garup1_u:13970: dharmātsukhaṃ ca jñānaṃ ca jñānānmokṣo 'dhigamyate // GarP_1,213.9 //
GP12garup1_u:13976: pāśupālyaṃ kṛṣiḥ paṇyaṃ vaiśyasyājīvanaṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,213.12 //
GP12garup1_u:13979: triḥ snātā snāpitā bhaikṣyaṃ gurau prāṇāntikī sthitiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:13980: samekhalo jaṭī daṇḍī muṇḍī vā gurusaṃśrayaḥ // GarP_1,213.14 //
GP12garup1_u:13995: ahiṃsā sūnṛtā vāṇī satyaśauce kṣamā dayā /
GP12garup1_u:13996: varṇināṃ liṅgināṃ caiva sāmānyo dharma ucyate // GarP_1,213.22 //
GP12garup1_u:13998: ā bodhātsvapanaṃ yāvat gṛhidharmaṃ ca vacmi te // GarP_1,213.23 //
GP12garup1_u:14004: ubhe mūtrapurīṣe ca divā kuryādudaṅmukhaḥ // GarP_1,213.26 //
GP12garup1_u:14005: rātrau ca dakṣiṇe kuryādubhe sandhye yathā divā /
GP12garup1_u:14006: chāyāyāmandhakāre vā rātrau vāhani vā dvijaḥ // GarP_1,213.27 //
GP12garup1_u:14012: ekāṃ liṅge mṛdaṃ dadyādvāma haste mṛdaṃ dvidhā // GarP_1,213.30 //
GP12garup1_u:14014: ekāṃ liṅge gude tistrastathā vāmakare daśa // GarP_1,213.31 //
GP12garup1_u:14016: ardhaprasṛtimātrā tu prathamā mṛttikā smṛtā // GarP_1,213.32 //
GP12garup1_u:14017: dvitīyā ca tṛtīyā ca tadardhā parikīrtitā /
GP12garup1_u:14018: upaviṣṭastu viṇmūtraṃ kartuṃ yastu na vindati // GarP_1,213.33 //
GP12garup1_u:14019: sa kuryādardhaśaucaṃ tu svasya śaucasya sarvadā /
GP12garup1_u:14020: divā śaucasya rātryardhaṃ yadvā pādo vidhīyate // GarP_1,213.34 //
GP12garup1_u:14022: vasā śukramasṛṅ majjā lālā viṇmūtrakarṇaviṭ // GarP_1,213.35 //
GP12garup1_u:14024: manyeta yāvatā śuddhiṃ tāvacchaucaṃ samācaret // GarP_1,213.36 //
GP12garup1_u:14026: śaucaṃ tu dvividhaṃ proktaṃ bāhyamābhyantaraṃ tathā // GarP_1,213.37 //
GP12garup1_u:14028: trirācāmedapaḥ pūrvaṃ dviḥ pramṛjyāttato mukham // GarP_1,213.38 //
GP12garup1_u:14031: aṅguṣṭhānāmikābhyāṃ ca cakṣuḥ śrotre punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14032: kaniṣṭhāṅgaṣṭhayornābhiṃ hṛdayaṃ tu talena vai // GarP_1,213.40 //
GP12garup1_u:14034: ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni triḥ paṭhanprīṇayetkramāt // GarP_1,213.41 //
GP12garup1_u:14037: khaṃ mukhe nāsike vāyuṃ netre sūryaṃ śrutī (tīrdi) diśaḥ /
