GP12garup1_u:14038: prāṇagranthimatho nābhiṃ brahmāṇaṃ hṛdaye spṛśet // GarP_1,213.43 //
GP12garup1_u:14044: uṣaḥ kāle tu saṃprāpte śaucaṃ kṛtvā yathārthavat // GarP_1,213.46 //
GP12garup1_u:14046: mukhe paryuṣite nityaṃ bhavatyaprayato naraḥ // GarP_1,213.47 //
GP12garup1_u:14053: prakṣālya bhuktvā ca śucau deśe tyaktvā tadācāmet /
GP12garup1_u:14054: amāyāṃ ca tathā ṣaṣṭhyāṃ navamyāṃ pratipadyapi // GarP_1,213.51 //
GP12garup1_u:14056: abhāve danta kāṣṭhasya niṣiddhāyāṃ tathā tithau // GarP_1,213.52 //
GP12garup1_u:14058: prātaḥ snānaṃ praśaṃsanti dṛṣṭādṛṣṭakaraṃ hitam // GarP_1,213.53 //
GP12garup1_u:14059: sarvamar hati śuddhātmā prātaḥ snāyī japādikam /
GP12garup1_u:14061: stravatyeṣa divā rātrau prātaḥ snānaṃ viśodhanam /
GP12garup1_u:14064: adya haste tu nakṣatre daśamyāṃ jyeṣṭhake site // GarP_1,213.56 //
GP12garup1_u:14073: tisraḥ koṭyastu vijñeyā mandehā nāma rākṣasāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14075: sa hanti sūryaṃ sandhyāyāṃ nopāstiṃ kurute tu yaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14077: ahorātrasya yaḥ sandhiḥ sā sandhyā bhavatīti ha /
GP12garup1_u:14080: svayaṃ homaphalaṃ yattu tadanyena na jāyate // GarP_1,213.64 //
GP12garup1_u:14082: ebhireva hutaṃ yattu taddhutaṃ svayameva hi // GarP_1,213.65 //
GP12garup1_u:14086: samāhitātmā sāvitrīṃ praṇavaṃ ca yathoditam // GarP_1,213.67 //
GP12garup1_u:14088: tripadāyāṃ ca sāvitryāṃ na bhayaṃ vidyate kvacit // GarP_1,213.68 //
GP12garup1_u:14090: lipyate na sa pāpena padmapatramivāmbhasā // GarP_1,213.69 //
GP12garup1_u:14097: pūrvāhna eva kurvīta devatānāṃ ca pūjanam /
GP12garup1_u:14098: na viṣṇoḥ paramo devastasmāttaṃ pūjayetsadā // GarP_1,213.73 //
GP12garup1_u:14104: taddānaṃ caiva śiṣyabhyo vedābhyāso hi pañcadhā // GarP_1,213.76 //
GP12garup1_u:14106: mūlyena lekhayitvā yo dadyādyāti sa vaidikam // GarP_1,213.77 //
GP12garup1_u:14110: mātā pitā gururbhrātā prajā dīnāḥ samāśritāḥ // GarP_1,213.79 //
GP12garup1_u:14118: kriyāḥ sarvāḥ pravartante parvatebhya ivāpagāḥ // GarP_1,213.83 //
GP12garup1_u:14122: yā vṛttistāṃ samāsthāya vipro jīvedanāpadi // GarP_1,213.85 //
GP12garup1_u:14123: dhanaṃ tu trividhaṃ jñeyaṃ śuklaṃ śabalameva ca /
GP12garup1_u:14124: kṛṣṇaṃ ca tasya vijñeyo vibhāgaḥ saptadhā pṛthak // GarP_1,213.86 //
GP12garup1_u:14125: kramāyattaṃ prītidattaṃ prāptaṃ ca saha bhāryayā /
GP12garup1_u:14126: aviśeṣeṇa sarveṣāṃ varṇānāṃ trividhaṃ dhanam // GarP_1,213.87 //
GP12garup1_u:14130: śuddhārthaṃ labdhakarajaṃ daṇḍāptaṃ jayajaṃ tathā // GarP_1,213.89 //
GP12garup1_u:14134: āpatkāle svayaṃ kurvannainasā yujyate dvijaḥ // GarP_1,213.91 //
GP12garup1_u:14138: kṛṣyādike bhavedbādhā sā kusīde na vidyate // GarP_1,213.93 //
GP12garup1_u:14139: śuklapakṣe tathā kṛṣṇe rajanyāṃ divasepi vā /
GP12garup1_u:14140: uṣṇe varṣati śīte vā vardhanaṃ na nivartate // GarP_1,213.94 //
GP12garup1_u:14142: kusīdaṃ kurvataḥ samyak saṃsthitasyaiva jāyate // GarP_1,213.95 //
GP12garup1_u:14144: te tṛptāstasya taddoṣaṃ śamayanti na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,213.96 //
GP12garup1_u:14151: vidyā śilpaṃ bhūtiḥ sevā gorakṣā vipaṇiḥ kṛṣiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14152: vṛttirbhaikṣyaṃ kusīdaṃ ca daśa jīvanahetavaḥ // GarP_1,213.100 //
GP12garup1_u:14154: vaiśye nyāyārjitāḥ svārthāḥ śūdre śuśrūṣayārjitāḥ // GarP_1,213.101 //
GP12garup1_u:14160: sarvataḥ pratigṛhṇīyānna tuṣyettu svayaṃ tataḥ // GarP_1,213.104 //
GP12garup1_u:14165: caturthe ca tathā bhāge snānārthaṃ mṛda māharet /
GP12garup1_u:14170: prātaḥ snānaṃ tadarthaṃ tu nityasnānaṃ prakīrtitam // GarP_1,213.109 //
GP12garup1_u:14172: snānārhastu yadā snāti snānaṃ naimittikaṃ hi tat // GarP_1,213.110 //
GP12garup1_u:14176: snānaṃ samācaredyastu kriyāṅgaṃ tacca kīrtitam // GarP_1,213.112 //
GP12garup1_u:14178: saraḥ sudevakhāteṣu tīrtheṣu ca nadīṣu ca // GarP_1,213.113 //
GP12garup1_u:14182: nityaṃ naimittikaṃ cāpi kriyāṅgaṃ malakarṣaṇam // GarP_1,213.115 //
GP12garup1_u:14186: tīrthatoyaṃ tataḥ puṇyaṃ gāgaṃ puṇyaṃ tu sarvataḥ // GarP_1,213.117 //
GP12garup1_u:14188: gayāyāṃ ca kurukṣetre yattoyaṃ samupasthitam // GarP_1,213.118 //
GP12garup1_u:14190: putrajanmani yogeṣu tathā saṃkramaṇe raveḥ // GarP_1,213.119 //
GP12garup1_u:14191: rāhośca darśane snānaṃ praśastaṃ niśi nānyathā /
GP12garup1_u:14194: yatphalaṃ dvādaśābdāni prājāpatye kṛte bhavet // GarP_1,213.121 //
GP12garup1_u:14197: prātaḥ snāyī bhavennityaṃ māsau dvau māghaphālgunau /
GP12garup1_u:14198: yastu māghaṃ samāsādya prātaḥ snāyī haviṣyabhuk // GarP_1,213.123 //
GP12garup1_u:14200: mātaraṃ pitaraṃ vāpi bhrātaraṃ suhṛdaṃ gurum // GarP_1,213.124 //
GP12garup1_u:14210: āgacchantu me pitara imaṃ gṛhṇantvapoñjalim // GarP_1,213.129 //
GP12garup1_u:14212: vasitvā vasanaṃ śuṣkaṃ sthalasthā starṇabarhiṣi // GarP_1,213.130 //
GP12garup1_u:14214: yadapāṃ krūramāṃsāttu yadamedhyaṃ tu kiñcana // GarP_1,213.131 //
GP12garup1_u:14216: gṛhītvānena mantreṇa toyaṃ savyena pāṇinā // GarP_1,213.132 //
GP12garup1_u:14220: punātu me tadindrastu varuṇaḥ sabṛhaspatiḥ // GarP_1,213.134 //
GP12garup1_u:14230: arcitaṃ syājjagādidaṃ tena sarvaṃ carācaram // GarP_1,213.139 //
GP12garup1_u:14242: gavā goṣṭhe daśaguṇaṃ agnyagāre śatādhikam // GarP_1,213.145 //
GP12garup1_u:14245: pañcame ca tathā bhāge saṃvibhāgo yathārthataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14248: sa pretya labhate svargamannadānaṃ samācaran // GarP_1,213.148 //
GP12garup1_u:14251: śākaṃ ca rātrau bhūmiṣṭhamatyantaṃ ca vivarjayet /
GP12garup1_u:14254: vaiśyasya cānnamevānnaṃ śūdrānnaṃ rudhiraṃ smṛtam // GarP_1,213.151 //
GP12garup1_u:14256: tatra śrīścaiva lakṣmīśca vasate nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14257: udare gārhapatyāgniḥ pṛṣṭhadeśe tu dakṣiṇaḥ // GarP_1,213.153 //
GP12garup1_u:14258: āsye cāhavanīyo 'gniḥ satyaḥ parva ca mūrdhani /
GP12garup1_u:14259: yaḥ pañcāgnīnimānveda āhitāgniḥ sa ucyate // GarP_1,213.154 //
GP12garup1_u:14261: prāṇo hyagnistathādityastribhoktā eka eva tu // GarP_1,213.155 //
GP12garup1_u:14267: tataḥ sandhyāmupāsīta snātvā vai paścimāṃ naraḥ // GarP_1,213.158 //
GP12garup1_u:14270: ācārādirdharmakartā keśavo hi smṛto dvija // GarP_1,213.159 //
GP12garup1_u:14271: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe pañcottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:14275: atha snānavidhiṃ vakṣye snānamūlā kriyā yataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14279: tridhā kṛtvā mṛdaṃ tāṃ tu gomayaṃ ca vicakṣaṇaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14280: adbhirmṛdbhiśca caraṇau prakṣālyātha karau tathā // GarP_1,214.3 //
GP12garup1_u:14284: oṃ uruṃ hi rājā varuṇaścakāra sūryāya panthānamanveta vā /
GP12garup1_u:14288: oṃ ye te śataṃ varuṇaye sahasraṃ yajñiyāḥ pāśā vitatā mahāntaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14289: tebhirno adya savitota viṣṇurviśve muñcantu marutaḥ svarkāḥ svāhā /
GP12garup1_u:14290: sumitriyāna ityabañjalimākṛtyottareṇa toyaṃ paścādvirājya caiva viniḥ kṣipet /
GP12garup1_u:14291: oṃ sumitriyā na āpa oṣadhayaḥ santu /
GP12garup1_u:14292: durmitriyāstasmai santu yo 'smāndveṣṭi yañca vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ // GarP_1,214.7 //
GP12garup1_u:14294: prakṣālya hastā vācamya namaskṛtya jalaṃ tataḥ // GarP_1,214.8 //
GP12garup1_u:14295: oṃ idaṃ viṣṇurvicakrame tredhā nidhe padam samūḍhamasya pāṃsure /
GP12garup1_u:14299: oṃ āpo asmānmātaraḥ śundhayantu ghṛtena no ghṛtaṣvaḥ punantu /
GP12garup1_u:14300: viśvaṃ hi ripraṃ pravahanti devīrudidābhyaḥ śucirāpūta emi // GarP_1,214.11 //
GP12garup1_u:14303: oṃ mānastoke tanaye mā na āyuṣi mā no goṣu mā no aśveṣu rīriṣaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14304: mā no vīrānrudrabhāmino 'badhīrhaviṣmantaḥ sadamitvā havāmahe // GarP_1,214.13 //
GP12garup1_u:14306: imaṃme varuṇe dvābhyāṃ tvannaḥ satvanna ityapi // GarP_1,214.14 //
GP12garup1_u:14308: oṃ imaṃme varuṇa śrudhīhavamadyā ca mṛḍayatvā mavasyurācake // GarP_1,214.15 //
GP12garup1_u:14309: oṃ tattvayāmi brahmaṇā vandamānastadāśāste yajamāno havirbhiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14310: aheḍamāno varuṇeha bodhyuruśaṃ samāna āyuḥ pramoṣīḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14311: oṃ tvanno agne varuṇasya vidvāndevasya heḍo avayāsisīṣṭhāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14313: oṃ sa tvanno agnevamo bhavatī nediṣṭho asyā uṣasovyuṣṭau /
GP12garup1_u:14314: avayakṣvano varuṇaṃ rarāṇo vīhimṛḍīkaṃ suhavo na edhi /
GP12garup1_u:14315: oṃ āpo nauṣadhi hiṃsārdhamno rājastato varuṇo nomuñcā yadāharaghnyā iti varuṇeti śapārmahe tato varuṇa no muñca /
GP12garup1_u:14321: avadevairdevakṛtā manoyāsi samavatyai kṛtaṃ puṣpācchā devadhīmalpāhī // GarP_1,214.16 //
GP12garup1_u:14325: devīrāpa iti dvābhyāṃ āpodevā iti tryṛcā // GarP_1,214.18 //
GP12garup1_u:14326: drupadādiva iti ca śanno devīrapāṃ rasaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14327: āpo devo pāvamānyaḥ punantvādyā ṛco nava // GarP_1,214.19 //
GP12garup1_u:14329: hiraṇyavarṇā iti ca pāvamānyastathā parāḥ // GarP_1,214.20 //
GP12garup1_u:14331: vāruṇyā bahavaḥ puṇyāḥ śaktitaḥ saṃprayojayet // GarP_1,214.21 //
GP12garup1_u:14333: ādāvante ca kurvīta abhiṣekaṃ yathākramam // GarP_1,214.22 //
GP12garup1_u:14335: antarjale japenmantraṃ triḥ kṛtvā cāghamarṣaṇam // GarP_1,214.23 //
GP12garup1_u:14338: savyāhṛtiṃ sapraṇavāṃ gāyatrīṃ vā japedbudhaḥ āvartayedvā praṇavaṃ smaredvā viṣṇamavyayam // GarP_1,214.25 //
GP12garup1_u:14342: gāyattrī vaiṣṇavī hyeṣā viṣṇoḥ saṃsmaraṇāya vai // GarP_1,214.27 //
GP12garup1_u:14345: āpo mā tasmādenasaḥ pāvamānaśca muñcatu iviṣmato vimā āpohaviṣmān āvirāsati /
GP12garup1_u:14346: haviṣmān deva asuro haviṣmān astu sūryaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14347: devīrāpo apā patnyā yaśca ūrmirhaviṣyaḥ indriyavānmādityantanaḥ taṃ devebhyo devatā dābhuśukralebhyasteṣāṃ bhāgakarṣivasisamudrasya dakṣiṇyāgrayāsimenāpograrbhiraśmatamodhoḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14349: yābhirmitrāvaruṇasya siñcayābhirindramanayatyanna vātī vadrupadāṃ śanno devī apāmasṛgdvayasaṃsūrye santaṃ samāhitaṃ apāṃrasasya yo rasya yo gṛhṇāsyuttamam /
GP12garup1_u:14350: āpo devīrupasūrya madhumatīvayasyāya prajābhyaḥ tāsā māsthānātvarjihatāmoṣadhayaḥ sapippalāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14351: punantu mā pitaraḥ saumyāsaḥ punantvanāpi pitā sahasāḥ pavitreṇa gatāyuṣā /
GP12garup1_u:14355: punantu mā devajanāḥ punantu manasā dhiyaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14356: punantu viśvā bhūtāni jātavedaḥ ! punīhi mā /
GP12garup1_u:14357: pavitreṇa punīhi mā śukreṇa deva dīdyat /
GP12garup1_u:14359: yatte pavitramarciṣyagne vitatamantarā brahmā tena punātu mā /
GP12garup1_u:14360: pavamānaḥ suvarjanaḥ / pavitreṇa vicarṣaṇiḥ / yaḥ potā sa punātu mā /
GP12garup1_u:14361: ubhābhyāṃ deva savitaḥ / pavitreṇa savena ca / idaṃ brahmapunīmahe /
GP12garup1_u:14363: tayāmadantaḥ sadhamādeṣu vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām /
GP12garup1_u:14364: citpa tirmā punātvacchidreṇa pavitreṇa sūryasya raśmibhiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14366: praṇitacchakeyaṃ devo vākpatirmā savitā tvacchidreṇa pavitreṇa sūryasya raśmibhiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14368: punastacchakeyaṃ dyupatiṃ ayaṃ gauḥ pṛśrirakramīsadaśaśataṃ mātaraṃ punaḥ pitarañca prayasmaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14369: devo mā savitā punātvacchidreṇa pavitreṇa sūryasya raśmibhiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14370: tasya te pavitrapate pavitrapūtasya yatkāmaḥ punātacchakeyam? /
GP12garup1_u:14371: oṃ tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ sadā paśyanti sūrayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14373: snātvaivaṃ vāsasī dhaute acchinne paridhāya ca /
GP12garup1_u:14374: prakṣālya ca mṛdādbhiśca hastau prakṣālya vai tadā // GarP_1,214.30 //
GP12garup1_u:14376: drupadāṃ ca trirāvartya tathā caivāghamarṣaṇam // GarP_1,214.31 //
GP12garup1_u:14380: taccakṣurdeva iti ca haṃsaḥ śuciṣadityapi // GarP_1,214.33 //
GP12garup1_u:14382: gāyattrīṃ ca tathā śaktyā upasthāya divākaram // GarP_1,214.34 //
GP12garup1_u:14384: śivasaṅkalpena ca tathā maṇḍalabrāhmaṇena ca // GarP_1,214.35 //
GP12garup1_u:14388: savyaṃ kṛtvā trirācamya śriyaṃ medhāṃ dhṛtiṃ kṣitim // GarP_1,214.37 //
GP12garup1_u:14390: umāmarundhatīṃ caiva śacīṃ mātarameva ca // GarP_1,214.38 //
GP12garup1_u:14391: jayāṃ ca vijayāṃ caiva sāvitrīṃ śāntimeva ca /
GP12garup1_u:14392: svāhāṃ svadhāṃ dhṛtiṃ caiva tathaivāditimuttamām // GarP_1,214.39 //
GP12garup1_u:14397: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe snānavidhivivaraṇaṃ nāma caturdaśottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:14490: teṣāṃ vayaṃ sumatau yajñiyānāṃ api bhadre saumanase syāma /
GP12garup1_u:14491: oṃ āyantu naḥ pitaraḥ saumyāsogniṣvāttāḥ pathibhirdevayānaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14493: oṃ ūrjaṃ vahantīramṛtaṃ ghṛtaṃ payaḥ kīlālaṃ parisnutaṃ svadhā stha tarpayata me pitṝn /
GP12garup1_u:14501: oṃ akṣanpitaro amīmadanta pitaro amī tṛpyantaḥ pitaraḥ śuṃ(sva)
GP12garup1_u:14502: dhadhvaṃ pibeha pitaro 'pi vānatrayāṃśca viśrayāṃśca bhavanapavitratvā rathapati te jātavedāḥ svadhābhiryajñaṃ sukṛtaṃ jupasva? /
GP12garup1_u:14503: oṃ ṇaduvātā ṛtāyate madhu kṣaranti sindhavaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14505: madhu dyaurastu naḥ pitā madhu mānno vanaspatirmadhubhām astu sūryo mādhvīrgāvo bhavantu naḥ // GarP_1,215.6 //
GP12garup1_u:14507: oṃ namo vaḥ pitaro rasāya namo vaḥ pitaraḥ śuṣmāya namo vaḥ pitaro jīvāya namo vaḥ pitaraḥ svadhāyai namo vaḥ pitaro ghorāya namo vaḥ pitaro manyave /
GP12garup1_u:14508: namo vaḥ pitaro gṛhānna pitaro dattaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14509: namo vaḥ pitaro dadhme tadvaḥ pitaro vāsaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14512: ye cāsmākaṃ kule jātā aputrā gotriṇo mṛtāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14513: te tṛpyantu mayā dattaṃ vastraniṣpīḍanodakam // GarP_1,215.8 //
GP12garup1_u:14514: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe devāditarpaṇanirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañjadaśottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:14519: prajvālya cāgniṃ paryukṣya-oṃ kraṣyādamagniṃ prahiṇomi dūraṃ yamarājyaṃ gacchatu ripravāhaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14520: ihaivāyamitaro jātavedā devebhyo havyaṃ vahatu prajānat /
GP12garup1_u:14521: oṃ pāvaka vaiśvānara idamāsanaṃ araṇīgarbhasaṃskṛtatejorūpa mahābrahman muhūrtāstriṣu vaiśvānaraṃ pratibodhayāmi /
GP12garup1_u:14522_0: oṃ vaiśvānare na ubhayaṃ āprayātu parāvataḥ agnirna svadyutīrūpapṛṣṭho divi pṛṣṭho
GP12garup1_u:14522_1: 'śvi pṛthivyāṃ pṛṣṭhā vivevā oṣadhīcāviveśa vaiśvānaraḥ sahasā pṛṣṭho 'gniḥ namo
GP12garup1_u:14542: oṃ ye bhūtā pracaranti dīnāca nimihanto bhuvanasya madhye /
GP12garup1_u:14543: tebhyo baliṃ puṣṭikāmo dadāmi mayi puṣṭiṃ puṣṭipatirdadātu /
GP12garup1_u:14545: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe vaiśvadevanirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣoḍaśottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:14550: apavitraḥ pavitro vā sarvāvasthāṃ gato 'pi vā // GarP_1,217.1 //
GP12garup1_u:14551: yaḥ smaretpuṇḍarīkākṣaṃ sa bāhyābhyantaraḥ śuciḥ // GarP_1,217.2 //
GP12garup1_u:14570: oṃ bhūrbhuvaḥ svaḥ astrāya phaṭ // GarP_1,217.3 //
GP12garup1_u:14571: oṃ bhūḥ oṃ bhuvaḥ oṃ svaḥ oṃ mahaḥ oṃ janaḥ oṃ tapaḥ oṃ satyaṃ tatstripadā /
GP12garup1_u:14572: oṃ āpo jyo 'tī raso 'mṛtaṃ brahma bhūrbhuvaḥ svarom /
GP12garup1_u:14576: oṃ āyātu varade devi ! pūrvāhne brahmadevatā /
GP12garup1_u:14577: gāyattrī nāma yā sandhyā raktāṅgī raktavāsasā /
GP12garup1_u:14580: āyātu varadā devī madhyāhne śvetarūpiṇī // GarP_1,217.6 //
GP12garup1_u:14588: oṃ āpo hiṣṭhā mayo bhuvastā na urje dadhāta naḥ // GarP_1,217.10 //
GP12garup1_u:14593: oṃ tasmā araṅgamāma vo yasya kṣayāya jinvatha /
GP12garup1_u:14595: oṃ sumitriyā na āpa oṣadhayaḥ santu oṃ durmitriyāstasmai santu yo 'smān dveṣṭi yañca vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14603: divaṃ ca pṛthivīṃ cāntarikṣamatho svaḥ // GarP_1,217.11 //
GP12garup1_u:14606: oṃ udutyaṃ jātavedasaṃ devaṃ vahanti ketavaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14609: āprā dyāvāpṛthivī antarikṣaṃ sūrya ātmā jagatastasthuṣaśca /
GP12garup1_u:14611: paśyema śaradaḥ śataṃ jīvema śaradaḥ śatam /
GP12garup1_u:14615: devā gātuvido nāṅgavidvānādbhamitamanasaspata imaṃ devayajñaṃ svāhā vātedhāḥ japet // GarP_1,217.12 //
GP12garup1_u:14617: brahmaṇā samanujñātā gaccha devi ! yathāsukham // GarP_1,217.13 //
GP12garup1_u:14618: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe sandhyāvidhinirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptadaśottaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:14627: oṃ susvāgatāmiti tairukte oṃ viśvebhyo devebhya etatpādodakamarghyaṃ svāheti devabrāhmaṇapādayordevatīrthenābhugnakuśasahitajaladānam // GarP_1,218.3 //
GP12garup1_u:14630: etadācamanīyaṃ svāhā svadheti brāhmaṇahaste eṣavor'ghya iti brāhmaṇahaste puṣpadānam // GarP_1,218.5 //
GP12garup1_u:14631: oṃ siddhamidamāsanam iha siddhamityabhidhāya oṃ bhūḥ oṃ bhuvaḥ oṃ svaḥ oṃ mahaḥ oṃ janaḥ oṃ tapaḥ oṃ satyamiti saptavyāhṛtibhiḥ pūrvamukhandevabrāhmaṇopaveśanam /
GP12garup1_u:14633: oṃ devatābhyaḥ pitṛbhyaśca mahāyogibhya eva ca /
GP12garup1_u:14634: namaḥ svadhāyai svāhāyai nityameva bhavantute iti trirjapet // GarP_1,218.6 //
GP12garup1_u:14635_1: yathānāmaśarmaṇāṃ viśvedevapūrvakandṛśrāddhaṃ kariṣye / oṃ viśvebhyo devabhyaḥ svāhā
GP12garup1_u:14636: āvāhayetyukte oṃ viśvedevāḥ sa āgata śṛṇutām imaṃ havam /
GP12garup1_u:14637: edaṃ barhirniṣīdata oṃ viśvedevāḥ śṛṇutemaṃ ivaṃ me ye antarikṣe ya upadyaviṣṭa /
GP12garup1_u:14638: ye agnijihvā uta vā yajatrā āsadyāsminbarhiṣi mādayadhvam /
GP12garup1_u:14639: oṃ oṣadhayaḥ saṃvadante somena saha rājñā /
GP12garup1_u:14642: ye atra vihitāḥ śrāddhe sāvadhānā bhavantu te /
GP12garup1_u:14643: oṃ apahatāsurā rakṣāṃsi vediṣada iti tritriryavavikiraṇam // GarP_1,218.7 //
GP12garup1_u:14645: oṃ karuṣvetyanujñātaḥ kṛtvā pātre pavitraniṣevaṇam // GarP_1,218.8 //
GP12garup1_u:14646: oṃ śanno devīrabhiṣṭaya āpo bhavantu pītaye /
GP12garup1_u:14650: īśvarīṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ tā (tvā) mihopahvaye śriyamiti gandhadānam /
GP12garup1_u:14651: oṃ yā divyā āpaḥ payasā saṃbabhūvuryā antarikṣauta pārthavīryāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14652: hiraṇyavarṇā yajñiyāstāna āpaḥ śivāḥ śaṃ syonā suhavā bhavantu /
GP12garup1_u:14653: eṣor'gho nama iti brāhmaṇahaste jalaṃ dattvānenaiva pātreṇa pavitragrahaṇaṃ kṛtvā saṃstravaṃ pavitraṃ ca brāhmaṇapārśve dadyāt /
GP12garup1_u:14654: tataḥ prathamapātre saṃstravajalaṃ saṃsthāpya kuśopari ūrdhvamukhaṃ sthāpanaṃ kuryat /
GP12garup1_u:14656: viśvebhyo devebhyaḥ etāni gandhapuṣpadhūpadīpavāso yugayajño pavītāni namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14659: tataḥ pitṛpitāmahaprapitāmahānāṃ mātāmahapramātāmahavṛddhapramātāmahānāṃ sapatnīkānāṃ śrāddhamahaṃ kariṣye iti anujñāvacanam /
GP12garup1_u:14662: oṃ amukagotrebyo 'smatpitṛpitāmahebhyo yathānāmaśarmabhyaḥ sapatnīkebhyaḥ idamāsanaṃ svadhā iti brāhmaṇavāme āsanadānam /
GP12garup1_u:14667: oṃ āyantu naḥ pitaraḥ saumyāso 'gniṣvāttāḥ pathibhirdevayānaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14669: oṃ apahatā surā rakṣāṃsi vediṣadaḥ iti tilavikiraṇam /
GP12garup1_u:14672: pratnamadbhiḥ pṛktaḥ svadhayā pitṝṃllokānprīṇīhi naḥ svāhā iti tiladānam // GarP_1,218.12 //
GP12garup1_u:14673: gandhapuṣpe hastābhyāṃ dattvā pitṛpātramutthāpya yā divyeti paṭhitvā amukagotrāsmatpitaḥ ! amukadevaśarman ! sapatnīka ! eṣa te 'rghyaḥ svadhā /
GP12garup1_u:14674: apavitraṃ pātraṃ gṛhītvā vāmapārśve dakṣiṇe kuśopari oṃ pitṛbhyaḥ sthānamasītyadhomukhapātrasthāpanam // GarP_1,218.13 //
GP12garup1_u:14677: amukagotrebhyo 'smatpitṛpitāmaha prapitāmahebhyaḥ sapatnīkebhya etāni gandhapuṣpadhūpadīpavāsoguṇasottarīyayajñopavītāni vaḥ svadhā pitṛtīrthena gandhādidānam /
GP12garup1_u:14683: tato ghṛtāktamannaṃ gṛhītvā dakṣiṇopavītī pitṛbrāhmaṇam oṃ agnau karaṇamahaṃ kariṣye /
GP12garup1_u:14684_0: oṃ kuruṣveti tenokte oṃ agnaye kavyavāhanāya svāhā iti āhutidvayaṃ devabrāhmaṇahaste
GP12garup1_u:14684_1: dattvā avaśiṣṭānnaṃ piṇḍārthaṃ sthāpayitvā aparamardhaṃ pitrādipātre mātāmahādipātre
GP12garup1_u:14685: pātramudrādi nidhāya kuśaṃ dattvā adhomukhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ pātraṃ gṛhītvā oṃ pṛthivīte pātraṃ dyaurapidhānaṃ brāhmaṇasya mukhe amṛte amṛtaṃ juhomi svāhā pātrābhimantraṇam /
GP12garup1_u:14690: oṃ nihanmi sarvaṃ yadamedhyavadbhaveddhatāśca sarve 'suradānavā mayā /
GP12garup1_u:14691: rakṣāṃsi yakṣāḥ sapiśācasaṅghā hatā mayā yātudhānāśca sarve iti siddhārthavikiraṇam // GarP_1,218.16 //
GP12garup1_u:14692: tato dhūrilocanasaṃjñakebhyodavebhya etadannaṃ saghṛtaṃ sapānīyaṃ savyañjanaṃ svāheti vārikuśādyairanusaṅkalpanam /
GP12garup1_u:14694_0: tato viparītopavītena savyañjanaṃ saghṛtamannaṃ pitrādi brāhmaṇapātre nidhāya tadupari
GP12garup1_u:14694_1: bhūmisaṃlagnakuśaṃ dattvā oṃ pṛthivī te pātraṃ iti mantreṇa uttānābhyāṃ pātraṃ gṛhītvā
GP12garup1_u:14694_2: oṃ idaṃ viṣṇorityannopari uttānaṃ dvijāṅguṣṭhaṃ niveśayet /
GP12garup1_u:14696: bhūmipātitavāmajānuḥ amukagotrebhyaḥ asmatpitṛpitāmahebhyaḥ sapatnīkebhyaḥ etadannaṃ saghṛtaṃ sapānīyaṃ savyañjanaṃ pratiṣiddhavarjitaṃ svadhā /
GP12garup1_u:14697: annaṃ saṅkalpya oṃ ūrjaṃ vahantīramṛtaṃ ghṛta payaḥ kīlālaṃ paristrutaṃ svadhāstu tarpayata me pitaram /
GP12garup1_u:14700_0: oṃ bhūrbhuvaḥ svastatsaviturvareṇyaṃ bhargodevasya dhīmahi dhiyo yo naḥ pracodayāt
GP12garup1_u:14700_1: iti visajayitvā oṃ madhuvātā ṛtāyate madhukṣarantu sindhavaḥ mādhvīrnaḥ santvoṣadhīrmadhunaktamutoṣaso
GP12garup1_u:14701: madhudyaurastu naḥ pitā madhumānno vanaspatiḥ madhumānastu sūryo mādhvīrgāvo bhavantu naḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14702: madhu madhu madhu iti japaḥ // GarP_1,218.19 //
GP12garup1_u:14706: cakravākāḥ śarādvīpe haṃsāḥ sarasi mānase // GarP_1,218.20 //
GP12garup1_u:14710: oṃ agnidagdhāśca ye jīvā ye 'pyadagdhāḥ kule mama /
GP12garup1_u:14711: bhūmau dattena tṛpyantu tṛptā yāntu parāṅgatim /
GP12garup1_u:14712: iti bhūmau kuśopari saghṛtamannaṃ jalaplutaṃ vikiret // GarP_1,218.22 //
GP12garup1_u:14713: tato brāhmaṇakrameṇa jalagaṇḍūṣaṃ dattvā pūrvavatsavyāhṛtikāṃ gāyattrīṃ madhuvātetitryṛcaṃ japtvā oṃ rucitaṃ bhavadbhiriti devabrāhmaṇapraśraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14716: pitrādibrāhmaṇaṃ vāmopavītena oṃ tṛptāḥ stha iti praśraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14717: oṃ tṛptāḥ sma iti tenokte bhūmyabhyukṣaṇaṃ maṇḍalacatuṣkoṇaṃ ti lavikiraṇam // GarP_1,218.23 //
GP12garup1_u:14718: oṃ amukagotra ! asmatpitaḥ ! amukadevadarśan ! sapatnīka ! etatte piṇḍāsanaṃ svadhā /
GP12garup1_u:14719_0: itthaṃ rekhāmadhye pitāmahāya khavyāhṛtikāṃ gāyattrīṃ madhuvāteti trarjapannannaṃ
GP12garup1_u:14719_1: sājyaṃ piṇḍaṃ kṛtvā kuśopari amukagotra asmatpitaḥ ! amukadevaśraman ! sapatnīka
GP12garup1_u:14721: tataḥ savyāhṛtikāṃ gāyattrīṃ madhuvāteti trirjaṃpanpiṇḍavikiraṇaṃ piṇḍāntike /
GP12garup1_u:14722_0: oṃ lepabhujaḥ prīyantamiti staraṇkuśeṣu hastamārjanaṃ prakṣālitapiṇḍodakena oṃ amukagotra
GP12garup1_u:14722_1: ! asmatpitaḥ ! amukaśarman sapatnīka etatte jalamavanekṣva ye cātratvāmanujāśca tvāmanu
GP12garup1_u:14723: piṇḍapātramadhomukhaṃ kṛtvā baddhāñjaliḥ oṃ pitaro mādayadhvaṃ yathābhāgamāvṛṣāyadhvamiti japet /
GP12garup1_u:14724: apaḥ spṛṣṭvā vāmena parāvṛttya udaṅmukhaḥ prāṇāṃstriḥ saṃyamya ṣaḍbhya ṛtubhyo namaḥ iti japaḥ // GarP_1,218.24 //
GP12garup1_u:14727: dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ amī madantaḥ pitaro yathābhāgamāvṛṣāyiṣata iti japaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14728: vāsaḥ śithilīkṛtvāñjaliṃ kṛtvā oṃ namo vaḥ pitaro namo vaḥ iti japaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14730: tataḥ sadā vaḥ pitaro dveṣma iti vīkṣya etadvaḥ pitaro vāsa ityuccārya amukagotra etatte vāsaḥ svadhā iti sūtradānam /
GP12garup1_u:14731: vāmena pāṇinā udakapātraṃ gṛhītvā ūrjaṃ vahantīramṛtaṃ ghṛtaṃ payaḥ ityādi piṇḍopari dhārātyāgaḥ // GarP_1,218.25 //
GP12garup1_u:14732_1: kuśapatrañca dattvā oṃ akṣannamīmadantahya va priyā adhūṣata astoṣatasvabhānavo viprā naviṣṭhayāmatī /
GP12garup1_u:14733: yo jānvindra te harīti trirjapaḥ // GarP_1,218.26 //
GP12garup1_u:14736: oṃ apāṃ madhye sthitā devāḥ sarvamapsu pratiṣṭhitam /
GP12garup1_u:14737: brāhmaṇasya kare nyastāḥ śivā āpo bhavantu naḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14742: akṣataṃ cāstu me puṇyaṃ śāntiḥ puṣṭirdhṛtiśca me /
GP12garup1_u:14748: oṃ aghorāḥ pitaraḥ santu gotraṃ no vardhatāṃ--dātāro no 'bhivardhantāṃ vedāḥ santatireva ca /
GP12garup1_u:14749: śraddhā ca no mā vyagamadbahudeyañca no 'stviti /
GP12garup1_u:14751: yācitāraśca naḥ santu mā ca yāciṣma kañcana /
GP12garup1_u:14755: kuśapavitraṃ gṛhītvātena kuśena pitrādibrāhmaṇaṃ spṛṣṭvā svadhāṃ vācayiṣye-oṃ vācyatāṃ-oṃ pitṛpitāmahebhyo yathānāmaśarmabhyaḥ sapatnīkebhyaḥ svadhocyatām /
GP12garup1_u:14756: astusvadhā ityukte ūrjaṃ vahantīramṛtaṃ ghṛtamiti piṇḍopari vāridhārāṃ dadyāt // GarP_1,218.29 //
GP12garup1_u:14757: tataḥ oṃ viśvedevā asminyajñe prīyantā--devabrāhmaṇahaste yavodakadānam /
GP12garup1_u:14758: oṃ prīyantāmiti tenokte oṃ devatābhya iti trirjapet // GarP_1,218.30 //
GP12garup1_u:14759_0: adhomukhaḥ piṇḍapātrāṇi cālayitvā ācamya dakṣiṇopavītī pūrvābhimukhaḥ oṃ amukagotrāya
GP12garup1_u:14761: tataḥ pitṛbrāhmaṇe piṇḍāḥ sampannā iti praśraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14762: susampannā iti piṇḍe kṣīradhārāṃ dattvā piṇḍacālanaṃ atithibrāhmaṇe piṇḍapātramuttānaṃ kṛtvā oṃ vāje vāje vata vājino no dhaneṣu viprā amṛtā ṛtajñāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14763_0: asyamadhvaḥ pibata mādayadhvaṃ tṛptā yāta pathibhirdevayānairiti piṇḍā divisarjanaṃ-āmāvājasya
GP12garup1_u:14763_1: prasavo jagamyādeme dyāvāpṛthivī viśvarūpe āmāgantāṃ pitarā cāmā somo 'mṛtatvena gamyāt /
GP12garup1_u:14769: anena vidhinā śrāddhaṃ kṛtaṃ vai yatra kutracit // GarP_1,218.33 //
GP12garup1_u:14771: ityuktaṃ pārvaṇaṃ śrāddhaṃ pitṝṇāṃ brahmalokadam // GarP_1,218.34 //
GP12garup1_u:14772: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe pārvaṇaśrāddhakathanaṃ nāmāṣṭradaśādhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:14777: oṃ amukagotrāṇāmasmatpitṛpitāmahānāṃ amukaśarmaṇāṃ sapatnīkānāṃ śrāddhaṃ siddhānnena yuṣmāsvahaṃ kariṣye /
GP12garup1_u:14780: jātaputramukhadarśanādau vṛddhi śrāddhaṃ pūrvābhimukheṣu dakṣiṇopavītiṣu sayavabadarakuśairdevatīrthena namaskārāntena dakṣiṇopacāreṇa kartavyam // GarP_1,219.2 //
GP12garup1_u:14781_1: śrāddhe kartavye vasusatyasaṃjñakānāṃ viśveṣāṃ devānāṃ śrāddhaṃ siddhānnenayuṣmāsu
GP12garup1_u:14783: tataḥ amukavṛddhau amukagotrāyā matprapitāmahyā amukadevyā nāndīmukhyāḥ śrāddhaṃ siddhānnena yuṣmāsu mayā kartavyamiti prapitāmahībrāhmaṇāmantraṇam /
GP12garup1_u:14786: āsane oṃ viśvedevāsa āgata śṛṇutāma imaṃrṭha ivam /
GP12garup1_u:14788: oṃ viśvedevāḥ śṛṇutemaṃ ivaṃ ye me antarikṣe ya udadyaviṣṭa /
GP12garup1_u:14789: pe agnijihvā utavā yadatrā āsādyāsminbarhiṣi mādayadhvam /
GP12garup1_u:14796: oṃ vasusatyasaṃjñakebhyo devebhya etadannaṃ saghṛtaṃ sapānīyaṃ savyañjanaṃ savadaraṃ sadadhi pratiṣiddhavarjitaṃ nama iti annasaṅkalpanam /
GP12garup1_u:14797: oṃ amukagotre ! matpitāmahamukadevi nāndīmukhi ! etadannaṃ sabadaraṃ sadadhi namaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14801: adya amukagotrasya matpituramukadevaśarmaṇaḥ pratisāṃvatsarikamekoddiṣṭaśrāddhaṃ siddhānnena yuṣmāsvahaṃ kariṣye /
GP12garup1_u:14805: tatasmṛptiṃ jñātvā dakṣiṇābhimukhīvāmopavītī ucchiṣṭasamīpe agnidagdhā iti annavikiraṇam /
GP12garup1_u:14806: amukagotramatpitaramukadevaśarmannetatte jalamavanenikṣva ye cātra tvāmanuyāśca tvāmanutasmai te svadhā iti rekhopari vāridhārādānam /
GP12garup1_u:14808: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ekonaviṃśādhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:14819_1: kuśaṃ dattvā pātrāntareṇa pidhāya acchidrāvadhāraṇāntaṃ parisamāpya tathaiva piturapi
GP12garup1_u:14821: uddhāṭanaṃ kṛtvā--oṃ ye samānāḥ samanasaḥ pitaro yamarājye /
GP12garup1_u:14822: teṣāṃ lokaḥ svadhā namo yajño deveṣu kalpatām /
GP12garup1_u:14823: oṃ ye samānāḥ samanaso jīvā jīveṣu māmakāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14824: teṣāṃ śrīrmayi kalpatāmasmin loke śataṃ samāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14825: etanmantradvayena pitṛpātrodakaṃ pitāmahaprapitāmahapātre vṛddhaprapitāmahapātraṃ parityajya pitāmahaprapitāmahayorudakaṃ pavitrañca pitṛpātre kṣipet // GarP_1,220.3 //
GP12garup1_u:14827_1: pātramutthāpya oṃ yā divyeti paṭhitvā oṃ amukagotra matpitāmaha amukadevaśarman sapatnīka
GP12garup1_u:14828_1: piṇḍasecanārthaṃ pātrāntareṇa pidhāya pitṛbrāhmaṇavāmapārśva dakṣiṇāgrakuśopari pitṛbhyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:14832_0: aṅguṣṭhaniveśanaṃ tilavikaraṇaṃ kṛtvā amukagotra etatte annaṃ saghṛtaṃ sapānīyaṃ
GP12garup1_u:14832_1: savyañjanaṃ pratiṣiddhavarjitaṃ ye cātra tvā manuyāśca tvāmanu tasmai te svadhā iti // GarP_1,220.5 //
GP12garup1_u:14836: pitāmāhadau praśraṃ kṛtvā pitṛbrāhmaṇam oṃ svaditaṃ bhavadbhiriti praśraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14837: oṃ amukagotra matpitaḥ amukaśarman sapatnīka eṣa te piṇḍo ye cātratvāmanuyāśca tvāmanu tasmai svadheti piṇḍapātramacchidramastu /
GP12garup1_u:14838: tataḥ saṅkalpa siddhivācanaṃ samāpya piṇḍaṃ dvidhā kṛtvā ye samānāḥ sumanasa iti mantradvayaṃ paṭhitvā pitāmahavṛddhaprapitāmahapātreṣu kṣipet /
GP12garup1_u:14843: suprokṣitamastu śivā āpaḥ santu--vṛddhaprapitāmahakrameṇa brāhmaṇahaste jaladānam /
GP12garup1_u:14845: aghorāḥ pitaraḥ santu astvityukte svadhāṃ vācayiṇya iti pitāmāhadibrāhmaṇānujñāpanam // GarP_1,220.7 //
GP12garup1_u:14846: oṃ vācyatāṃ ityukte oṃ pitāmahādibhyaḥ svadhocyatām /
GP12garup1_u:14848: astu svadhetyukte oṃ ūrjaṃ vahantīriti dakṣiṇābhimukhavāridhārātyāgaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14849: oṃ viśvedevā asmin yajñe prīyantāmiti devabrāhmaṇahaste oṃ yavodakadānam /
GP12garup1_u:14851: piṇḍapātrāṇi cālayitvā ācamya pitāmahādibhyo dakṣiṇāṃ dattvā tataḥ pitṛ brāhmaṇāya āśiṣo me pradīyantāmityāśīḥ prārthanam /
GP12garup1_u:14852: pratigṛhyatāmityukte dātāro no 'bhivardhantāmiti pātramuttānaṃ kṛtvā vāje vājedṛvisarjanam /
GP12garup1_u:14855: śrāddhaṃ viṣṇuḥ śrāddhakartā phalaṃ śrāddhādikaṃ hariḥ // GarP_1,220.10 //
GP12garup1_u:14856: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śrāddhānuṣṭhānaṃ nāmaviṃśādhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:14862: śrutaṃ dharmaṃ balaṃ dhairyaṃ sukhamutsāhameva ca /
GP12garup1_u:14863: śoko harati vai nṝṇāṃ tasmācchokaṃ parityajet // GarP_1,221.2 //
GP12garup1_u:14865: karmāṇi prerayantīha puruṣaṃ sukhaduḥ khayoḥ // GarP_1,221.3 //
GP12garup1_u:14867: dānāḥtsvargaśca rājyañca dadyāddanaṃ tato naraḥ // GarP_1,221.4 //
GP12garup1_u:14870: tapasā brahmacaryeṇa yajñaiḥ snānena vā punaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14871: dharmasya nāśakā ye ca te vai nirayagāminaḥ // GarP_1,221.6 //
GP12garup1_u:14874: na dātā sukhaduḥ khānāṃ na ca hartāsti kaścana /
GP12garup1_u:14875: bhuñjate svakṛtānyeva duḥ khāni ca sukhāni ca // GarP_1,221.8 //
GP12garup1_u:14877: santuṣṭaḥ ko na śaknoti phalamūlaiśca vartitum // GarP_1,221.9 //
GP12garup1_u:14879: idameva hi lobhasya kāryaṃ syā datiduṣkaram // GarP_1,221.10 //
GP12garup1_u:14881: lobhānmohaśca māyā ca māno matsara eva ca // GarP_1,221.11 //
GP12garup1_u:14883: yaḥ sa śāntaḥ paraṃ lokaṃ yāti pāpavivarjitaḥ // GarP_1,221.12 //
GP12garup1_u:14884: devatā munayo nāgā gandharvā guhyakā hara /
GP12garup1_u:14885: dhārmikaṃ pūjayantīha na dhanāḍhyaṃ na kāminam // GarP_1,221.13 //
GP12garup1_u:14887: alabhyaṃ labhate martyastatra kā parivedanā // GarP_1,221.14 //
GP12garup1_u:14893: bhūmiṃ sarvaguṇopetāṃ dattvā pāpaiḥ pramucyate // GarP_1,221.17 //
GP12garup1_u:14894: na godānātparaṃ dānaṃ kiñcidastīti me matiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14895: yā gaurnyāyārjitā dattā kṛtsnaṃ tārayate kulam // GarP_1,221.18 //
GP12garup1_u:14897: annena dhāryate sarvaṃ carācaramidaṃ jagat // GarP_1,221.19 //
GP12garup1_u:14901: annātprāṇā balaṃ tejaścānnādvīryaṃ dhṛtiḥ smṛtiḥ // GarP_1,221.21 //
GP12garup1_u:14905: kālena tīrthaṃ phalati sadyaḥ sādhusamāgamaḥ // GarP_1,221.23 //
GP12garup1_u:14907: jñānaṃ śamo dayā dānameṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ // GarP_1,221.24 //
GP12garup1_u:14908: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe dharmasārakathanaṃ nāmaikaviṃśādhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:14913: makṣikā vipruṣo nārī bhuvi toyaṃ hutāśanaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:14918: snānaṃ japyañca kartavyaṃ dinasyānte ca bhojanam // GarP_1,222.3 //
GP12garup1_u:14920: yaśca pāṇitale bhuṅkte aṅgulyā bāhunā ca yaḥ // GarP_1,222.4 //
GP12garup1_u:14927: yastatra bhuṅkte pakvānnaṃ kṛcchrārdhaṃ tasya dāpayet /
GP12garup1_u:14928: teṣāmapi ca yo bhuṅkte kṛcchrapādo vidhīyate // GarP_1,222.8 //
GP12garup1_u:14930: etadannañca yo bhuṅkte dvijaścāndrāyaṇaṃ caret // GarP_1,222.9 //
GP12garup1_u:14939: phalaṃ bhakṣayate tatra ahorātreṇa śudhyati // GarP_1,222.13 //
GP12garup1_u:14941: gāyattryaṣṭasahasrantu drupadāṃ vā śataṃ japet // GarP_1,222.14 //
GP12garup1_u:14955: varṇabāhyena saṃspṛṣṭaḥ pañcarātreṇa vai tadā // GarP_1,222.21 //
GP12garup1_u:14957: striyo bālāśca vṛddhāśca na duṣyanti kadācana // GarP_1,222.22 //
GP12garup1_u:14958: nityamāsyaṃ śuci strīṇāṃ śakuntaiḥ pātitaṃ phalam /
GP12garup1_u:14959: prastrave ca śucirvatsaḥ śvā mṛgagrahaṇe śuciḥ // GarP_1,222.23 //
GP12garup1_u:14960: udake codakasthaṃ tu sthaleṣu sthalajaṃ śuci /
GP12garup1_u:14961: pādau sthāpyau ca tatraiva ācāntaḥ śucitāmiyāt // GarP_1,222.24 //
GP12garup1_u:14963: mūtreṇa surayā miśraṃ tapanaiḥ khalu śudhyati // GarP_1,222.25 //
GP12garup1_u:14971: bhūmauniḥ kṣaipya taddravyaṃ śaucaṃ kṛtvā samāhitaḥ // GarP_1,222.29 //
GP12garup1_u:14972: āranālaṃ dadhi kṣīraṃ takrantu kṛsarañca yat /
GP12garup1_u:14973: śūdrādapi ca tadgāhyaṃ māṃsaṃ madhu tathāntyajāt // GarP_1,222.30 //
GP12garup1_u:14974: gauḍīṃ paiṣṭīñca mādhvīkaṃ viprādiryaḥ surāṃ pibet /
GP12garup1_u:14975: surāṃ pibandvijaḥ śudhyedagnivarṇāṃ surāṃ piban // GarP_1,222.31 //
GP12garup1_u:14976: vipraḥ pañcaśataṃ japyaṃ gāyatryāḥ kṣatriyasya ca śataṃ vipraśca bhuktvānnaṃ pānapātreṇa sūtake // GarP_1,222.32 //
GP12garup1_u:14978: vaiśyaḥ pañcadaśāhana śūdro māsena śudhyati // GarP_1,222.33 //
GP12garup1_u:14980: bāle prete māsike ca sadyaḥ śaucaṃ vidhīyate // GarP_1,222.34 //
GP12garup1_u:14982: jatadantaśca bālaśca kumārī ca trivarṣikā // GarP_1,222.35 //
GP12garup1_u:14990: agnayo yatra hūyante vedo vā yatra paṭhyate // GarP_1,222.39 //
GP12garup1_u:14991: satataṃ vaiśvadevā di na teṣāṃ sūtakaṃ bhavet /
GP12garup1_u:14992: aśuddhe ca gṛhe bhukte trirātrācchudhyati dvijaḥ // GarP_1,222.40 //
GP12garup1_u:14993: brāhmaṇī kṣatriyā vaiśyā śūdrā caiva rajasvalā /
GP12garup1_u:14995: dvirātrataḥ kṣatriyā ca śuddhā vaiśyā hyupoṣitā /
GP12garup1_u:14996: śūdrā snānena śudhyettu droṇārthaṃ na visarjayet // GarP_1,222.42 //
GP12garup1_u:14998: suvarṇādbhaiḥ samabhyukṣya hutāśe ca pratāpayet // GarP_1,222.43 //
GP12garup1_u:14999: kūpe ca patitāndṛṣṭvā śvaśṛgālau ca markaṭam /
GP12garup1_u:15002: asthi carma malaṃ vāpi mūṣikāṃ yadi kūpataḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15003: uddhṛtya codakaṃ pañca gavyācchuddhyettu śodhitam // GarP_1,222.45 //
GP12garup1_u:15011: krīḍāyāṃ śayanīyādau nīlīvastraṃ na duṣyati // GarP_1,222.49 //
GP12garup1_u:15012: nīlīvastraṃ na spṛśecca nīlī ca nirayaṃ brajet /
GP12garup1_u:15013: vrahmaghnaśca surāpaśca steyī ca gurutalpagaḥ // GarP_1,222.50 //
GP12garup1_u:15014: ṛkṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā viśudhyante tatsaṃyogī ca pañcamaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15016: brahmahā dvādaśābdāni kuṭīṃ kṛtvā vane vaset /
GP12garup1_u:15019: vṛṣamekaṃ sahasraṃ gāṃ dadyācca gurutalpagaḥ // GarP_1,222.53 //
GP12garup1_u:15023: asthibhaṅgaṃ gavāṃ kṛtvā śṛṅgabhaṅgamathāpi vā // GarP_1,222.55 //
GP12garup1_u:15024: tvagbhedaṃ pucchanāśe vā māsārdhaṃ yāvakaṃ pibet /
GP12garup1_u:15027: punaḥ saṃskāramāyānti trayo varṇā dvijātayaḥ // GarP_1,222.57 //
GP12garup1_u:15031: antyabhāṇḍasthitāḥ sarve niṣkrāntāḥ śucayaḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,222.59 //
GP12garup1_u:15034: upavāsaḥ pādakṛcchraṃ kṛcchārdhadviguṇaṃ hi yat // GarP_1,222.60 //
GP12garup1_u:15040: ekaikaṃ vardhayetpiṇḍaṃ śukle kṛṣṇe ca hrāsayet // GarP_1,222.63 //
GP12garup1_u:15045: kṣīrasya dvādaśa proktā dadhnastu daśa ucyate /
GP12garup1_u:15046: ghṛtasya māṣakāḥ pañca pañcagavyaṃ malāpaham // GarP_1,222.66 //
GP12garup1_u:15047: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe prāyaścitakathanaṃ nāma dvāviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15050: brahmovāca munibhiścaritā dharmā bhaktyā vyāsa mayoditāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15052: tarpaṇena ca homena sandhyāyā vandanena ca /
GP12garup1_u:15054: dharmo hi bhagavānviṣṇuḥ pūjī viṣṇostu tarpaṇam /
GP12garup1_u:15055: homaḥ sandhyā tathā dhyānaṃ dhāraṇā sakalaṃ hariḥ // GarP_1,223.3 //
GP12garup1_u:15057: pralayaṃ jagato vakṣye tatsarvaṃ śṛṇu śaunaka /
GP12garup1_u:15060: kṛte dharmaścatuṣpācca satyaṃ dānaṃ tapo dayā // GarP_1,223.5 //
GP12garup1_u:15062: caturvaṃṣarsahasrāṇi narā jīvanti vai tadā // GarP_1,223.6 //
GP12garup1_u:15064: śūraścātibalo viṣṇū rakṣāṃsi ca jaghāna ha // GarP_1,223.7 //
GP12garup1_u:15070: catuḥ śatāyuṣo lokā dvijakṣatrodbhavāḥ prajāḥ // GarP_1,223.10 //
GP12garup1_u:15077: aṣṭādaśapurāṇāni yair vedyo harireva hi // GarP_1,223.13 //
GP12garup1_u:15100: sattvaṃ rajastama iti dṛśyante puruṣe guṇāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15102: prabhūtañca yadā sattvaṃ mano burdhondriyāṇi ca /
GP12garup1_u:15103: tadā kṛtayugaṃ vidyājjñāne tapasi yadratiḥ // GarP_1,223.24 //
GP12garup1_u:15109: śokamohau bhayaṃ dainyaṃ sa kalistamasi smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,223.27 //
GP12garup1_u:15118: udvignāḥ santi ca janāḥ piśācasadṛśāḥ prajāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15120: kariṣyenti kalau prāpte na ca pitryodakakriyām /
GP12garup1_u:15121: strīparāśca janāḥ sarve śūdraprāyāśca śaunaka // GarP_1,223.33 //
GP12garup1_u:15123: śiraḥ kaṇḍūyanaparā ājñāṃ bhetsyanti bhartsitāḥ // GarP_1,223.34 //
GP12garup1_u:15127: kṛte yadyyāyato viṣṇuṃ tretāyāṃ japataḥ phalam // GarP_1,223.36 //
GP12garup1_u:15129: tasmāddhyeyo harirnityaṃ geyaḥ pūjyaśca śaunaka // GarP_1,223.37 //
GP12garup1_u:15130: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe yugadharmakathanaṃ nāma trayoviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15136: utiṣṭhanti tadā raudrā divi sapta divākarāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15137: te tu pītvā jalaṃ sarvaṃ śoṣayanti jagattrayam // GarP_1,224.2 //
GP12garup1_u:15139: viṣṇuśca rudro bhūtvāsau pātālāni dahatyadhaḥ // GarP_1,224.3 //
GP12garup1_u:15141: varṣante vai varṣaśataṃ nānāvarṇā mahāghanāḥ // GarP_1,224.4 //
GP12garup1_u:15146: atha prākṛtikaṃ vakṣye pralayaṃ śṛṇu śaunaka // GarP_1,224.6 //
GP12garup1_u:15148: brahmāṇaṃ nyasya dehe hi mukto yogabalairhariḥ // GarP_1,224.7 //
GP12garup1_u:15149: ye gatā brahmaṇaḥ sthānaṃ te 'pi yānti paraṃ padam /
GP12garup1_u:15153: pūrṇe brahmāyuṣi gate bhidyate 'mbhasi līyate // GarP_1,224.9 //
GP12garup1_u:15154: evaṃ sā jagadādhārā toye corvo pralīyate /
GP12garup1_u:15155: āpastejasi līyante tejo vāyau pralīyate // GarP_1,224.10 //
GP12garup1_u:15156: vāyuḥ khe khañca bhūtādau viśate ca tadā mahān /
GP12garup1_u:15160: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe naimittikapralayonāma caturviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15167: yadvinā puruṣārtho na līnaḥ syātparamātmani // GarP_1,225.2 //
GP12garup1_u:15171: yacca piṇḍaṃ prayacchanti yamaloke tadaśnute // GarP_1,225.4 //
GP12garup1_u:15173: pāpakṛdyāti narakaṃ puṇyakṛdyāti vai divam // GarP_1,225.5 //
GP12garup1_u:15175: nābhibhūtañca tasyaiva yāti bījadvayaṃ hi tat // GarP_1,225.6 //
GP12garup1_u:15177: peśyāḥ palasamo 'ṇḍaḥ syādaṅkuraṃ tata ucyate // GarP_1,225.7 //
GP12garup1_u:15180: tvaco romāṇi jāyante keśāścaiva tataḥ param /
GP12garup1_u:15181: naraścādhomukhaḥ sthitvā daśame ca saḥ jāyate // GarP_1,225.9 //
GP12garup1_u:15183: bālatvaṃ tvatha kaumāraṃ yauvanaṃ vṛddhatāmapi // GarP_1,225.10 //
GP12garup1_u:15189: upādhyāyavyalīkaṃ tu kṛtvā śvā bhavati dvija // GarP_1,225.13 //
GP12garup1_u:15193: bhurtuḥ piṇḍamupāśvasto vañjayitvā tameva yaḥ // GarP_1,225.15 //
GP12garup1_u:15197: viśvāsahartā ca naro mīnayonau prajāyate // GarP_1,225.17 //
GP12garup1_u:15209: aśastraṃ puruṣaṃ hartā naraḥ sañjāyate kharaḥ // GarP_1,225.23 //
GP12garup1_u:15210: kṛmiḥ strīvadhakartā ca bālahantā ca jāyate /
GP12garup1_u:15211: bhojanañcorayitvā tu makṣikā jāyate naraḥ // GarP_1,225.24 //
GP12garup1_u:15213: ghṛtaṃ hṛtvā ca nakulaḥ kāko madbhuramāmiṣam // GarP_1,225.25 //
GP12garup1_u:15214: madhu hṛtvā naro daṃśa-pūpaṃ hṛtvā pipīlikaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15215: apo hṛtvā tu pāpātmā vāyasaḥ samprajāyate // GarP_1,225.26 //
GP12garup1_u:15216: hṛte kāṣṭhe ca hārītaḥ kapoto vā prajāyate /
GP12garup1_u:15217: hṛtvā tu kāñcanaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ kṛmiyonau prajāyate // GarP_1,225.27 //
GP12garup1_u:15219: mayūro varṇakaṃ hṛtvā śākapatrañca jāyate // GarP_1,225.28 //
GP12garup1_u:15221: chuchundariḥ śubhāngandhāñchaśaṃ hṛtvā śaśo bhavet // GarP_1,225.29 //
GP12garup1_u:15227: eṣa eva kramo dṛṣṭo gosuvarṇādihāriṇām // GarP_1,225.32 //
GP12garup1_u:15229: asamiddhe hute cāgnau mandāgniḥ khalu jāyate // GarP_1,225.33 //
GP12garup1_u:15233: nikṛtya bandhanaṃ nṝṇāṃ kārpaṇyañca nṛṇāṃ vadhaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15235: dayā bhūteṣu saṃvādaḥ paralokaṃ prati kriyā /
GP12garup1_u:15240: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe karmavipākādikathanaṃ nāma pañcaviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15243: sūta uvāca vakṣye sāṅgaṃ mahāyogaṃ bhuktimuktikaraṃ param /
GP12garup1_u:15245: mameti mūlaṃ duḥ khasya na mameti nivartanam /
GP12garup1_u:15254: mūrtendriyalayaṃ nūnaṃ na tvaṃ rājan na cāpyaham // GarP_1,226.6 //
GP12garup1_u:15255: na tanmātrādikaṃ vācā naivāntaḥ karaṇaṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:15256: kaṃ vā paśyasi rājendra pradhānamidamāvayoḥ // GarP_1,226.7 //
GP12garup1_u:15260: sā muktirbrahmaṇā caikya manaikyaṃ prākṛtairguṇaiḥ // GarP_1,226.9 //
GP12garup1_u:15261: tadgṛhaṃ yatra vasati tadbhojyaṃ yena jīvati /
GP12garup1_u:15262: yanmuktaye tadevoktaṃ jñānājñāne na cānyathā // GarP_1,226.10 //
GP12garup1_u:15266: yamāḥ pañcātha niyamāḥ śaucaṃ dvividhamīritam // GarP_1,226.12 //
GP12garup1_u:15270: laghuryo daśamātrastu dviguṇaḥ sa tu madhyamaḥ // GarP_1,226.14 //
GP12garup1_u:15278: nirudhya niścalo bhūtvā sthito yuñjīta yogavit // GarP_1,226.18 //
GP12garup1_u:15281: prāṇāyāmā daśāṣṭau ca dhāraṇā sā vidhīyate /
GP12garup1_u:15282: dve dhāraṇe smṛto yogo yogibhistattvadarśibhiḥ // GarP_1,226.20 //
GP12garup1_u:15283: prāṅnāḍyāṃ hṛdaye cātra tṛtīyā ca tathorasi /
GP12garup1_u:15284: kaṇṭhe mukhe nā sikāgre netre bhrūmadhyamūrdhasu // GarP_1,226.21 //
GP12garup1_u:15296: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ pṛthivyā malavarjitam /
GP12garup1_u:15301: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ śrotratvakparivarjitam // GarP_1,226.29 //
GP12garup1_u:15303: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotiḥ prāṇāpānavivarjitam // GarP_1,226.30 //
GP12garup1_u:15306: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotisturīyaṃ paramaṃ padam /
GP12garup1_u:15309: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirjñānarūpo vimuktaye // GarP_1,226.33 //
GP12garup1_u:15311: ityaṣṭāṅgo mayā yoga uktaḥ śaunaka muktidaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15313: utpadyante hi saṃsāre naikaṃ yātvā parātmanām /
GP12garup1_u:15315: tato naṃ mriyate duḥ khī na rogī na ca vandhavān /
GP12garup1_u:15316: na pāpairyujyate yogī narake na vipacyate // GarP_1,226.36 //
GP12garup1_u:15317: garbhavāse sa no duḥ khī sa syānnārāyaṇo 'vyayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15322: indro 'pi paramaṃ sthānaṃ gandharvāpsaraso varāḥ // GarP_1,226.39 //
GP12garup1_u:15323: prāptā devāśca devatvaṃ munitvaṃ munayo gatāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15325: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍeṣṭāṅgayogakathanaṃ nāma ṣaḍviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15330: yathā bhaktyā haristuṣyettathā nānyena kenacit // GarP_1,227.1 //
GP12garup1_u:15332: jīvitasya phalaṃ svādu niyataṃ smaraṇaṃ hareḥ // GarP_1,227.2 //
GP12garup1_u:15337: iha nityakriyāḥ kuryuḥ snigdhā ye vaiṣṇavāstu te /
GP12garup1_u:15338: brahmākṣaraṃ na śṛṇvanvai tayā bhagavateritam // GarP_1,227.5 //
GP12garup1_u:15339: praṇāmapūrvakaṃ bhaktyā yo vadedvaiṣṇavo hi saḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15342: yena sarvātmanā viṣṇau bhaktyā bhāvo niveśitaḥ // GarP_1,227.7 //
GP12garup1_u:15347: sa viprendro muniḥ śrīmānsa yāti paramāṃ gatim // GarP_1,227.9 //
GP12garup1_u:15348: tasmai deyaṃ tato grāhyaṃ sa ca pūjyo yathā hariḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15349: smṛtaḥ saṃbhāṣito vāpi pūjito vā dvijottamaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15351: dayāṃ kuru prapannāya tavāsmīti ca yo vadet /
GP12garup1_u:15352: abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo dadyādetad vrataṃ hareḥ // GarP_1,227.11 //
GP12garup1_u:15365: yo bhaktiṃ vahate viṣṇau tena sarvaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavet // GarP_1,227.17 //
GP12garup1_u:15367: na tāṃ yānti gatiṃ bhaktā yāṃ yānti munisattamāḥ // GarP_1,227.18 //
GP12garup1_u:15371: te 'pi yānti paraṃ sthānaṃ nārāyaṇaparāyaṇāḥ // GarP_1,227.20 //
GP12garup1_u:15377: sa maro badhiro jñeyaḥ sarvadharmabahiṣkṛtaḥ // GarP_1,227.22 //
GP12garup1_u:15378: nāmni saṃkīrtite viṣṇoryasya puṃso na jāyate /
GP12garup1_u:15382: svapuruṣamabhivīkṣya pāśahastaṃ vadati yamaḥ kila tasya karṇamūle /
GP12garup1_u:15385: sādhureva sa mantavyaḥ samyagavyavasito hi saḥ // GarP_1,227.26 //
GP12garup1_u:15386: kṣipraṃ bhavati dharmātmā śaśvacchāntiṃ sa gacchati /
GP12garup1_u:15387: viprendra pratijānīhi viṣṇubhakto na naśyati // GarP_1,227.27 //
GP12garup1_u:15388: dharmārthakāmaḥ kiṃ tasya muktistasya kare sthitā /
GP12garup1_u:15389: samastajagatāṃ mūlaṃ yasya bhaktiḥ sthirā harau // GarP_1,227.28 //
GP12garup1_u:15391: tameva ye prapadyante māyāmetāṃ taranti te // GarP_1,227.29 //
GP12garup1_u:15395: toṣameti mahātmāsau yathā bhaktyā janārdanaḥ // GarP_1,227.31 //
GP12garup1_u:15398: patreṣu puṣpeṣu phaleṣu toyeṣvakaṣṭalabhyeṣu sadaiva satsu /
GP12garup1_u:15399: bhaktyaikalabhye puruṣe purāṇe muktyaikalābhe kriyate prayatnaḥ // GarP_1,227.33 //
GP12garup1_u:15401: vaiṣṇavosmatkule jātaḥ sa naḥ santārayiṣyati // GarP_1,227.34 //
GP12garup1_u:15403: muktiṃ gatāḥ smaraṇamātravidhūtapāpāḥ kaḥ saṃśayaḥ paramabhaktimatāṃ janānām // GarP_1,227.35 //
GP12garup1_u:15405: te 'pi mṛtyumatikramya yānti tadvaiṣṇavaṃ padam // GarP_1,227.36 //
GP12garup1_u:15407: niyamyatāṃ mādhava ! me manohayastvadaṅghriśaṅkau dṛḍhabhaktibandhane // GarP_1,227.37 //
GP12garup1_u:15410: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe bhagavadbhaktivivaraṇaṃ nāma saptaviṃśatyadhikadviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15415: yo namet sarvalokasya namasyo jāyate naraḥ // GarP_1,228.1 //
GP12garup1_u:15417: praṇamāmi sadā bhaktyā cetasā hṛdayālayam // GarP_1,228.2 //
GP12garup1_u:15419: taṃ sarvasākṣiṇaṃ viṣṇuṃ namasye parameśvaram // GarP_1,228.3 //
GP12garup1_u:15423: eko hi bhāvaguṇamātradṛḍhapraṇāmaḥ sadyaḥ śvapākamapi sādhayituṃ saśaktaḥ // GarP_1,228.5 //
GP12garup1_u:15425: sa yāṃ gatimavāpnoti na tāṃ kratuśatairapi // GarP_1,228.6 //
GP12garup1_u:15427: ekaḥ kṛṣṇe namaskāro muktyā tāṃstārayiṣyati // GarP_1,228.7 //
GP12garup1_u:15428: āsīno vā śayāno vātiṣṭhan vā yatra tatra vā /
GP12garup1_u:15431: tathāpi narake mūḍhāḥ patantīti kimadbhutam // GarP_1,228.9 //
GP12garup1_u:15432: caturmukho vā yadi koṭivaktro bhavennaraḥ kopi viśuddhacetāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15433: sa vai guṇānāmayutaikadeśaṃ vadenna vā devavarasya viṣṇoḥ // GarP_1,228.10 //
GP12garup1_u:15437: pumān vimucyate sadyaḥ siṃhatrasto mṛgā yathā /
GP12garup1_u:15438: baddhaḥ parikarastena mokṣāya gamanaṃ prati // GarP_1,228.12 //
GP12garup1_u:15439: svapne 'pi nāma spṛśato 'pi puṃsaḥ kṣayaṃ karotyakṣayapāparāśim /
GP12garup1_u:15440: pratyakṣataḥ kiṃ punaratra puṃsā prakīrtite nāmni janārdanasya // GarP_1,228.13 //
GP12garup1_u:15449: kṛṣṇeti vaiṣṇavaṃ kṣāntaṃ japtvā mukto bhavennaraḥ // GarP_1,228.17 //
GP12garup1_u:15451: yadāpnoti tadāpnoti tadāpnoti kalau saṃsmṛtyakeśavam // GarP_1,228.18 //
GP12garup1_u:15453: saṃsārasāgaraṃ tīrtvā sa gacchedvaiṣṇavaṃ padam // GarP_1,228.19 //
GP12garup1_u:15455: spapnāntare na hi punaśca bhavaṃ sa paśyennārāyaṇastutikathāparamo manuṣyaḥ // GarP_1,228.20 //
GP12garup1_u:15456: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇubhaktivivaraṇaṃ nāmāṣṭāviṃśatyuttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15461: dadyātu puruṣasūkteṇa yaḥ puṣpāṇyapa eva ca // GarP_1,229.1 //
GP12garup1_u:15463: yo na pūjayate viṣṇuṃ taṃ vidyādbrahmaghātakam // GarP_1,229.2 //
GP12garup1_u:15465: taṃ yo na dhyāyate viṣṇuṃ sa viṣṭhāyāṃ krimirbhavet // GarP_1,229.3 //
GP12garup1_u:15467: kintvayā nārcito devaḥ keśavaḥ kleśanāśanaḥ // GarP_1,229.4 //
GP12garup1_u:15469: yo dadāti svakaṃ lokaṃ sa tvayā kiṃ na cārcitaḥ // GarP_1,229.5 //
GP12garup1_u:15470: na tatkaroti sā mātā na pitā nāpi bāndhavaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15475: toṣameti mahātmāsau yathā bhaktyā janārdanaḥ // GarP_1,229.8 //
GP12garup1_u:15478: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇupūjānirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonatriśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15482: ālokya sarvaśāstrāṇi vicārya ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15483: idamekaṃ suniṣpannaṃ dhyeyo nārāyaṇaḥ sadā // GarP_1,230.1 //
GP12garup1_u:15484: kiṃ tasya dānaiḥ kintīrthaiḥ kiṃ tapobhiḥ kimadhvaraiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15485: yo nityaṃ dhyāyate devaṃ nārāyaṇamananyadhīḥ // GarP_1,230.2 //
GP12garup1_u:15491: prāyaścittantu tasyaikaṃ hareḥ saṃsmaraṇaṃ param // GarP_1,230.5 //
GP12garup1_u:15495: yā kācinmanaso vṛttiḥ sā bhavatyacyutāśrayāt // GarP_1,230.7 //
GP12garup1_u:15497: bhuñjañjāgracca govindaṃ mādhavaṃ yaśca saṃsmaret // GarP_1,230.8 //
GP12garup1_u:15500: dhyānameva paro dharmo dhyānameva paraṃ tapaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15501: dhyānameva paraṃ śaucaṃ tasmāddhyānaparo bhavet // GarP_1,230.10 //
GP12garup1_u:15502: nāsti viṣṇoḥ paraṃ dhtheyaṃ tapo nānaśanātparam /
GP12garup1_u:15504: yaddurlabhaṃ paraṃ prāpyaṃ manaso yanna gocaram /
GP12garup1_u:15507: smaraṇādeva tadviṣṇoḥ saṃpūrṇaṃ syāditi śrutiḥ // GarP_1,230.13 //
GP12garup1_u:15511: prāpnoti yogī yogāgnidagdhakarmā ca yo 'cirāt // GarP_1,230.15 //
GP12garup1_u:15513: tathā cittasthite viṣṇau yoginā sarvakilbiṣam // GarP_1,230.16 //
GP12garup1_u:15515: saṃpluṣṭo vāsudevena manuṣyāṇāṃ sadā malaḥ // GarP_1,230.17 //
GP12garup1_u:15517: yatpāpaṃ nilayayāti smṛte naśyati taddharau // GarP_1,230.18 //
GP12garup1_u:15521: na krāmenmānasaṃ tasya yasya cetasi keśavaḥ // GarP_1,230.20 //
GP12garup1_u:15522: sā tithistadahorātraṃ sa yogaḥ sa ca candramāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15523: lagnaṃ tadeva vikhyātaṃ yatra saṃsmaryate hariḥ // GarP_1,230.21 //
GP12garup1_u:15525: canmuhūrtaṃ kṣaṇo vāpi vāsudevo na cintyate // GarP_1,230.22 //
GP12garup1_u:15526: kalau kṛta yugaṃ tasya kalistasya kṛte yuge /
GP12garup1_u:15527: hṛdi no yasya govindo yasya cetasi nācyutaḥ // GarP_1,230.23 //
GP12garup1_u:15529: govinde niyataṃ cetaḥ kṛtakṛtyaḥ sadaiva saḥ // GarP_1,230.24 //
GP12garup1_u:15532: asaṃtyajya ca gārhasthayaṃ sa taptvā ca mahattapaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15534: kṣamāṃ kurvanti kruddheṣu dayāṃ mūrkheṣu mānavāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15541: ūrdhvā hyeva gatiścāsti kiṃ punarjñānināṃ nṛṇām // GarP_1,230.30 //
GP12garup1_u:15543: narakadvāraśamanī sā kimarthaṃ na sevyate // GarP_1,230.31 //
GP12garup1_u:15544: na ca durvāsasaḥ śāpo rājyañcāpi śacīpateḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15545: hantuṃ samarthaṃ hi sakhe hṛtkṛte madhusūdane // GarP_1,230.32 //
GP12garup1_u:15547: nāpayāti yadā cintā siddhāṃ manyeta dhāraṇām // GarP_1,230.33 //
GP12garup1_u:15550: na hi dhyānena sadṛśaṃ pavitramiha vidyate /
GP12garup1_u:15551: śvapacānnāni bhuñjāno pāpī naivātra lipyate // GarP_1,230.35 //
GP12garup1_u:15553: yadi nārāyaṇe 'pyevaṃ ko na mucyeta bandhanāt // GarP_1,230.36 //
GP12garup1_u:15555: viṣṇubhaktiryasya citte kaṃ vā jīvo nametsadā /
GP12garup1_u:15556: sa tārayati cātmānaṃ tadaiva duritārṇavāt // GarP_1,230.37 //
GP12garup1_u:15557: tañjñānaṃ yatra govindaḥ sā kathā yatra kāśavaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15559: sā jihvā yā hariṃ stauti taccittaṃ yattadarpitam /
GP12garup1_u:15560: tāveva kevalau ślāghyau yau tatpūjākarau karau // GarP_1,230.39 //
GP12garup1_u:15561: praṇāmamīśasya śiraḥ phalaṃ vidustadarcanaṃ pāṇiphalaṃ divaukasaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15562: manaḥ phalaṃ tadguṇakarmacintanaṃ vacastu govindaguṇastutiḥ phalam // GarP_1,230.40 //
GP12garup1_u:15566: sarvaṃ nārāyaṇe nyasya kurvannapi na limpati // GarP_1,230.42 //
GP12garup1_u:15568: carācaraṃ jagatsarvaṃ prasuptaṃ māyayā tava // GarP_1,230.43 //
GP12garup1_u:15569: yasminnyastamatirna yāti narakaṃ svargo 'pi yaccintane vighno yatra navā viśetkathamapi brāhmo 'piloko 'lpakaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15570: muktiñcetasi saṃsthito jaḍadhiyāṃ puṃsāṃ dadātyavyayaḥ kiñcitraṃ yadayaṃ prayāti vilayaṃ tatrācyute kīrtite // GarP_1,230.44 //
GP12garup1_u:15572: gantuṃ duḥ khodadheḥ kuryurye ca tatra naranti te // GarP_1,230.45 //
GP12garup1_u:15573: rāṣṭrasya śaraṇaṃ rājā pitaro bālakasya ca /
GP12garup1_u:15574: dharmaśca sarvamartyānāṃ sarvasya śaraṇaṃ hariḥ // GarP_1,230.46 //
GP12garup1_u:15576: na yebhyo vidyate tīrthamadhikaṃ munisattam // GarP_1,230.47 //
GP12garup1_u:15579: śūdraṃ vā bhagavadbhaktaṃ niṣādaṃ śvapacaṃ tathā /
GP12garup1_u:15580: dvijajāti samaṃmanyo na yāti narakaṃ naraḥ // GarP_1,230.49 //
GP12garup1_u:15582: tathā viśvasya kartāraṃ ko na mucyeta bandhanāt // GarP_1,230.50 //
GP12garup1_u:15591: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe viṣṇumahātmyavarṇanaṃ nāma triṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15596: pūrvaṃ mātṛgaṇāḥ sarve śaṅkaraṃ vākyamabruvan // GarP_1,231.1 //
GP12garup1_u:15600: bhavatībhiḥ prajāḥ sarvā rakṣaṇīyā na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15604: trailokye bhakṣyamāṇe tu tadā mātṛgaṇena vai /
GP12garup1_u:15615: yādṛśena rūpeṇa dhyāto rudraistu bhaktitaḥ // GarP_1,231.10 //
GP12garup1_u:15617: praṇipatya tu deveśaṃ tadā tuṣṭāva śaṅkaraḥ // GarP_1,231.11 //
GP12garup1_u:15633: andhakasya vināśāya yā sṛṣṭā mātaro mayā /
GP12garup1_u:15634: anādṛtya tu madvākyaṃ bhakṣyantvadbhutāḥ prajāḥ // GarP_1,231.18 //
GP12garup1_u:15636: pūrvaṃ kṛtvā kathaṃ tāsāṃ vināśamabhirocaye // GarP_1,231.19 //
GP12garup1_u:15640: saṃhṛtya jagataḥ śarma kṛtvā cāntardadhe hariḥ // GarP_1,231.21 //
GP12garup1_u:15644: anādimadhyāntamaja purāṇaṃ parāpareśaṃ jagatāṃ nidhānam // GarP_1,231.23 //
GP12garup1_u:15646: samātṛvargasya karoti mūrtiṃ yadā tadā tiṣṭhati tatsamīpe // GarP_1,231.24 //
GP12garup1_u:15648: prasādya taṃ devavaraṃ sa labdhvā avyājjaganmātṛgaṇebhya eva ca // GarP_1,231.25 //
GP12garup1_u:15649: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe nṛsiṃhastotraṃ nāmaikatriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15654: pṛṣṭaḥ śrīnāradenaiva nāradāya tathā śṛṇu // GarP_1,232.1 //
GP12garup1_u:15656: yaḥ saṃkāre sadā dvandvaiḥ kāmakrodhaiḥ śubhāśubhaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15661: uvāca tamṛṣiṃ śambhuḥ prasannavadano haraḥ // GarP_1,232.4 //
GP12garup1_u:15664: vakṣyāmi śṛṇu duḥ khaghnaṃ bhavabandhabhayāmaham // GarP_1,232.5 //
GP12garup1_u:15666: carācaraṃ jagatsarvaṃ prasuptaṃ yasya māyayā // GarP_1,232.6 //
GP12garup1_u:15668: sa nistarati saṃsāraṃ devānāmapi dustaram // GarP_1,232.7 //
GP12garup1_u:15671: sarva ekārṇave magnā jīrṇā vanagajā iva /
GP12garup1_u:15680: acalaṃ sarvagaṃ viṣṇuṃ sadā dhyāyanvimucyate // GarP_1,232.12 //
GP12garup1_u:15682: vāsudevaṃ guruṃ viṣṇuṃ sadā dhyāyanvimucyate // GarP_1,232.13 //
GP12garup1_u:15688: yogibhiḥ sevitaṃ viṣṇuṃ sadā dhyāyanvimucyate // GarP_1,232.16 //
GP12garup1_u:15690: stutvaivaṃ varadaṃ viṣṇuṃ sadā dhyāyanvimucyate // GarP_1,232.17 //
GP12garup1_u:15695: nāradena purā pṛṣṭa evaṃ sa vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15696: yettena tasmai vyākhyātaṃ tanmayā kathitaṃ tava // GarP_1,232.19 //
GP12garup1_u:15698: avāpsyasi dhruvaṃ tāta ! śāśvataṃ padamavyayam // GarP_1,232.20 //
GP12garup1_u:15702: sa viṣṇuṃ samyagārādhya siddhaḥ padamavāptavān // GarP_1,232.22 //
GP12garup1_u:15706: prayatnādyaḥ paṭhennitya mamṛtatvaṃ sa gacchati // GarP_1,232.24 //
GP12garup1_u:15707: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe kulāmṛtastotraṃ nāma dvātriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15712: dāmodaraṃ prapanno 'smi kinno mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati // GarP_1,233.1 //
GP12garup1_u:15714: adho 'kṣajaṃ prapannosmi kinno mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati // GarP_1,233.2 //
GP12garup1_u:15716: mādhavaṃ ca prapanno 'smi kinno mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati // GarP_1,233.3 //
GP12garup1_u:15718: lokanāthaṃ prapanno 'smi kinno mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati // GarP_1,233.4 //
GP12garup1_u:15720: mahāyogaṃ prapanno 'smi kinno mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati // GarP_1,233.5 //
GP12garup1_u:15722: viśvarūpaṃ prapanno 'smi kinno mūtyuḥ kariṣyati // GarP_1,233.6 //
GP12garup1_u:15729: idaṃ yaḥ paṭhate bhaktyā trikālaṃ niyataṃ śuciḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15732: vicintya sūryādatirājamānaṃ mṛtyuṃ sa yogi jitavāṃstathaiva // GarP_1,233.11 //
GP12garup1_u:15733: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe mārkaṇḍeyakṛtaṃ mṛtyvaṣṭakastotraṃ nāma trayastriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15738: brahmā pṛṣṭo nāradāya yathovāca tathā param // GarP_1,234.1 //
GP12garup1_u:15741: pratyahaṃ cārcanākāle tathā tvaṃ vaktumarhasi // GarP_1,234.2 //
GP12garup1_u:15743: saphalaṃ jīvitaṃ teṣāṃ ye stuvanti sadācyutam // GarP_1,234.3 //
GP12garup1_u:15746: śṛṇu yena stutaḥ samyak pūjākāle prasīdati // GarP_1,234.4 //
GP12garup1_u:15758: namaḥ śivāya sūkṣmāya purāṇāya namonamaḥ // GarP_1,234.10 //
GP12garup1_u:15778: jaya vedāntavidvedya jaya sarvada mādhava // GarP_1,234.20 //
GP12garup1_u:15780: jaya sūkṣma cidāndana jaya cittanirañjana // GarP_1,234.21 //
GP12garup1_u:15782: jaya nātha jagatpuṣṭa (tpūjya) jaya viṣṇo namo 'stūte // GarP_1,234.22 //
GP12garup1_u:15787: tvaṃ prabho chalabhṛdrāmastvaṃ punaḥ sa kharāntakaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15790: tvaṃ suparṇastathā cakraṃ tvaṃ gadā śaṅkha eva ca // GarP_1,234.26 //
GP12garup1_u:15791: tvaṃ śrīḥ prabho tvaṃ muṣṭisatvaṃ tvaṃ mālā deva śāvatī /
GP12garup1_u:15792: śrīvatsaḥ kaustubhastvaṃ hi śārṅgo tvaṃ ca tatheṣudhiḥ // GarP_1,234.27 //
GP12garup1_u:15793: tvaṃ khaḍgacarmaṇā sārdhaṃ tvaṃ dikpālāstathā prabho /
GP12garup1_u:15794: tvaṃ vedhāstvaṃ vidhātā ca tvaṃ yamastvaṃ hutāśanaḥ // GarP_1,234.28 //
GP12garup1_u:15796: tvaṃ rakṣo 'dhipatiḥ sādhyastvaṃ vāyustvaṃ niśākaraḥ // GarP_1,234.29 //
GP12garup1_u:15797: ādityā vasavo rudrā aśvinau tvaṃ marudgaṇāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15798: tvaṃ daityā dānavā nāgāstvaṃ yakṣā rākṣasāḥ khagāḥ // GarP_1,234.30 //
GP12garup1_u:15800: bhūtāni viṣayastvaṃ hi tvamavyaktendriyāṇi ca // GarP_1,234.31 //
GP12garup1_u:15803: tvaṃ vedī tvaṃ hare dīkṣā tvaṃ yūpastvaṃ hutāśanaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15804: tvaṃ patnī tvaṃ puroḍāśastvaṃ śālā strukca tvaṃ stuvaḥ // GarP_1,234.33 //
GP12garup1_u:15805: grāvāṇaḥ sakalaṃ tvaṃ hi sadasyāstvaṃ sadākṣiṇaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15806: tvaṃ sūrpādistvaṃ ca brahmā musalolūkhale dhruvam // GarP_1,234.34 //
GP12garup1_u:15807: tvaṃ hotā yajamānastvaṃ tvaṃ dhānyaṃ paśuyājakaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15812: tava rūpamidaṃ sarvaṃ dṛṣṭyarthaṃ saṃprakāśitam // GarP_1,234.37 //
GP12garup1_u:15826: kṣantumarhasi tatsarvaṃ yatkṛtaṃ na kṛtaṃ mayā // GarP_1,234.44 //
GP12garup1_u:15827: na śaknomi vibho samyakkartuṃ pūjāṃ yathoditām /
GP12garup1_u:15830: divā rātrau ca sandhyāyāṃ sarvāvasthāsu ceṣṭataḥ // GarP_1,234.46 //
GP12garup1_u:15832: śarire na (ṇa) tathā prītirna ca dharmādikeṣu ca // GarP_1,234.47 //
GP12garup1_u:15834: kiṃ tena na kṛtaṃ karma svargamokṣādisādhanam // GarP_1,234.48 //
GP12garup1_u:15836: pūjāṃ kartuṃ tathā stotraṃ kaḥ śaknoti tavācyuta // GarP_1,234.49 //
GP12garup1_u:15837: stutaṃ tu pūjitaṃ me 'dya tatkṣamasva namo 'stu te /
GP12garup1_u:15839: stauhi viṣṇuṃ mune bhaktyā yadīcchasi paraṃ padam // GarP_1,234.50 //
GP12garup1_u:15840: stotreṇānena yaḥ stauti pūjākāle jagadghurum // GarP_1,234.51 //
GP12garup1_u:15842: anyo 'pi yo japedbhaktyā trisandhyaṃ niyataḥ śuciḥ // GarP_1,234.52 //
GP12garup1_u:15844: putrārtho labhate putrānbaddho mucyate bandhanāt // GarP_1,234.53 //
GP12garup1_u:15846: vidyārtho labhate vidyāṃ bhagyaṃ kīrti ca vindati // GarP_1,234.54 //
GP12garup1_u:15848: sa dhanyaḥ sarvavitprājñaḥsa sādhuḥ sarvakarmakṛt // GarP_1,234.55 //
GP12garup1_u:15850: asaṃbhāṣyā hi te sarve sarvadharmabahiṣkṛtāḥ // GarP_1,234.56 //
GP12garup1_u:15852: na śuddhaṃ vidyate tasya mano vākca durātmanaḥ // GarP_1,234.57 //
GP12garup1_u:15858: sakalamunibhirādyaścintyate yo hi śuddho nikhilahṛdi niviṣṭo vetti yaḥ sarvasākṣī /
GP12garup1_u:15859: tamajamamṛtamīśaṃ vāsudevaṃ nato 'smi bhayamaraṇavihīnaṃ nityamānandarūpam // GarP_1,234.60 //
GP12garup1_u:15860: nikhilabhuvana nāthaṃ śāśvataṃ suprasannaṃ tvativimalaviśuddhaṃ nirguṇaṃ bhavapuṣpaiḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15861: sukhamuditasamastaṃ pūjayāmyātmabhāvaṃ viśatu hṛdayapadme sarvasākṣī cidātmā // GarP_1,234.61 //
GP12garup1_u:15863: tasmādvicintyaḥ parameśvaro 'sau vimuktikāmena nareṇa samyak // GarP_1,234.62 //
GP12garup1_u:15865: sañcintya viṣṇuṃ paramadvitīyaṃ kastatra yogī na laṃya prayāti // GarP_1,234.63 //
GP12garup1_u:15866: imaṃ stavaṃ yaḥ satataṃ manuṣyaḥ paṭhecca tadvatprayataḥ praśāntaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15867: sa dhūtapāpmā vitataprabhāvaḥ prayāti lokaṃ vitataṃ murāreḥ // GarP_1,234.64 //
GP12garup1_u:15868: yaḥ prārthayatyarthamaśeṣasaukhyaṃ dharmaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca tathaiva mokṣam /
GP12garup1_u:15869: sa sarvamutsṛjya paraṃ purāṇaṃ prayāti viṣṇuṃ śaraṇaṃ vareṇyam // GarP_1,234.65 //
GP12garup1_u:15871: yo vāsudevaṃ vimalaṃ prapannaḥ sa mokṣamāpnoti vimuktasaṅgaḥ // GarP_1,234.66 //
GP12garup1_u:15872: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe 'cyutastotraṃ nāma catustriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15876: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ jyotirviṣṇurityeva cintayan // GarP_1,235.1 //

GP12garup1_u:15878: yathā sarpiḥ śīrasthaṃ gavāṃ na kurute balam // GarP_1,235.2 //
GP12garup1_u:15879: nirgataṃ karmasaṃyuktaṃ dattaṃ tāsāṃ mahā balam /
GP12garup1_u:15880: tathā viṣṇuḥ śarīrastho na karoti hitaṃ naṇām // GarP_1,235.3 //

GP12garup1_u:15887: etatsusaṃyataṃ yasya sa vipraḥ kathyate budhaiḥ (dhaḥ) /
GP12garup1_u:15888: paravittaṃ na gṛhṇāti na hiṃsāṃ kurute tathā // GarP_1,235.7 //
GP12garup1_u:15892: satyaṃ hitaṃ mitaṃ brūte yasmādvāktasya saṃyatā // GarP_1,235.9 //
GP12garup1_u:15896: bhruvormadhye sthitāṃ buddhiṃ viṣayeṣu yunakti yaḥ // GarP_1,235.11 //
GP12garup1_u:15900: hṛdi sthitaḥ sa tamasā mohito na smaratyapi /
GP12garup1_u:15901: yadā tasya kuto veti suṣuptiriti kathyate // GarP_1,235.14 //
GP12garup1_u:15902: jāgrato yasya no tandrā na moho na bhramastathā /
GP12garup1_u:15905: buddhyāhaṅkāramapi ca prakṛtyā buddhimeva ca // GarP_1,235.16 //
GP12garup1_u:15906: saṃyamya prakṛtiṃ cāpi cicchaktyā kevale sthitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15911: puryaṣṭakasya padmasya patrāṇyaṣṭau ca tāni hi // GarP_1,235.19 //
GP12garup1_u:15913: karṇikāyāṃ sthito devo dehī cidrūpa eva hi // GarP_1,235.20 //
GP12garup1_u:15915: yadā yāti tadā jīvo yāti muktiṃ na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_1,235.21 //
GP12garup1_u:15917: dhyānaṃ samādhirityete ṣaḍ yogasya prasādhakāḥ // GarP_1,235.22 //
GP12garup1_u:15921: madhyo dvādaśamātrastu oṅkāraṃ satataṃ japet // GarP_1,235.24 //
GP12garup1_u:15922: vācake praṇave jñāte vācyaṃ brahma prasīdati /
GP12garup1_u:15927: sahasā saha buddhyā ca pratyāhāreṣu saṃsthitaḥ // GarP_1,235.27 //
GP12garup1_u:15930: tasyaiva brahmaṇā proktaṃ dhyānaṃ dvādaśa dhāraṇāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:15931: tuṣyeta niyato yuktaḥ samādhiḥ so 'bhīdhīyate // GarP_1,235.28*1 //
GP12garup1_u:15932: dhyāyanna calate yasya manobhidhyāyato bhṛśam // GarP_1,235.29 //
GP12garup1_u:15934: dhyeye saktaṃ mano yasya dhyeyamevānupaśyati // GarP_1,235.30 //
GP12garup1_u:15936: dhyeye mano niścalatāṃ yāti dhyeyaṃ vicintayan // GarP_1,235.31 //
GP12garup1_u:15938: dhyeyameva hi sarvatra dhyātā tanmayatāṃ gataḥ // GarP_1,235.32 //
GP12garup1_u:15946: sthityarthaṃ manasaḥ sarvaṃ sthūlarūpaṃ vicintayet // GarP_1,235.36 //
GP12garup1_u:15948: na vinā paramātmānaṃ kiñcijjagati vidyate // GarP_1,235.37 //
GP12garup1_u:15950: oṅkāraṃ paramaṃ brahma dhyāyedabjasthitaṃ vibhum // GarP_1,235.38 //
GP12garup1_u:15952: hṛdi sañcintayetpūrvaṃ pradhānaṃ tasya copari // GarP_1,235.39 //
GP12garup1_u:15956: jñānaṃ tu karṇikā tatra vijñānaṃ kesarāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_1,235.41 //
GP12garup1_u:15958: karṇikāyāṃ sthitaṃ tatra jīvavanniścalaṃ vibhu // GarP_1,235.42 //
GP12garup1_u:15961: hariṃ saṃsthāpya dehābje dhyāyanyo gī ca bhaktibhāk /
GP12garup1_u:15966: jitendriyātmakaraṇo jñānadṛpto hi yo bhavet // GarP_1,235.46 //
GP12garup1_u:15972: sarvabhūteṣu kāruṇyaṃ vidveṣaṃ viṣayeṣu ca // GarP_1,235.49 //
GP12garup1_u:15974: indriyairindriyārthāṃstu na jānāti naro yadā // GarP_1,235.50 //
GP12garup1_u:15976: sarvavarṇāḥ śriyaḥ sarvāḥ kṛtvā pāpāni bhasmasāt // GarP_1,235.51 //
GP12garup1_u:15977: dhyānāgninā ca medhāvī labhate paramāṃ gatim /
GP12garup1_u:15984: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe brahmavijñānasvarūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcatriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:15995: atraivāntargataṃ sarvaṃ śāśvate nādvaye pade // GarP_1,236.4 //
GP12garup1_u:15999: so 'hamasmīti mokṣāya nānyaḥ panthā vimuktaye // GarP_1,236.6 //
GP12garup1_u:16000: śravaṇaṃ mananaṃ dhyānaṃ jñānānāṃ caiva sādhanam /
GP12garup1_u:16003: dvividhaṃ vedavacanaṃ kuru karma tyajeti ca // GarP_1,236.8 //
GP12garup1_u:16010: yadā sarve vimucyante kāmā yesyahṛdi sthitāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16012: vyāpakatvātkathaṃ yāti ko yāti kva sa yāti ca /
GP12garup1_u:16019: yathā te priyātmā naḥ sarveṣāṃ ca tathā priyaḥ // GarP_1,236.16 //
GP12garup1_u:16020: bodhamārge yathā cittaṃ sarveṣāṃ ca tathā mate /
GP12garup1_u:16021: sarvadā sarvabhūtānāṃ sarvasya ca mahāmune // GarP_1,236.17 //
GP12garup1_u:16023: jāgratsvapnaṃ tathā vṛttaṃ sauṣuptasukhameva ca // GarP_1,236.18 //
GP12garup1_u:16025: satyamastu tathā vāṇu aśarīraṃ paraṃ tathā // GarP_1,236.19 //
GP12garup1_u:16026: nāsti cetsukhaduḥ khānāṃ sarveṣāṃ vedanaṃ katham /
GP12garup1_u:16027: sadā sarvatra sarvajñaḥ sarvasya hṛdaye na yet // GarP_1,236.20 //
GP12garup1_u:16029: satya jñānānanta bhinnaṃ syānnasatyaṃ jñānataḥ pṛthak // GarP_1,236.21 //
GP12garup1_u:16032: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ tattvaṃ jñātvā tvakhilavidbhavet /
GP12garup1_u:16042: tathā hi rajjururagaḥ śuktiḥ kārajataṃ yathā /
GP12garup1_u:16051: ekaḥ satyaṃ tathā bhāgī vicāreṇa paraṃ mṛṣā // GarP_1,236.32 //
GP12garup1_u:16053: māyecchayā dvidhā sa syātpatiḥ patnī sukhaṃ jagat // GarP_1,236.33 //
GP12garup1_u:16059: yathā rathādayaḥ svapne santo naiva ca satyataḥ // GarP_1,236.36 //
GP12garup1_u:16060: tathā jāgradavasthāyāṃ bhūtāni na tu sannidhau /
GP12garup1_u:16061: dvairūpyaṃ māyayā yāti jāgratsvapnapadajña (kṣa) yoḥ // GarP_1,236.37 //
GP12garup1_u:16071: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe ātmajñānasvarūpavarṇanaṃ nāma ṣaṭtriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:16084: sarvajñaḥ sarvadarśo ca kṣetrajñastāni paśyanti // GarP_1,237.5 //
GP12garup1_u:16085: yadā prakāśate hyātmā paṭe dīpo jvalanniva /
GP12garup1_u:16093: ahaṃ kāraṃ tathā buddhau buddhiṃ ca prakṛtāvapi /
GP12garup1_u:16094: prakṛtiṃ puruṣe sthāpya puruṣaṃ brahmaṇi nyaset // GarP_1,237.10 //
GP12garup1_u:16095: ahaṃ bahma paraṃ jyotiḥ prasaṃkhyāya vimucyate /
GP12garup1_u:16097: kṣetrajñādhiṣṭhitaṃ vidvānyo veda sa varaḥ kaviḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16099: jñānayajñasya sarvāṇi kalāṃ nārhanti ṣocśīm // GarP_1,237.12 //
GP12garup1_u:16100: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe śrīmadbhagavadgītāsāranirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptatriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:16107: karmaṇā manasā vācā sarvabhūteṣu sarvadā // GarP_1,238.2 //
GP12garup1_u:16109: vidhinā yā bhaveddhiṃsā sā tvahiṃsā prakīrtitā // GarP_1,238.3 //
GP12garup1_u:16111: priyaṃ ca nānṛtaṃ brūyādeṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ // GarP_1,238.4 //
GP12garup1_u:16126: āsanaṃ svastikaṃ proktaṃ padmamardhāsanaṃ tathā // GarP_1,238.11 //
GP12garup1_u:16135: padadvayārthau dvividhau vācyau lakṣyau smatau budhaiḥ // GarP_1,239.2 //
GP12garup1_u:16149: aikyajñānaṃ tu hi bhavedvedāntāddūrato dhruvam // GarP_1,239.9 //
GP12garup1_u:16151: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśākhye ācārakāṇḍe brahmagītāsāravarṇanaṃ nāmaikonacatvāriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:16154: sannapi brahma tasmātkhaṃ marutkhācca tato 'nalaḥ // GarP_1,239.1 //
GP12garup1_u:16156: tataḥ saptadaśaṃ liṅgaṃ pañcakarmendriyāṇi ca // GarP_1,239.2 //
GP12garup1_u:16158: śrotraṃ tvakcakṣuṣī jihvā ghrāṇaṃ syātpañca vāyavaḥ // GarP_1,239.3 //
GP12garup1_u:16160: manontaḥ karaṇaṃ dhīśca syānmanaḥ saṃśayātmakam // GarP_1,239.4 //
GP12garup1_u:16166: pañcīkṛtāni bhūtāni tatkāryaṃ tatsthameva ca // GarP_1,239.7 //
GP12garup1_u:16168: tridhāhri paramātmasthaṃ śarīraṃ procyate budhaiḥ // GarP_1,239.8 //
GP12garup1_u:16172: jāgratsvapnasuṣuptīnāṃ sākṣī jīvaḥ sa ca smṛtaḥ // GarP_1,239.10 //
GP12garup1_u:16188: yathā mṛdo ghaṭo bhinno nāsti tatkāryatastathā // GarP_1,239.18 //
GP12garup1_u:16192: pṛthvyādhāraṃ vinā nāsti vinā nāsti ca tena sā // GarP_1,239.20 //
GP12garup1_u:16193: tejaśca vāyunā nāsti vāyuḥ khena vinā na hi /
GP12garup1_u:16194: yadbrahmaṇā ca khaṃ nāsti śuddha brahma vinā ca kham // GarP_1,239.21 //
GP12garup1_u:16198: tattvaṃpadāntau śiṣṭau ca tatkāro brahmavācakaḥ // GarP_1,239.23 //
GP12garup1_u:16202: satyaṃ jñānamanataṃ hi tvamasīti śrutīritam // GarP_1,239.25 //
GP12garup1_u:16205: gītāsāror'junāyokto yena brahmaṇi vai layaḥ // GarP_1,239.26 //
GP12garup1_u:16206: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe prathamāṃśe ācārakāṇḍe brahmagītāsāro nāmekonacatvāriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup1_u:16210: purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ rudra proktaṃ sāraṃ mayātava /
GP12garup1_u:16213: yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyādrudra sarvavitsa divaṃ vrajet // GarP_1,240.2 //
GP12garup1_u:16215: iti vyāsa mayā viṣṇoḥ purāṇaṃ muktidaṃ śrutam /
GP12garup1_u:16219: mayāpi tubhyaṃ sūtena purāṇaṃ kathitaṃ param // GarP_1,240.4 //
GP12garup1_u:16221: viṣṇuḥ sāratamaṃprāha garuḍaṃ gāruḍaṃ tataḥ // GarP_1,240.5 //
GP12garup1_u:16224: śaunaka pravaraṃ proktaṃ purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ tava // GarP_1,240.6 //
GP12garup1_u:16226: vyāsaḥ śrutvā brahmaṇaśca purāṇaṃ gāruḍaṃ śubham /
GP12garup1_u:16228: aṣṭādaśapurāṇāni tāni māṃ prāha vai śukaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16229: idaṃ tu gāruḍaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ mayā te śaunakeritam // GarP_1,240.8 //
GP12garup1_u:16237: kṣattriyo kṣattriyasyāpi rakṣitā bhavatīha ca // GarP_1,240.12 //
GP12garup1_u:16240: anyasmai ca vadedvidvān brāhmaṇontarito ya di /
GP12garup1_u:16241: brāhmaṇāntaritai sarvaiḥ śrotavyaṃ gāruḍaṃ tvidama // GarP_1,240.14 //
GP12garup1_u:16243: gāruḍaṃ vasurājaśca śrutvā sarvamavāpa ha // GarP_1,240.15 //
GP12garup1_u:16253: na khādyau tau tvayānīcau caturbhujau ca pakṣipa? /
GP12garup1_u:16258: śākhā bhinnā tvayā yatra vālakhilyāḥ samāsthitāḥ // GarP_1,240.22 //
GP12garup1_u:16261: tvayā jitā raṇe devāḥ sarve śakrapurogamāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16262: āhṛtaṃ tatpurā somaṃ vāhniṃ nirvāpya kāśyape // GarP_1,240.24 //
GP12garup1_u:16263: nāgau dṛṣṭiviṣau kṛtvā rajasā tu vicakṣuṣau /
GP12garup1_u:16264: tīkṣṇāgreṇa na sā bhaṅktvāvikravetau manohataḥ? // GarP_1,240.25 //
GP12garup1_u:16265: āhṛtyāpi tvayā somaṃ nītameva na bhaktitaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16266: tena viṣṇordhvajasthānaṃ vāhanatvaṃ gato hyasi // GarP_1,240.26 //
GP12garup1_u:16267: tvayā niḥ kṣipya darbheṣu somaṃ nāgāśca vañcitāḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16268: jahāra cāmṛtaṃ pātraṃ śīghraṃ vai brahmasūdana // GarP_1,240.27 //
GP12garup1_u:16270: vinatā mocitā dāsyātkadvā pūrvajitā raṇe // GarP_1,240.28 //
GP12garup1_u:16271: uccaiḥ śravāḥ sa kiṃvarṇaḥ śukla ityeva bhāṣate /
GP12garup1_u:16275: tasya pakṣasya devendro yadānītaṃ hi dṛṣṭavān /
GP12garup1_u:16276: tadā tava suparṇoti nāma sthānaṃ jagattraye // GarP_1,240.31 //
GP12garup1_u:16282: taduktaṃ gāruḍaṃ puṇyaṃ purāṇaṃ yaḥ paṭhennaraḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16285: yasyedaṃ vartate geha tasya sarvaṃ bhavediha // GarP_1,240.35 //
GP12garup1_u:16286: gāruḍaṃ yasya haste tu tasya hastagato nayaḥ /
GP12garup1_u:16289: putrārtho labhate putrān kāmārtho kāmamāpnuyāt // GarP_1,240.37 //
GP12garup1_u:16290: vidyārtho labhate vidyāṃ jayārtho labhate jayam /
GP12garup1_u:16292: vandhyāpi labhate puttraṃ kanyā vindati satpatim /
GP12garup1_u:16293: kṣemārtho labhate kṣemaṃ bogārtho bogamāpnuyāt // GarP_1,240.39 //
GP12garup1_u:16295: kāvyārtho ca kavitvaṃ ca sārārtho sāramāpnuyāt // GarP_1,240.40 //
GP12garup1_u:16297: idaṃ svastyayanaṃ dhanyaṃ gāruḍaṃ garuḍeritam // GarP_1,240.41 //
GP12garup1_u:16298: nākāle maraṇaṃ tasya ślokamekaṃ tu yaḥ paṭhet /
GP12garup1_u:16303: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe pūrvakhaṇḍe prathamāṃśe ācārakāṇḍe garuḍapurāṇamāhātmyaṃ nāma catvāriṃśaduttaradviśatatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
